headline: A required stop!
content: What is a trip to Key West without a stop at Sloppy Joes?  The food is just ok bar food, and the drinks are just overpriced drinks, but you can't beat the entertainment, staff, and atmosphere!

headline: FUN!
content: We had appetizers here.  Food and service were both very good.  There was a band playing and they were awesome!  Would definitely like to go back to Sloppy Joe's!

headline: Sloppy Joe's
content: I had to go to Sloppy Joe's after hearing that this was the bar Earnest Hemmingway went to. The drinks were great as well as the food. I had a great time there. It was my last day in the keys and I made it...More

headline: Fun as Usual
content: It‚Äôs been several years since we‚Äôve been here. Always enjoy the place. Of course we had to get new t-shirts. Also met some nice people from our home stat and other areas. Everyone was friendly. Service was great.

headline: COUPLES TRIP
content: Went down first week of March.  Great place for eating and entertainment.  This was our second time eating there and the food has always been excellent.  Love the no frills feeling of the place.  Fast service with friendly people.  Will return.

headline: A must experience
content: A very touristy attraction that everyone should experience at least once.  Atmsphere is lively and the drinks were better than any other place visited.

headline: Great start to our Key West vacation
content: We arrived at our hotel earlier in the day and decided to find someplace memorable to satisfy our appetites.  After walking for a while, we came upon Sloppy Joe‚Äôs Bar, a legendary establishment on Duval St.  Karen had the fish and chips and I got...More

headline: Must visit place in Key West
content: Sloppy Joe's is probably one  of the most visited bars on Duvall Street. I really enjoy the music and the place is always packed. People in here tend to be very friendly and maybe that is because most of them are drinking heartily. Always a...More

headline: A Key West Original
content:
You can‚Äôt go to Duval Street without a stop at sloppy Joe‚Äôs Bar.  Live bands, good drinks and friendly staff make it a  ‚ÄòOne of a kind ‚Äò place to visit.
 They have food  and   Sloppy Joe‚Äôs  merchandise too !

headline: Fun night at the bar
content: We only went in for drinks, not food. The place was very busy and fun. They had some really good live bands playing. Drinks were reasonably priced, bartenders were very friendly. This bar is in a great location on Duval St.

headline: What happens in Sloppy Joes...well, good thing there were no cell phone cameras a while ago...
content: So the ORIGINAL location of Sloppy Joe's is around the corner.  What to do, of course, but to enjoy them both !

headline: Very loud!
content: We had lunch there one afternoon. It was very noisy ... you can‚Äôt have a conversation. The service started good and we received our food and drinks in a timely manner however it went downhill from there. Our server NEVER check on us again! We...More

headline: Minnesota Nice
content: The main bar was PACKED so we slid next door to a small eating spot that they have connected to the main bar.  We could hear the music but still be able to hear ourselves talk....had some apps and a beer.....all good!!

headline: This is the bar to go!!!!!!
content: We arrived in Key West on a cruise and there were two things I wanted to do.   One was go to the southernness most point and two go to bars.    Well, after arriving at 7:30 and walking to the southernness most point and back the...More

headline: Has to visit
content: We had to stop in for a beer to say we were here. Great history and an unique place to see. Beer was a beer.

headline: Great place for drinks and some fun
content: Went just for drinks and to see what this place was all about - fun atmosphere, party crowd, good music and service was very good.   Didn't disappoint ... can't comment on food, but would definitely go back next time I'm in the area for a...More

headline: Must visit
content: First stop on our trip to key west.  Great music, drinks and we had the iconic sandwich.  Did not disappoint!

headline: Food Is Second
content: This is a woderful bar to go and drink whatever beverages you want to consume. Also, it is a fun type of place. If you are going here just for the food, you should not gp there. I was pleasantly surprised that the sloppy joe...More

headline: Noisy & crowded
content: People come here to buy tee shirts to prove they‚Äôve visited Hemingway‚Äòa favorite watering hole. Food is not great, alcohol flows freely and you can‚Äôt have a conversation.

headline: Fun night w/ dinner
content: We stopped in to Sloppy Joes on our first night in Key West....there happened to be a group on stage who sounded great and had a fun comedy side too.  It is a first come first serve for seating but we got lucky and found...More

headline: A Must
content: The bar was crowded, noisy, and the service was mediocre at best. How can you go to Key West and not go to Sloppy Joe's?  We would not go again when there are so many wonderful places to eat and imbibe in Key West!

headline: Sloppy Joe's
content: Crowded and noisy and a lot of fun!!!  We had a good time hanging with the people looking at other people.

headline: Sloppy Joes is a must
content: Sloppy Joes is a must when visiting Key West. The service was very fast even on a very crowded day. The food was prepared perfect and it had great entertainment, definitely will visit again!

headline: Must-do bar experience
content: You‚Äôve come to Key West, so you have to come here, it‚Äôs a ‚Äúmust-do‚Äù fantastic bar experience, entertaining live music, food is reasonable but there is far better food all around.

headline: You HAVE TO Experience Sloppy Joe's
content: Anyone who visits Key West HAS TO stop in to experience Sloppy Joe's.  You will have a completely different experience at different times of day. They open at 9 in the morning and close at 4 in the morning! They have something for everyone and...More

headline: Huge place with a lot going on
content: Wander in for real treat (not just the drinks).  What  a fabulous updated, yet still time capsule.  I love the old & new mix going on in here, but especially love the charm & character of the entire place.

headline: Always our favorite!
content: Just returned from Key West...always an awesome time...and some of our highlights are at Sloppy Joe's. Food is okay but the entertainment both day and night is incredible! Great bands, great crowds, great energy! Love this place!

headline: Killer margaritas
content: We stop in at Sloppys all the time, great live music and uncle lou makes the best margaritas in town!

headline: Expected more
content: No big deal, the Original Sloppy Joe was just that....Ground beef in a tangy tomato sauce served on a bun.  Key West has great ambiance for sure.  The trio playing that evening were good.  A little insulting as if they were locals playing for these...More

headline: Fun with Family
content: We stop in after a long walk around town. The bar looked fun everyone looked like they were having fun. The drinks and appetizers we ordered were great. I had a wonderful time there Friendly staff. I would recommend this bar.

headline: Obligatory
content: We were told we had to do this. We had appetizers and drinks. Nothing too special. Historical significance and great ambiance.  Service was good.

headline: Stopped for pictures
content: The history draws you in, but didnt stop to eat. I never realized that sloppy joe sandwiches originated here.

headline: One More Off My Bucket List
content: I always wanted to have a sloppy Joe sandwich at Sloppy Joe's Bar, so while in Key West last month, it's one of the first places I went.  And I wasn't disappointed.  It was so crowded at lunch we had to sit in the bar...More

headline: Top Place to Visit, Great Bar and Music
content: Went to Sloppy Joe‚Äôs several times during our stay. Our server Lou was friendly and efficient getting our drinks. Very lively with lots of friendly travelers and good music. Basic bar menu, food was OK. You can‚Äôt leave Key West without experiencing this famous spot!

headline: Fun bar with live music
content: This is a fun bar on Duvall street. Long Key West establishment with links to Hemingway.  Very much a hang out for active military as well.  Multiple drinks and types of beer on the menu (check out the Rita andRum runner).

headline: A must see and eat
content:
Not much to say exept wow, great food and awesome service , beers cold and very good , the sloppy joes if you dont try you will miss not eating the sandwich!,, hmmmmmmmm 
Live bands are great too

headline: Great atmosphere at Sloppy Joe's Bar
content: We spent a pleasant afternoon in Sloppy Joe's listening to live music and enjoying drinks and a snack. The service was very personable and the drinks and food were also very good.  We arrived mid afternoon and had no trouble finding a seat but the...More

headline: Come & Sit Awhile to Enjoy the Music
content:
The key to enjoying Sloppy Joe's is to join others at a table. It's hard to find an empty table but our experience is that most guests are welcome to meeting new friends.
The Music is always great & available. The food & drinks are...More

headline: Daytime Visit
content: There was nowhere to sit, so we just looked around the place for a bit and then left.  Ummm - it's an interesting place with stuff hanging all over the ceilings & walls.  It's a busy place, for sure, but I'm afraid I can't speak...More

headline: not a locals bar
content: Service was slow as the tourist place was filled with people.  I don't recommend the fish sandwich?  It was something preformed and pre grill marked.  I expected something better being on an island.  The onion rings were good and the adult beverage was also.

headline: Great
content: Very good drinks. Was nice to sit down and have a sloppy Joe. Would recommend going if your in key west.

headline: Joe's tap room porch
content: Great place for a cigar and people watching! The nachos with Sloppy Joe were outstanding! Lance took good care of us!

headline: Iconic venue in an iconic street
content:
Sloppy Joe's is an institution on Key West. We've visited it last time we were here in 2004, and had no doubt to repeat it this year.
So, just after the Mallory's sunset we headed here. Huge selection of beers and terrific live music with...More

headline: Legendary
content: Cold beer, good live music and time famous sloppy joe‚Äôs burger and fries. A must while visiting Key West.

headline: Icon
content: We had to bring the kids just to say we did it. The food was terrible but the family loved the live music and atmosphere.

headline: Yearly Visit to The Florida Keys and Sloppy Joes.
content: One of the most beautiful and historical areas of the Great State of Florida. Pristine living reefs, Gold laden ship wrecks, tragic slave trading ship wrecks, explorers stop over, Ship wrecking Industry, Flagler Railroad, Tourism, Presidents hideaways, Naval Ship Port and Fly Navy Base as...More

headline: Lunch
content:
Good service, at lunch. Food was
 good, not great. Service was good. Music was good! Very short wait!

headline: Not worth all the hype but super impressed how they honor their employees!
content: Obviously everyone wants to go to the iconic sloppy joes! Tables are hard to come by! Once you win the lottery and find one, service is quick and amazing! Food was what I would expect for a place that doesn‚Äôt need to be known for...More

headline: Great Place
content: Great place for drinks, food and music.  Several in our group had the sloppy joes and they said they were very good.  Others had the steak sandwich which was huge and very good.  Of the two, we all thought the steak sandwich was the best...More

headline: Great place to listen to music
content: This is a great place to eat, drink, and listen to some music. Very crowded but an institution in Key West.

headline: Fun place
content: We just came here for drinks. Fun, high energy place. Great entertainment.Lots of fun.Super crowded but worth the wait.

headline: A MUST Visit/Stop in Key West!
content: Sloppy Joe's on Duval Street is a MUST stop/visit when in Key West.  Everyone visiting Key West stops by Joe's; you must, too.  They offer SO many tasty, specialty drinks, and fabulous food, tasty  offerings.  There is always great entertainment, and their shirt shop is...More

headline: One of those places you must stop in
content: This place is aways crowded. Live music - not just at night, but for you day drinkers as well. Take a good look around, because there is a lot to soak in...

headline: Very popular
content: Very nice place to see very big tourist stop. Food was average place is always very crowded. Food was priced on the higher side. That being said I would make the stop just to say I was their.

headline: Great atmosphere good music
content: Stopped in on a recent trip to Key west. Margaretta drink was fabulous. Had fish tacos,Philly cheese steak sandwich excellent. Music was great and they played cat Stevens, Neil Young and many others. Even honoured the Vets in the room. Nice

headline: Best bar in Key West
content: Sloppy Joe‚Äôs lives up-to the hype because it is the best bar in Key West hands down. Live music all day long coupled with good food and bartenders and a historic vibe that should not be missed. Going back for day 3 tonight and I‚Äôm...More

headline: Great atmosphere
content: Music was great and entertaining! Drinks were good and friendly bartender! Even though it was busy , there was seating.

headline: Great Sevice
content:
Great Service!
Had a Bartender named Jordan. What a fine young man, had a great smile and personality. He was very busy but still had time to have to be friendly. Mark and Family

headline: Fun place, great music
content: Stopped by for cocktails and a sloppy joe sandwich after a tour of Hemingway's House where we heard about his history of drinking here.  Brilliant live music and friendly service.  We were lucky enough to get a table without waiting although it was very crowded....More

headline: It‚Äôs a hot spot so it‚Äôs busy
content: It‚Äôs a hot spot so it‚Äôs busy and occasionally hard to find a seat.  I‚Äôve never eaten the food there so I‚Äôm unsure about that.  The drinks are fine, smaller in portion size and moderately priced.   The live music is nice.

headline: Fun place great music
content: This is a must because it‚Äôs a fun bar to hang out at.  The music gets people singing and dancing. Great place to have a good time. Stop in for drinks at the bar.

headline: Fun bar, good music
content: Had drinks and appetizers.  Bar was full. Pretty fun place for a Sunday night. Would definitely go back again.

headline: A must stop while in Key West!
content:
Atmospher was wonderful... Live music, good food and friendly staff!  What more could you ask for!  The musician on stage was very entertaining and was very involved with the crowd. 

Only detriment was you need to find your own table, you had to be quick...More

headline: Live music
content: Great place to take a break and relax.  Great staff and good drinks and food! Sing along or just listen to great live music.

headline: Fun place
content: It's crazy, crowded and fun. There was a great band, and we were fortunate to get a seat, and had fast service. Drinks were good and so was their chili.

headline: Happy Hour!
content: We had a great time at Sloppy Joe‚Äôs!  It was packed.  The live music was great.  The pina colada‚Äôs were great!  We had cheese sticks and conch fritters which were good!  It was a fun afternoon!

headline: We had a blast. Came out the
content: We had a blast. Came out the cruise ship found it easily knew a bit of the history music was great our server Justin made the trip worthwhile can‚Äôt wait to come back!

headline: Soak up that atmosphere
content:
Difficult to convey how busy this place is at 12 mid day. Piano player memorabilia on the walls what an interesting place.

Good pulled pork sandwich and fish tacos  and very efficient service.

headline: Sloppy Joe's Bar
content: Wanted to eat & have a drink. Not possible. The inattentive bartender was talking to someone & never even acknowledged we were at the bar. We were there about 10 minutes. Also, it was so loud we had to shout to each other. Would never...More

headline: Sloppy joes
content: What a fun atmosphere. We went in for lunch. The food was excellent. Our server was so much fun. She spend a lot of time with us telling us about Key West. And there was live music and it was wonderful.

headline: Fun bar
content:
Great band playing 
Good service
Enjoyed watching crazy people dancing in the isles
Sloppy joe was good

headline: Do not miss
content: Fun, fun, fun!!! Good food, great drinks and entertainment all in one. We went for dinner, loved it and went back for lunch next day before we left. Very reasonable prices.

headline: A must do in Key West
content: You have to stop in at this iconic stop, have a blended drink and listen to the music! Every trip to Key West requires a stop at the bar at the end of the world!

headline: gritty bar, but fun atmosphere
content: I went with a group for drinks.  It's a fun, gritty, loud bar that seemingly everyone goes to.  Worth going for a drink or two.

headline: Nice Crowd!
content: There's always a lively crowd there and live music. Noisy and busy but ok. Mozzarella sticks were good. I'm not a drinker...just wanted to check it out.

headline: Fun !
content: Supposedly where Papa Hemingway hung out when he was in Key West, it‚Äôs now a major tourist attraction, although in a slightly different location than when Hemingway visited.  Fun nevertheless, just to get a Mojito and watch the parade outside on the street.

headline: A must do on Duval Street
content: Iconic bar in Key West. Busy, noisy, great music, crowded, good service. Just stop in and find a place to sit down. Had the nachos for a late lunch which were good.

headline: This place gets poppin
content: This place gets poppin when cruise ships come in. Food was average, drinks were good. I particularly liked the key lime drink.

headline: High Energy Bar
content: Sloppy Joe's has live music every day (often a band rather than solo musician), decent menu, good service.

headline: Fair prices good bands
content: Bud lights were $5.50 a bottle and we had the hot roast beef sandwiches. These were like French dips and the roast beef was very tender.  Service is a little slow because they are always so busy but not bad.  We went here at least...More

headline: Booze, food and atmosphere
content: Apparently this is where Hemingway hung out.  Probably for the alcohol and conch fritters.  Loud and lively place.

headline: cheep lunch
content: Guitar with lunch. A standared bar menu food ok but not fine dining. Noisy but a fun place for lunch and an iconic stop when in Key West.

headline: Fun place
content: My husband and I popped in here because it is a must do on Duval Street. The live music and atmosphere was fun and funky. We ordered the sloppy Joe nachos and they were very good. Just perfect for a late lunch.

headline: Fun place!
content: We stopped in Sloppy Joe's for drinks while on a cruise.  The atmosphere is very fun and the staff was great.  We would have stayed longer if we had more time.

headline: A Must Do in Key West
content: A large bar with live music. Many tables that are all full. Loud party atmosphere. Good service, we never waited long for a drink. Part of Key West history.

headline: It's a Bar!
content: First stop on our Key West trip.  The house ale was good.  My wife and I had the Original Sloppy Joes...side of fries separate.  The Sloppy Joe was okay, hard to handle and eat.  It's pretty large but not any better than the homemade sloppy...More

headline: Unfriendly and pushy to pay bar tab
content: We visited Sloppy Joes in 2013 and we‚Äôre excited to return. Disappointed with unfriendly older female bartender who was paranoid because someone recently left without paying their tab that everyone was treated with a pay your tab now and even talked about us with a...More

headline: Landmark establishment.
content: What can anyone say about Sloppy Joe's Bar? Been around since December 5th, 1933! May 5, 1937, is when they moved to their current location. No more words needed. Excellent property, location, offerings. Professional, service oriented, personable staff is just the beginning.

headline: A good time for lunch!
content: Had lunch here with my sister. We shared a Sloppy Joe, and it was very tasty! Fries were crisp and hot. The server was friendly and attentive. Drinks were reasonable and good. The memorabilia of Hemingway on the walls was interesting to read. There was...More

headline: Roudy bar with average food
content: Nothing special here other than some unknown historical significance. Had seafood pizza and fish tacos. Fish tacos were some of the worst I have had. Flavor profile was more like a beef taco, fish tasted like the frozen fish sticks from the grocery store.

headline: Just Ok
content: My fiance and I went here in January. The front half was too crowded, we couldn't get to the bar because a live band was playing, so we walked around the corner and we realized there was a back end so we went there. We...More

headline: So Fun!
content: Great music, nice bartenders and good drinks.  What more could you want.  It's a real gem in Key WestA

headline: Sloppy Joes
content: Sloppy Joe's is always fun and the food, drinks, entertainment and service are top notch! It fills up when the music starts so get your table early and stay a while,  or just stand on the sidewalk and enjoy through the big open windows!

headline: Sloppy Joe's the place
content: This is another spot that we frequent on our annual visit. We go and enjoy the bands, the food and especially the drinks after leaving Fat Tuesday.  The waitresses were awesome as usual and the environment, 1st class.  You have to go, never been a...More

headline: Come here for the music and he people watching
content: There are a few places in KW that are an absolute MUST.  Sloppy Joe's is one of them.  A lot of character and mystique (read legend).  Super drinks, reasonable food, plenty of things to buy in the shop and everyone is nice.

headline: The best bar in Key West
content: If you go to Key West you have to go to Sloppy Joe's it is iconic! It is a true keys bar busy, loud, and fun. They have the best live music around. You will need to just stand, dance, and enjoy yourself...this is not...More

headline: Fun bar and good music
content: Definitely a fun bar with live music. Great place to let loose and just hang out with friends. Lots to choose from drink wise. Didn‚Äôt order much in the way of food, but did try the conch fritters and they definitely weren‚Äôt nearly as good...More

headline: Great place for lunch.
content: Signature sandwich -sloppy joe is excellent. Our waitress was great. Also had a terrific singer. Moderately priced.

headline: Suds and grub.
content: Ice cold beer, music to your ears, and a sloppy joe.  That's why we go!  Can't miss this place, it's right up to pace, with lots of fun . . . No time to run!  Sit back a spell, hoot, holler and yell.  No body...More

headline: Evening Visit
content: Stopped in for a drink and stayed a few hours! Awesome place and enjoyed the music and it wasn‚Äôt blaring at you.

headline: Fun atmosphere
content: We came here for lunch and they had live music. We had the pork tacos and the sloppy joe sandwich. Both were really good and our server was great. I would definitely come back. Great live music too

headline: Awesome Bar with great entertainment and bar food
content: All of the people who work there were fun to be around.  You go there for the drinks and the entertainment, and if you like bar food, their food is just as good as anyone other place that serves bar food.  The had good draft...More

headline: Great hangout
content: Spent one afternoon at the bar here. Great scene for people watching.  Had the best Mahi Mahi fish tacos ever!  Big tourist attraction but still fun

headline: Pretty Good
content: We decided to go mainly to have a drink where Hemingway drank. Although he didn't in this location. We stayed fot lunch and it was surprisingly good. Shrimp Po Boy was very good. Prices are on the high side since sides don't come with sandwiches.

headline: Fun
content: Entertainment was great, Sloppy Margarita was the best ever. I highly recommend the nachos. The sauce they have has a sweet and spicy taste. So good. Friendly servers, the nachos were enough for 3 of us.

headline: Fabulous
content: Great atmosphere with live music and drinks. Only had nachos at the  bar so difficult to comment on food. Service was good.  Went back a couple of times and always had a good time

headline: Always The Same - Great
content: Sitting at the bar, same barmaids from a few years ago,fine informal entertainment, and friendly patrons, who would ask for anything better. Also watching the barmaids handle the extremely busy serving requests was a show in itself. All customers were  treated as "regulars"! A couple...More

headline: Worth a visit!
content:
Visited here at lunch time during our trip. It was extremely busy and we were about to move on as we couldn‚Äôt find a place to sit - luckily we managed to find somewhere right at the back.

The atmosphere is really good, the service...More

headline: Nothing special
content: Had to do the tourist thing while in key West. Of course that included this place. Food was ok, nothing special. Service was decent even though it was pretty busy. Prices were typical tourist-trap range. T-shirts are crap, barely held up after one washing, so...More

headline: Can't go wrong visiting
content: Although this is where the tourists go, you can still get a good drink while listening to free live music in a lively atmosphere.  The Sloppy Joe sandwich is also very tasty.  Lots of stuff to look at, some Ernest Hemingway, hanging from the walls...More

headline: Always have to stop here when in the Keys
content: The food is the usual pub fare. It is decent. The place is always busy, and usually live music. Iconic stop when you are in the Keys, priced accordingly. Music was good, beer was cold.

headline: Great Live Music-Good Time
content:
There was a great band playing when we visited. Drinks were flowing and good times were had by all. Drinks/beers are a little pricey.
Hemingway‚Äôs hang out!

headline: Great food and atmosphere
content: We had to stop here to see what all the fuss was about. Not only did our party of 8 enjoy the food, but also liked listening to the bands and soaking in the fun.

headline: AWESOME!!
content: Band was amazing!  Staff friendly and very helpful and knowledgeable about the island.  Had an amazing awesome great time!  Prices reasonable.

headline: AMAZING!!
content: We dropped into Sloppy Joe's for a few drinks and the entertainment! A great band, too!  This place lives up to its sterling reputation as a great place to hang. The chicken wing sampler is to die for!!  A three-level platter holds six wings on...More

headline: Hemingway‚Äôs Favorite
content: Sloppy Joe‚Äôs bar is Hemingway‚Äôs favorite bar in Key West. Live music, bar, great atmosphere. Local beer tastes good!

headline: The original sloppy Joe‚Äôs
content: The original sloppy Joe‚Äôs (even though there‚Äôs another bar a few meters away claiming to be the one). We had to classic sandwiches with a great ground meat+souce. Basic but good. Also prices lower than expected

headline: Always fun
content: Good music and fun.  Great bartenders and we had an awesome waitress. A must do for tourist. Can get crowded but in a positive fun way.

headline: Bar Visit
content: Fun bar Tory bartender way too intense not welcoming. Had a fun jam session earlier in week great waiter Will !

headline: Good food and drinks
content: Historic bar with good food, drinks, and entertainment. Went in for lunch and was presently surprised by the quality of the food. Very good service and the drink were fine. So it is not just for entertainment at night. Had live music even at lunch...More

headline: Fun night
content: My husband and I had a great night here at Sloppy Joes. Live Entertainment was amazing and waitress was on the ball. Couldn‚Äôt ask for more. Thanks for a great night

headline: Good drinks and music.
content:
We stopped in for drinks, music, and key lime pie.
All 3 were good.
The guy playing had a good voice and played the guitar well.
Service was good, it was very busy and crowded when we went.

headline: Fun!
content:
Popped in for a beverage and heard some
Good music. Open area to see all the by-passers. Bartender was great and definitely recommend getting a souvenir t-shirt!

headline: Original Keys
content: Got to go to the Original brewery. Beer is good and food is good enough to go and take in the history of this tavern. Decor is fun and usually have some mediocre live music during peak hours. Great place to buy a t shirt...More

headline: Had to go in with the band playing
content: The band drew us into this place.  It was more at the end of an afternoon and could not believe how busy it was,...everyone and their kids!  Maybe a cruise ship stop? Good drinks on special .  We also had a couple appies that were...More

headline: OK
content: You expect everything to be touristy in Key West but this bar is tops on that list. It only plays off its name. It is always crowded and the service is always "Keys" style, slow. The only think it has going is there is almost...More

headline: Classic dive bar feel. Get the souvenir bottle.
content: It has history and is a good place to get a drink. I'd suggest the frozen drinks that come in a souvenir water bottle. Yum and easy to walk around with.

headline: Great Drinks!
content: We visited Sloppy Joe's bar while on a cruise with a port of call in Key West. We really enjoyed the decor, drinks were reasonably priced, and the guy singing while we were there was good. Our waitress was very friendly and attentive. We didn't...More

headline: Had to come check it out.
content:
Had to come check it out. We took the last seats in the corner near the stage. Live music. 
We ordered a sloppy margarita (good), sloppy joe (meh, I‚Äôd skip it), (conch fritters- really good). Service was good considering how packed it was. We enjoyed...More

headline: Great classic dive bar with
content: Great classic dive bar with live music, like many other KW bars. Center of town.  Food moderately priced, drinks on high side. $5.50 miller lite, mojito $10 . Fast service considering it was packed

headline: Traditional and Historical place to be
content: Visited inJanuary with friends.  Did not eat there this trip.  Many tourists flood this bar to say they drank where Hemingway drank.  Cruise ship season has thousands of guests flocking the streets and having at least one drink.  Service is friendly and professional even throughout...More

headline: Nice decor
content: Had a quick lunch in a historic place. Conch fritters were really good and sloppy joe sandwich was not bad. Pretty busy but tables were available.

headline: Great venue for live music and fun...so so drinks
content: We come to Key West yearly and also stop in to Sloppy Joe‚Äôs for live music and fun. We finally feel relaxed and on vacation after a trip here. We‚Äôve never had the food but it seems like standard bar snacks. Drinks are ok...fine if...More

headline: Great fun bar
content: Fabulous fun bar, good food with great service.  A must to experience.  Music was fun, people ready to party and the staff was right there when needed.  Loved it all.

headline: I love this place!
content: Visited here on Black Friday for lunch. First place we went to when we arrived to town after dropping off luggage. The place was packed. It is a seat yourself kind of place. Live entertainment on stage, which was very good. Had the sloppy joe...More

headline: Always Packed.
content: The bar seems to be the place everyone in Key West goes to. Drinks prices are fair and the food is pretty good. It is loud and crowed at night and there is always some sort of live entertainment. We like to stand out side...More

headline: Go for the atmosphere, not really the food
content: The food was okay but nothing to write home about. Great atmosphere though. Since we have two small kids we visited in mid afternoon. Still live music going on and we had a great time but the food is just okay.  Have a drink at...More

headline: Fun Atmosphere
content: The atmosphere is good, but tables are crowded together.  We had an extremely friendly waiter, he was very responsive to our requests.  The food was tasty- even tried the original Sloppy Joe.  Worth visiting, to say that you did.  There was live music which was...More

headline: Ok. Nothing too special.
content:
Stopped in for a drink. The drinks were good. Ok band playing, bartenders were good. Nothing special. 
Don‚Äôt look up in the ceiling if you can‚Äôt handle lots of dust and old grime in a bar!

headline: A Classic Tourist Destination
content: Another one of those institutions you have to experience if you make it to Key West. A classic dive bar with tons of atmosphere. The staff is great,the music is always god and the crowd has lots of fun. Drink prices are reasonable.

headline: What a great time!
content: Wanted to go here, have drinks and listen to some live music.  The music was great and the drinks even better!  I suggest you try their rum runner!  So good!  Great place to unwind from shopping/beaching all day!

headline: Fun Place
content: Super fun place with great service.  When  we went there was a good band and the bartender Torrie made us a fantastic Key West lemonade drink.  Great time and fantastic people.

headline: New Year's Eve Bash
content: What a wonderful place to ring in 2020 with our friends. The atmosphere was vibrant and truly memorable!!!

headline: Great for New Year!
content: What a fabulous place to come for New Year‚Äôs Eve, not only are the keys beautifully decorated for Christmas but on New Year‚Äôs Eve you can have a drink at Sloppy Joe‚Äôs and then wait outside to watch the conch shell drop. There were thousands...More

headline: Good Sloppy Joes
content: A fun bar usually has music. The sloppy joes are great. I had the sloppy joe meat added to my taco salad which really made it tasty. Always a good time. Close to the oceanfront and a lot of other places to visit.

headline: New Years!
content: New years Eve...this is the place to be.  I stopped in before everything started to pick up and had some beer and a Sloppy Joes sandwich.  It was VERY good I will have to say. They plan a great event each year at New Years...More

headline: Awesome for a tourist hotspot
content: I didn‚Äôt think this would be great because it‚Äôs such a tourist hotspot. But our server was excellent, prices for our lunch reasonable and it‚Äôs just a super fun spot with live music. The service and attentiveness to our needs were superior to a $300...More

headline: Another Return Visit
content: Over a long weekend in Key West, we made yet another visit to Sloppy Joe's and will definitely be back!  We always opt for the traditional sloppy joe sandwich and really enjoyed the live music as well.  Best to wait until the cruise ships leave...More

headline: Fun spot for live music and dancing
content: Enjoyed the band while walking on Duval St. Good drinks, fun times. Definitely part of the Key West experience.

headline: Fun atmosphere - Great for family (with teens) lunch
content: Sloppy Joe's is such an icon it's almost a cliche in Key West, but still always good fun.  We stopped in for lunch while wandering around escaping our cruise ship (two families - four adults and four teens) and had a good time - not...More

headline: Very fun Christmas Eve sing-a-long!
content: Brought the whole family! Aged from 4 years old to 57 years old.... good ole fun.... not a lot of tattooed drunks. Good singer too.

headline: Must see at Key West
content: Must see at Key West. There‚Äôs really not much I could add to such a place, except that it‚Äôs as awesome as you imagine.

headline: Return visit
content: Just a fun place to sit and eat along with entertainment. Good conch fritters and sandwiches. Need to try the Sloppy Joe sandwich the next time we visit.

headline: Saturday night out!
content: Drinks and sloppy joe dinner was good and food is provided in record time! The band was great. Service, two thumbs up. The ambiance is fun.

headline: Dance! Dance! Dance!
content: Great SUPERfun bar! Let your hair down & have a blast! Friendly people! Go and have a great time! Definitely plan on dancing with strangers who will quickly become friends!

headline: So fun--a must-do!
content: We weren't sure we would go to Sloppy Joe's since we are not big bar-goers anymore.  But as we were walking by, the music drew us in and and we were so happy we went.  We  only stayed for a couple drinks and did not...More

headline: Must Go
content: Amazing atmosphere - any time, any day. Live music makes this bar a must-see in Key West. The drinks are good and the people inside make it even better. Come at night and there's dancing near the stage in the back.

headline: Stop and enjoy the music
content: Love to stop at Sloppy Joes for a drink and good music. Great atmosphere. Never disappointed. Always feel like I'm walking into a party. Snacks are great too.

headline: Must Go When in KW
content: Fun crowd. Pretty decent live bands and acoustics, good staff who work hard.  The Sloppy Joe sandwich was good, and the fish taco sandwich was very good going down, but the fish was deep fried so it might sit in your stomach all night.

headline: Good food
content: Nice place to stop and get a cool drink. Lots of seating. Food came out really fast. Live bands which is also nice.

headline: Famous stop so visit first trip to KW
content: This place is iconic so if it is your first Key West trip you must visit. Otherwise, food is average and both food and drinks are overpriced. Hop in if you hear good music.

headline: Its a place for fun
content: We were there in the evening and just for drinks which were very good and the service was terrific.  We were also treated to a local band, Tipsy and the donuts, and they are absolutely terrific.  Just some guitars and bongos, they will try to...More

headline: Historic and a little loud
content: So, if you want to soak up a little of Key West Hemingway history then find a seat. Seats turn over frequently,  people are friendly, beer on tap and in bottles. Beer was good, our chicken nachos just so, so. I would never return to...More

headline: Lunch
content: Nice variety of menu options. Probs were good sized and didn't leave anyone hungry. Very attentive servers. Really enjoyed the live music, talented musician!

headline: Don‚Äôt bother
content: This is a cavernous, frequently VERY loud place living off its tenuous connection to Hemingway and the fact that many tourists like it because of its aura of a good-time joint. If Hemingway were alive, he wouldn‚Äôt go near it.

headline: Touristy and packed, but it's a must go while in KW
content:
The local beers are good, the staff seems a little fatigued eith tourists but with the sheet volume of what they are dealing with, I can understand.

The cashier at the gift shop gave me great advice and recommended going to the Tap Room at...More

headline: Must stop for every visitor
content: It‚Äôs for tourists. Embrace that fact and have fun with it. Join in with the throngs of visitors dancing to live music, drinking the prerequisite rum cocktails. It‚Äôs a fun stop on Duval.

headline: Drink at lunchtime with Key lime pie
content:
We popped in for a drink and slice of pie at the famous Sloppy Joe's.  A cruise ship was in and the place was packed with tourists, as you would expect.
There was live music that was great but the drinks, pie and atmosphere were...More

headline: Surprised
content: Food and service was surprisingly good. They dropped a few bucks into audio and lighting production. Decent performances. As far as we saw, the best in key west.

headline: Sloppy Joes ROCKS!
content: We visited Sloppy Joes for drinks and supper one evening and we‚Äôre so enchanted with the atmosphere, food, beverages, and music  that we went back the next day for lunch!!! Highly recommend for those who love good food and beverages served in a great atmosphere!

headline: Sloppy Joe's
content: Great fun place. The music is always really good as are their Sloppy Joe sandwiches. They do have other food as well.

headline: Great live music
content:
Great live music all the time!! We went for lunch and for a late night on Duval. Great both times! 
You must get a sloppy joe!!

headline: Great entertainment with ok food
content: We enjoyed visiting the famous Sloppy Joe‚Äôs for lunch. The live music was awesome! We had peel and eat shrimp and pretzels with cheese as appetizers. Both were delicious. Our entrees weren‚Äôt great. The pulled pork was very salty. The full moon fish sandwich was...More

headline: Great bar!
content: Drinks were good, had 1 man show playing during the afternoon, loved the atmosphere. Even the shop was nice.

headline: It was ok
content: It was ok, felt like we should visit given iconic spot.  Sloppy Joe was ok, fries were good.  Fish & Chips were soggy and less than ok.  Music had a trumpet player which was a weird vibe for this place.

headline: Quick bite, great service.
content: Quick bite, great service. Food was good. Didn‚Äôt get to stay for live music but sounded like it would have been good while they were setting up.

headline: A must to see
content: I loved visiting Sloppy Joe's because of its history and atmosphere.  This is an open air bar/restaurant where you have to find your own table.  Basically when someone leaves the first person to get there gets the table.  We visited for a late lunch.  The...More

headline: Everybody must go .
content: No matter what you do in key west, It's a staple to go through sloppy Joes, Since you're walking through the town "anyway" you have to visit.

headline: The gold standard
content: You have to stop by Sloppy Joe‚Äôs. Yes it is touristy but it has earned its status as THE must stop. The food and drinks are consistently good and they always have great bands.

headline: Quick snack and drink
content:
Typical of Key west, service is so so, take it or leave it attitude. Food was pretty average, drinks were drinks.  Love music was good, seemed like it could have been better, right in heart of Duval street.  

We had a late lunch, this is...More

headline: Sloppy Joe's Bar
content: Sloppy Joe's Bar is a cool spot for good food, drinks, and music. They have a relaxed and laid back and easy atmosphere that is also fun. I liked all of the things on the walls as it really added to everything. The staff here...More

headline: Must Stop by at Sloppy's
content: Sloppy's has been in Key West for like 80 years.  The founder, Joe, was buds with Hemingway.  We stopped by for lunch one day and couldn't find a table. A few days later, we tried again and were successful.  My wife had the Sloppy Joe,...More

headline: Just What You Expect
content: A must place to stop and have a drink anytime during the day or night. Great atmosphere and some really fun music. My wife spilled her drink and they gave her a free one. Classy place.

headline: Live entertainment, good food, decent prices
content: I expected them to gouge people in Key West since this is a restaurant with some historic value, but I was pleasantly surprised in all respect, the only downside is it might have been one of the busier restaurants and wait times were quite high.

headline: OK for snack and historic notes
content: We arrived a few hours before our check-in so we went to Sloppy Joe‚Äôs due to its name and location, for a bite to eat and a drink.  The waitress was ‚Äòuninterested‚Äô in us and we felt her coolness.  The drink was ‚ÄòOK‚Äô.  We order...More

headline: Casual drink with my wife
content: My wife and I stopped in to grab a drink, the band playing was great so we stayed for several drinks. In addition, Jordan, our bartender was great. Very attentive and good chit chat. Although he did have a Cubs bottle opener...lol. Gonna have to...More

headline: Excellent entertainment and tacos!!
content: We had a wonderful waitress and we ordered a couple of specialty drinks that were good. The pork tacos were amazing!! I got everyone on the side and they were very flavorful!! My husband got the fish tacos and they were good too! A very...More

headline: Visit this "after" the Hemingway House Tour
content: What an authentic and fun "bar food" kind of restaurant.  The four of us shared the "sloppy joe's fries" and a couple of orders of calimari.  It wasnt' the best bar food we've ever had, but the history of the place and its place in...More

headline: Quirky, Fun, Best Mojito Ever!
content: This has been on my bucket list and my husband and I visited twice during our 4 day stay in Key West.  First visit went in for a Mojito ( the best.  And you get a souvenir plastic cup to take home) and a frozen...More

headline: It's a party!
content: An end prohibition party - on Dec 5th. Tried to stop in the original Hemingway location at Capt Tony's Saloon down the street, but left after realizing it was ok to smoke inside. Sloppy Joe's has an extensive drink menu and plenty of folks seemed...More

headline: Good food and great drinks
content: Went in for a snack and some beverages....left full and satisfied!  Good food and drink, great crowd!  Souvenir shop is cute and priced reasonably.

headline: More for the Vibe
content: Don't miss this hangout of Hemingway,et.al., = fun atmosphere, great entertainment, and staff. Food is just ok, even the famous Sloppy Joe sandwich. Best bet = Margaritas - sit back with a couple, chill, and enjoy the fun (and, sometimes sing along)....Bottom line - Great...More

headline: It's a must do in Key west
content: If you come to Key West and don't visit Sloppy Joe's then you will miss out on a key part of the Key West history related to Hemingway. For sure today its just an ordinary Bar but one steeped in the past. We found service...More

headline: Great food!
content: Love the food, atmosphere, and staff! And they don‚Äôt just serve sloppy Joes üòâ. All kinds of food to choose from. You can eat here for any meal everyday and never get the same thing twice.

headline: Sloppy Joe‚Äôs
content:
Great bar hangout! Good atmosphere üòä
Cold beer, good entertainment, wife loved the ‚ÄúSloppy Joe‚Äôs sloppy margaritas!

headline: A Robust Drinking Establishment
content: You shouldn‚Äôt miss this crowded iconic bar when you visit Key West. Plenty to drink here and the food is good. Noisy and raucous with bands that play all day and night. Don‚Äôt forget to buy a t shirt!

headline: Just Stopped In
content: Stopped in for a couple drinks and pretzels to cool off during late morning one Friday. Love the live music, Sloppy margarita was pretty good as well. Creepy old man came down and sat down at our table for an unknown reason and stayed a...More

headline: Must See in Key West
content: This place is a land mark and offers live music and a great bar scene. Come in, find a seat and they will take your order. Beer is cold and nacho's great. Service was good and fast. Lots to see inside and hear the stories...More

headline: Awesome place
content: We‚Äôve been here numerous times over the years, and each visit is great!  Lou, the side bartender, always acts like he remembers us! He gives impeccable service as does the entire staff!

headline: Key West party landmark
content: My wife and I stopped by for after-dinner partying and live music.  Yes, it‚Äôs well-known, but still a blast.  Live music with a rocking band blasting out classic rock was the perfect place for a couple of aging Boomers.  Fun crowd and great Key West...More

headline: Great place
content: We had a great time live band . This place is full of history that I loved. If you are close it is a must stop by.

headline: Good sloppy Joe sandwich
content: Stopped in here for lunch because it is apparently famous.  The sloppy Joe sandwich was good, but not outstanding.  I still would recommend you have a meal here because of the atmosphere and live music.  The waitress was great!

headline: Must visit
content: Great experience and great food! Sloppy Joe‚Äôs has so much history. It was the first place we visited when we got to Key West. Definitely recommend.

headline: Just stopping by
content: The guy playing guitar and singing was really great- the best part of our visit. The frozen drinks we had were tasty but not enough alcohol to even get a little buzz. Service was good. Just stopped in because it‚Äôs what you do in Key...More

headline: Still works
content: Key West works it! This is one of the few places that actually benefits from a Cruise Ship. The party is serious and now. Sloppy Joe‚Äôs has it!

headline: This place would be my "Cheers"!
content: Live music, tropical breezes, casual, laid-back atmosphere, great food, great service - what else could you ask for? My 15 yo son & I were only in Key West for 3 days, and we ate there 2 of those days. Would have been 3 if...More

headline: Fun Place!
content:
We called in here for a drink while visiting Key West from our cruise ship. We had heard about it so just had to give it a go. It was packed!! The drinks were good, never tried the food. 
Worth a visit

headline: Fun place
content: We enjoyed our visit at Sloppy joes bar. The music was good. Fun and lively place. We enjoyed it. Great food and drinks. We especially liked the music.

headline: Historic
content: The food is not great, but the atmosphere is delightful. The live music is better then average. Bathrooms are gross.

headline: Fun atmosphere
content: We were in Key West back in 2015 and neglected to visit here because of some of the reviews. This time around this was our first stop. Best fish tacos I‚Äôve probably had. Drinks were strong. The cover band was awesome. Country singer Brandon Lay...More

headline: A must see place...
content: A staple of the Duval Street night life..  A must stop and have a drink or two..  Or ten...   Sloppy Joes is ground zero for KW nightlife...

headline: Quintessential Key West
content: A group of us stopped in on a Sunday night but it was so mobbed, we didn't stay. That's to be expected though. We came back on a Tuesday...late morning. They had live music which was so much fun and let's just say not "family...More

headline: Typical bar
content: Typical touristy type bar in a touristy town.  Nothing special or over the top here.  Has a fun atmosphere and full bar.  Prices are a bit high for what you get.  To me this is a 1 drink and move on type place.  Not bad...More

headline: Not bad on a slow night
content: We ended up here for the key west storm cocktails, which were delicious. The back bar is where its at. The main room has three bars, but is crowded with a poor flow of foot traffic.

headline: Fun vibe when a band is playing
content: Stopped in on a Sunday night.  The Live band was pretty good and the Hemingway memorablia and "Old Time" feel made for a nice spot to relax and enjoy some music and the company of friends.

headline: A must stop if you are on a cruise
content: Proximity to the pier (or shuttle to the navy pier) makes Sloppy Joe's a must stop if you are on a cruise with a stop in Key West. Live music essentially all day, with friendly bar staff. Try the Conch Fritters - be warned that...More

headline: Great band
content: We visited sloppy Joe's, after 40 minutes waiting for service we left.  We decided to give it another try a few days later and were happy we did. The food was delicious and the band was very entertaining. The only recommendation we have is they...More

headline: Food and Staff Perfect!
content: This is a must eat at!  The food was fantastic and the staff did everything they could to help us choose a safe meal without Gluten!  So welcoming!  The staff member was a nutritional expert!  Loved her!

headline: Always stop at Sloppy Joe's when in Key West
content: Sloppy Joe's is a Key West landmark.  My first visit was on my honeymoon in 1979 where we didn't pay for one single drink once the bartenders found out we were just married.  Went back again a year later with a new baby, then again...More

headline: Everything I expected and more!!
content: No trip to the Keys is complete without going to Sloppy Joe's. Historic bar, busy, easy to get to. We sat close to the stage, great band but as is often the case fairly loud. Later into the night they remove the tables close to...More

headline: Good music and fun
content:
I loved the BBQ, I got the BBQ chicken!  A thicker sauce that tasted great with a cold brew. 

It can get a little busy being so close to port when the cruise ships come in
n but our server was excellent even with barely...More

headline: A must visit!
content: A must visit while in Key West.  Great atmosphere, drinks and food.  Started with the conch fritters and warm pretzels with cheese.  Of course we ordered the sloppy joe for lunch and it was delicious.  Just the right amount sweet, onion and sauce. The service...More

headline: Great music and drinks
content: Typical type tourist trap BUT.....great place nonetheless. Music always good and they holst a great party.

headline: Average fare
content: We went to Sloppy Joe's at the suggestion of the guide at Hemingway House. The atmosphere was great. The live music was good and the service was fair.  We were not offered water with our expensive cocktails. My husband loves chicken wings and is kind...More

headline: Annual Trip with CFCA to Key West & Sloppy Joe's
content: Every year the Central Florida Corvette Club makes a caravan to Key West Florida to relax and enjoy the sights.  Sloppy Joe's is always a stopping location and be sure and wave to the cameras.

headline: Live Music and Entertainment
content:
Pro:  Live entertainment  You must stop by for the experience.
Cons:  No happy hour  Although i guess they don't need it.  People are drawn in by the name and the history of Sloppy Joes.  We didnt eat so I cant give a review on the...More

headline: Famous place to visit but very busy, and impersonal
content: Had 1 drink in here  but moved on fairly quickly as we found the staff very cool and not very welcoming, and it is very busy and hard to find tables to sit at. Heard a sample of the music and we had heard better...More

headline: This place is where it is said that Hemingway drank and hung out.
content: The bar is the site of the Ernest Hemingway look-alike contest, which started in 1981. It is well known as a tourist attraction, with live bands and slushy drinks. On November 1, 2006, it was added to the National Register of Historic Places.

headline: This is a Must See
content: Your trip to Key West is not complete without a visit to Sloppy Joes. Stop in for a drink and it will be hard to want to leave. Great Bands all the time.

headline: Great shows, fun atmosphere!
content: Happy hours and sloppy joes simple menus with live music provide an inexpensive and fun place to stop and grab a bite

headline: One of the best bars in key west
content: Everytime I'm there, they seem to have the best bands in the house.  Thanks for the hospitality, we'll be back soon.

headline: Tourist/Cruise Ship Central
content: What can you say about this place? It has history, and plenty of cool Hemingway memorabilia. The drinks are expensive, and the service very hit or miss. They pump out average bar food, but with so many great restaurants in KW I would never eat...More

headline: It is a bar with food
content:
We went during the early part of Fantasy Fest (just after the Zombie Bike parade) so your results may be different.

First, it was very, very,  crowded. We had the Sloppy Joes.  I thought they were good.  The place also had live music while we...More

headline: Great time
content: Food, booze, live music. Need I say anything more! Great time. Not a bad thing to say. The food, the ser ice, the drinks. All great. Highly recommend a stop here

headline: Great live music!
content: Great live music. Sometimes too many tourists. But super super talented musicians! Good sound and not too loud either.

headline: Such a fun place!
content: We ended up here everyday on our weeklong trip. Great atmosphere. Mostly good service. Good food & drinks. Will be back soon!

headline: Excellent service and fun
content: Excellent service and a fun place to listen to music.  Peel and eat shrimp were plentiful but small.  Nice selection of drinks

headline: OK for Drinks and a Snack
content: We stopped here based on the advice of friends.  Had a couple drinks and some conch fritters.  Not overly impressed...basically a bar with average food and drinks.  Nothing special.

headline: Sloppy Joe‚Äôs
content: Walking into Sloppy Joe‚Äôs is something that everyone should do when they‚Äôre in Key West. This iconic bar Will treat you with history, booze, excitement, music and much much more!

headline: Best bar in Key West
content: I love Sloppy Joes bar. They always have the best live rock bands. Every-time I come here i have an awesome time and I dont want to go home. Fantasy Fest is the absolute best time to go. The bartenders are super nice too. I...More

headline: Nothing fancy however... you are in Key West
content: A plain ole‚Äô bar that has been around awhile. And although old and worn it was a hopping. Good watering hole, food and music. Too loud to carry on a conversation though in a place like Sloppy Joes, one sits back to watch the people...More

headline: PAPA‚ÄôS LOCAL BAR  :-]
content: Being a huge Hemingway fan from Michigan, I got to experience his first ‚Äúexotic‚Äù vacation spots.  Much later Paris &  Pamplona but Key West always eluded me. So finally this year I made it by boat and went straight to Sloppy Joe‚Äôs!  Everyone there seemed...More

headline: Fun times!
content: Alway fun times and good drinks at Sloppy Joe's!  Waitress are always friendly and fast. the live music was great!

headline: BUSY PLACE
content: Lots of great music, good service, quality drinks!!! Lots of history here, very clean, loved the open atmosphere, numerous bars under one roof!!! Come to have fun!

headline: Great place Good food drinks and meusic
content:
The place located in the center of key west and has a great vibes , food , drinks and meusic.
We had a wonderfull time there last week during the haluin night.A lot of happy people who celebrate the night .Even when the place was...More

headline: Music. Fun.
content: Tourists flock here, but on a good band night, who cares if it‚Äôs a tourist spot. Go out on the dance floor and listen to the awesome bands to dance and sing the night away with a cold drink.

headline: FUN FUN FUN
content: What can you say about an iconic place like Sloppy Joe's. You can hear the music from a block away. The doors are always open and the place is usually quite busy to packed. Service is good, food is really good and the drinks are...More

headline: Fun environment
content: Boyfriend and I loved stopping in for dinner. We came early at about 5 and luckily got seats, normally there is standing room only in the back for people to enjoy the bar and live music on stage. I got the Cuban Sandwich and I‚Äôd...More

headline: If you don't visit Sloppy Joe's - you have not visited Key West
content: Talk about being part of history! This is not only where Ernest Hemingway spend most of his nights, but where many other famous personalities (like me) have shared a few glasses of delicious cold beer during a live performance. Go with a group and have...More

headline: Very busy
content: Very busy but the waitstaff kept up.  Very strong drinks, always good live music. Obviously it‚Äôs a Duval street staple so you should probably give it a try.  Oh, and the drinks are strong... LOL

headline: Lots of fun!
content: We were in Key West and this was 1 of the restaurants highly recommended to us. The food was good, the beers were cold , the music was good making this place a must stop while in Key West. We tried to get in the...More

headline: Fun all around!
content: Easily the busiest bar on the island but the atmosphere is fun and inviting! I love the live music and there are multiple bars to take care of all of the guests. We ate and the Sloppy Joe was awesome! If we travel to Key...More

headline: A must visit place while making the rounds on Duval Street. Great for dining, drinking & people watching!
content: This is a must visit place while you are in Key West. With former customers like Ernest Hemingway: you know you can't go wrong! It is my understanding that it is popluar with both tourists and locals. I went by this place several times each...More

headline: Great drinks and Great music
content: We visited Sloppy Joe's twice while visiting Key West. We were able to see 2 different bands while there. Both were very good. Good mixture of tunes. Wait staff was very good. Did not have to go and find them.

headline: A bar not to be missed!
content:
I have wanted to travel here and be a proper tourist on the webcam at Duval Street whilst talking to my daughter on the phone for years! Mission accomplished! Great atmosphere, live music, food and service.
If you are in Key West do not miss...More

headline: Bloody Mary Morning.
content: Only bar we could found that was serving in the morning by 9:30 am. on Tuesday morning on Duval street coming from the south.

headline: Dinner
content: Food was fantastic and atmosphere was great!  A dive bar with live music! Street level. Servers were on their game!The Philly cheesesteak pizza was awesome!

headline: historical key west at its best
content: We had a drink at the bar and SJ's lived up to expectations. Its got history and character. A must see for at least a drink. Everyone was friendly and well in tune with the vibe of the place. Good fun, we will be back!

headline: The Place to Say I've Been!
content: It seems that most people that visit Key West happen to visit Sloppy Joe's at least once. A colorful place to visit. The beer was cold on a hot afternoon and the fish sandwich was tasty. Other than the history of the place it is...More

headline: Don‚Äôt eat the sloppy joe!
content: We came here for the sake of eating at the world famous sloppy joes and while our server was great; the food was horrible. I couldn‚Äôt even eat the sloppy joe i ordered. The onion rings were good but nothing special. The atmosphere was good...More

headline: Lunch, drinks and singing policemen!
content: Superb service, cold tasty cocktails and delicious quick lunch snacks. You HAVE to visit Sloppy joe‚Äôs. Every time I‚Äôve been there the band have been excellent, open to requests and extremely entertaining. The food has been really tasty and the drinks have been cold and...More

headline: Love the Sloppy Fries
content: We just love Sloppy Joes.  The food is great.  Atmosphere is amazing.  Music is great.  We had the sloppy fries and the nachos and they were huge.  Waitress was great.  All of the staff seemed to be enjoying their work, which is nice to see.

headline: Music & atmosphere
content: I was here 30 years ago on my honeymoon (to visit the E. Hemingway bar) and the place is very much the same (some furniture/tables moved). Good selection of beer, drinks, food. Really good live music on this occasion, solo act, the guy made the...More

headline: Florida Keys
content: A must stop place to visit while in Key West, once again if the cruise ships are in town you probably won't be able to get in right away, I thought a bit pricey but they know you will stop so be prepared, you will...More

headline: Top bar of key west
content: The sloppy joes are awesome, the staff was awesome and friendly, the live music was awesome!! We couldn‚Äôt help buy apparel to never forget our fun experience here!!

headline: Appetizers and cocktails!!
content: This is always a must start for us.  I love the Sloppy Rita.  Food is always tasty and the drinks strong.  Sloppy Fries are always a winner.  Can get very crowded on cruise ship days.

headline: Adult Playground
content: This place is lively. With so many places to see on Duval it‚Äôs pretty impressive when a place is filled with patrons. We had a great time drinking and singing at this place. The live band was awesome. They took us on a journey not...More

headline: Once was enough
content: Music Great! Place felt very dirty,very outdated,was not the HOTSPOT we were looking foor. Food was not tasty we left almost all that we ordered.

headline: Surprisingly great fish tacos
content: Been SJ's plenty over the years but never ate there. Had the fish tacos and an excellent three piece band. Fun night

headline: Very busy
content: There was two different live bands when we visited on a Thursday night. The bands were great. Food and drinks were great. The security guy at the door was super friendly. Our server was rude, however. She got frustrated with us, we needed a few...More

headline: Fun Time
content: What a great restaurant ! The atmosphere was lively and friendly. The music was enjoyable . The food and drinks were very good. We had a great time and would highly recommend it.

headline: I Live in Key West
content: This is definitely a place to take friends on their first visit. Never recommend their food but their drinks and entertainment definitely give off fun vibes.

headline: Stepping back in time
content: The ambience was nice.  You could almost feel Hemingway in the room.  Food was okay, service was less than impressive.  Place was packed though.  Nice escape from the rain and/or humidity.

headline: Fun!
content: Okay, so it was 10:00am and we were drinking in a bar and eating sloppy joes. What a great way to start our morning! We were not alone either. There was a fun crowd too. The singer was just incredible and we thought he did...More

headline: Good food, great music!!
content: Our first visit to Key West and Sloppy Joe‚Äôs. It was a fun place with a lively crowd! The music was awesome! Our waitress was extremely attentive and friendly!! The food and drinks were good standard pub fare.

headline: Worth a visit
content: Hemingways favorite place.  The sloppy joe sandwich was very good.  Drinks are average, but the ambiance, crowd, and music make it worth it.  You must go there at least once.  Early seemed to be best, it's always crowded.  Prices are very reasonable compared to other...More

headline: Beer stop
content: Always seem to swing into Sloppy Joes for a cold beer or cocktail. Drinks are always cold in good. The food is just average bar food hence the 4 star rating. They do have great T shirts although a little pricey pushing the $30 mark.

headline: Sloopey Joe‚Äôs Bar extraordinaire
content: Great food and service. Price reasonable. Great place to watch the world go by sit on porch. Watch the weirdos

headline: Always fun at Sloppy Joes
content: Always a good time at sloppy joes which is why it is always are first stop in key west. We love the wings and nachos and of corse sloppy joes. But do your self a favor and stick with wine or beer to drink; my...More

headline: Famour tourist spot, and worth a visit!
content: We came here for a drink between viewing the excellent Ernest Hemingway House and seeing the sunset from Mallory Square. I suspect this is more a tourist's than a local's pub, as the prices are quite high and the d√©cor elaborate. Interesting, though, for it's...More

headline: food never arrived
content: We called in at Sloppy Joes at lunchtime, place wasn't too crowded, ordered drinks & food at the bar. Drinks expensive. Half hour went by,ordered another drink, after 45 minutes we asked if our food would be out soon, the waitress checked & the order...More

headline: Historical bar a must visit.
content: Hiw can you not stop into the bar Ernest Hemingway made infamous.  Good drinks, good food, friendly service, great music.  Fun place.

headline: Awesome place
content: Had lunch and a few drinks.  Foot was good, service was very good.  Enjoyed the atmosphere and the frozen drinks to go too!  They have a stage with live music as well.

headline: Beer & music
content: Downtown tourist pub. Drinks are expensive, lot of customers. bonus is very good live rock¬¥n roll band.

headline: Delicious Lunch
content:
After spending our week in Key West eating seafood, on our last day we reverted back to burgers and an iconic sloppy joe sandwich with Cajun fries (very spicy), but good. Our service was good and the wait for our food wasn‚Äôt long.
The place...More

headline: eep! Not so good
content: We were looking forward to Sloppy Joes as this is the spot to be. The food was average at best, I don't want to talk about the worst. The sloppy joe meal itself was not something I would eat again. I never knew what it...More

headline: Awesome spot
content: Great for lunch, live music and people watching. We come here every year on our pilgrimage to the Keys.

headline: Best place to hang out in Key West
content: Great atmosphere, always lively, fab music, helpful staff, great frozen daiquiris! Can't wait to go back.

headline: Always busy!
content: Early afternoon this place was already hopping ! Great bartender and friendly strangers to enjoy a beer !

headline: Gotta Do Sloppy Joe's !!!!
content: It's rite in the middle of the best sites around and jumps out at you when you see it! The smoked fish dip will bring you back on it'd own SELF. Drinks, burgers, fries.....can't go wrong!

headline: A must see on Duval Street
content: This place was my favorite bar on Duval Street. The atmosphere was fun, with live music. The bartender made us feel very welcome. It‚Äôs a large place, so there are 3 bars, food, gift shop, and FUN !

headline: Day at Port
content:
We went with a couple of friends and did a stop here! I will recommend it just for drinks! The place is run down and not in the prettiest condition! But is a bar! 
They have live music, piano guy and I guess at night...More

headline: Still crazy after all these years...
content: I‚Äôve been to Sloppy Joes many times over the last 40 years, and from what I can recall, it hasnt changed much at all. Decent bar food, friendly staff, live music... As the expression goes, ‚Äúif it ain‚Äôt broke, don‚Äôt fix it.‚Äù As a quintessential...More

headline: Disappointed in the food
content: We went based on a friends suggestion. We ordered the quesadilla and fish and chips. I could have made a better quesadilla at home and my husband ate about a half a piece of the fish. Neither entree was good at all. We aren‚Äôt drinkers...More

headline: Always a stop on a KW visit!
content: You can never miss with a stop at Sloppy Joe's in Key West. We always have the Sloppy Joe and enjoy the music.

headline: Eat a sloppy joe at Sloppy Joe's
content: Yes, it is a touristy must do type place.  But I was drawn in by the neon and the sound of live music.  Got a table pretty quickly and the waiter took our order.  Rum or something frozen with rum in it was the drink....More

headline: Had some drinks
content: Stopped here because it was supposedly Hemingway‚Äôs hang out. Had a couple drinks and a light snack. Nice bar with entertainment in the afternoon.

headline: Fun place!
content: Great live music, two bars, great service and lots of fun!  Everyone should stop by if visiting Key West!

headline: Great food and fun
content: Awesome live music and at 930 they clear some of tables to have a dance floor. Then the real bands start and the party goes till 4am! The food was amazing and our server was the best!

headline: Wonderful time!
content: Great  atmosphere! Love the Hemingway  memorabilia and photos! Great music and service! Will definitely visit again on our next trip!

headline: Had to be done
content:
This bar was on my husband's to do list whilst we were on Key West and we enjoyed our visit.  It was very busy and you get to sit yourself, so just head for the first available table!

I had the chicken wrap - I...More

headline: Sloppy Joe‚Äôs
content: This place is a must.  It can be very touristy.  They have great entertainment.  We usually have drinks there but they also serve food.

headline: Old reliable
content: Always the same - good food, good music, friendly service. The pulled pork sandwich is my favorite; my husband prefers the sloppy joe. We go every year & will continue.

headline: vacation
content: It is a neat visit for the history but drinks are expensive and very weak for the price. Order a beer!

headline: OK but not as good as other nearby bars
content: Lively but more expensive and less good than other nearby bars. Was told not to use my iPad by security staff. They were polite but why? We left and went to Irish Kevin‚Äôs bar which did not have the same issues and were we had...More

headline: walk on by!
content:
FILTHY!, FILTHY! FILTHY! Key West Board of Health where are you??????
We stopped in for a bite before a Sunset Cruise.  4pm on a Tuesday eve.  The place was crowded, the guitar player was loud.  People were mingling.  We both had 1/4 pound hot dog,...More

headline: Great food, drinks, service, and super time...
content: Had a fabulous time at Sloppy Joes bar...live music, waitress was amazing. Reasonable prices also...Had shrimp tacos, conch fritters, and key lime pie drinks...loved the atmosphere...tip: seat yourself, could be crowded, so grab a table when you can...lots of history in that place

headline: Food was okay
content: Okay so went here because everyone says you have too.  Service was really good.  Did was very large portions.  But just okay.  I do think everyone should go.  But there are so many amazing food places, this is more for the atmosphere.

headline: Good place
content: On my trip to key West many people recommended this place. They have lived up to their hype.  The food was good and the music was great. They had a live band but they were not too loud that we could not hear each other....More

headline: Iconic Spot in Key West
content: Good food, cold drinks, and great live music. Had a very good time with good service from the staff.

headline: Always a must go
content: Every trip to Key West starts out with a stop at sloppy joes. I always have the sloppy joe nachos. I like all the different kinds of entertainment they have on the indoor stage. I enjoy walking in front of their life camera and watching...More

headline: Live Music
content: Always a must visit in Key West! Live music, great atmosphere, and cold drinks! Only negative is it gets a little too crowded when the cruise ships are in.

headline: Duval Street Staple
content: Visited for dinner and drinks. Food was mediocre, but portions are decent. Drinks weren't great, but not terrible. Typically live music a d a lively crowd. Worth a stop to check it off your Key West bucket list.

headline: Stopped in for a drink....no food
content: Stopped in and had a good drink.  Friendly bartender that guided us to some other restaurants that we ate at during our trip.  They do serve food but the wives thought it was mostly fried food.  Looks like a good place to have fund and...More

headline: Good food, great atmosphere
content: We stopped here for lunch, because how can you not stop at Sloppy Joe's?  The place was packed, as is to be expected, but we were able to find seats at one of the bars.  The bartender was attentive and got our drinks and order...More

headline: One of the best bars in Key West
content: Very popular bar, Hemmingway's old hangout. Live music all day long. Does become very crowded at night. Has A/C but windows and doors usually open. No outdoor seating.

headline: Not impressed
content: We visited mid-week for lunch, very noisy and crowded. But that's to be expected. Here's the good news: the fish and chips, conch fritters and onion rings were very good. Here's the bad news: the famous Sloppy Joe was just ok. Open a can of...More

headline: Always lots of fun
content: A great place to people watch and the food is awesome.  Family from New York was also able to watch us on the webcam.

headline: Dinner and drinks
content: We went because it is famous. It could be okay it just wasn‚Äôt our scene. Lot of loud and very drunk people which makes sense, but the food was sub par. Nice to say we went but I wouldn‚Äôt go back.

headline: Good time vibes
content: The drinks were great. The food was fantastic! The live band playing really set the beachy mood! Can't wait to go back!

headline: An immersion in the American essence.
content: What else can anyone ask for? Good live music, mostly within a wide popular range. Food and drinks the fresh air of KW, and plenty of room to watch tourist passing by. Kind staff. Thumbs up!

headline: Perfect Trifecta - Bar, Restaurant and Live Music
content: I go to Sloppy Joe's every time I am in KW.  This latest, we went and of course they had a great band playing - I got the Sloppy Joe's Quesadilla (split with my hubs) and my kids (one is over 21 and one is...More

headline: Awesome place to go!!!!
content:
The food and entertainment are great.
Prices are resonable, menu has a lot of choices.  The service staff are pleasant and efficient. The live entertainment and atmosphere represent the spirit of KEYey West.  Went there all hours and everything was great

headline: Sloppy Joe's
content: It's all you've heard it was. Live entertainment, drinks, comfort food (recommend the fish tacos) and Key West atmosphere.

headline: Perfect Pina Colada!
content: Of course this is a must see spot! We had tried conch fritters in several restaurants and these were the BEST, served with Key Lime mustard sauce, washed down with Pina Coladas. Friendly server/live entertainment.

headline: Iconic Sloppy Joes
content: People told us this was a MUST to visit.  Had a good meal.  I would't say it was anything out of the ordinary.  The drinks were okay also.  Nothing special.  The life inside was great.  Really felt like we were in Key west.

headline: Good beer and french fry.
content: This is a legendary place. It has a bit of the history of Key West. Place visited by the Nobel Prize Ernest Hemingway (for Literature). Although I must say that this was not the original site. If you want to see the original place go...More

headline: Super fun!
content: Amazing food! The sloppy joe is truly yummy!!! The live entertainment was also fanatic! Great place for the family during the day

headline: Outstanding food, entertaining vibe
content: Ate lunch everyday, while in key west,  at Sloppy Joes... one great experience after another.  The bar and wait staff are friendly.  Entertainment just grew better as week went on

headline: Great atmosphere, fun place
content: Live music, great service and a lively atmosphere. Sloppy Joe Quesadillas were delicious. Reasonably priced and quick bar service.

headline: A good time
content: Once we tried this place, we kept going back. Live music. Good band. Relaxed atmosphere. Friendly staff. Fun place.

headline: Couples Key West
content: A Key West staple. Always fun to visit with good food, drinks and entertainment. Reasonably price and always has great service.

headline: A nice place to experience Duval St
content: We passed Sloppy Joe's a couple of times before we decided to stop in. It looks crowded, but very easy to get seats. People coming and going constantly as the service was extremely fast! Our server was great. Food was good, not spectacular, but the...More
