headline: Sloppy Joe's MAN!!!!
content: You have to have a beer in Sloppy Joe's, It's a Key West staple. The Sloppy Joe's are really good too...

headline: Snack
content: So I really wanted to experience Sloppy Joe‚Äôs so I popped in to get s snack as I wasn‚Äôt very hungry. The bartender was very nice but very busy too. I got water and the sloppy fries and my food came out quickly. My planned...More

headline: Fun time
content: Expecting a touristy bar, I was wrong, walked in to hear good live music, good crowd, ordered the original sloppy joe and a Cuban sandwich, both very good. Prices reasonable, and staff very friendly. Had a great time!!

headline: Pre game spot
content: Another good bar at Duval st.  Usually walk back and forth between this place, durty Harry's and Ricks.  Crowd seems to be a little more mature than Rick's or durty harry's so it's a good place to pre game for me.

headline: Great place
content:
We always visit this bar when we come to Key West. The staff are friendly and make you feel welcome. The drinks are served quickly, the Mojitos are excellent. The toilets are cleaned every hour. Great music. Can‚Äôt fault this bar. Worth a visit.

.

headline: Great vibe
content: Cool place to eat and drink. Live music and great food and very good service. Close to lots of stuff to do and see

headline: Duval St Must
content: Great food and drinks, we was there visiting on a day trip off a cruise... we was there and there was families, couples it was at least a 100 degrees üòÇ but you never know it at Sloppy Joe‚Äôs it was nice and comfortable! They...More

headline: Great place.
content: It was some great food! Great fun atmosphere. Very open and roomy, fun people and great drinks! We definitely had a good time.

headline: Key West atmosphere!
content: It is hard to miss Sloppy Joes if you are in Key West!  Busy with live music playing it is a must stop for a drink, lunch, or just to hang out to hear some great tunes.  We stopped for lunch.  Drinks were creative, sloppy...More

headline: people watching
content: such a fun time admiring the diverse crowd the drops in to Sloppy Joes!   great service, good appetizers, cold beer, decent music.  what more could you want from a Key West landmark?

headline: Great ambiance!
content:
Nice stop on the trip! Live music daily!

I wasn't really a fan of the actual sloppy joe sandwich. The pickle was good though. Service was super fast!

headline: At Last We Visited
content: My wife and I have stopped many times via a cruise On Sundays and have missed this place as it did not open until 1PM. On this cruise we landed on a Saturday and hung around on the ship until after 12 noon and stopped...More

headline: Must go if you are a history buff
content: The oldest bar on the island. Live music and good food and drinks. For me I dont need to go back but enjoyed our meal and drinks

headline: amazing food
content: A live music bar, music better on an evening than daytime. Food is a must lots of tasty choices. Al;ways busy anytime of day, good quick service.

headline: Weeeeeeee
content: I review two review three review four.  Oh wait that‚Äôs sloppy Rita‚Äôs  now I‚Äôm in the floor!  What a knockout!

headline: Fun place, friendly security
content:
We own a tavern so we engage with security to learn the heart of a place with a short visit. 

Great mixed drinks. Cold beer. Got to stop here when you‚Äôre in Key West. 

They feature Hemingway Distillery Pilar Rum in many distinctive cocktails

headline: Cold Beer
content: We stopped in here for a quick refresh drink, the atmosphere was great with a live singer. We sat at the bar and had great service. A really fun place to stop.

headline: Good food
content: I ate here one evening, they have a fairly good menu. Prices are reasonable for key west. This is another one of the popular spots so it gets pretty crowded.i got the sloppy joe sandwich, it was very good.

headline: My Annual Visit Complete
content: For the past 20 years, my wife and I make sure we visit Sloppy Joes during my Birthday week and have never been disappointed with the festive atmosphere.  Julie, our favorite bartender greeted us like we were her favorite customers.  After several cold beers, some...More

headline: Vacation
content: Always love going to Sloppy Joe's.  Great live music and entertainment. Staff are wonderful. Wouldn't go to Key West without going there at least twice in a 2 day visit.Fun,Fun.

headline: Famous spot
content: My husband and I had lunch at Sloppy Joe‚Äôs on a recent trip to Key West. The atmosphere was worth the trip and we enjoyed the music.  Our waitress was friendly and offered suggestions on what to order. We were a little disappointed in the...More

headline: Sloppy Joes bar
content: Whiskey kiss cant wait! Say you guys were excellent back in may we shall see you again soon. We will be back for Klash kiss see you soon Good bye guys enjoy the rest of the summer

headline: A bit pricey for a sandwich joint
content: Food was good but it's a sandwhich place that's a bit pricey.  Drinks with booze (lemonaid) was $10 each.  too much for lunch time and nothing spectacular.  was barely 6 oz.

headline: Popular Bar with history in Key West
content: Sloppy Joes' is a must stop in the area. As it is one of the longest running bars in KW. Have a drink at the bar or stay for some food. There is usually a band playing. Excellent experience and service.

headline: Dinner and entertainment
content: We had a good time at Sloppy Joes. Shrimp Tacos were very good. Conch Fritters were alittle heavy but good. Music was awesome. Make sure you stop by.

headline: A must in Key West
content:
How could you ever pass in Key West and not stay for one evening at Sloppy Joe's?
Great music and atmosphere,after roughly 10.00pm they clear up the center tables and move them to let people dance.
Food is not bad either,sandwiches are with various fillings...More

headline: My favorite bar in Key West
content: This bar is roomy and spacious. It has three bar areas (one in the back room). The service is good and has a lot of Hemingway memorabilia which was great. The bar will also have live bands and artists as well.

headline: Great food and live music
content: I‚Äôm sure there‚Äôs not much to be said about Sloppy Joe‚Äôs that hasn‚Äôt been said before. We had lunch here twice while visiting Key West and were not disappointed. The food was delicious, service was great and the musicians provided a wonderful laid back atmosphere.

headline: Great atmosphere!
content: This is definitely an awesome and fun spot. The live music was great, the pizza was really good and sadly the sloppy joes were not all that. But overall it‚Äôs a must place to visit!!

headline: Great entertainment and food
content: Hubs and I enjoyed a great evening at Sloppy Joes.  Food was delicious.  The Rum Runner was the best!!! And we enjoyed the band too.  Great atmosphere.  Lots of fun.  It was be on my "must do" list every time I go to Key West.

headline: Only an average "Sloppy Joe"
content: Wasn't that impressed. We decided to order the sloppy joe because of the name, but come to find out the place isn't named after them at all, but rather how sloppy the floors used to be. I thought the sloppy joe was just average. Nothing...More

headline: Birthday/Anniversary
content: Large open bar. Filled up at night with good music. Nice atmosphere. Good drinks/food. Recommended by co worker. Didn‚Äôt disappoint

headline: HUNGRY HUNGRY HUNGRY ?
content: This place is AWESOME. Not to mention the üòã food. You can smell down the street. Whether it is their Famous Sloppy Joe or Chicken tenders. It is so yummy. You can't miss it. Don't take my word just try it.

headline: Quick stop
content: We were on a time crunch but wanted to pop in quick for a drink.  It was crowded!  I had a marg and it was good.  Seems like a fun spot, if you can find room.

headline: Key West Legend on Duval
content: Okay, you made it to vacation and you're in Key West. This bar is Key West and should be on your "Why wouldn't I?" list. Good food, lot's of drinks and great music! Nice place to stop in just for a drink and the ability...More

headline: Famous Bar
content: Typical bar food that you would find in any bar. The place gets pretty crowded so get there early for whatever meal you plan on eating to avoid any waiting . Was a favorite of Ernest Hemingway, I believe he named it Sloppy Joe‚Äôs.

headline: Great place for music & dancing
content: Went on a Fri evening and saw end of set of 3 guy guitar band and most of set for a cover band. Good crowd, drink waits were pretty good, really fun vibe.

headline: Good time üëç
content: The atmosphere was nice, staff was very attentive and food was good. My family would definitely go back the next time we‚Äôre in town.

headline: Cool place
content: Come here to say you‚Äôve been there. Have a few drinks and look at all the people. If you‚Äôre looking for a superb food experience, you should try somewhere else. Food was average, but ambience was way above!

headline: Lunch
content: The place was packed which is always a positive sign. I had the sloppy joe which was incredible. We sat ourselves which was not the best thing. We had to ask to be helped. There was a singer who had great talent but the music...More

headline: Fun, music, mediocre food and drinks
content: It's a fun bar when visiting Key West.  Always a good band.  Drinks are well poured and beer is cold.  Food however is mediocre.  They no longer serve conch chowder which was a staple.  Waitress said the fish was white fish???? Talapia??? Yuk!  Burger was...More

headline: Fun fun fun!
content: We had never been IN sloppy joes because it always packed but we strolled in on an early afternoon and had such a great time.  Great music and it was great sitting in a spot that has so much history and longevity. Good drinks.

headline: Terrific Lunch With My Wife
content: As we enter this location, we were told to sit wherever we can find a spot. We chose the bar. The bartender was friendly and informative. He was very efficient and brought our drinks right away although he was extremely busy. We ordered the Cuban...More

headline: Touring Key West
content: We ate at Sloppy Joe's Bar twice during our stay for lunch. Good music and tasty bar food for our family.

headline: My favourite bar in the world
content: I had my first drink in here when I was 15 many years ago, it‚Äôs a little more touristy now, but still an institution. The drinks are good, the food is good, Hemingway didn‚Äôt hang out here, but the place is a shrine to him...More

headline: great bar
content: If you're coming to Key West you got to come down and at least have one drink at sloppy joes. We come here because they always have rock bands playing and they always have a good vibe. They recently changed out the old sound system,...More

headline: Fun Casual Experience
content: Visited Sloppy‚Äôs Joes in Key West for the first time.  The food selection was great and we truly enjoyed our meals.  Very fun upbeat environment.  Will definitely go back!

headline: Great experiences
content: We had great lunch and then drinks the next day we liked it so much.  Music was awesome, food good, drinks. Refreshing.  Atmosphere was what we were looking for.

headline: THE  BAR WITH  HISTORY YOU VISIT ONCE
content: This might have been were Hemingway hung out but itis way overrated. Expensive  drnks,  bad food, slow service.

headline: Place to go to remember Hemingway
content: Sloppy Joe's Bar is a must see because it was a favorite watering hole of Ernest Hemingway.  The room is large and wide open, and was filled with folks, mostly younger than our group - all having a fun and noisy time.  At the far...More

headline: Touristy
content: It's ok. Probably nothing like what it was in Hemingways time. They added 2 extra bars. Place was crowed in the afternoon but we still go a seat. Food didn't look good. Stuff like naches and fast type food.

headline: Not worth the stop
content: Food so so, drink was okay....Bloody Mary.  Not sure what all the hype is, and well, Hemingway is really not to be idolized. He was pretty sick and probably abused his messed up kids

headline: Great stop while cruising around on Duval St.!!!!!
content: Great place to go and get a drink, however all that we got was the nachos with the sloppy joe meat on top. It was extremely tasty and big enough to share between four people. The kicker I don‚Äôt even like the taste of sloppy...More

headline: Great Service
content: Sat at the bar and the server was very attentive and quick to service us. Great live music and crowd.

headline: Cool environment (at lunch), good food
content: Stopped in for lunch as we passed it driving through and figured it was an iconic place to stop. Atmosphere was neat, live music, and good service. The traditional sloppy joe was pretty good, and everyone enjoyed their meals. If passing by, I would consider...More

headline: Sloppy Joe's = A good time
content: Sloppy Joe's is a must visit place while in Key West. Cold beer, tasty conch fritters and sweet Pina coladas...what more could you ask for? Oh, and the band is good too!

headline: Great standard!
content: If you are in Key West, one must visit and experience this establishment.  The Entertainment is endless and the food and drinks are excellent.  My favorite food is the Sloppy Joe Pizza.

headline: Pit stop for nostaglia
content:
Can‚Äôt really say too much about this bar. It‚Äôs a tourist spot.
If you have never been, stop for some pics and a drink. Great spot to run in to use the bathroom too.
The food is not good, and the drinks are all very...More

headline: Fun Night
content: We had a blast listening to the live music while sitting at the bar having drinks and snacking on the Sloppy Joe Nachos.  It was a little to busy to get great service, but understandable based on the number of customers. The service we did...More

headline: Key West Original
content: If you haven't been to Key West, Sloppy Joe's is a must. They have the original Sloppy Joe sandwich and another recommendation is their Cuban sandwich.

headline: Loved Hemingway Days
content: My wife and I happened to be in Key West during the right week.  Enjoyed the Ernest Hemingway look a likes, running with the bulls and the 5k (came in 15th of over 700 people!).  Hope to return next year!

headline: Great bar
content: This bar was really fun. The inside is very open and spacious. The band was amazing. There wasn‚Äôt a song I didn‚Äôt know. Great dancing music when the band was on break. And delicious frozen drinks. We went two night in a row and loved...More

headline: More of a bar than restaurant but still great!
content: It was so good! Maybe we should get less people inside and a bit more organized, great location! Super nice place, i recomend you to go just with friends, it is not a kid friendly place, no kids menu or apropiate for kids

headline: Great time
content: Hit sloppy Joe's for beer music and snacks. Food was good music was great. Reasonably priced with friendly staff.

headline: Sloppy Joes Key West
content: I feel this bar is really overrated in Key West.  Many better venues to hang out and listen to music.  Something you should try in your first trip to Key West but definitely move on.

headline: Trader Vic Pina Colada!
content: Sloppy Joe's Trader Vic Pina Colada is usually my first and last stop and order for each visit to Key West. Didn't eat there this time around, but in past it's always been good pub fare.

headline: ok
content: we stopped for a light snack.  Service was very good and we got our food quick, the food was average.  It is just such a tourist trap.

headline: Go for fun but not food
content: Go for fun atmosphere,but not for sloppy joes. It was a little too much ketchup for me and it was $10 just for a sandwich. It is pretty big sandwich though. Fun place to hang out and listen to music,but not to eat.

headline: Fun time
content: Probably one of the best bars that we were at in Key West. The entertainment was great and the food was just as good. There‚Äôs also a good Irish bar next-door but we didn‚Äôt get a chance to really enjoy that more as well

headline: This place is absolutely crazy during the Hemingway Look Alike contest
content: Was there to participate in the Hemingway contest (my first time). Sloppy Joe's gets maximum hype off this event which is like nothing else you have ever seen and they do a pretty good job at managing the craziness. However, to call it a look-alike...More

headline: Party Time
content: Was here for the Hemingway celebration and was here almost twice a day for 4 days straight.  Came for the Look Alike contest, but then also just for the bands at night, to meet people, have a snack.   Just a great place to go at...More

headline: Fair service
content: Waitress was very forgetful! Made many errors. Mojito drinks were very good with lots of fresh mint.

headline: Hemingway days
content: So much fun!!! We loved hanging out here during all the festivities!! Great service!!! The running of the bulls was one of my faves.!!! The beer was always cold too which is a plus!!!

headline: Fun time
content: Ate here with my wife and two kids. Food was good and came quick even with the place full. Live music was an added bonus.

headline: Sloppy Joe's - a Kew West icon
content:
Sloppy Joe's is a Key West Icon. Great food.Great service.
Key Lime Lemonade was delicious. Conch fritters and Peel n eat Shrimp were generous portions of tasty local foods.

headline: Late drinks
content: Just a regular bar, kk music playing, nothing special honestly. The bathroom was nastyyyyy :( to the point that we left because we needed to use one.

headline: Epic!
content: A local bar that's been around forever. They have great food, cold beer, and an awesome atmosphere! A must visit if going to Key West.

headline: Great Bartenders
content: A great bartender always enhances the drinking experience and Sloppy Joes has some of the best in Key West. Whether you‚Äôre there for just a few hours or you stay for days on end, take some time to get to know those around you. It...More

headline: Really not worth it
content: Yes, it's a well known tourist stop.  And, yes, they sell great t-shirts.  But the inside noise level, the very mediocre food, and the server who was so 'gone' that he couldn't give us back the right change for our tab - that was all...More

headline: Just loved it
content:
We had a drink one night and just chilled listening to the fantastic band, we had eaten but looked at the loaded fries someone ordered and thought I need to eat those!!
The next night that's just what we did with a roast beef sandwich...More

headline: Always busy!!!
content: Very busy place but so good!!!  We arrived early about 5 pm and I think we got the last table. Live music didn‚Äôt start until about 5:30 but that was ok. We had the ‚Äúsloppy joe‚Äù and it was a large sandwich and delicious. Great...More

headline: Great Late Lunch
content:
Key West was a cruise stop for us.  We had tickets on the hop on hop off trolley.  I think this was stop 3.  We were here around 2pm.  Had the fish sandwich and chili cheese fries.  Food was great.  

There was a man singing...More

headline: Hemingway week
content:
So much fun to see all the look a likes running around....
Great bands, 
Loved the frozen end of the world drink , with a Myers floater....
Go go go to this bar !!

headline: So much fun!
content: Great drinks, great music, and we loved the atmosphere. The service was unbelievably good considering the place was packed. The ‚ÄúPain in the Ass‚Äù drink was my favorite and we had Sid‚Äôs Sampler as a snack that was yummy.

headline: Gotta Have the Joe
content: It's a classic venue that's a must for every first-time Key West visitor. The Sloppy Joe sandwich is to die for. Yes, there's live music; yes, it's crowded. Be sure to check out the wall with pictures of all the Ernest Hemingway Look-Alike Winners. Enjoy!

headline: Nice bar
content: Great bar to hang out and drink and hear live music. Friendly staff and right in the heart of the action

headline: not for me
content: Not really my scene. Way too crowded for my liking. They've got live music all the time which is cool but not what I'm into. Kinda hard to get service and way too loud to enjoy anything and people seem to be way more drunk...More

headline: Dangerous for women at night
content: My husband and I have been coming to Sloppy Joe‚Äôs several times a year for many years. We were in last week standing near the bar. I felt a hand grab onto my waist and another hand on my arm. My husband went to knock...More

headline: Coolest bar on Duval St
content: How can you beat a bar that was Hemingway's favorite? Good food, friendly staff and live music. Great place!

headline: One of those iconic places you just have to visit
content: We visited a couple of times during our stay in Key West and it was packed both occasions.  Great for live music, decent pub grub and buzzing atmosphere.  Staff are attentive, service is good.

headline: Great sloppy joe‚Äôs
content: If you‚Äôre looking for sloppy joe‚Äôs then this is your place, however that‚Äôs really about it. Nothing else special here.

headline: Best Sloppy Joe ever!!
content: This trip to Key West I had to stop in Sloppy Joes because someone had told me even if you don‚Äôt like sloppy joes you will love theirs and they were absolutely correct.   In fact all 4 of us including two teenagers loved them.  The...More

headline: Had to stop at Sloppy Joe's
content: We had to grab a drink at this Key West staple. It was packed. We squeezed in two seats at the end of the bar and received fast service. The frozen drinks are a great way to cool off from the heat. The band that...More

headline: Super Sandwich
content: Stopped ihn for lunch and had their "Slppy Joe" sandwich which was awesome. We also ordered a sampler for appitizer and it was just OK.  I would not order the conch fritters there. Aftre trying them at several different places theirs were the worst.  Drinks...More

headline: Great atmosphere!
content: My wife and I stopped in for a late lunch. Sloppy Joe‚Äôs was a hoppin place! Live music and no open tables. We grabbed a seat at the bar, had a quick lunch and enjoyed the music. Very cool place! Good music, good food and...More

headline: Great Place to Visit
content: Love the vibe of this place!  Considered a ‚Äòmust‚Äô for places to visit in Key West by many guides, I would have to agree that if you visit, you need to see it!

headline: Busy, but fun spot!
content: We were in Key West in November 2018, over Thanksgiving.  The weather was perfect for walking around and exploring downtown Key West.  My husband and I stopped at Sloppy Joes for a beer and live music mid-day.  While they were busy, the service was fast...More

headline: Great place for live music
content: We stopped in one afternoon when it was raining and the place was packed!  We each had a couple drinks and shared some Nachos with chicken.  The nachos could have been a little warmer but tasted ok.

headline: Lunch
content: Couldn‚Äôt pass up a sloppy joe at Sloppy Joes! It was good and fries were too. Great atmosphere, fun place!

headline: Worth the trip!
content: If you're in Key West, you have to stop here, preferably after a stop at the Hemingway House. Good drinks, great vibe, and good music the day we were here. Also, highly recommend the Sloppy Joe sandwich! It's a knife-and-fork sandwich, as it's large and...More

headline: Great fun - not good value
content: Great entertainment and atmosphere.  Twice, they brought a drink that was very clearly watered down.  Each time, they said it was ordered neat. but the bartender put it over ice, so they strained it off.  After they were called down on it, they brought the...More

headline: Great drinks and atmosphere
content: Great place to get drinks and enjoy live music.  Although its not the original Sloppy Joe's that Ernest Hemingway was at, but still world famous

headline: Iconic - Good Live Music
content: The food in only ok, and our waitress kind of had an attitude, but the atmosphere is fun and the live music is good.  Set your expectations, go for the atmosphere and history and you'll enjoy.

headline: A great place to play!
content: I never miss an opportunity to go to Sloppy Joe's when we're in Key West.  The food is very good and I've never had a bad meal.  The conch fritters are amazing!  Whether there for lunch, dinner, or late evening, the music is a lot...More

headline: Dance the night away!
content: At the end of June and the beginning of July we danced for hours every night.  The band was awesome and we had a blast.

headline: Great food and history
content: We ate there several times drink many beers there the menu is good live music can be crowded at times and the have a gift shop. Staff is always friendly

headline: Has to be done
content: The legendary bar with live music that was a favourite of Hemmingway. Always busy and always buzzing. You cant visit Key West without a beer here

headline: Aggressive pursuit of tip
content: All was going great until we decided to leave. Susan B aggressively suggested we had not left a tip and did not apologise on realising HER mistake - maybe more attention required?

headline: Great hangout
content: Always a great hangout.  Good (not great) live music.  Good beer selection.  Bar food is fine, great if you've already had a few.

headline: FISH TACOS!!
content:
Great food, Great drinks and live music!! What more can you ask for?!?
No Shoes Nation!! 
Definitely need to stop in here and grab drinks, tickle your ears listening to the tunes and grab a bite to eat too!!

headline: Great Food and Fun
content: The food is fantastic, staff friendly, fast service great live music. Overall great place to visit over and over again.

headline: Frozen cocktail win
content: I'd heard a lot about sloppy joes for both food and drink so decided to try out one of their signature frozen cocktails. There is no watering down here, I'm amazed my other half could Stand after his! Awesome, packed and great live music

headline: Good food, live entertainment
content: A group of us ate supper and enjoyed the band playing (can‚Äôt remember their name...oops). It was so much fun! Very cool atmosphere, everyone enjoyed their appetizers and meals and the beers were cold! Can‚Äôt get any better than that!

headline: Good place for a drink
content: We just went in for the ambiance and had a few drinks.  We didn't eat any food so we can't give any opinion on that.  It was a fun place to stop in.

headline: Family Friendly Stop
content: This restaurant had something for everyone. Table service for families and couples. Bar seating if you were just stopping by for a quick bite and drink. Love music was playing and it was fun for the whole family.

headline: Bad food, fun atmosphere
content: The signature sloppy joe sandwich was awful. I can get better from Winn Dixie. Also the crab cake sandwich made me gag so the waitress took it off our bill.  I do not recommend this place for food.

headline: Overrated‚Äîtourist trap
content: This place is dirty and the service is poor, food average at best. Water dripping from the ceiling vent onto our heads but don‚Äôt look up. Ceiling is filthy and black around ventilation and most everywhere. Best thing to do is walk by and keep...More

headline: Great vibe
content: The best margaritas we had during our stay in Key West. Music was good, people around us were having fun and it was just so nice to sit back and soak up the atmosphere. Food was good too.

headline: Frozen Drinks
content: Their signature frozen drinks there are good and delicious!! The live music there was great and exciting. The staff is VERY nice, and patient. My girl and I went there a few times out of 4 days. We will DEFINITELY go there again, when we're...More

headline: Great Food!
content: We went for lunch, and the place was very busy.  Even so, the service was friendly, attentive and timely.  The food was very good.  We shared a sloppy joe sandwich and chicken wings.  I have never had a sloppy joe.  It was really good!

headline: What's in a name?
content: In the case of this place, everything!  They invented sloppy joe's for cryin' out loud.  Several sloppy joe items on the menu here including a fantastic sloppy joe pizza.  This place offers live music.  It gets crowded early so plan to arrive early or be...More

headline: End of trip
content: Nice bar, music and wait staff but the guards suck. Had taken two beers and went to the toilet then being thrown out because someone accused me of spitting in the sink.  I just tell the guard that be destroyed our last night down in...More

headline: A place you have to visit!
content: Great atmosphere on Duval Street!  Drinks, food and people watching.  A must go to bar while visiting Key West!

headline: Fun atmosphere
content: We had dinner here on our first night. There was a live band playing good music. Food and service were both great.

headline: Good watering hole
content:
Stopped by for a beer. Had a live band playing and the bar was packed mid afternoon. 

Enjoyed the establishment and certainly is a "don't miss place" to visit.

headline: Typical bar food
content: Made this one of our stops during our vacation, but could have skipped it. Service was great and food comes out fast - but this is really about drinking and the live music. Not somewhere you would go if you need to make adjustments to...More

headline: Fun!
content: Love music and cold drinks, truly a part of the quintessential Key West experience.  Great place to stop and have some fun anytime.

headline: fun place to eat
content: My husband and I went to buy a t-shirt for someone and ended up eating here.  Don't let the open air restaurant hold you back in thinking it is too hot.  It was well into the 90's and humid when we went.  We sat near...More

headline: Sloppy Rita‚Äôs at Sloppy Joes!!
content: We enjoyed the Sloppy Rita‚Äôs to celebrate our birthday trip!! A must visit if your on Duval Street! The band was great on a Wednesday night and the friends we met from London were great entertainment.

headline: Great food
content: We stopped after an excursion. After eating cruise ship food for 4 days this was like heaven. We split a sloppy joe and an order of wings and both were awesome. The place has a great welcoming atmosphere and everyone is very friendly. It was...More

headline: Loved it!!
content:
We needed to grab a quick bite before a scheduled show and I‚Äôm so glad we did. Of course we went with the sloppy joe to eat and it was perfect!! 

The guys they had playing music on stage were great!!

The service was quick...More

headline: Super fun! If you don't like loud places, don't go here.
content: I love this bar if I am in the mood to go there. It is a rowdy place but it is super fun if you're looking to get hammered and listen to music/turn up with friends. The place is really big, probably the biggest bar...More

headline: Mrs. Christie
content: Healthy portions. Waitress provided information on the building and very friendly. Live music was playing. Ordered salad and boiled shrimp delicious. Chicken wrap was bland but generous portion.  Crowded even in off season but must do.

headline: Great food with live music.
content: Stopped in for lunch after driving down to key west for the day.  Fast service and food.  Friend told us about it so we had to go down and try a sloppy joe.  Fantastic.

headline: Fun place but a bit overrated
content: Crowded all day but music was good. the tap room in the back was a welcome retreat. Great smoked fish dip.

headline: Something changed for the better
content: When I was here march 2018, I thought it to be marginal at best. This visit was just the other way around. The bar tender was fun but professional and had great ideas about their tap beers. The music was ok but and the crowd...More

headline: A Must Do!
content: This is such a cool bar! Awesome vibe, yummy drinks! Staff was friendly and very helpful, simply a must for Key West!

headline: Thunderstorm
content: We ducked into sloppy Joes to get shelter from the rain, it is the place everyone heads to in Key West and certainly attracts the cruise ship clientele. It was busy with loud music, service was quick, we had the sloppy joes which were ok...More

headline: Horrible
content:
Dirty, no, filthy, hot and, the most rude bartender I have ever had...rude, Rude, RUDE!!!
Never come here!!

headline: Delicious
content: We grabbed the second to last table and the food was so good! Great live band, not too crowded even tho it was packed!

headline: Great Bar
content: Sloppy Joe‚Äôs is a great local bar. The night we went there was a local artist playing live music and the crowd was great. It was a wonderful relaxed environment. The drinks were good. The only downfall is the food. It was okay. Nothing special...More

headline: fun
content:
very fun, great drinks and food, wonderful history.
two visits stopping in for drinks, and t-shirts.

headline: You go to say you‚Äôve been there not necessarily to eat there
content: Not the best food. Sloppy joe with cheese was ok but not anything great. I feel like this place is better suited to go listen to great music & have a drink. Service was fast....waitress was great. Food just blahish

headline: Favorite stop
content: I think Sloppy Joe‚Äôs was my favorite stop in the Keys. I loved the live music. It was three local guys who just like to play music together. My husband had the mojo pork tacos, and I had to trade some of my sandwich for...More

headline: Bad live music
content: We tried this place two different times because it‚Äôs so famous. We also walked by it numerous times during our 5 night stay in Key West. Every time the live music was SO BAD. I know that‚Äôs highly subjective, so I‚Äôll say that the atmosphere...More

headline: Nostalgic bar and good live music
content: Sloppy Joe's is an obligatory stop for anyone visiting Key West. It is pricey and the food, drink and service is nothing to write home about. The live music is enjoyable and fun. Overall, a must do but keep your expectations in check before entering.

headline: Fun dinner out
content:
We stopped here for dinner as we were walking and it seemed like a lively place to be. The food was good, the atmosphere was great as was the service. 
The first band that played was great. 
for the second band they cleared a dance...More

headline: Good time touristy spot!
content: Amazingly enough my two friends & I secured the table by the door to the left of the stage. Bartender was super busy but handled his load with expertise. After learning we were celebrating my friend's 50th birthday he had the band serenade her. Drinks...More

headline: Couple Visit- Food-Drinks and Music
content: My wife and I went there for an early lunch, they open at 9:00am. We had to get a sloppy joe sandwich and we were not disappointed. The sandwich was amazing, the French fries were very tasty- the beer was cold and my wife‚Äôs mojito...More

headline: Food and drinks are DELICIOUS!
content: I ordered a Sloppy Joe sandwich and My Husband ordered a Cuban. Both were so tasty. We also ordered a Sloppy Mojito and a Hemingway Mojito. Both were awesome! We returned the following day and ordered the same. Definitely returning when in town.

headline: Tourist spot
content: This was our second trip to Key West and we had missed Sloppy Joe's the first time, so we had to go. Live music, mid-afternoon, which was fun. The drinks were good. Food was just okay.

headline: Good music and lots of people.
content: This bar was always popping with people when we visited. The drinks were good although maybe not enough alcohol to equal the price. The music was good. Easy to get too and a open on Duval Street. Gift store is next door for Hemingway fans.

headline: No trip to Key West is complete without a visit to Sloppy Joe‚Äôs
content: This iconic venue has it all - great drinks, live music, good bar food, and intriguing pictures displayed on the walls. It‚Äôs a ‚Äúmust see‚Äù in Key West!

headline: Fun Times
content: Had a great time. Atmosphere was fun. The band was great. Nothing bad to say about this place really.

headline: Mojito
content: We stopped for a drink and really enjoyed ourselves.  They used local run in the mojito.... If you're in Key West, this is a must do...

headline: Always a great time
content: Great bands, great food, great bartenders and 20%more pours, what is not to love?!?? Sloppy Joe‚Äôs has it all and an adorable, customer focused manager named Mark!  Make sure you stop in!!

headline: Good (not great) food with a band
content: Historic place that offers good food and a band (that plays loud enough you can‚Äôt talk). One time is worth it since Hemingway helped move to this location (our of the original location which is now a blues bar).

headline: Fun time and great food
content: Food was Great! and everyone enjoyed the band while we were there.  Had to wait a while for a table but it was worth it.

headline: One of the best bars in Key West
content:
Recommended this bar by our hotel staff. 
Ok it is very touristy but still had a nice vibe and fun place to spend an evening. 
Food is ok and drink is reasonably priced. 
Live music was of a high standard

headline: Great Music and Great Food
content: We stopped by for lunch because we had to see the historic Sloppy Joe's Bar. I ordered the Sloppy Fries while my dad ordered the Sloppy Joe. The food was delicious, but it was an insane amount of food. The live band was great as...More

headline: Music and lunch
content: We stopped in for lunch middle of the week and it was packed.  Not a table open!  It was all seat your self.  We found a table near the stage.  Our server was very busy hustling but she was on top of things.  Drinks were...More

headline: Music and Drinks
content: We stopped at Sloppy Joe's for drinks and lunch and enjoyed our experience very much. Big bar with tons of seating. The place was packed and you could tell everyone was enjoying themselves. Service was good and the sloppy joe.....I don't even like sloppy joes...More

headline: Typical bar food
content: The food was good, but is nothing special.  Figured when in Key West must try it.  Tried it and crossed off my list.

headline: It's not a trip to Key West without a stop at Sloppy Joe's
content: Sloppy Joe's is one of the most fun places to eat in Key West. The service is good, atmosphere is relaxed, and the food is tasty and unassuming. There's usually a live band playing, and all the ones we saw were quite good. Well worth...More

headline: A Tradition
content: Great Bar on corner of Duvall & Green St.  Always busy....known as Hemingway's hangout in his day.  It does not disappoint.  Tee shirts, mugs, cups available for purchase.

headline: Great Food and entertainment
content: We had nachos, bbq sandwich fries and shrimp po boy. Food was outstanding, drinks were phenomenal. Entertainment was 2 guitars and bingo player taking requests. Whether they know song or not you will here their version. A great time to be had

headline: A definite must!
content: Fun atmosphere. Waitress was very accommodating to our 9 month old grandson by letting me order him just 1 piece of fried fish instead of the whole fish and chips basket.

headline: Best place for music and great drinks
content: We went back to Sloppy Joes multiple times over a few days.  It was by far the best drinks in town and great atmosphere.  Bands played great music and were entertaining.  The bartenders were friendly and very accommodating would definitely visit Sloppy Joes again.

headline: Key West
content: Where you want to be in Key West!  Yes!!  Crowded.  Loud.  Live Music.  Fun  Good food.  Huge portions.  Had the fish tacos and the Fish and Chips.  French fries were nice a crunchy as requested.  Best Hemingway Mojito!

headline: A Key West Tradition
content: What else can you say? This may be America's great dive bar. Cold drinks and plenty of them, live music all day long, food if you want it. Don't expect gourmet dining, it's bar food for God's sakes. If you want fine dining go somewhere...More

headline: A BLAST!
content:
This place is happening all the time!   Our Bartender was Carla and she was THE BEST!!  So attentive and friendly, we loved her!
We ordered munchies and everything was delicious.  
There is music during the day and then a great band came on at night....More

headline: Best pina colada in Key West!
content: We stopped at several places to celebrate a birthday and Sloppy Joes had the best pina colada around!

headline: Love it!
content: Great music! Great service! I always have a great time when I come in here. The bartender Lou is amazing!

headline: Good times at Sloppy Joe‚Äôs
content: We stopped in at Sloppy Joe‚Äôs for lunch. Place had a great vibe. Live music mid day was fantastic. Food was simple but good. Good drink list. Definitely would go back

headline: Cool restaurant and vibe, nice piece of history
content: Cool restaurant and vibe, nice piece of history, ask about how this location became where it is today. Interesting story

headline: Must do
content: You can't go to Key West without a trip to Sloppy Joe's.  Always a great time.  Love the music and the drinks and of course the friends and food.

headline: So much fun
content: Part of going here is the atmosphere. The music is loud, the dancing is there and the food is good. It is hot and smelly and a great vibe. Loved it here.

headline: Lunch in the Keys
content: Stopped in to Sloppy Joe‚Äôs for lunch and was pleasantly surprised with the live music and the atmosphere. Sat at the bar and enjoy a few Land Shark beers and the Buffalo Chicken Wrap. Two wraps and definitely worth the price. Worth the trip there...More

headline: Drinks All Around.
content: We visited a good few bars in Key West, this one by far being the most famous and therefore the busiest. Despite this we were served quickly and politely. Despite the crowds, the atmosphere was very friendly and relaxed, no concerns about a pub brawl...More

headline: Awesome atmosphere
content: Super Food and drinks. Waitress was great wish I could remember her name. Live music was awesome. Very loud. If you‚Äôre not into that steer clear. So enjoyed it.

headline: Afternoon vosit
content: We stoped by because everyone had said we should. The music was great and the atmosphere was so much fun. We will deform go back again!

headline: Sloppy Joe's in Key West
content: Sloppy Joe's is all about the history of the bar.  Food is ok, but the bands playing were alot of fun.  We enjoyed our visit here.

headline: Classic Must-See!
content: When in Key West....right?  We visited around 11:00 am and the place was packed!  We were able to find 2 seats at the bar.  We ordered beer and it was cold and refreshing on a hot day.  Sitting at the bar turned out to be...More

headline: Must go !
content: We spent a week in Key Largo and made a day trip to Key West. Sloppy Joes was on my wifes bucket list, as a dozen other things. The food was a step above average, and the beer was cold !

headline: A place to drink at
content: First of all it is not just a place to visit, but definitely to have a drink at. I took my parents there first just to look around but the place had such a vibe that we stayed for a drink and to eat. The...More

headline: good spot for listening good music and take food & drinks
content: this is not the best restaurant in town for sure, but probably (one) the place with most best vibes. good music group, good choices of beer, food is OK for this type of place and it is not expensive...it was the Hemingway's Bar, definitively you...More

headline: Sadly, we've found better
content: Used to go to this place multiple times during our stay to watch Pete and Wayne and laugh and joke with the bartender at the side bar (won't mention name).  Since Pete and Wayne are no more (sigh, RIP Wayne), we stopped in during the...More

headline: Great food
content: We had to go to this iconic place and have the sloppy joe sandwich. It was fantastic. The bar side was very busy every night with great bands playing. Definitely recommend this place to anyone in Key West.

headline: Great party atmosphere with history.
content: Located on corner of Green and Duvall. Great live music, wonderful atmosphere and lots of history, not mention the drinks. The wait staff were very attentive.

headline: Great vibe and food
content: Had dinner there. Food and drinks were great. Thoroughly enjoyed the fried shrimp tacos. Great live music

headline: Great visit to historic Sloppy Joe's.
content: Sloppy Joe's is a historic spot to visit in Key West. The music is loud and good and the atmosphere is very laid back and friendly. We were there during lunch and it is very family friendly. There is basic food choices-hamburger, nachos, etc.

headline: Great atmosphere
content:
Stopped here for a drink, band was playing. Good drinks and good music. Will recommend to everyone.
Eric Pittsburgh PA

headline: Cold beer and great music!
content: Of all the bars in Key West, we seemed to migrate back to Sloppy Joe's on Duval St. the most. The bar/restaurant is large, open aired, serves cold beer and hosts great bands! We never ate there, just drank. It was our 21+ year old...More

headline: Good food and music
content: We of course ordered the "slobby Joe sandwich" messy to eat üòÉ but really tasty. The drinks are also good. Can get really crowded especially when the band is playing. You want to sit you have to cruise for a seat . We had fun,...More

headline: One of the iconic Key West dive bars.
content: Sloppy Joe's is one of the iconic Key West dive bars, and we did our best to visit as many as possible. There are plenty of draft beer choices and the souvenir bar matt coasters are fun.

headline: Great stop on DuVal Street for live music and great bartenders
content: Loved chatting with Beverly while we enjoyed the original sloppy joe sandwiches.  If you are a southerner, the sloppy joe was a staple in your household growing up!  Live music and good company - great way to start our pub crawl day in Key West!

headline: ‚ÄúAtmosphere‚Äù
content: We stopped in Sloppy Joe‚Äôs for a drink. The service was fast, drink was good and the band was great. The place is really cool with all this old memorabilia from Key West and Hemingway. We had intended to go back and try one of...More

headline: A must see when touring Key West.
content: One should always come thru here when in Key West. A nice vibe and historical location which is still fun. Was very crowded the day we came by as it was a cruise day.

headline: Good music
content: Great place to go for live music and dancing. Food and drinks mediocre and nothing special. Go for the music. It can be quite crowded in the evenings so you are never guaranteed a seat. Often standing room only.

headline: Had a beer. Bought a shirt.
content: Always on the list of places to visit. Favorite visit included a police horse and his human partner stopping in for cool water.

headline: Loud and hot
content:
Typical key west bar, service and food okay and as the name says ‚Äúsloppy joes‚Äù that exactly how the sloppy joe is served if you happen to order one. Get a fork.

Live music but too loud for the place. I think they are in...More

headline: Meh
content: I think its funner you come here for drinks, the food is pretty average or below, gets crowded and it's a Seat Yourself situation. The mixed drinks are apparently 1 & 1/2 oz of liquor, so bonus. They have live music,  which is nice.

headline: ICONIC
content: You can not go to KW without going to Sloppy Joes. The atmosphere alone is enough to make you high. The food is standard bar food, but served always with a smile and a greeting. The entertainment is some of the best in the Keys,...More

headline: Great music
content: We love coming here for the music and cold drinks. It gets very crowded at night which in my opinion makes the energy of the place better! They always have great bands and it‚Äôs a must do when you are in Key West!

headline: Bartender Chris is Your Man
content: 30 years ago today, Bartender Chris left his studies at Virginia Tech for a life in Key West. He‚Äôs a wealth of knowledge, pours a mean Rum Punch and is full of suggestions only a local could advise. Do yourself a favor and stop by...More

headline: Best nachos
content: The sloppy joe nachos with chicken and sloppy joe sauce are the bomb!  So good.  Always good entertainment too. Cold beer. Friendly staff.  Clean bathrooms. Have to go every trip.  Live feed webcam too so let your family know to look for you...or notü§£

headline: Good Bands and Decent Drinks
content: Stopped in for the second time in two weeks.  Only had drinks. The drinks the first time were a better pour and in a large cup. This time, different bartender, put them into smaller cups.  The band that was playing were good.  It was very...More

headline: Must stop here
content:
At least for a drink. Its not the best, but its a staple. 
The energy, the nostalgia, people watching. They always have great live music too. 
It‚Äôs a little dumpy but in a good way!

headline: Good Frozen Drinks
content: Stopped in the Sloppy Joes for a beer and settle on the frozen drinks.  They sounded good and they were had a Bar at the end of the World and a Schooner Breeze. Good drinks!

headline: Nighttime visit- Great music
content: My husband and I visited Sloppy Joes while walking along Duval!  It was on a Friday night and the band playing was fantastic. Good crowd. Mixed in ages so it is fun for all!  Dancing available in front of the stage!  Very fun place!

headline: Hemingway's Favorite Hangout
content: When in Key West, you have to stop by this place.  Drinks are all in plastic cups, but it doesn't seem to matter.  Drinks are nicely poured.  Sloppy Joe sandwich is even worth trying!  Full of Hemingway memorabilia.  We went back at 9:00 the next...More

headline: A Key West must
content: Although very touristy, it is still a must. Have a beer and a 'sloppy joe' (ground beef in tomato sauce on hamburger bun). Lots of interesting items cover the walls. Get's very busy for lunch, so go a little early or mid afternoon.

headline: late night drinks and music
content: This place atteacts great bands and has great drink prices, wait staff is attentive and friendly. Get an original with onion rings

headline: Enjoyed the history of the place
content: Enjoyed the history of being in a place that Mr Hemingway and his friends drank a few cold ones.  We had nachos which were satisfactory but nothing to write home about (but what can one really say about nachos anyway?).  The staff were kind.  Our...More

headline: Tourist trap-but not so bad
content: So we knew this was a popular tourist destination but decided to try it!  Atmosphere is fun-bar is on the corner with open windows/French doors on both sides for nice cross breeze. Bar is crowded and has live music- day we were there musician was...More

headline: Great  night
content: We had a great time at this lively iconic bar. Friendly staff, not overly expensive prices. Great live music.

headline: Busy
content: Very very busy bar with small seats to eat.  It‚Äôs like putting 100 people in a closet.  Food was ok. A waitress got very nasty to my friends for going to the bar and getting drinks after we paid our bill.  All we wanted to...More

headline: Lives Up to It's Legend
content: My husband and I ate at Sloppy Joe's twice in 2 days while vacationing in Key West. Each visit lived up to this famous restaurants legend. The service was excellent. Even with a full house, the wait staff was friendly, experienced, and welcoming. I had...More

headline: Late lunch
content: Okay, total tourist trap place like Margaritaville, but we had to check it out being a KW staple.   Good live music while we were there, so that was nice.   Drinks are overpriced and weak as all heck.   Food was solid, standard tavern fair plus some...More

headline: Good times
content: Good drinks and friendly service, good way to spend some time on a Thursday afternoon.  Did not eat while here

headline: Quintessential Key West
content: Well, when in Key West.... A trip to Sloppy Joes is a must. Staff was friendly  even when super busy at night which is always a plus. Bands are always great and everyone is having a good time. Security is great about spotting those who...More

headline: Great food
content: Great food and entertainment.  Our waiter made good food suggestions and was prompt with the service even though they were super busy.

headline: Quick bite
content: A must stop in Key West.  We just had a quick bite and was pleasantly surprised that the quality was a slight notch better than anticipated.  The drinks were of course ...perfect.

headline: A must do
content: Lunch and a couple of drinks! Our bartender Chris was friendly and personable. Cuban sandwich was great and the mojito was amazing!

headline: Night out
content: Great place. The band was great. I danced and danced. Very friendly staff and very fast. Thanks for a fun night.

headline: Tourons this is your spot!
content: Only go here if you have a tank top on (adult males should not wear one unless working out), Harley tattoo, gray ponytail, smoke or from a cruise ship. The locals will be happy you corralled yourself into one bar with a mediocre sloppy joe...More

headline: Good Atmosphere, Cold Beer & Good Food
content: We stopped at Sloppy Joe's for lunch and the place was nearly full. There was live music and service was OK. Food was OK. Beer was cold. Overall, we can say been there, done that.

headline: Hemingway's favorite hang out
content: While some might say that Sloppy Joe's is too touristy, hey, you're on vacation! It is a fun bar and also full of historic significance for literature and history lovers. Not to be missed, the yearly Papa Hemingway look-alike contest during Hemingway Days

headline: Fun bar, good music, good food.
content: If you're looking for a fun local pub with lots of energy and good food, this is the place to go.  I can't speak for their alcoholic drinks since my husband and I don't really drink, but everyone around us seemed to be really enjoying...More

headline: Always great, band was awesome!
content: Every time we are in Key West we stop in and it‚Äôs always a consistently fun place, but this time was even better.  The band was such a nice surprise, Perkins Road  - we had never heard of them, but if you get a chance...More

headline: Good bar for a party
content: Stopped in for a couple drinks. Band was good. Nice atmosphere for a night or two of partying. A must stop and see place even if you aren't a big party person.

headline: Fun place.. loads of history here
content:
Here in Key West for a week with 21 friends.
Had to visit Sloppy Joes!
Very busy but our waitress kept us in cold beer while we waited for food.
Love the piano player..

headline: Great party spot!
content: We stopped by one evening and enjoyed the music. Walked by early the next day. Saw the place was empty and asked the manager if I could get a selfie while standing behind the bar and he said, "Sure!!" Appreciate the hospitality!

headline: Good time
content: This was our second time at sloppy Joe's and it did not disappoint.  The bartender kept our drinks full.  The music was very good.  A great place to go for a good time.

headline: Only went there twice!
content: Excellent both times.  Ordered a Sloppy Joe & a Cuban Mix with one side of fries for the two of us. Could not eat it all.   Second time, split the Havana Nacho with Sloppy sauce.  If we could have stayed 1 day longer we would...More

headline: Such a cool place!
content: Good cold drinks and excellent nachos. Had to come here after seeing it on tv so many times and hearing friends talk about it. Music was great too!

headline: Loved my Sloppy Fries
content: Coming from Australia we had no idea what Sloppy Joes was, but OMG it was so good, staff were super friendly, band was amazing and we left with some merchandise to take back home.

headline: A must
content: One of the oldest establishments in Key West a must on your stop at sloppy Joe‚Äôs art melt in your mouth delicious and the drinks offer a very hefty poor as well great music and band great service and fun atmosphere with people wanting to...More

headline: Best band in town!
content: We went here for drinks and dancing and had the best time! Fantastic house band that plays lots of different genres and interacts with the audience. We didn‚Äôt eat but food looked good!

headline: Live entertainment
content: We enjoyed the live band that was playing during dinner. The drinks were average but the menu has a large selection.

headline: A tradition...
content: We always eat & drink at Sloppy Joes in Key West..great food, service & entertainment. We really like the big plate of nachos..yummmy

headline: Lively place
content: My wife and I stopped by in the early evening on a Monday, because we liked the music the band was playing. There was a large, lively crowd in the place which interacted with the musicians. We only stayed for 1 drink, because the Agave...More

headline: Party time
content: Visited during our vacation in key west. Had a great night drinking and dancing. Great band. Nic e place to visit for a great time.

headline: Birthday fun
content: I have celebrated 3 birthdays here and I continue to love it! Live music is definitely a plus. But the vibe here is always positive!

headline: Fun fun fun
content: Fun staff who clearly work their arse off non-stop!! Regardless of how busy it‚Äôs been, we‚Äôve always had quick service. Good live music and range of beers . Definitely worth leaving a tip for

headline: Typical touristy eatery
content:
Although it‚Äôs a Key West tourist trap. The staff are attentive & friendly.
Selection is good and quality of food and drinks were good as well.
Pricing is typical of Key West

headline: Fun place
content: Part of our Duval crawl.  Our bartender (I think his name was Van or Ven) was awesome. He made our stop so fun we stayed for 2 drinks and appetizers. The food was also great!

headline: Tourist Tradition
content: Sloppy Joe‚Äôs located in Old Town since 1937 has has built a reputation as the bar to visit in Key West where famous artists imbibed and shared experiences. There are photos and memorabilia capturing the past. Along with other tourists we crowded into the dining...More

headline: A must in Key West
content: Nice open sure restaurant with live music.  Brought our kids for lunch.  Great options for good and drink.  The nachos were great as was the mojito in a SJ plastic cup to bring home.

headline: Great music
content: For Pete's sake and his special guest rocked the house! The sloppy nachos were tasty. I always love visiting this place when Im in keywest.

headline: Enjoyed beers in Sloppy Joe's!
content:
No visit to Key West would be complete without sampling the atmosphere of Sloppy Joe's, an icon of Key West and the laid back culture here.

Called in for a beer, welcomed by the staff and enjoyed the music. 

It doesn't get any better than...More

headline: Great Bar
content:
Visited on our first visit to Key West, such is its reputation as a Key West must visit.
I am pleased to say that we were not disappointed.
The drinks and vibrant atmosphere made it a great choice. Our server at the bar was excellent....More

headline: FUN!!!
content: Great music with a great atmosphere.  Service was friendly and quick.  Decor adds to the overall vibe of restaurant.

headline: Key West Institution
content: Bartenders are unbelievably fast given the amount of patrons that walk through the doors. Other Bars  and restaurants could learn a lot from Sloppy Joe‚Äôs. All you need to do is flash a quick smile as an acknowledge so patrons know they exist. Not that...More

headline: Was ok
content: Stopped here while we were in Key West because we figured it was a ‚Äúmust do‚Äù while we were in town.  It was really overrated and disappointing. Music was average at best. Our frozen punch drink was so sweet we couldn‚Äôt drink it. Wouldn‚Äôt come...More

headline: Walking Duval street
content: Very Busy and crowded,had a drink and listened to the music for a little while to cool off , didn't get anything to eat,  didn't see many people eating,  did see a couple having the Sloppy Joe's and wondered about how they tasted? We would...More

headline: Pictures
content: We drove down Duval Street to see Sloppy Joes to check it off our key west bucket list. We took pictures, checked out the gift area and that was it. Basically and old broken down bar with bunches of college kids and bikers hanging out,...More

headline: Great
content: Can be loud, but must go to.  Food good and not expensive.  Easy for handicap to go in.  Friendly staff and bar drinks are good but high priced  Must go

headline: Great music
content: Great service..bar tendar was attentive, friendly and welcoming, felt like i was returning home..have been there in the 80's and the atmosphere is still great...highly recomanded

headline: It‚Äôs a landmark - that‚Äôs why
content: You have to go there because it is one of the iconic places in Key West.  It has a crazy atmosphere and lots of people and decent music.  Food is ‚Äúokay‚Äù and drinks are good but overpriced.  But overall if you haven‚Äôt been there, you...More

headline: Fun
content: We had a great time listening to the performers.  The people are friendly and the food is good.  It is a for sure place to stop.

headline: Had to stop here!
content: So when we asked people places that were a must see in Key West, everyone said to come to Sloppy Joe≈õ.   Glad we did... What a fun place.... a music group was playing and they were wonderful.  We only had a few drinks and nachos......More

headline: Love the bar, but the cocktails need help
content: Love the story about the place and Love the vibe of this bar but the cocktails are not very good. If your having anything other than a mixed drink you'll be fine, however if having a cocktail you'll want to go somewhere else. They have...More

headline: Awesome bar!
content: We always stop at Sloppy Joe‚Äôs when in Key West. Good food, great drinks and always terrific entertainment. Bartenders are friendly and quick and atmosphere is welcoming. Great place to visit!!

headline: One of the " Must Do's"
content: Just have to poke your head in here to grab a local brew. Just have to!  Fun atmosphere. Huge place. Live Music all day.

headline: Great Food & Music
content: Iconic bar and restaurant! Stopped in one evening  for drinks and food.....was not disappointed! The food was delicious and the portions were large.  Nightly bands play here and I must say every band we heard was better than the last. Great memorabilia decorated the walls...More

headline: Boots3113
content: Great food and entertainment. Very crowded, get there early for better seating. No waiting line. Has own gift shop.

headline: Excellent fun!
content: Stopped in for a cocktail and staed awhile to listen to the entertainment. We had fun and the Pina Coladas were exvellent

headline: Didn‚Äôt stay
content: Music was SOOO loud couldn‚Äôt talk among friends and the menu looked like your very average bar fare.  Guess they‚Äôre known as a drinking hole which wasn‚Äôt what we were looking for at noon.

headline: Good Vibes!
content: The band was hilarious and played well.  Good drinks and good service.  Had a lot of fun.  Wish I woul've tried the food.

headline: Great for lunch!
content: I had lunch with my 14 year old granddaughter. The food was great (we were still full at dinner!) We both had fun. The guitar player was good too! Our waitress was polite and took good care of us. We would go back!

headline: Good food, rude service
content: This was our first port of call in the Key West, on the Saturday prior to Easter Sunday, the place was packed with good live music and a great atmosphere. My husband had the sloppy joe sandwich and I had the pulled pork with a...More

headline: Sloppy joe sandwich!!  Yummy
content: I love this place. Always a must stop place when in the keys.  Eat their specialty sandwich every time!!  I always want to go back several times when I‚Äôm here.  Yummy.

headline: Great Music, good food and excellent service
content: One thing is for certain about Sloppy Joe‚Äôs and that it is a guaranteed good time for all. They make the best Rum Runners - the sledgehammer is a must try. Our server was great and very attentive. You cannot go wrong with this venue.

headline: Oneof a Few Got To Go Places
content: Told by friends this or Margaritaville was a must go so we pick Sloppy Joes.The place was alive with music and packed during the early afternoon hour.  Bathrooms area seemed a little grubby.  I had a chees pizza, no better that what you get from...More

headline: Great place
content: Great place for good drinks and fun music. Was always busy when we visited. Nice little gift shop attached to it. The particular waitress that we had was not overly friendly.

headline: Hanging out
content: Great place...good food, good atmosphere.  Make sure to stop by. We have been by twice this week. We love it.

headline: Key West
content: By far, one of the best places on Duval Street! Went there almost everyday to enjoy the fun & pleasant environment, historical pictures & memorabilia, & have a cocktail along with their great chicken wings! Great place-good service!

headline: Great time at Sloppy Joe's
content: Sloppy mojito was great. Definitely can't go wrong with fish spread, one of the best we've had. Sloppy joe was on point!

headline: Great Sloppy Joe!
content: Fun and crowded place on Duval St. sloppy Joe was really good and the live music was great.  Good for families- not something I‚Äôd say for all the places on Duval.

headline: Fun place to eat, drink and hear music!
content: Very enjoyable place with history as a Hemingway hang out! Service is really good as well! It‚Äôs crowded but you still get served quickly.

headline: A must stop when in Key West!
content: We stopped here a few times during our trip. Always good service, fun atmosphere and great drinks. Always a sure bet for a good time.

headline: Fun place with good food!
content: The drinks were the BEST! The food was great and the entertainment was good. Open air restaurant with a great atmosphere.

headline: Awesome
content: What can I say it's great as usual. We went there twice during our visit to Key West. Great food, drinks and music.

headline: Great Place
content: One of the best places to eat the food is awesome and service is outstanding.  The music was great and atmosphere awesome

headline: Great Iconic Place
content: Food & drinks were great.  Always crowded, but service is great & the place is very cool,  A must see & do!

headline: Fun fun fun
content: A must go to in Key West.  This historic bar is lively and always busy.  Great music and ample drinks.

headline: Great time and live music
content: My husband and I went for a late lunch/early dinner and the place was already busy. The food was simple and delicious and the vibe was like a late night bar crowd.

headline: Jackpot!!!
content: When you go to an establishment multiple times on a trip you know it's that deal!! Another historic bar that totally satisfied. Complete with a full bar, two mini bars and a stage with rotating bands this place was jumpin! I ordered a few whiskey...More

headline: Great music & atmosphere
content: We visited Sloppy Joe‚Äôs a few times during our stay in Key West.  It‚Äôs a fun bar with great live music & a good atmosphere.  Attracts people of all ages which is nice to see.

headline: Shouldn‚Äôt there be conch in the conch fritters?
content: Also, the Joes were definitely sloppy but not worth the trip. The sauce was sweet rather than savory and wasn‚Äôt a treat to the taste buds at all. The music, while loud, was enjoyable. PS you could be live on the internet and not know...More

headline: Nice place for some booze and food
content: Came here after the Hemmingway house tour as the person that owned this place back in the day was friends with Hemmigway and it is a locale landmark. Food is ok nothig great typical bar food with good music to boot.

headline: Had Too, Check.
content: We stopped for one and ended up checking the pace out and leaving. We had to see what the hype was all about. We visited Sloppy Joes in Havana and loved it. It was great checking this place out but it was a little too...More

headline: Sloppy Joe with Show!!!
content:
YUM, YUM & more YUM!!!
Enjoyed the unique history and atmosphere of Sloppy Joe‚Äôs years ago on a previous visit to Key West. Planned to check it out again while on this vacation. The power went out in our resort and as we quickly discovered...More

headline: What a great place - You Must Visit
content: this was on my husbands must visit list and it did not disappoint. The rustic building and atmosphere was fantastic. The bar staff, wait staff and patrons were all very happy and eager to chat. The beers are cold and the entertainment great and welcoming....More

headline: You‚Äôve got to go
content:
Sloppy joes is a key west must 
Service is excellent 
Wait staff is attentive and quick 
Beer is cold and live music playing sets a terrific palm tree sunshine mood

headline: Great entertainment, great drinks and pretty good food.
content: The food was pretty good, the drinks were very tasty, great service and great entertainment.  The prices were ok, considering the competition and the area.  Upbeat atmosphere, family friendly.

headline: Haven from the storm
content: It was a rainy afternoon and the power had gone out.  Sloppy Joes was the only place open.  They must have a generator.  Everyone flocked in to have a drink.  There was live music and it was very crowded but very fun.  We bellied up...More

headline: Fun famous Key West Bar
content: No history lesson here, you can google the history later). This place had a great vibe and feel. Open air flowing throughout because the open walls on two sides. I‚Äôm not big on drinking and the bartender insisted that he squeeze a lime in my...More

headline: Great Atmosphere
content: We stopped here for cocktails one afternoon.  Great atmosphere, paying much tribute to our Navy.  The drinks were delicious and refreshing.  Food looked like typical bar fare. Enjoyed the live entertainment.

headline: Great Vibe!
content: Wonderful bar and restaurant. Great live music. Good food! Awesome atmosphere with plenty of activity! Definitely one of those iconic places to visit while in Key West!

headline: Tourist trap
content:
We came here after our trip through the Hemingway House.  Huge disappointment. The place is loud and server threw our food on the table and was in a hurry. We ordered wings and conch fritters . 
The sloppy Rita was great but the food was...More

headline: Legend
content: A must when in key west. Good food. Live music.. cold beer.. and just relax in a good way.. but there is a lot of good bars in duval streetüòé

headline: Try the nachos!
content: Had a few drinks and nachos, some decent live music and a nice place to chill for a bit. Prices were reasonable and service was great.

headline: Great drinks and service
content: Had a great time at Sloppy Joe‚Äôs. The pina colada was perfect, as was their famous margarita. Justin was an amazing server! Great atmosphere.

headline: Overrated but Popular
content: It's all in the name and location.  This place is set on the corner in a very busy part of Duval.  There are always a lot of people here, but I find it dirty, noisey and full of drunk tourists.  The food is horrible and...More

headline: Great Place For Drinks and Musical Entertainment
content: So our "Duval Crawl" consisted of only three stops.  We started at Irish Kevins where we had a great time and then moved down to Sloppy Joe's where the great times continued.  We hit it just right as we had a group of 10 right...More

headline: Iconic
content: My family recently had lunch here. It was almost always packed during our visit, so we went early on a day that there were  no cruise ships in town.  The food was good, but nothing special. I had a grilled fish sandwich.  The live entertainment...More

headline: We had a blast!!!
content: My hubby and I took a cab here from the place we were renting on Atlantic Blvd, as we were looking for a fun evening out, and knowing we wanted to spend some time at this joint. We had visited the Hemingway home earlier in...More

headline: Don‚Äôt eat there!
content: The drink are good but there are so many good restaurants don‚Äôt eat here. The sloppy joe sandwich was all tomato sauce and very little meat. Fish tacos were plain.

headline: Crowded house
content:
As everyone else you have to visit Sloppy Joe's (Duval Street) while in Key West, this was a weekday and the bar was full of people during daytime, good service for a drink.
Also live music on stage.

headline: It's all about the atmosphere here.
content: Stopped by Sloppy Joe's on a recent Saturday night for some dinner and entertainment, and it was packed as usual.  I had a sandwich called the Full Moon fish sandwich, and it was great....fried mahi - yum!  Also tried a Sloppy Rita drink, which was...More

headline: ENTERTAINING!
content: My husband and I stopped in here during the day and at evening - both times - friendly staff, great music - the air flowing through the place just felt so tropical. Never felt rushed, was able to enjoy the atmosphere.

headline: Fun Place
content: As should be expected, it was a bit crowded but the service was great and the food was good. We enjoyed the piano player singing old rock and roll songs.

headline: Check it out
content: We grabbed a couple drinks and a Sloppy Joe here for the history. Very loud and somewhat dirty, at 3p in January.

headline: Always jammed and Live music all day long
content: So if you are lucky enough to get a sit the Conch Fritters are really good specially with GREEN TABASCO SAUCE..We ordered the Hemingway Mojito with Pilar Rum a very different tasting rum but very enjoyable...the down side they are fairly small and you just...More

headline: Sloppy Joe‚Äôs
content: Always busy, so grab a seat when you see one available. Great service! Variety of food choices. Love the atmosphere and live music.

headline: Interesting
content: The food and service were good. The ambiance was great and the musicians were entertaining, worth the visit just for the history if nothing else.

headline: Sloppy Joe‚Äôs
content: A must in Key West! It‚Äôs always busy so grab a seat, or stalk until you find one open up, have a drink, eat a Sloppy Joe and enjoy the live music!

headline: Key West icon
content: This is a most stop just due to the history and tourist expectations- always live music and predictable service and food.  Worth the stop and get a souvenir .

headline: Great drop in spot
content: We stopped in for a cold drink and an appetizer- and were lucky enough to sit and cool off and have live entertainment .  Beer was cold and the sampler tray was all good - wings, mozza sticks, conch fritters and onion rings..some good.  Its...More

headline: Gotta Go!
content: Great drinks, live music and of course the best sloppy joe‚Äôs! I‚Äôm not a big fan of sloppy joe‚Äôs, but the ones they serve here are different- they serve piping hot and on perfectly toasted buns- delicious!

headline: Not good
content: Came for early dinner before boat cruise. Food was overpriced and not very good. Server came by once for order and then delivery of meal. She never checked back and was not attentive at all. Tourist trap eat somewhere else.

headline: Birthday Night
content: Great time great bartenders great music in for a vacation and celebrating our friends birthday had to try the sloppy Joe‚Äôs first night was March 31 then we brought our other friends back on Tuesday night everybody loved it

headline: Fun with good food as a bonus
content: Fun atmosphere with strong drinks and good food as a bonus. It‚Äôs all ages until 9:30p, so you can take your kids for a little Duval St experience. Servers are delightful.

headline: Fantastic evening of music!
content: Possibly we were just very fortunate, but the Monday jam session, of 4 musicians plus a guest, was amazing. The 3 guys, lead by Preacher??, and accompanied by a phenomenal lady bass guitarist playing a 6 string bass guitar. The foursome played and sang a...More

headline: Land mark
content: Great live music and atmosphere.  Try the local rum or grab a bite to eat. We loved the people here, the bartenders will help you get in the happy chill key west mood

headline: Electric Energetic and Fabulous !!
content: Atmosphere was so fun and exciting.  It was crowded and there was a band playing - a really good band (sorry that i can't remember name).  We were lucky enough to see a couple leaving just as we approached so we grabbed the table !!...More

headline: Iconic
content: Sorely miss Wsyne of Pete and Wayne came- Wayne passed far too young - but the conch fritters and nachos are as iconic as the place itself. Watch the ssd's Howland enjoy the KW vibe.

headline: Lost a bit of its appeal.
content:
There's something lacking about Sloppy Joes these days. 
There just isn't that feel good atsmosphere any more. 
Still, there's plenty of other great bars in KW

headline: Sloppys
content: Stayed in Key West for 5 days the last weekend in March with some friends. Each night we went to Sloppy Joes for music and drinks. When we were there the band Mixed Signal‚Äôs played every night. The band was amazing and played some great...More

headline: Take A Pic And Move On
content: Stopped in because it's a classic. The food is meh- average. Just get a beer, and/or just take a picture. Service for us was- meh. But I am sure the service varies from server to server. I got the Sloppy Joe, of course. It's a...More

headline: Just stopped in for a beer and some music.
content: It was our last night on the island and we stopped in for a few drinks and to listen to the band.  We had good service sitting at the bar.

headline: Always fun!
content: Sloppy Joes is an experience. There is always live music. Sometimes you might find someone famous playing, like Kenny Chesney!  Price is ok for Key West. Can‚Äôt go to Key West without stopping here!

headline: You ain‚Äôt never had a better sloppy joe!
content: Best sloppy joe you will ever have in your life!  Fast service.  Fresh delicious foods.  Great drink selection.  Live music and great drink selection.

headline: Great music
content: Stopped in for a few minutes stayed for a couple hours.  Great music, fun atmosphere, service was prompt.  Worth stopping in when in key West.

headline: Papa would approve
content: I waited a long time to get to this place. So let‚Äôs get to it: the drinks are big and cold and strong, and I like that very much. There is an entire wall of hemming Way memorabilia, genuine and fascinating, and I like that...More

headline: Sloppy Joes - fun, good live music and food
content: Highly recommend eating here or just having drinks. Great hamburger, fish tacos and southwestern salad. Margaritas are good. Live music was great. You can enjoy this place with children.

headline: Amazing Couch Fritters
content: The beer was ice cold the couch fritters were amazing. The bartender treated us like family and we really enjoyed our stay in Key West. Everyone was so nice.

headline: Bar for drinks
