content: crowded, overpriced but super fun and relaxed. The bartenders were hard to get to but that's why you go. We snagged a table when a nice couple moved to the bar to allow for our 4 some. I got a pat on the back from...More

headline: Food was just average. Good live music. Good service.
content: We had a large party of 12 and got in right at noon. We enjoyed the live music but it was a bit loud - too hard to converse. The service was good. However, the food was just OK. We had sloppy joes and BBQ...More

headline: Service and food
content: Went in for lunch and a drink, took 20 mins to get a drink and I had to get her our server who was talking at the bar with a co worker and the BBQ was terrible all fat.  If you like music I would...More

headline: Just a great dive bar!
content: This is the kind of bar that you want to hang out in forever.  Good drinks, good food and friendly people.  Had the world famous "Bar at the end of the world" daiquiri along with a few beers - was not disappointed.

headline: Birthday lunch
content:
Good crowd. Fun atmosphere, with good drinks, decent lunch fare and enjoyable performances.

You do not go here for fine dining, you go to have a good time, and Soppy Joe‚Äôs provides!

headline: Lunch date Duval Street
content: Good food, very busy! Live music was great and entertaining. Staff was friendly. Right in the middle of Key West action. Not original site of one connected to Hemingway, but close to Marina and Rum Distillery.

headline: Fun!
content: A must see on Duval Street!  Always great music and people watching.  Location is part of the fun atmosphere

headline: A must see!
content: This place is iconic. You must go here! Anyone thats been to key west has been here! Definitely see this place.

headline: A Key West Jewel
content:
Perfect retreat for a sandwich and a cold frosty beer! Quick friendly service and ice cold beer. 

Great job Sloppy Joe's

headline: A must do
content: I couldnt think of Key West without thinking of Sloppy Joes..great food, greatest entertainment, great drinks and service..üëçüëçüíïüíñ

headline: A nice place to kick back
content: There are many watering holes in Key West. My wife, friends and I came here on the recommendations of a good friend. The place is so good we came in here twice to have a few beers and to listen to the live band. This...More

headline: Spring break 2019
content: Busy on Sunday afternoon, as cruise ships don‚Äôt leave until 5-6 pm.  Service was excellent (Justin) was great to us even though it was crazy busy.  He even mapped out his favorites for us while here.   Food was okay- nothing spectacular but a fun environment...More

headline: Great entertainment
content: I went here to get the sloppy Joe sandwich there was a live band playing the atmosphere was pretty nice although a little loud but energetic my wife got the shrimp basket and she liked it the drinks were good great night life.

headline: Great place!
content: Great food, great service, fun atmosphere!  Had a band while we were there.  It was fun to listen to the music while we ate our dinner.

headline: Fun lunch stop
content:
We had read about the history behind Sloppy Joe's and were looking forward to trying it.  It was packed but we found a table pretty easily.
Very quick, and attentive, service. Good sloppy joe sandwiches and crunchy fries. Enjoyed the singer who performed.
As good...More

headline: Busy venue
content: Clearly a huge hit in Key West. Nice large venue with multiple bars and a stage for a band. Place was packed and super lively. They have a different type of Mojito called the Hemingway and is really good!

headline: A Must-Go-To Tourist Trap
content: Tourist prices.  Always packed.  Loud music and average tasting food.  But, it's where Hemingway went.  Worth checking out.

headline: Neat Old Bar!
content: Every time we passed by Sloppy Joe‚Äôs it was packed with people so one day we decided to make it our first stop of the day.  There were a handful of people in the place during our visit.  Beverly, our bartender, served us quickly and...More

headline: Cruise Ship Stop in Key West.
content: So happy Joe‚Äôs has always been a Key West Place  for dining.  Everything in the keys is casual so it‚Äôs a casual dining area. We got there for lunch at 11:30 which was good because it got crowded quickly oh wait was very kind to...More

headline: Great place, fun atmosphere
content: Chris the bartender was excellent. Great service and good food. Nice live music. A must see when visiting Key West

headline: Touristy but so fun!
content: I almost did not want to like this place given the Duval tourist hype, but it was so damn fun I loved it!  There are people from age 21 to 81 inside and everyone is looking to have a good time.  I am a huge...More

headline: Very fun atmosphere
content: It‚Äôs a very busy bar/restaurant. Food is good and the music was excellent. Very fun place to visit. Get there early if you want a seat otherwise it‚Äôs standing room only. Worth the visit!

headline: Age Does Not Matter
content: My girlfriend and I are senior citizens.  We went into Sloppy Joes late after dinner on a Friday night during college spring break.  We were not sure what to expect.  What we found were many others that were our age.  We found a great band...More

headline: Food was good
content: Stopped here for lunch, good lunch. Drinks were served in disposable plastic cups. Entertainment was average.

headline: Mediocre
content: This is a touristy spot on Duval. Unfortunately the service leaves something to be desired and the food was mediocre. It‚Äôs great if you just want some average bar food and average service, if not, then KW has a a lot more to offer.

headline: The Keys
content: On vacation with my wife and went to the legendary Sloppy Joe's.  A trip to the Keys would not be complete without a trip here.  Awesome time!

headline: Fun
content: We had a lot of fun here. The live music was always really fun and we loved how open it was inside. The drinks were good and the theme inside was really cool too.

headline: Iconic Bar with great Bands
content: We visit New Orleans every year because of the music. If you‚Äôve been to Key West it‚Äôs a lot of the same bar crawl atmosphere but there are few and far between places that actually have a live band. The difference is it‚Äôs not just...More

headline: Take a picture and keep walking
content: Yes, this is an iconic Key West bar that has survived 86 years and numerous tropical storms and hurricanes. However, the atmosphere is blah and they don‚Äôt have any premium liquor brands. There‚Äôs so many better bars in the area. Take your souvenir photo and...More

headline: So fun!
content: We went for the famous sloppy joe, and of course the atmosphere. We went back later at night to listen to the band. Great fun!!!!

headline: Not Unpleasant but Nothing Outstanding
content: Sloppy Joe's is legendary and is certainly unique.It has a friendly vibe but the rowdiness is a bit overdone. It is worth a stop just to experience the place (and say you were there) but one stop was enough for our family.

headline: Fun bar
content: The entertainment here was great fun! The place was packed every night! Fun place to dance and enjoy good music!

headline: Sloppy  Joe's cafe
content: Me and my wife visited sloppy Joe's the service was great the band was great the food was awsome would recommend sloppy Joe's to any body who visits key west Florida will not disapoint.

headline: Fun times
content: We met friends here.. the atmosphere is very fun, live music and they had a customer on stage as well

headline: Go for the Sloppy Joe of course.
content: Had to stop and try the sloppy joe's.  Not quite what my mother used to make but pretty close.  Crowded, noisy and fun.   Not fine dining but a fun place to stop.

headline: Historic music bar
content:
We visited Sloppy Joe's on a recent cruise call to Key West. This historic bar is famous for it's patrons especially Ernest Hemingway, and it's live music. 
There is a full menu of fast food including pizza, sandwiches, fish and chips, conch fritters etc -...More

headline: Fun place
content: Fun eclectic place with good food and drinks coupled with live music.  College wall, Hemingway wall and armed services wall give it the anything goes feel.

headline: Not worth my time
content: Every time we attempt to go here something weird happens. Last year we went to walk in with drinks in hand (all bars on Duvall allow this) and they told us we had to finish our drinks first. WTH? Then this year they wanted a...More

headline: The history alone is priceless!
content: Even though it is a tad commercial it is still a lot of fun stepping back into the history of Key West. I would recommend stopping in for a drink!

headline: Sloppy Joe‚Äôs is a must place to go when you‚Äôre in Key West
content: Sloppy Joe‚Äôs on Duval Street in Key West is a must place to visit when you‚Äôre in Key West, great entertainment, great atmosphere, great food and fun, good time for everyone

headline: Great atmosphere
content: I was here with 3 friends on a Friday night. I don't usually like bars but the atmosphere was great with a live band and lots of people enjoying their great music. The food was good, but the drinks were overpriced (as is everything in...More

headline: Great band!
content: Went there with coworkers after dinner. The band was amazingly talented and played lots of music from the 80's, 90's and early 2000's. Great atmosphere huge range of ages and people

headline: Key West Landmark
content: Party atmosphere, live music, signature sloppy joe, tap beer etc. I gave this a 1 star as we had a pan handler approach us inside the resturant at our table, sat down like he knew us and waitress obliviously knew him, as she asked if...More

headline: A Key West landmark
content: You've got to stop by for a drink. There's live music most of the day and  a really laid-back, time-to-party Key West vibe. Fun place for a drink or two or a light bite. Filled with Hemingway memorabilia on the walls. People here are ready...More

headline: Classic key west
content: Sloppy joes was the classsic key west vibe. Live music, friendly staff and great music made this a must stop!!!!

headline: Great Lunch Spot
content: They had live music. A lot of places do, but it was pretty good here. The food was a nice mix of seafood and American cuisine. Good experience overall. Staff was nice and we never had empty glasses.

headline: Music
content: Always great bands. We make this a required stop every time we visit key west. The drinks and service awesome.

headline: Touristy - Loud - FUN!
content: We loved Sloppy Joes! The Sloppy Joes were great and the beer was cold. The people watching was spectacular. They also had a good band. Service was excellent! This is a Key West must-dine place!

headline: Long weekend getaway
content: The hangout of Hemingway and live entertainment. Stopped in because well we‚Äôve never been and had been told that you need to at least stop by once. We stayed awhile had a few drinks, listened to live music and had the nachos. We had a...More

headline: Seniors Spring Break
content: Went there as we were familiar with the web cams featuring this place during Irma.  This is an iconic watering hole in Key West.  We decided to have an early happy hour.  The music was an added bonus.  Drinks and service lived up to reputation.

headline: Great entertainment
content:
Definitely the place to visit in Key West for great beer and entertainment üòéüëçüèªüëçüèª

A busy place with a great atmosphere.

headline: Fun!
content: Fun, historic bar.  Good drinks.  Enjoyed the live band!  Great people watching, especially on the dance floor.  Worth going to for a fun evening!

headline: Good times
content: We stopped in to Sloppy Joes one day that we were in town. My wife had been there before, and said it was a fun place. Any place named sloppy joe (as in food) is fine by me. It was a warm day in the...More

headline: Contrast
content: Day and evening nice pub and food, after hours fun dance bar, loud thump thump music, drinks are a little expensive compared to other places but I guess it helps cover the bands since there was no cover on a Saturday night.

headline: Love this place
content: Great bar with live music and great service. We were there during the daytime and it was full. Very impressed with food and our waitress could not have been better. Can‚Äôt wait to go back.

headline: THIS IS A" MUST DO"  - restaurant  - -  bar - - CLASSIC ESTABLISHMENT.
content: Been going there for years  - -  right on Historic Duval Street. Considered the " Original Home"  -  of the Famous Sloppy Joe Sandwhich. Great local color  - - - live music . A not to be missed stop in KEY WEST. Love IT.

headline: Great Historic Bar In Key West
content: This place is a must see when in Key West.  They have great entertainment all Day and Night. The drinks are tropical and delicious. This is a really fun place. Can be hard to get a table but if you just ask to share a...More

headline: Tourist trap
content: After 20 minutes of searching for ourselves a table to clean off we finally got to eat. The sloppy Joe was nothing but onion and tomato paste and smelled like cat food. The drinks were pre packaged drink mix, were terrible and over priced. After...More

headline: A Key West Icon
content: Because of the history behind it (one of Ernest Hemingway's favorite haunts), we had to eat at Sloppy Joe's while in Key West.  It was packed for lunch on Saturday and I thought we might have to pass it by, but we were able to...More

headline: Stopped For a beverage
content: Group of 8 took an after brunch break for a beverage & to check it out. Hopping place even on a Monday afternoon!  Musician did a good job engaging the audience. His music sounded good too

headline: Very Loud
content: Average food and average service. Very, very loud and very busy. They do have a nice gift shop attached if you wanted to get a tshirt or something. We just split a cuban sandwhich but it was just a basic bar with basic bar food.

headline: Great Food and Drinks and
content: Came here today for drinks and nachos. Both were excellent like last time. A little crowded like it always is but that's the sign of a good place!!

headline: Would go again
content: We had a lot of fun; good food, good music, and good drinks. All tables and bar stools were full & there were 4 of us; you seat yourself & have to keep an eye on who is leaving, to get their table before someone...More

headline: Party
content: Sloppy Joe's never disapoints. Been there a few times now and the atmosphere is always great. Live music and great drinks and beer. Happy dancing and singing people at summers nights end. What more can you ask for? This is one of the "must have...More

headline: A must while visiting Key West!
content: Definitely stop in at Sloppy Joe's while visiting Key West. The place is typically packed regardless of the time of day. We stopped by late afternoon and finally located 2 seats at the bar. Live music and very quick service. I had the best Pina...More

headline: Great views Great View but don‚Äôt sit at bar
content: Great views.  Food is good.  Prices are fair but don‚Äôt sit at the bar there is a terrible smell ... HELP HELP HELP

headline: Wild party
content: Good times, this is definitely a party, live music, fun people stop in for a beer listen to a few songs meet new people.

headline: Fabulous
content: What a spot.. packed day and night with happiness all over!! Bands and music and fun and a great bunch of people! Not o be missed .. pop in for a beer!!

headline: Great food!
content: We had a time restraint being on an excursion, we got quick service food was timely and delicious.  Loved that the staff checked identification when checking out being a tourist town my identity may have been stolen thank you!

headline: A must do!
content: Live entertainment is great! Sloppyrita is really good. Sloppy Joes are great and the nachos are a huge order.

headline: Food is so-so
content: I‚Äôm sure people go for the bar atmosphere but we ate lunch here one day. It was just ok. Nothing special. Good live music though!

headline: Lunch at Sloppy Joe‚Äôs
content: We stopped for a late lunch at Sloppy Joe‚Äôs and enjoyed a great meal which was accompanied by a group of musicians.  There was a bass guitar player, a drummer and lead singer/guitarist who played during our meal.  It is a crowed spot so you...More

headline: Appetizer and drinks!
content: We stopped here on a day trip to Key West from our cruise. The chicken nachos are delicious!  The bartender was so nice. I would stop here again if in the area.

headline: Great Food and Drinks!
content: Drinks were strong, reasonably priced (for Key West) and the Fried Fish Sandwich was Huge and AMAZING!!!!

headline: Fun Place
content:
Great bar and great time music is great 
Bar staff amazing always a stop when We go to Key West looking forward to coming back

headline: Average Fun Spot but worth a visit!
content: We met up with 2 other couples at this old historic spot!  They had the sloppy joe's which were just that and nothing special & cost $9.99 each with nothing else.  The other couple had a gorgeous beautiful pizza that looked delicious!  The place has...More

headline: Great band!
content: Loved hearing the Juliano Brothers here several weeks ago!  Heard them 3 times and they didn‚Äôt disappoint. Love the atmosphere at Sloppy Joes. Also great people watching! üëçüèº

headline: Best Frozen Strawberry Colada's
content: We stopped in for a cold drink and to listen to the band playing. We had a couple of Frozen Strawberry Colada's. These are a great mix of strawberry and pina colada. Very good and refreshing. If you don't have time to sit and listen...More

headline: Overrated
content: If a crowded, overpriced bar full of drunken rowdies is what you're looking for, this is the place. It's overpriced and overrated. The staff is both slow and rude. If you are lucky enough to find a place to sit, beware of seating near the...More

headline: Went traditional- yep
content: Had to stop in to see what this was all about - lots of hype - bottom line it lived up to it. Heard food was marginal - Not true. Had the traditional sloppy joe- and wife had cheese steak. Both were excellent ! Service...More

headline: Key West is touristy, but Sloppy Joe's hasn't changed
content: This place is still a little slice of heaven like Key West used to be. It was 100 degrees outside so this place was an oaisis. Drinks are expensive but not outlandish. And you can get a hurricane and it's the best thing you have...More

headline: Food, drinks and people watching!
content: The service was quick and casual, the Philly cheese steak sandwich one of the best I have had outside of Philly. The margaritas divine, and the people watching best ever! The bar is open to the street on two sides making you feel part of...More

headline: Cool place
content:
Good drinks, great service...one of the iconic places we hadn't been to.
Grabbed some onion rings while we were there and listened to the musician...cool atmosphere.
Wasn't too crowded when we were there but we've seen it overflowing before!!

headline: Sloppy Joes
content: My family and I ate there the other day!! The sloppy joe I had was great and my wife and dad really enjoyed their food!!! Amazing historic atmosphere, our waiter was awesome!!! So many thing to look at while you wait for your food, which...More

headline: Day drinking at its best!!
content: Best place for day drinking and people watching on Duval St. in Key West! There is always live music and the open feel of the bar makes you lose track of all time and place. The drinks are reasonable and the staff is very friendly...More

headline: Sloppy
content: Made a brief stop for a Sloppyrita and onion rings.  They were advertised as beer battered, but were straight off some distributor truck.  Extremely ordinary and the Sloppyrita was weak and pretty tasteless.  Go for the fun and music, not the food.

headline: Sloppy but so yummy!
content: Fun bar! Great band to sing slong with! The Sloppy Joe was delicious! The guys had to split another one for dessert! The burgers were good too! Service was excellent even though the place was crazy crowded. Reasonally priced menu too!

headline: Sloppy is right
content:
Fun Fun Fun! but the food is just plain sloppy and I not talking just about the appearance.
But if you are just drinking you're in the right place. But let's be clear there are lots of fun places in Key West that are fun....More

headline: Key West Return Visit
content: Popular watering hole due to location and Hemingway fame. Bar was crowded as it usually is and music was OK. Bartender friendly as I have found in all Key West Bars I visited. You always need to drop in for a drink when in town...More

headline: We love our Sloppy Joe's
content: We love to go and hang out here when we are in town.  Great food, drinks, bands.  Clean restrooms and and overall great place!

headline: Celebrating my 60th
content:
This is a Key West must do...we were celebrating my 60th Birthday.

Enjoy your favorite libation with great local bands...

headline: Truly a one of a kind
content: The food is very good, the drinks are cold, and the fun is always happening when you are at Sloppy Joes.

headline: Fun and fast
content: Came early to get a good table for a group of us with kids. Server was super friendly and helpful, music was playing and a fun atmosphere. Food came out pretty fast but it was just ok. Good portions, decent price, but the original sloppy...More

headline: Busy hopping bar with cold beer!
content: Apparently this is a must while in Key West... so.. we went for a beer. Was super busy and everyone was having a great time.  Bartender "understood" were were there for one and then had to leave.. he was funny and quick.  Downed our cold...More

headline: Always Fun
content: Given its notoriety, Sloppy Joe's definitely attracts a bar crowd. They food and appetizers fit the scene. Usually crowded, but always fun.

headline: Sloppy joes party
content: Visited sloppy joes as part of a day trip. Went in the afternoon and the place was mobbed and jumping. A guy was in stage playing guitar and singing and it was a really good party atmosphere and I would highly recommend a visit.

headline: Put-In-Bay (Ohio) Festival was a blast
content: Sloppy Joe's - infamous and famously entertaining!  This place was hopping for the Put-In-Bay (Ohio) Festival.  Lots of Ohio folks supporting talented Ohio musicians!  The wait staff was exceptional on this busy night!  Great vibe in the crowd.  We had so much fun we returned...More

headline: Wonderful place to eat and drink
content: Great food!  The vibe was really laid back and cool.  There was a phenomenal band playing and the dance floor was hopping.  The service was really fast and friendly.

headline: Charming
content: Nice place with a lot of personality a few blocks from the cruise port. They don't stint on the alcohol! I don't normally get dessert when I eat out, but I ordered the key lime pie with raspberry sauce and I was NOT disappointed. Yum!

headline: A wonderful pub
content:
If you like music this is the right site.
Here it is possible have specialty drinks, large selection of beers within a pleasure live music.
Simply a wonderful piace.

headline: Papa Hemingway had good taste!
content: We hung out here and had iced cold beers and terrific nachos and pretzels! We also enjoyed the music of the live band! Would go back in a heartbeat!

headline: Favorite Bar
content: Love this place, always music and fun. The sloppy joe isn‚Äôt too bad either but it is very ‚Äúsloppy ‚Äú.

headline: Get at least one drink üç∏ üòÅ
content: Historic Bar where Hemingway used to drink, womanize and write! It‚Äôs one of the most famous places in Key West and you should definitely have at least one drink there.

headline: ABSOLUTELY MUST VISIT!
content:
Sloppy Joes is a Key West tradition that you definitely have to experience!
In my opinion, the food was average.  
The main feature, for me, was the memorabilia on the walls!  Lot of Hemingway, of course.
But, as a Vietnam veteran, I appreciate that Sloppy...More

headline: What a Place!!
content: We stopped here on the crawl every night we like the drinks and the company. There are a lot of options for cocktails and we tried them all that we can remember.

headline: Third Stop on Pub Crawl
content: This was a stop on a pub crawl we went on. Good drinks, fun atmosphere. Different drink specials each day.

headline: Great historic staple!
content: This ol‚Äô place never disappoints. Great drinks, food is fresh and simple, loads of seating, and even good live music! There‚Äôs always friendly staff helping each other out so you never wait for refills. They have several ceiling fans to keep it cool in there...More

headline: Loud
content: If you like loud fun this is the place for you. Rocks day and night and is a Key West institution so you must go if you like an old smelly beer bar. But fun.

headline: Great Music venue
content: We went for entertainment and lunch.  They were both great!  Service was great too!  There was a music festival in town for the weekend and we benefited from them as well.

headline: Put-in Bay Music Festival
content: My wife and I stumbled into the Put-in Bay Music Festival at Sloppy Joe‚Äôs last year. We enjoyed ourselves so much that we planned a trip again this year to attend the festival again.  Pete, Ray Fogg & Pat Sheppard did not disappoint!  We spent...More

headline: Fun drinks
content: We enjoyed the live music and atmosphere here. The food was meh recommend for some drinks but not dinner.

headline: World Class Bar
content: We visited several times when Preacher Pete and his new trio Tipsy and the Donuts - gosh, I hope they've gotten a new name by now -  were playing in the early evening. The music and crowd interaction were rollicking good; as lively and as...More

headline: Packed
content: This restaurant was packed and we had to wait a while for a table.  The food is okay, the service is okay, and the entertainment is okay.  It is a place you have to stop in while you are in Kew West.

headline: Childhood Sloppy Joe sandwich
content: My sister loves a dry sloppy joe if that‚Äôs even possible but I love their recipe. The musician on stage added so much to the experience. We get off the Key West Express and head directly there every time. Never a disappointment. Their specialty drinks...More

headline: Always a good time at Sloppy Joe's
content: You simply can not go to Key West and not at least stop into Sloppy Joe's.  Great music, drinks and staff keep me coming back year after year.

headline: Manage your expectations
content: This is a very popular spot in a very touristy area. It has a ton of great charm but I would recommend you get drinks there and don‚Äôt eat there.

headline: fun place!
content: Good luck getting a table -- it's each man for himself!  Supposedly a haunt of Hemingway's ... a fun place to have a bite or a sip.  very open, live music.  food is ok, tee shirts are better!

headline: Fun Bar - Don‚Äôt Miss
content: Fun bar in Key West. Good frozen drinks at reasonable prices. Live music most of the time. Quick and efficient service.

headline: This is not the original Sloppy Joe‚Äôs
content:
This bar has live music and food and is big and  clean friendly with nice wait staff. We had dark and stormy drinks and the original sloppy joe- it was great!
If you came back in the day and want to find the original sloppy...More

headline: Love this place!
content: Every time we‚Äôre in KW, we end up making a trip to KW we stop at Sloppy Joe‚Äôs and this time was no different.  Our group of 6-my parents, sister, brother in law, along with my husband and I all went this trip and made...More

headline: Loud
content: This is a real loud place but its fun and has good food that makes it worth while. We were just looking not having any place in mine and there it was so in we go. Not cheap but good and in line with most...More

headline: Good vibe
content: They have great live music and quick service. My wife really liked the classic sloppy joe and her drink. I suggest trying to get a table by the wall to stay out of traffic.

headline: Fun live music!
content: Definitely one of the most energetic places. They were quite busy but we were able to get a high top near the stage to enjoy some great live music. We did enjoy enjoy an actual sloppy joe which is where this comes from. Drinks for...More

headline: Great spot for Cold beer and Food
content: Fun lunch spot in Key West, live band and a great bartender who's been there 30 years. We had Cuban sandwiches that were out of this world. Busy place and always fun to watch people in Key West.

headline: Great place!
content: Nightly the bands are great here.  It does get packed in the evening.  But the bar is quick and extremely nice.  We didnt try the food but the dancing is great!

headline: 3day stay in Key West
content: We walked down Duval st and found so many Fun establishments !! Great food and yet I heard another amazing band so we found Sloppy Joes!  Great seating and dance area!  Fun is all I can say!  The band was spot in!   A must see!

headline: Great atmosphere
content: Great atmosphere. Good live music. Only downfall is that it‚Äôs so busy it literally takes forever to get a drink. Need more bartenders.

headline: what a fun environment!!
content: great live music, fair priced drinks and an electric atmosphere! great place for photos and a lively souvenir shop! courteous staff and great service!!

headline: This IS THE PLACE to be in Key West
content: Spent time a few days here.  The food is fine, the drinks are very good and the company is great.  If you're into Hemingway, you've come to the right place.  His pictures are all over the place, and there's a merchandise store attached.  i'd recommend...More

headline: Mrs
content: Cuban sandwich was good. Husband had a Sloppy Joe he said it was very good.  Very crowded at lunch time. Cruise ship was in town. A lot of history here.

headline: Quirky and fun
content:
Our second visit here on our annual pilgrimage to the Keys.
Great food, good music and attentive service. Yes it was busy, but that added to the vibe.

headline: #1 cheese-steak
content: We stopped in after a fishing trip with Salty Goats. We ordered the cheese-steak sandwiches with onion rings. Wow! They were large portions and delicious! We actually had to wait a few minutes to eat them because they were served perfectly hot with the melted...More

headline: Iconic Key West
content: Full of tourists - enjoyed a daiquiri mid afternoon with great music (live musician) and high energy atmosphere. Food and drinks are a little pricey but it was a good experience

headline: Great music, food, atmosphere!!!
content: I'm looking forward to my next trip there!!  When we arrived we pretty much had our choice of tables, food was great, service was wonderful and the music was fantastic (brothers band).  By the time we were ready to leave (not really but had to...More

headline: Iconic...Busy...Loud
content: This is a Key West place that you have to experience. We walked by on our way to the sunset one late afternoon and thought we‚Äôd get a drink, but it was so packed we couldn‚Äôt get in! Decided to try another day for lunch....More

headline: Good food
content: Got seated right away.  Service was great. Asked for a different channel for tv and that was accomplished quickly. Will return

headline: A Must Stop to Eat
content: My wife and I went to Sloppy Joe‚Äôs with our son-in-law, his parents, and our granddaughter on Thursday for a late lunch. Besides our granddaughter, our son-in-law was probably the youngest there. The atmosphere was great, live music was good, service was very good, and...More

headline: Fun fun fun - a must stop
content: Tons of fun. Had live band two times we‚Äôve been there. Enjoyed the drinks but we weren‚Äôt there to eat their food which looked amazing. Gets kind of crowded so grab a seat when you can. Very historical place and you can imagine Hemingway sitting...More

headline: Great Place
content: Great historic bar!  It was crowded but we still found seats with no problem. Drinks were good and so was the music

headline: So much fun!
content: My date and I had a blast! I wish I could remember the name of the band with female singer that was playing because they were awesome!  Also had Fantastic margaritas, beer, and service! Always a good time! Great  appetizers! And no trip would be...More

headline: Great bar
content: Sloppy Joes had several bars throughout as well as tables so there was ample seating. Great live music and our bartender was awesome!

headline: Fun spot
content: This is a fun bar right on the main strip of Ducal St.that had great live entertainment during the day and night. They had fun drinks that weren't over priced and actually pretty good. Don't waste your money on food here though, there are better...More

headline: Party bar...buy a T-shirt!
content: I‚Äôve been coming to Key West for years and this place is never a disappointment. We met some friends on this vacation and I thought where could we go to be guaranteed a good time? I sent out a text and we all made it...More

headline: Noisy if you like
content: Wild loud busy...if you like that it's got what you want...soo  many bars to pick from and all with music.

headline: I love Sloppy Joe‚Äôs
content: Always go here when I am in Key West. The band was great when I was there. Service is always good. One of my fav places in Key West to go out.

headline: Cold drinks, cool vibe and good music
content: This was a fun bar to visit and have a cocktail in and listen to some tunes.  We went there after touring the Hemingway house and even though this isn't the original location we believe, it was good fun.  Family and couples and everything in...More

headline: Nice
content: If you think you can get in and out.  Good luck.   This place is booming. Drinks where good. Staff was nice.

headline: Nice atmosphere....
content: The live music is nice. We were not impressed by the sloppy joe sandwich. We did not like the taste,did'nt even finish it!  The fries were delicious. Seating is tight. Good servers.

headline: Iconic
content: Grab a drink and/or some lunch. It's Key West's most iconic location and is a must-see. Other than that, it's a bar. There's better and there's worse, but it's worth the stop.

headline: Don‚Äôt miss it!!!
content:
What a great place!
The food is wonderful, especially the sloppy joes.
The ‚ÄúSloppy-Rita‚Äôs are outstanding and will leave a lasting memory.
The service equals the food.
This is one fun place and not loud and rowdy.
I will not go to Key West without...More

headline: A must do
content: Stopping by here is a absolutel must do when you are in Key West. But if you don‚Äôt know how it got here please go to the Hemingway Museum first.

headline: A must for anyone visiting Key West
content:
We had a great time in Sloppy Joe's, this is a must if you visit Key West.

The music, atmosphere and food were excellent, so much so we almost missed the ferry back to Fort Myres.

headline: Had to try a Key West Tradition
content: I had my first adult vacation to Key West for the annual Key West Marathon and 5K this weekend. After the race I was told by many friends, the many different places that I HAD to visit while I was in the Keys. I tried...More

headline: Busy but good
content: Initially we tried to go for dinner. Way too many people. So we went for lunch the next day. We got the fish tacos and sloppy joes. The fish tacos were excellent, but the sloppy joes...wow! Out of this world. I wish they sold their...More

headline: Great place! If you can get a seat.....
content: This place is awesome but it is too busy so no one goes there. Stay away so I can find a place to sit.

headline: When on Duval Street.........
content: One of the must stops in Key West especially if only here for a day, like a cruise stop. Great drink selection and good cheap eats, the home of the sloppy joe sandwich which I absolutely loved. Lots of history hanging on the walls, so...More

headline: Such history! Great bar in Key West
content: During our day visit on a 7-day cruise, we stopped in the port of Key West. We had never been to Key West before, so we decided to take a walking tour. One place that we passed by was Sloppy Joes and I remembered that...More

headline: A Key West Landmark!
content: Everyone has heard of Sloppy Joes!  It truly is a great resturant with excellent food.  Sloppy's is a fun place with great music and entertainment all day long and late into the night.

headline: Must visit - classic old style bar with a lot of history
content: Great bar with great atmosphere and history - enjoyed good band during our visit - lots of memorabilia to view on the wall from Hemingway days - a "must do" if visiting. Nice friendly and fast service

headline: Great drinks
content: Loved it great drinks  and the music what a wonderful place to party!!!! My husband and I had a wonderful time during our Christmas vacation

headline: Surprising Good Food and Drinks
content: We went during a cruise ship visit and it was really crowded but we got our drinks and food in a timely manner.  Allow a minimum of 1 hour during your port visit. Although we walked back to the ship, those with mobility issues may...More

headline: Entertainment and great food
content: A Key west tradition that never disapoints.  Been going 15 years.    Entertainment is always enjoyable!!!

headline: Great
content: Drinks and food were great. Wonderful place to have fun. Go there for good music as well.  We recommend the Sloppy Rita.

headline: A Hopping place
content: The street corner was crowded with folks staring into Sloppy Joe's.  Got thru and we hung loose at a table sipping suds and enjoying the food.  A must visit place for every visit to Key West.

headline: Make it Part of your Duval Crawl
content: Typically full of cruise ship tourists day times, but better after hours and late at night. Great waitstaff, decent menu and good food selections. Live entertainment and a webcam to show your friends how drunk you can get.

headline: Great Live Music
content:
Stopped in a Sunday evening for one drink and stayed for three. Wonderful live music and good variety of drinks/cocktails. 
Ordered nachos. Plenty of cheese on top and other toppings. 
Friendly efficient service. Bathrooms cleaner than average. Lots of interesting photos and fish on the...More

headline: Delicious food, great entertainment
content: Historical bar with amazing dishes and lively entertainment. Great wait staff and bartenders. Gift shop and live cam outside make Sloppy Joe‚Äôs a must on your trip to KW.

headline: Great cocktails.
content: Having been to KW several times, we decided to visit Sloppy Joe's.  Great Rum Runner,  great service, great atmosphere.  See you in April.

headline: Overnight in Key West
content: Everyone said ‚ÄúYou must go to Sloppy Joes‚Äù!!!!   We were not disappointed.   Live music mid day with great service and delicious drinks.  Nothing better than having your husband drinking at the bar while you enjoying shopping at the Sloppy Joes shop right onsite.   A must...More

headline: Drinks and food
content: The best food with great service. Live local singers great atmosphere.local hang out with reasonable prices. On Duval St covenant to alot of great places.

headline: Tourist Trap
content: Stop by and grab your t-shirt and have a drink so you can say you were there, much like the Hard Rock.  Capt Tony's Saloon, which bills itself as the original Sloppy Joe's (google the history and lawsuits), has a much more dive bar kind...More

headline: A must
content:
Of course a must if you are in Key West as a tourist but we were so positively surprised.
The people in the bar were a mix of tourists and locals and the environment was truly open and friendly. It just has to be experienced...More

headline: A great Key West restaurant right on Duvall Street.
content: Yesterday we dined at Sloppy Joe's. It certainly was an experience. The restaurant was very busy because a cruise ship was in. Never the less we found a table right up front where the entertainment was. The four of us had a really great meal...More

headline: Lively crowd
content: Interesting place. Very lively with music from live bands. The food was mediocre and a little bit pricey. The service was excellent and the food came out very quickly considering the amount of people.

headline: Popular Spot
content: We liked this place. It was packed, but the service was great. The food was well done. There is quite a good selection of beers and cocktails. The live music was a plus.

headline: A fun Friday Night
content: Friendly staff. Great live music. I had the Sloppy Joe, very good! The place was packed but service was quick and friendly. Food was hot & very good!

headline: I came, I saw, I drank...
content:
...and then I moved on.  We got there right when they opened and didn't have a trouble getting a table, but, this place filled up fast!

Not sure what else there is to do in here except drink and then buy a t-shirt - so...More

headline: This place was hoppin!
content: Stopped in for a drink and man was this place HOT!  It was jam packed!  Good musician singing with his guitar...good drinks!  Just very crowded.

headline: Disappointing
content: Went for a drink and was looking forward as seems like a popular place in Key West. They also had live music. We ordered a couple of cocktails but was not at all impressed. They seem to add too much syrup or sugar .. this...More

headline: A tourist attraction with some panache and history
content: Throughout a tasty lunch we enjoyed some great music and reminisced about Hemingway frequenting his friend‚Äôs bar each afternoon.  Probably a key west‚Äôs version of Cafe du Monge!

headline: Lunch at Sloppy Joe's
content:
Quite popular with tourists at lunchtime, it is a big place on Duval St and was pretty full when we got there. We did find an open table quickly. Service was prompt. 
I had to order a Sloppy Joe and wasn't disappointed. Companion ordered a...More

headline: Drive by.
content: I rode right by this one also on the Old Town Trolley which buy the way is the very best way to see all of Key West. It looks small and dank but when all you want to do is drank Git R Done. I...More

headline: A Landmark worth the stop
content: Since we were in Key West for five days, we decided to hit all the "usual" spots as well as some out of the way ones. Literally EVERYONE told us to go to Sloppy Joe's...so we did! It was packed BUT I think it is...More

headline: Loved Sloppy Joes
content: It‚Äôs been years since I have been here. Probably 30. Great entertainment and very friendly bar staff. The Way Outs were a great band and out of the 5 nights we were in Key West, we saw them 3 times if only for a few...More

headline: Great food and service!
content:
We stopped at Sloppy Joe‚Äôs after a day touring Key West. We sat at the bar for our meal. Our bartendar was fantastic! He was attentive and knowledgable. He also had a great personality which added to the fun. 

The food was delicious and the...More

headline: Only go there for Sloppy Joe!
content: Atmosphere is fun. I ordered sloppy joe which was yummy. My husband ordered a buffalo chicken wrap.  It was chicken meatballs and it was so bad that he asked if he could send it back for a sloppy joe. Waitress Wendy was more than accommodating....More

headline: Family Christmas Eve in Key West
content: This was our first trip to Key West.  We had heard of Sloppy Joe's so when we walked up, we decided to give it a try.  We did not wait for a table luckily and the server was prompt in asking questions and taking our...More

headline: Overrated, tourist trap
content: This was our first stop bar-hopping on a Friday night while we were in Key West during the week before Christmas 2018.  We had heard so much about it, but were pretty disappointed ‚Äì it ended up being our least favorite bar of the night....More

headline: Very fun to eat here
content: We enjoyed eating lunch here and having an ‚Äúoriginal‚Äù Sloppy Joe. Had some live music as well. Would go back.

headline: Nostalgia on Duval
content: For anyone visiting Key West the memorabilia on the walls alone in Sloppy Joe's is a must-see.  It's not just a bar, it's a restaurant.  The food is good for a lunch stop.

headline: Yummy nachos and great live music
content: You have to get Sloppy Joe nachos when you come to Sloppy Joe‚Äôs. And the iconic mojito made with Pilar rum is fantastic! It‚Äôs often crowded, but the staff is terrific and the bar food is pretty good!

headline: Interesting . . . but
content:
If you like to see hundreds of bras hanging from the ceiling, this is the place for you. As for me, this place is an insult to the progress toward gender equality during the past 100 years.
That said, Sloppy Joes has historic implications with...More

headline: Not quite sure what the attraction is of Sloppy Joe‚Äôs.
content: Just a large dirty bar/restaurant with a stage and a very relaxed atmosphere.  Nothing special other than that as far as I could tell.

headline: Touristy but cool
content: Nice spot to hang out and cool off on a hot day.  It‚Äôs your typical tourist type place but still a good place to meet people and hang for a while.

headline: Must stop
content: Sloppy Joe's is what you expect it to be after viewing several key west websites. They great music, strong drink, and good portions. It is a must stop while your walking down duval street

headline: Bar stop
content: Still my favorite, great drinks, good food and it does not matter how busy it is, the service is always excellent and prompt. It is the best party in town, live entertainment was great

headline: Sloppy Joes/Key West
content: The live Entertainment was Rock and Roll Era 80‚Äôs.  The stage was like being at a Concert.  Family environment and great food. Loved our Waiter!  He photo bombed all our pics and didn‚Äôt even know it!

headline: Must Stop
content: Sloppy Joes is a must stop staple in Key West.  Great food especially their world famous sloppy Joe‚Äôs, and I love their fish dip also .  Live entertainment all the time very loud fun place to visit and also very busy so expect to wait...More

headline: Always eat at Sloppy Joe‚Äôs when in Key West
content: We always eat here when we visit Key West lots of history good food they had a good live band all fun we had conch fitters Cuban sandwich my wife had a salad.

headline: Sloppy Joe's - great meal and atmosphere
content: Just an all around fun place to visit.  Good food, great servers, live entertainment and a cute gift shop.   Very affordable and convenient near Mallory Square

headline: Had a great lunch
content: Good drinks and food. Live music on a Thursday at lunchtime. Will definitely go back next time we are in the keys.

headline: Great Band!
content: We went to Sloppy Joes over New Years 2019 and saw a band named Whiskey Kiss.  They were a phenomenal classic rock cover band!!  Highly recommend seeing them if you have a chance

headline: World Famous Bar
content: Sloppy Joe's Island Ale was an excellent beer. You trip to Key West is not complete without a trip to this iconic bar

headline: Great Sloppy Joe
content: Great sloppy joe, margarita and live music.  Had a nice lunch with hubby and son after getting ripped off byConch train ride and seeing Hemingway House. Short walk from pier/ ship. Go in and grab a table.  Service was great, food good and fun atmosphere.

headline: Cool Lunch Spot
content: I have been to the Sloppy Joes in Treasure Island and wanted to experience the one in Key West! It was a great atmosphere with live music. It was seat yourself, so if you have a big group like we did, we split up between...More

headline: Teen Family Friendly before 930 pm
content: While in Key West we visited Sloppy Joe‚Äôs on more than one occasions with the under 21 teen family members. Before 930 pm the family can listen to great bands, eat great food and get the souvenir T shirt from the key west favorite Sloppy...More

headline: Great visit
content: We had a quick stop here for lunch and a Sloppy Joe's draft beer. Lunch was a chicken burger, fries and chicken wings. Not the healthiest meal, but then you are eating in a bar. There was a live performer playing country music, which was...More

headline: They just gave up
content: I have been coming to Key West for the last decade. Sloppy Joes was a regular stop for drinks and a meal, lunch or dinner. Stopped by last night, what a waste, service was non existent- finished my first beer, never saw server to order...More

headline: Great Atmosphere
content: We had three visits to Sloppy Joe's during our 6 night stay in Key West. Two lunch and one evening visit. The atmosphere in this place when live bands are on is fabulous. It's  not bad when no bands are on the stage either. We...More

headline: Classic
content: You can't come to Key West and not eat at Hemingway's favorite bar! The sandwiches were good and large, and the drinks were reasonably priced. Very pleased.

headline: Decent food and fun atmosphere
content:
We stopped in for dinner. Service was quick. Food was average. We tried the hot pretzels for an appetizer. It came with sweet mustard instead of cheese which isn‚Äôt my favorite. The sloppy joe was decent. 
They had live music that was fun.

headline: Oh my, those fried chicken Tacos!   Yum.
content:
So besides the amazing non-stop people watching the place makes some pretty decent bar food and drinks.  
I‚Äôve had a million different taco combinations in my life.  But that‚Äôs the first Fried Chicken tacos and the combination of the fresh veggies and the Spicey aioli...More

headline: Christmas Eve Lunch
content: First of all it Sloppy Joes. What a great place. Love the old feel to the place. The food was great. My kids loved there meals. Yes the sloppy joe is great too. The one man band performing was fun too. A little bit Christmas...More

headline: Seriously great!
content: Portions are huge, drinks are great. Live music today was awesome and the guys were hilarious. My bartender was quick and attentive.

headline: nothing sloppy about this place
content: a very one of a kind bar, crowed, noisey, and lots of fun, drinks are cold but a little pricey, good is good but also pricey, wait staff is great

headline: Sloppy
content: If you never have be in Sloppy Joe ‚Äòs and are going to Key west you need to stop in .  Been around since 1937 open air atmosphere ,bar type food,

headline: Awesome atmosphere, fun place, but flawed...
content: It is VERY noisy, which is great if that‚Äôs what you‚Äôre looking for! We were there for food and drinks, and found the sandwiches - I had the pulled pork and my wife had the Carolina-style BBQ - to be very good. Sadly, sides -...More

headline: Delicious
content: This place was WAY crowded! It was very loud too. The waitress was good but so terribly busy. If you order a sloppy joe, you'll get it QUICK while the rest of your table will wait a while for food. Kind of pricey too! However,...More

headline: Historical Pub (kind of), A Party Central Location
content: Located on a main corner near the docks, this bar/restaurant/club is in the middle of the busy area of Key West.  I would guess almost every tourist passing through goes here for at least one drink, so we did too. There are tables in front...More

headline: Cool Bar, Great Food
content: We headed off to Key West for the day and enjoyed lunch at Sloppy Joes. The place was packed....it was the day after Christmas so to be expected. Plenty of live music. The beer and the cider was tasty. The signature dishes were tasty, the...More

headline: Great atmosphere
content: Had to try a Sloppy Joe, it was nice but I prefer a more spicy version. Great and pleasant live music the place is really worth a visit. You will not be seated so it can take you a while to get a table.

headline: That famous place ...
content: This is one of those place that one will go, but totally under impressed. The food and drinks were nothing special. The music is loud and the place is full of noise tourists. On the other hand, no one visit this place because of food...More

headline: An Iconic Must
content: Probably the most important thing about SJ is its history.  Located now on the corner of Duval and Green, it actually began across the street as an illegal speakeasy named the Blind Pig. Ernest Hemingway used to drop in for his  scotch. It became legal...More

headline: Great food
content: Sloppy Joes excellent. Also had the Cuban and South Carolina barbecue which were good. Lively atmosphere with a great Key West vibe. Would definitely visit again.

headline: Good Drinks and Live Music!
content: While on our trip, we stopped as Sloopy Joe‚Äôs. The drink specials were great and the music is really great. Great atmosphere and good staff.

headline: Neat bar
content: What a great bar to go see, and have a few. Staff was very friendly, and the food was great. Would definitely go back.

headline: Iconic Must
content:
We can now say ‚Äú Been there ,seen it ‚Äú.

We went last night I didn‚Äôt like the band and the bathrooms were filthy . One drink and out 

But at least we went

headline: Great high energy bar
content: This is the place to be every night in Key West! Amazing live music, and definitely entertaining! The party scene and party crowd flock to this bar!! This is a must do, while in the keys!

headline: Good food, reasonable prices
content: Stopped for Dinner. There were 5 of us and we all enjoyed our meals. Chris was our waiter and he was attentive and had a great personality. Will definitely go back and highly recommend this place to stop at!

headline: Drinks & Key Lime Pie
content: We stopped for drinks and some pie while walking on Duval St.  The drinks were well made and their Key Line Pie was excellent

headline: Good Times at Sloppy Joes
content: Spend the evening at Sloppy Joes----lots of fun.  Main act starts at 10:00.  Band likes to get audience involved and everyone has a good time.

headline: You Got To Stop Here
content: An old staple of Key West.  A fun bar that has live music playing most of the day and night.  The Sloppy Rita's hit the spot after a day of walking around Key West.  Bar also serves food and is large so you don't feel...More

headline: Fun pub
content: Still a large fun pub in central key West.  Always busy and vibrant.  You meet all sorts in here. They often have good live bands playing.

headline: Tourist trap!
content:
Don‚Äôt waste your time or money! 
Very dark and not very clean. This is a typical tourist trap with high prices and less than average food. Too many drunk folks for me. Take a photo outside so you can say that you‚Äôve been there and...More

headline: Iconic, If Not the Best Bar on the Key
content: If you are a Hemingway buff, or not, you should give this bar a try. Good live band playing. A solid place for a margarita, but not the best on the island.

headline: Great Service...
content: The bartender was very good. Very entertaining guy. We had a quick beverage to cool off with and off we went.

headline: Hemingways "Cheers"
content: 4 stars for its history and island vibe.   Hemingways hideaway.  Try both the old and new locations to pick up on the history.

headline: great place
content: stopped here for lunch while in key west and loved the place. nice atmosphere. great live music. service was fast and the food was delish! will go back for sure

headline: Had to try the iconic sloppy Joe
content: We stopped in here for lunch to try the iconic sloppy joe. Since there are so many places to eat downtown Key West we just ordered one sandwich and split it. IT had a very unique flavor unlike any sloppy joe I've ever had.  very...More

headline: Has a gift shop
content: This is a great place to enjoy a live band and great music. There is parking available close by. They have a nice gift store for souvenirs.

headline: Late night fun dancing
content: Sloppy Joe‚Äôs is always a must stop. I enjoy the nightlife there for dancing to live bands mostly. The food is nothing amazing. It is just a good time after 9pm. During the day they may have some acoustic music and commentary on stage, but...More

headline: Bachelorette party fun!
content: A large group of us came here each night during our stay in Key West for a bachelorette party. The vibe here was super fun in the evening! Drinks are good and not too expensive. ot have Red Bull so they offered monster instead. The...More

headline: Dive trip
content: Had lunch there the day we got there. Great place to kick back have a few drinks and some great food. The staff is friendly. Would go back again.

headline: A Fun Place
content: A must stop when in Key West.  If you stop by any evening, prepare for a difficult time getting a table.  The drinks are good, especially the Mojito.  You'll enjoy the bands and food.  You've got to try a sloppy joe sandwich, where they were...More

headline: It's a bar
content: If you're a Hemingway fan or just want to stop at an iconic place this is a stop to make. Live music, well stocked bar and great food. We made 2 stops because of the Sloppy Fries: French fried potatoes topped with sloppy joe and...More

headline: The food was great
content: We stopped in and had some great food. I recommend the hot roast beef sandwich omg so good. Came with gravy and fries highly recommend trying this if you get tired of seafood while in the Keys.

headline: Sloppy and tasty
content: Such a fun place! I opted to get their specialty,  the Sloppy Joe. It was definitely the right choice!!!! Large, flavorful, and just what I needed after the zombie bike ride for fantasy fest.

headline: Crowded but fun
content: A good atmosphare with nice live bands. If soething quite expensive drinks, but it is Key west and everything is expensive. Be here in time if you want a table..

headline: Fun place
content: I reviewed this restaurant a few years ago and it is as much fun now as it was at that time. The sloppy joes were, of course, sloppy but great. The fries were fresh and hot. This place is a must visit every time we...More

headline: Fun place
content: Fun place to stop in at. It was our friends bday! Great entertainment and staff. Super friendly, a definite must do.

headline: Quick Drink Review
content: We stopped by and had a quick drink just to say we had been to the famous Sloppy Joes. We got a seat at the bar and were served quickly. The drink was very well prepared and the staff friendly. Nice live music playing even...More

headline: relaxe
content: chill out here good music after walking around all of keywest had to have a drink all the shops hers are a tourist trap you know if you have been there you go before the ships come in injoy yourself then leave that's what I...More

headline: Had to stop!
content: Busy and loud,  but got lucky and had no wait.  My friend had the Sloppy Joe......said it was worth stopping.  I had quesadilla ...  delicious but  pretty hard to mess up.  Had to stop there being in Key West, but doubt we'd go back.  Lots...More

headline: It's Fun
content: The music is always good. The service is really good if they aren't too busy. The place is comfortable. I love the pics of Ernest Hemingway. I haven't eaten there, but they have a nice variety of options on the menu.

headline: Our Tradition
content: So it's now a tradtion that when we go to Key West, we must stop in for a drink.  The place is very traditional and has good service. We asked for a pi√±a colada and a mojito. I was a bit disappointed that the pi√±a...More

headline: Biggest and loudest tourist rip off in town
content: Don‚Äôt need to say more; overpriced‚Äîwear earplugs; located on lower Duval where t-shirts abound and tourists from ships overwhelming. No local charm

headline: Good Service
content: We called in for dinner I ordered chicken tacos and my wife had the grilled cheese sandwich. It was ok but the wife‚Äôs sandwich had far to much cheese on it to the point it was hard to find the bread, just to over powering....More

headline: Must visit
content: This place is a key west classic. Fun crowd, eclectic staff and customers and the coolest vibe  around. Food is good and the drinks are plentiful. They show lots of love for the armed forces too! Great memorabilia hanging all over the place. This is...More

headline: Must Do
content: You must stop in for a Sloppy Joe's for a Sloppy Joe.  The sandwich was good but I would recommend the Sloppy Joe Pizza as it is easier to eat.  Definitely a tourist location and that is perfect for a tourist.  I've been there and...More

headline: Brilliant bar - fanastic live band
content: Fantastic bar to call & have a drink & eat. Called last night for a drink & the place was full. The live band was brilliant & they got everyone won in the mood to partyüòÄ they have a great shop to buy merchandise, had...More

headline: Worth a dine...
content: Out of the many choices available in Key West, we found Sloppy Joe‚Äôs a place worth stopping. Food and price Were decent and service was very good.

headline: Good for a drink
content: Sloppy Joes is a must see if you‚Äôre a fan of Hemingway. Have a beer and enjoy the atmosphere. It is a bit commercialized but fun.

headline: Fun Place. A Must for a Drink and People Watching
content: From the outside, I was reticent to go in, it looked like a rundown old bar that had seen better days. If I was in my 20s to 30s, I would have been hanging out there in a second for party atmosphere. Of course we...More

headline: Fun Place, Food Was "OK"
content: The frozen drinks were pretty good, nothing to write home about. But it was cool to have them at this famous landmark. Unfortunately, our food order was lost, we waited 45 minutes to get three tacos. The tacos were good, but the waitstaff did nothing...More

headline: Just had drinks
content: It was ok at best.  Stopped in for the history and had several cocktails.  Pricey for coming out of a slushy machine.  The band they had playing was vulgar and loud.  Probably would not go back.

headline: Fun place
content: Great shrimp,smoked seafood dip, good live entertainment, T-shirt gift shop, near shopping, walking distance to water.  Good menu options. Would go back!

headline: Great fun
content: Stopped in Key West on a cruise   A must see was Sloppy Joes because it always fun and has great entertainment.  Today was no exception.  Brian Roberts was awesome and held the crowd‚Äôs attention with his diverse repertoire!!!!  The conch fritters were great also.

headline: Great Hangout
content: Great place to unwind. Great for dancing and listening to live music. Easy access on the corner of Duval St. close to all other Key West aminities.

headline: Great Experience!
content: Who can go to Key West without visiting Sloppy Joe's?  We had a great time.  Wonderful food and service, really enjoyed the music too.  Would return anytime.

headline: Went 3 times, enjoyed every single one of them!
content: Went there with my friend the first night that we arrived at Key West. Got there around 10 pm and the place was already packed. We‚Äôre lucky to have found two places to seat at the bar. The bar tender was very nice and got...More

headline: winner
content: every one need to go to sloppy joe"s they have live camera and plenty of souvenirs are there, can walk from cruise ship to down town key west.

headline: Restaurant
content: Awesome  food and drinks !!! Band played in the back while  we ate lunch. Highly  recommend  this place. I got the famous  sloppy  Joe sandwich  . It was amazing! ! Fun atmosphere was not disappointed  at all !!

headline: Cool landmark location, not too great for families
content: We visit the area each year and have two young children. We have stopped in a couple different times to grab a couple appetizers and drinks. The nachos and fish dip are both really good and our drinks have always been good. We always go...More

headline: Go, take a picture
content: It's too crowded, too loud, too everything, but go, Go once. Take the mandatory picture in front. It's part of the Key West culture. Make sure to get on the video cam over the front sidewalk, and call your friends to see it. But once...More

headline: Lunch
content: Highly recommend Sloppy Joe‚Äôs, food was great.  We listened to live music while having the fish tacos and of course, a sloppy Joe and a few drinks.  Service was good also.  An all around nice experience.

headline: Great place for a drink, love music and foods!
content: Love this place. This was my second time there. Staff is awesome. Live music always. Loved there peak and eat shrimps?

headline: Key West Vactation
content: A must stop when in Key West good entertainment good food and a great staff. we stop in every time were in Key West !

headline: Overrated tourist trap
content: Noisy, crowed,underwhelming food and drinks.  One of keywests most overly marketed tourist sites, everyone goes there once.

headline: A good choice for drinks, live music, and pub grub
content: Don‚Äôt let the name fool you.  Live music was fantastic, Gerb Rube.  The service was good.  We stopped in for drinks and the atmosphere and entertainment exceed our expectations.  We did. To try the food but lots of people did.  As soon as a table...More

headline: Quick stop ...
content:
The main bar was quite busy‚Ä¶ Found a sweet little hiding place in the back area (best kept secret) where there were only two people , there is an outside seating area with  extra tables.

Stopped in for a cold drink and to cool down...More

headline: Went there for drinks.  When you think of Key West you think of Sloppy Joes
content: Atmosphere very Key West.  Had drinks only this time,  They were priced right and were good pours.  For an interesting drink try the Hemmingway Mojita.  Service was good & the room was loud

headline: A Happening Place
content: If you plan to walk down Duval Street you have to stop and get a drink at Sloppy Joe's. And if you are hungry, it is a very good place to eat lunch. It is a "happening place" with music and every kind of drink...More

headline: Fun time
content: I was a little hesitant at first because it‚Äôs loud and busy but once you get a drink it‚Äôs lots of fun! We loved our cocktails, ‚ÄúThe end of the world‚Äù, and our waiter was funny! There was live music in the middle of the...More

headline: Fun!
content: Definitely a must-visit! Great beer selection, wonderful people, the food tasted really good and the atmosphere is great!

headline: History you must visit
content: We were there Halloween night when this great band was there! They were there quite a few nights! That band was fantastic! Played multi-generational live music! People of all ages were there, and they played stuff they all knew! Just fantastic band! The place was...More

headline: Beer and nachos
content: We were doing a soet of pub crawl on Duval and had ri hit Sloppy Joe's. We each had a draft beer and ordered some nachos. They were fantastic. Live music  was great too. Great place to check out for a drink or three in...More

headline: Fun Place
content: A must stop when coming to Key West. Lots of people too have fun with!! Did not have any food but the drinks were very good!!!

headline: Fun must visit
content: Great atmosphere and music.we had nachos and a sloppy joe. Pretty good for a tourist trap but the history behind the establishment adds alot of flare. I'd definitely go back.

headline: Gotta go!
content: THis is one of the most famous places in Key West.  Everyone goes there so the place is very crowded.  But such fun!  There was live music in the middle of the day!

headline: Key west icon
content: Go for the food and music. Its a must for key west! The smoked fish dip is awesome and dont forget the cocktails

headline: Annual trip for Veteran's day
content: Visiting Sloppy Joe's is like visiting an old friend. Having been coming here every year since 2000. The staff have become friends.We are a group of police officers and many of our members are veteran's. In 2005 one of our Brothers a Marine nicknamed 'Goody"...More

headline: OMG!!!THE MOST FUN EVER!!!
content: Popped in after sunset cruise. It is all seat yourself, which is weird to me, but it works. everyone is so easy breezy. We sat at the Bar. Great bands and atmosphere! Clean, Friendly and worth every penny! Met a ton of people!

headline: The original Sloppy Joe sandwich
content: Go in for lunch and order the Sloppy Joe.  Doesn‚Äôt matter if you are getting off a cruise boat or staying in town. It comes with Fries. It will remind you of the Sloppy Joe your mom use to make. Only much bigger.   Get yourself...More

headline: It's a Bar
content: We stopped in the afternoon to take a break from Duval shopping. Nice open air bar with a lot of history but nothing that remarkable about it

headline: Good service with live entertainment
content: A must visit if you're going to Key West.  Restaurant/Bar is large and has live entertainment often, even during the day most days.  Food and drinks are good and service is great.  Try the actual "Sloppy Joe".  Although the sandwich does not come with a...More

headline: Landmark
content: When you think of Key West you think of Sloppy Joe's.Always stop for at least one during our Duval street visits,almost an obligation.Still have decent almost non stop music.Their signature t shirts are seen all over the world.

headline: Best spot in keywest
content: Best spot for live music. Great atmosphere. Good drinks and we had a great server can‚Äôt remember her name but was a lady of a certain age and experience

headline: Nostalgia
content:
Sloppy joe‚Äôs probably the best bar in all the world ? Well yes you would think so, could be but unfortunately  it isn‚Äôt. Why ? Plastic cups equating to plastic beer for a start.

But the most annoying thing is that this is and should...More

headline: Live music, Cool place, but really loud
content: "Old Time" atmosphere, with big bar and a stage in the back. We were there on a Tuesday night but it was packed. Live music and lively atmosphere. Food was a split--my husband had the Sloppy Joe which he said was fantastic. I had the...More

headline: Should have had a Sloppy Joe
content: Fun place, fast and good service. Good music. We came for lunch and ordered fish tacos - and they were not good at all. Big portion, tasteless as far as spice and flavor, other than a lingering fishy taste. We may have gotten a bad...More

headline: Great Bloody Mary‚Äôs
content: Loved the vibe, it‚Äôs seat yourself and just super laid back. I got the crab cake sandwich, soooo good.

headline: What a fun and quirky place!
content: The bar is a great place for live music, drinking and dancing! Really captures the heart and soul of Key West!

headline: A FUN Place !!!
content:
It's big, it can be noisy, its Key West, what more can I say? Every time we go there, we have fun. The waiters, the crowd, the whole atmosphere is just, well, it is just Key West.
This is not the only bar Ernest Hemingway...More

headline: Not much to say....
content: An hour and a half after seated for a late lunch!   Not busy! Poorest place we ate during our 6 days.  Will walk thru for music next time, but won‚Äôt eat there.  People like us may try one time just to say they ate there.

headline: Hemingway‚Äôs hangout
content: Had to Have a beer and sanding at the famous bar where Hemingway brought home the urinal to his wife after getting mad at her for building a too big swimming pool. She had a sense of irony and used it as a decorative fountain....More

headline: First time Visit
content: Food was really good, and the band was great!! Its really a fun place to be.  Wasn't to crowded and great place to dance.

headline: Great Bar!
content: This is a fun place. This is the bar Hemmingway would drink. We visited it after your at  Hemmingway House. The shrimp and Cuban sandwich were great. Good drinks. I recommend the sloppy ginger.

headline: Great Food
content: Good food & terrific atmosphere. The service was very good. The sunsets are spectacular over the gulf.

headline: Great fish sandwich
content:
I didn‚Äôt expect much from this very loud and crowded place that revels on the Hemingway legend. 
I was pleasantly surprised to get this oversized and delicious fried fish sandwich. 
Covered with saut√©ed mushrooms, onions and peppers plus melted cheddar cheese with a little side...More

headline: The Heart of Key West
content: Great bar and restaurant on Duval Street in Key West! The oldest bar in town, it‚Äôs a definite ‚Äúdo not miss ‚Äú if you are going to the Key‚Äôs. Great service, music and of course Margaritas!!

headline: Atmosphere fun but the food and service...blah
content: Went to Sloppy Joe's with a kid at 5:00...there was a band with foul mouths...good band fun place, but not with a kid - not kid friendly even at 5...we ordered our food, fries as an appetizer, 2 Sloppy Joes, a hot dog, and 3...More

headline: Great Bar
content: Sloppy Joes is a great bar with great entertainment and a very pleasant staff. It is just one of the best bars to frequent on Duvall Street

headline: Asked bartender where Hemingway sat and she had no idea
content: We went because of the Hemingway association and the bartender knew nothing about it. Hard to believe .

headline: Pure Entertainment
content: Beer, live music and lots of people having fun (some even in costume). I even saw a masculine version of Wonder Woman. Fun and a little scary. What more could you want from Duval Street?

headline: Gotta try at least once
content: Checked this off the list.  Typical bar with average food.  Ordered sweet tea and was told they didn't have it.  I mean we are in the South aren't we? Had the original sloppy Joe sandwich.  Would have been nice to have some pickles and mustard....More

headline: Packed house, but lots of fun!
content: Even in the early afternoon on a week day this place was packed!  Thankfully we managed to find a couple seats at the bar and stayed for a drink.  Our bartender was very personable and made the whole experience even that more enjoyable.

headline: Great fun place to hang out
content: We went with friends after walking by and hearing a good band.  Lots of people and good dance floor.  Service good.   Typical fun bar with live music.

headline: Very nice!
content: We visited sloppy joe‚Äôs twice during our stay. Apart from the amazing food (sloppy joe‚Äôs sandwich is very very nice) the place is very nice to have a drink while listening to live music. Personnel very friendly!

headline: Must visit
content: We popped in during a cruise stop. It was early on a Sunday and the place was buzzing and live music. Definitely worth a visit

headline: A lot of fun
content: Stopped by here after our glass bottom boat tour and the food was delicious. They had great mixed drinks and the staff was super friendly.

headline: Different
content: We use to enjoy  this place but the staff r different then other places and there r way 2 crazy and crowded here.. just a place we stop  into to see who's playing and meet friends once in awhile....

headline: Great atmosphere, food and fun
content: Always make it a point to visit sloppy Joes several times while in Key West. I would recommend you try there Sloppy Joes and or the Chicken Fingers.

headline: Fun, Lively Place!
content: Crab Cake Sandwich was amazing & the Steak Sandwich was good. Live music was great and Gift shop is conveniently on premise..

headline: Great place for a beer
content: While in Key West we had to go to Sloppy Joes for a beer. This used to be Hemmingway's hang out years ago. They have a great selection of beers as well.

headline: Loved the Live Music and Location
content: We stopped in to have drinks and a few appetizers, the key west shrimp was what we enjoyed the most. The live music added a very touch. The drinks, I did not love. Tried their famous sloppyrita and mojito. It's a fun place to stop...More

headline: A Must Do
content: If your going to Key West you must do Sloppy Joe's, they always have great entertainment, great food and of course a huge variety of adult and not so adult beverages!  I personally like their fish dip, so if your in for some fresh fish...More

headline: WOW.....Just WOW
content: We stopped in for a Sloppy Rita since my ladies name is Rita...lol   Our server was fantastic. She was from Russia and was so helpful with our order.. I always love this stop on Duvall street.

headline: If You Visit Key West this is a Must!
content: Sloppy Joes is the old bar frequented by Hemingway. Fantastic frozen drinks and nightly entertainment until 4 am! We had so much fun singing along to the oldies. Different bands alternate providing variety and some great surprises. A Key West tradition...don‚Äôt miss it!

headline: An must in Key West
content: This is an iconic place to visit. Most of the time very busy and after 8 pm you have to be lucky to get an spot at the bar but the atmosphere is relaxed and you meet here tons of people. We tried their mojitos...More

headline: Great Band
content: A must do in Key West. This bar serves great food and drinks. The staff is friendly and the band was great.

headline: Entertaining
content: Sloppy Joe's is a fun, upbeat place to enjoy food, drinks, and music.  It is located on the corner, so it is easy to access and easy to see the street and people watch.

headline: Fun spot
content: We stopped in during the hottest part of the afternoon to cool off and eat lunch. The conch fritters were yummy and the drinks were cold. We had our son (10) with us and he enjoyed it too. The music was lively and the crowd...More

headline: If you can't have fun here, you're hopeless.
content: Key west is the city but sloppy's is the destination.  Beer n' chicken wings...   nuff said.  Great staff, food and zombies #fantasyfest

headline: A Sloppy Joe + Cold beer to remember !
content:
Key West Sloppy Joe‚Äôs Bar is a Strong Brand and tradition for more than 80 years ! 
Not to be missed if we disembark a cruise for less than 8 hours, especially on Sundays .
For those who are looking to find a place on...More

headline: Famous and Fun!
content: Although not in this location...there must've been a reason Hemingway frequented this place.  After going, I can see why.  The night we were there, live music was playing.  It's not world-class cuisine...but I had a terrific hot dog.  And drinks...and drinks...and drinks.

headline: Fun bar
content: It's pretty much a must to go to sloppy Joe's when you're in Key West. More meaningful if you go on the tour of Ernest Hemingway's home before. Nice bartenders good drinks!

headline: Lively Lunch with Live Music
content: The restaurant was packed for lunch when my sisters and I arrived around 1 PM. It is a fun place and the food is okay, but if you come to Key West, you have to stop and hang there for awhile where Hemingway once drank....More

headline: Everyone goes to Sloppy Joes...
content: ...but that doesn't mean its the best place to go. Atmosphere was good, not great. Its very busy, and with good reason since its one of the most popular spots on the island. That being said, there are other places to get better food and...More

headline: Okay food
