content: I was honestly not impressed with the food here. It‚Äôs basically bar food. My mozzarella sticks were overly fried that they were so hard. The sloppy joe was just okay, you can get better elsewhere or make at home. Service was good but so slow....More

headline: Sloppy Joes
content: Sloppy is a perfect name and description. The entertainment was poor and the crowd was just as Sloppy. Dont waste your time in this money trap.

headline: Atmosphere was amazing food okay
content: The band playing was great and the atomosphere was great! Our waiteress seem very fake but nice. The food was okay, conch fritters were very oily and the sloppy joe was way too sweet. The drinks were good.

headline: Fun venue with live music
content: Always a great place to spend some time on Duval Street.  The live music was fun and the place was packed.  We ordered nachos with the sloppy joe sauce.  It was more like a glob of cheese over chips.  I wouldn‚Äôt recommend it but go...More

headline: Great staple of Key West
content: We stayed at Margaritaville Resort and this place is only a block away right on Duval Street.  It is huge and has several smaller bars located throughout the place in addition to main bar in the middle.  I recommend everyone sees this place because it...More

headline: Great Spot
content:
Awesome food, great service, wonderful atmosphere. We always have a great time. 
Always a stop when in the keys.

headline: A novelty bar
content: Had to stop to see the famous bar. Entertainment was good for a one man band but $11 for 1 draft beer and 1 glass of house chardonnay is a bit much. The place is loud and busy with tourists with tourist prices. Been there...More

headline: Florida trip
content: They had live music, great drinks, the staff was great! Will definitely be stopping back when we come back to the area!

headline: This is the place to go!
content: So as I have always heard...this is the place to go in Keywest. The band there the day we went sounded great. Actually, anytime I've been down here the bands are great. Our drinks were delicious. The food was typical bar food in my opinion....More

headline: Wonderful live music and dancing
content: We visited this bar on our girls trip, we absolutely loved it, the band was wonderful and loved the music they played. There is a ton of room for dancing, variety of drinks. Loved the atmosphere. Definitely will return.

headline: Vacation substitution trip
content: Great music,  fun atmosphere and plenty of good food. The musicians play  non stop on Duvall street which keeps you there drinking more.

headline: You have to.
content: If you visit Key West, you have to go to Sloppy Joe's! We went twice, once at night and once during the day. The Sloppy Rita's were great and the service was good. Both night and day they had live music and both were very...More

headline: Great atmosphere and ok food
content: This place is amiss stop when in Key West from a historic value and as a local landmark. They have music playing and service was wonderful Got an order of  conch fritters and they were average (BO‚Äôs are the best)  Cuban sandwich was good Daughtet...More

headline: Sloppy Joe's
content: They have an award winning margarita that is excellent.  It's great place mid week, weekends and when cruise ships are on port it gets teal busy.

headline: Great Music, Food & Drinks
content: We stopped in here for a snack and drinks.  The waitress was friendly and everyone was having a good time.  The food was good!

headline: Anniversary celebration
content: Awesome bartenders, Lou and Jim.  Great music, Tim Hollohan. We come to Key West every year and this is always on our schedule. Good food.

headline: Fun place
content:
this was a great place for a drink. Live music was a bonus and the crowd was alive.
Bartender had a great personality and attentive to all his customers.

headline: Always fun
content: Stopped in later during a bar hopping day. Great music, didn't eat, good service, good band, missed listening to Wayne.

headline: Try the Key Lime Drink!
content: I had them use coconut rum instead of the vodka, I think lol anyway, it is always AMAZING!  My all time favorite drink in Key West ‚ô°

headline: Fun
content: Very fun place. Good food. Music was to loud to understand lyrics. Nice atmosphere. Service was a little slow on drinks

headline: Great Fun
content: Was such a fun time with great drinks.  Fun crowd an very personable bartender.  Live music, what more can ya ask for !!

headline: Nice bar
content: Came here for food and drinks.. nice bar really busy.. you have to order the sloppy joes fries... they had a live band on during the day which was nice..

headline: A Key West Institution
content: A fun place for a drink on Duval Street. Usually has a country or southern rock kind of vibe at least during the times We've been there.

headline: Good food
content: My wife and I stopped here for lunch, she got the fish and chips, she said it was one of the best she has had.

headline: Love This Place
content: Great, fast bartenders, food servers.  I had a taco salad, red chili and tortilla chips.  Great meal.  Full bar...good selection of beer.

headline: Excellent Daiquiris.  Fun atmosphere!
content: Fun place with good food, good live music, good beer and excellent Daiquiris!  In fact, we came back a second time just so I could get another one of their Daiquiris!  A mild warning - if you don't like crowds and noise, you may want...More

headline: Unique bar
content: You have to stop by just to view the facility.The drinks are excellent.You can almost feel the nostalgia.

headline: Nice vibe, clean
content: Had a good Sloppy Joe, & OK fish taco. Good service, music @ lunch time. Would return, but why since there are so man places o drink

headline: Lunch
content: Had a good sloppy joe and some cold beers. Yes this is a place to visit each time we go to keywest. The staff was friendly, the music was great and I will go again

headline: Key West Fun Spot
content: Ernest Hemingway‚Äôs old stomping grounds... the bar is centrally located on Duval Street and is a fun spot to drink, grab some bar food, or listen to a band and dance. Happened to be Hemingway look-a-like week when we were there. Was a blast! People...More

headline: Perfect stop for music, drinks and a sloppy joe
content: The 2nd to last stop of our day trip, came in to cool down, have some drinks listen to some music and have the classic sloppy joe.  The place is fun hot spot, definitely a must for the visit and on a Sunday not too...More

headline: Wonderful bar!
content: We stopped in for a couple cocktails after a day of shopping and fun. Live entertainment was amazing, great drink selection and right on Duval Street. Our waiter was a riot. He was singing and dancing around, soooo fun

headline: Believes it‚Äôs own hype
content:

Music was good and bar was lovely but just need to be a bit more relaxed, as most of...More

headline: Must see bar.
content:
A bar ang grill with history. Said to be a watering hole of Ernist Hemingway.
Atmospheric bar with great music all day.
Easy going sit where you want food is really good with a food selection of beers.

headline: Cuban sandwich
content: Wished we would have had more time to spend here.  Nice restaurant with live music late in the day.  Food all looked really nice with good portions we had the Cuban sandwich and it was delicious.  Also was one of Hemingway favorite places.  They have...More

headline: Best bar on Duvall!
content: Awesome time and great band!!! We had sooo much fun dancing at this place! Drinks were very reasonable! Unfortunately, we did not have dinner at this place so no advice on food.

headline: Pit stop
content:
I got a sludgy cocktail although it wasn‚Äôt pretty it did taste lovely

Music was an added bonus
Great atmosphere and staff were attentive 

Stop and try it for yourself

headline: Great Drinks with Friends!
content: Great place to stop by and grab a few drinks and listen to the locals.  Loved that there were multiple smaller bars inside and were more intimate.  Drinks were poured well and bartender was super nice and funny!

headline: Great fun.  Does what it says on the tin.
content:
This is such a lively bar with live music and reasonably priced drinks served by super-efficient waiting staff.   Good range of typical American fare, if that‚Äôs what you want. 

It‚Äôs a must see

headline: A must but not only for the sandwich
content: Went in here just to eat a Sloppy Joe. It was good but it was kind of a disappointment. When you are a kid you think mac n cheese should be like Kraft mac n cheese. You compare all mac n cheese to Kraft. This...More

headline: Crazy
content: We had a blast each night. Great drinks great band. Didnt want the nite to end. I can wait to go back. Love the bartenders!

headline: Must go
content:
You cannot go to key west and not go to sloppy joes.
If you look around the place it is a complete dump and that's it's charm, if they refurbished the place it would lose all that.
There's usually live music

headline: Always Great Bands
content: We had a few drinks and listened to a few bands. We enjoyed the first band more than the second.  However it nice to hear different types.

content: I must admit I was reluctant when my husband said he wanted to try Sloppy Joe's. I figured this was a good place to eat at some point in history so... I was not expecting anything a serious food lover would really appreciate. Well... let...More

headline: One of those places you have to see!
content: I only wish we were hungry when we went here but we knew this was a must see place. We sat at the bar and listened to the live entertainment around lunchtime. Service was excellent and the drinks were great! I'd like to go back...More

headline: Must See It

headline: Good üëçüëçüëç

headline: Busy and loud

headline: Happy place / time
content:

professional.  Gets pretty crazy at night, but fun to be there.  Really like all the military memorability. This is not Martha's Vineyard.  Good old people that appreciate America and...More

headline: Crazy busy
content: Stopped for a drink lots of seating was very busy. Great entertainment. Server was very attentive. Famous bar for Hemingway.

headline: Lives up to its name!

headline: Fun place
content: Good live music, great nachos with sloppy joe on it. Good beer and drinks. It is on Doval street near all attractions.

headline: Good place to see live music

headline: Always Fun
content: It‚Äôs pretty hard to miss this Duval Street drinking institution and quite frankly why should you? This is one of the funniest bars in Key West and one of the best venues for live music. No trip to Key West is complete without a stop...More

headline: Best key lime drink
content: We always enjoy Sloppy joes great drinks and we love the nachos with sloppy joe sauce!! Large enough to share.. always great entertainment!!

headline: Must go
content: Service was fantastic!! The music was live was great! Drinks and food excellent. A must go for sure!

headline: Skip the sloppy Joe‚Äôs
content: They are nothing special. The bar was fun. The washrooms need some updating service was very good. Always had live music to keep the crowd coming in.

headline: This is the top choice for this type of establishment.
content: Clean, lots of seating, quick service, live music. We did not eat here, but many people did, and it looked appetizing!

headline: Tasty mellow lunch

headline: Fun nightlife-great band
content: Fun atmosphere for a night in key west! Went when there was a love band that played great songs from the 90s and 00s. Definitely kept the fun vines going!

headline: night out on the town
content: went to Sloppy Joes, on Friday night September 7, 2018. Did not eat there but the place was hopping. The band was great, very lively place. Had a great time. Would definitely go back again.

headline: Relaxed and Fun Atmosphere
content: Food and drinks are great, but their live bands really make Sloppy Joe‚Äôs the place to be on Duval Street. The wait staff and bartenders are awesome. I would have a new drink before my last one was empty. Since it has more of a...More

headline: Great lunch with friends and family
content: Came there for a quick lunch and a few drinks.  It was sooooo good.  We had frozen drinks and they were sooooo good.

headline: It's just a bar
content: Felt we had to stop in because of the Hemingway connection, but this is not the original location, nor is there anything left that's compelling. It's just a bar hanging on to its faded past. The food was just bar food - again, nothing to...More

headline: A must se in Key West
content: We had the Sloppy Joe's. The place is nice, loud, and with a lot of tourist like ourselves. We went there for the experience, which was good.

headline: Always a blast.
content: Sloppy Joe's is a place like no place else,. Always a good band,but the most fun is to watch the people on the dance floor. You see some sites.

headline: What a memory

Beverley the longtime bartender from England is a super cool character

Your the english guy from orlando 
What a memory 
No visit...More

headline: Key West Little White House
content:
President Harry Truman's famous retreat. Great for 20th century history fans. Excellent, well informed tour guide, guides you through the life of a man who  changed the course of modern history House and grounds well kept.
Capt

headline: Drink and Music!
content: This is an old bar that is all about the beverage and music! A great place to visit with friends, enjoy a quick bit and drink a cold one. Oh ya take one to go and Cruz up Duval street.

headline: Too Loud & Expensive

headline: Excellent
content: Stopped in for lunch. We ordered Smoked fish dip , which was amazing, conch fritters, also amazing and a sloppy joe. Delicious. The bloody mary's were fantastic, too. Awesome atmosphere and the service was great!!

headline: Friendliest place

headline: Another Place in Key West You have to Do.
content: You can't go to Key West without going to Sloppy Joe's.  We went after Labor Day to avoid some of the crowds.  There was the right number of people for us.  Fun, but comfortable.

headline: Great conch fritters and mojitos ....
content: Conch fritters were the best we had on island !!  Would have rated a 5 but our bartender/server was not friendly to us at all.  Clearly he had a preference to the gay crowd as he was very happy to joke and talk with them...More

headline: For younger crowds
content: Live music At times very crowded rowdy you wouldn't want to bring your mother here not bad for one quick drink

headline: Very cool place
content: Lots of fun, very recommended, must go, part of Key West history. Must fallow lighthouse to go back home!

headline: The place to be seen!

headline: Fun
content: Had a great time....always a lot going on and you cant go to key west without going to sloppy Joes!!

headline: Must see
content: You can‚Äôt go to Key West and not stop at Sloppy Joe‚Äôs.  It‚Äôs a local legend.  Love the atmosphere, drinks were good and they had live entertainment.

headline: Great Drinks

headline: Interesting Place for Nachos & Atmosphere
content:
We stopped in about 6:30 on Saturday night.

Frozen Marguerite was a little too tart for our taste, but okay.

headline: Love Sloppy Joes

headline: Great music and entertainment!

headline: Great place to have fun!!!

headline: Over rated
content: I would have to say that this was the least favorite place that my husband and i ate at on vacation. The fish tacos were terrible and sloppy Joe not that great either.

headline: Always a good time
content: Totally relaxed and happy place. Great food and service, and great bands at night. Very Key West....

headline: Loved this Place!
content: Loved Sloppy Joes! Great atmosphere, good margaritas, friendly staff.  Stayed in Key West and ended up at this bar EVERY day.  Just really liked the vibe.  Entertainment was OK, bar staff was friendly, drinks were good, always had a good crowd.  Looking forward to visiting...More

headline: Vacation
content: You can‚Äôt go to key west without stoping by at sloppy joe‚Äôs. Amazing international atmosphere with live music,good drinks and excellent food. Very polite waiters and fast service.This was my third trip to the key‚Äôs  and will absolutely back to sloppy joe‚Äôs next time.

headline: Great atmosphere when bands are playing

headline: A nightlife must!
content: Sloppy Joe's is still the Key West draw and institution it has always been.  Great atmosphere, great drinks, great service, great bands, and just a great time.  A definite stop on the Key West itinerary.

headline: A Key West Institution
content: After talking to many people prior to coming here, the consensus was a trip to Key West wouldn‚Äôt be complete without a visit to Sloppy Joe‚Äôs! We stopped in on the Sunday of Labor Day weekend for drinks and lunch. The Sloppy Ginger (a Moscow...More

headline: Sloppy mess, but in a good way

headline: Same Sloppy Joe‚Äôs

headline: Average bar and food

headline: Out roaming

headline: Nice ambience, Pretty good food.
content:
After eating multiple nasty places in old town area, Sloppy Joes food and service was OK.
Pretty much a superstar for the area.

headline: Fun atmosphere.

headline: Amazing atmosphere, drinks, food, and service!
content: My husband and I visited Sloppy Joe's during our recent visit to Key West, and enjoyed our visit so much! Our waitress was amazing, very friendly, and knowledgeable.  She did an amazing job! The drinks were served very quickly, as was the food! Everything was...More

headline: Have to stop at Sloppy Joe's
content: The menu was pretty expansive and had a good selection. The hamburgers were the good but a little pricey and the service was challenging. other than that we took lunch off our bucket list at sloppy Joes

headline: Finally made it here!!
content: We have been to Key West several times during the past 6 years but failed to stop in this icon on Duval. Well, we finally made it and it was all that we were hoping for. Expectations met! I had the signature menu item and...More

headline: MUST VISIT SLOPPYS HEMINGWAY WEEK
content:
27 years Keywest fun. 15 spent at Sloppy Joes for HEMINGWAY CONTEST.Fun to root for your Fave. We followed one look alike for years til he won.
Great food, drink, awesome entertainment.
Week of July 20th Hemingway Birthday, lots of activities. Our favorite Sunday Duval...More

headline: Drinking in History

headline: an experience
content:
Everywhere you in the keys plays 90s feel good music (not complaining), & this place is no exception.

headline: Fun atmosphere
content: My husband and I enjoyed the live bands/musicians and the atmosphere. The food was okay. Our service at lunch was mediocre but our service at night was better. It‚Äôs a fun place to hang out with friends.

headline: Average food.  Good service.
content: We have ordered the chicken sandwich. It was a small piece of chicken in a huge bread.  The price was expensive for what they offer

headline: Great time!
content: The food, spirits and overall energy was very entertaining.  The food was much better than the two bigger seafood restaurants down at the marina.   We had a great time!

headline: Local

headline: Good music

headline: How much Fun is this place??  All Fun
content:
What a great place to be happy and full of life!  Yes they have "Sloppy Joe Sandwiches"

headline: Good Live Music
content: Walking down Duval street and we were drawn in by the sounds of good music. Enjoyed the fun evening listening to band and dancing.

headline: Amazing place
content: Dance, drink, fun and excellent atmosphere. Great live music. arrive before 10:00 pm to be able to enter because it is full

headline: Loved the Atmosphere!

headline: Love it!
content: Food ehhh- atmosphere great. Good drinks and bands. We did our bar crawl each night and ended up at sloppy joes every time !

headline: Key West experience!
content:
Busy during the day but crowded at night.
The place to hang out, meet the locals and taste the island food.
Drinks priced reasonably, and bar food is oh so good.

headline: Great bar atmosphere
content: This is where Hemingway used to drink.  Plus excellent bands play there.  All around good time.  Nice people and a very good menu.  Great atmosphere and just a lot of fun!  Definitely for adults

headline: Must see...cant go wring
content:
Live entertainment, great atmosphere and drinks and good food too 

Can't go to Key West and not spend a few hours in Sloppy Joe's.

headline: Like kissing your sister............
content:
8/23  Just back from Key West, I have looked forward for many years for this visit!
It was HOT and MUGGY, too many tourists, wall to wall people...

Looked up and saw the SLOPPY JOE'S sign, HEAVEN awaits.

People everywhere, Music blasting and NO seats.............More

headline: Must go!
content: We had the sloppy joe's and they were delicious!  Fun atmosphere, some great live music!  Love the vibe and the food!  Go, you will not be sorry!

headline: Good Drinks, Fun Time!
content:
Finally decided to stop in on our next to last day. The drinks were good and the entertainment was talented.
Sat at the bar, didn't get food.

headline: Loud, crowded, but fun
content: This landmark always seems to have a good band, but it also seems to always be packed. My patience for getting jostled around is low, so the times we went we stayed near the door where it was less crowded.

headline: if you haven‚Äôt gone to sloppy Joe‚Äôs you haven‚Äôt been to Key West!

headline: What a fun place, with great food
content: This is a very casual place on Duval. Let‚Äôs face it. It is an open air bar with air conditioning. That said, it is really fun, especially for us folks who appreciate both live music as well as 80‚Äôs hits. No electric bo-ga-loo here. The...More

headline: Great place to drink!!
content: Spent a better part of week visiting this establishment and had a fabulous time. Fair price on drinks and the made them right. Staff was friendly and quick. The live band was great all nights!

headline: Historic but overdone
content:
We always stop here in key west because of its history of Ernest Hemingway frequenting this bar. It‚Äôs a fun place for a drink and snack. While we were here there was a performer, which was fun.

headline: Gotta Go to Sloppy Joe's
content: It's an icon worth visiting - lots of energy from the patrons & staff, great live music, large beer & mixed drink selections.  Appetizers were typical bar food and were good.  Fun place to hang out in the afternoon or evening.

headline: Fun bar
content: Busy, busy, busy on weekend evenings. Check it out during the afternoon and order the nachos with sloppy joe! Delicious!!

headline: Fun stop for cocktails and munchies
content: Expectations were low....my son ordered a quesadilla which was surprisingly good.  My husbands pina colada was OK...nothing extraordinary.  My mojito was good...Live music was fun.  it‚Äôs a stop, not a long term destination.

headline: Must see
content:

headline: My annual Birthday Visit

headline: Fun atmosphere, great sloppy joe nachos
content: Stopped by to get a drink and a snack. Ended up enjoying two plates of sloppy joe nachos and some good live music.

headline: Average place
content: Ok, I guess Sloppy Joe's is (or used to be) a famous name on Key West, but nowadays it's your basic tourist trap. Not that I have anything to complain: the food is OK, the beer is OK, the live music is OK, the service...More

headline: WORST PLACE TO DRINK OR EAT!!!!
content:

We sat down and waited about 20 minutes...More

headline: Live music
content: Brilliant live music by a duet one lady singer with a deep voice was great! Drinks prices were reasonable and service fast!

headline: Skip Lunch On The Cruise Ship, Eat Lunch Here
content: Here is my recommendation for Sloppy Joes Bar.  If you are on a cruise ship that docks at Key West, don‚Äôt eat lunch on the ship.  Time your stay in Key West so that once you get off the ship, you can eat lunch at...More

headline: tourist spot
content: I'm sure this is a fun place and I only enjoyed a cold beverage no food.  However, the Friday night early singers were raunchy.  One or two songs of that nature would have been fine but it was early in the evening and the two...More

headline: Good bar
content:
Called in to Sloppy Jo‚Äôs today for a quick pint on our way down Duval street.We ended up staying a couple of hours as the singer was good and we really felt at home 
Great authentic place to visit

headline: Paradise Found
content: Stopped in for a quick drink and ordered the famous ‚Äúsloppy joe‚Äù sandwich. I must say it was really really good.  The beer was cold and the mid day entertainment was excellent- Now I know what all of the buzz was about. Great place to...More

headline: Great music, fun times
content: SJ's is a fun place with good drinks, albeit a bit pricey. The band they had (Actual Bank Robbers) were amazing.

headline: Beer and Music
content:
Called into this iconic institution of Key West to introduce the kids to a bit of history 
The bar still has that bit of magic from the early 1980s
The bar has now become a Mecca for tourists who pop in for 1 drink and...More

headline: Fun Fun!
content: Sloppy Joe everyone talks about it. From their drinks, appetizers and live music. We finally stopped by and what a great experience we had. The drinks to me were ok. Appetizers were good and you will always have a good time with the live music....More

headline: Lunch
content: We stopped for a quick lunch and enjoyed the live music and food. The full moon burger is delicious and the sloppy joe was great too.

headline: Twice in one week
content: I love this place. I love that you can come in and seat yourself and get frozen drinks. My husband and I went twice in the last two days because their food was bomb and the bartender we had was awesome. I would recommend coming...More

headline: When in Key West you must visit Sloppy Joe's
content: Love this place for great drinks and awesome music. We love coming to Sloppy Joe's when we come to Key West. It's a great spot to grab a drink eat a snack and get out of the heat. The little gift shop next door has...More

headline: Excellent environment sat right next to Hemingway (almost)
content: Had lunch here and the Cuban sandwich was excellent. Washed it down with a Sloppy Joes Ale. I sat at the bar from a guys who was a dead ringer for Papa Ernest himself. They say they have look alikes drinking here all the time....More

headline: A great place to get out of the hjeat and let your hair down
content: We had a great afternoon listening to the band, drinking beer and cocktails and eating cheesy chips, it's a must if you're in Key West

headline: Try the Sloppy Joe!
content:
Great spot for food and music. It gets crowded and you seat yourself so you may want to get there early. 
I enjoyed the sloppy joe and my husband liked the grilled fish sandwich.

headline: Loud and crowded and a slice of history
content: If you can think through the music and vocal din of Sloppy Joe‚Äôs you can imagine who spilled drinks on their shoes in these hallowed walls.  From Hemingway to hamburgers, Sloppy Joe‚Äôs offers something for everyone.  You may just want to come and soak up...More

headline: Not for us
content: This place was way too noisy for us. The guy singing was way too loud and every song sounded the same. Our waiter was a mess. Ordered no sauce but got sauce. She rarely stopped by the table and was not very pleasant. Crab cake...More

headline: Great place to enjoy entertainment and drinks
content: We celebrated my son‚Äôs 21st birthday on this trip and Sloppy Joe‚Äôs was a perfect place to start our Duval Street celebration! We had so much fun slinging along with the songs and having drinks ! There is a reason Sloppy Joes is a Key...More

headline: Just okay
content: We weren't super impressed with the place. The food wasn't great. The cocktails didn't use real juice. We went there because it's a popular restaurant, but we probably won't be back. Just too many great places to eat/drink in Key West to settle for just...More

headline: Huge notable bar
content: Bands play on a large elevated stage.  Huge place with a few bars to order from, very crowded even in offseason.  Unfortunately, when we went the band was terrible, no cohesion, like each member actually belonged to a different group.  Nothing special really.

headline: Another must experience point of interest in Key West.
content:
Come in , cool off.  Have a frozen drink or beer.  Try the sloppy joes!  ( even on a pizza!)

Live bands most of the day!

headline: Awesome place!
content: Definitely the most popular place in key west.  The food and drink are always top notch as well as the service (Carla's the best! She's always at the little front bar)  Highly recommend.

headline: a must stop
content: we go there everytime we are in Key West. It is a great gathering place for drinks, music and people watching. The food is simple bar food but that is fine. Sometimes it is hard to find a seat because this is so popular. It...More

headline: Dinner
content: Obviously worth going here , the night we went they had a big band on early during dinner time . The only suggestion would be to have a lower key band play during those hours .

headline: Good atmosphere
content: We usually come here for drinks and live music. The drinks are ok as well better if you go during happy hour. Its a traditional place for many tourists.

headline: Best Mojito ever!
content: Our trip to the Keys would not have been complete without a stop at Sloppy Joe's Bar. We didn't visit the restaurant but spent almost 2 hours sitting in the bar and talking to Christian who made me the best Mojito ever and some other...More

headline: Night Out
content: Great place to just relax. Friendly staff, great margaritas, fantastic entertainment. Highly recommend.

headline: Great Atmosphere! Good Food
content: This is the second time I‚Äôve been here. Highly recommend the Hemingway Mojito and the Sloppy Joes Nachos.

headline: Fun place!
content: We went here multiple times during our trip! They have good cover bands, it‚Äôs easy to get a drink at the bar, and there‚Äôs air conditioning!

headline: Great Drinks Super Fun!
content: This is the original Hemingway Bar!  What a fun place to visit and it is really hopping.  The atmosphere is Super and I guarantee you will enjoy yourself.  I can understand why Hemingway liked it here. What a Place!

headline: Classic Key West stop
content: My boyfriend and I just visited Key West for the first time and we came with a list of places to go and things to do based on friend‚Äôs recommendations. Sloppy Joe‚Äôs was our first stop for lunch when we arrived around 4:00. There was...More

headline: Sloppy Joe‚Äôs
content: This famous spot frequented by Hemingway in his day has very tasty margaritas.  Live entertainment on occasion adds to the ambiance.

headline: What a blast
content: Read about the bands playing and saw the place and wasn't sure, but we took a chance and had a great time at Sloppy Joe's dancing and drinks.

headline: Don't miss Sloppy Joe's
content: What a great place to eat and listen to local music talent.  Of course, you need a world famous sloppy joe and a beer or a glass of wine or cocktail.  The music is local and pure magic.  What a quaint place to visit.  Don't...More

headline: Great bar!
content: Awesome atmosphere, walk in from the street and enjoy a cold one all day long! The windows are open and the entertainment is usually playing! Sit down and enjoy a beer, or one of their tasty frozen drinks.

headline: Another wonder of the world
content: There's always some type of entertainment going on at Sloppy Joe's. Great drinks, fast service, great people,  and all fun time.

headline: What is there to say....
content: Iconic...photo op - a must stop!  But don't forget the original around the corner....!  Ice cold beverages and just because then you can say you were there!

headline: Sloppy Joe‚Äôs. A Key West Tradition.
content:
A visit to Key West is not complete without a visit to Sloppy Joe‚Äôs. Legend has it the Ernest Hemingway used to frequent this nostalgic bar.

They have great entertainment daily, and 2 bars that pump out drinks at a furious pace.

You will ALWAYS...More

headline: Love the live music and great eats!
content: At the center of where it all happens on Duval Street, you have to hang out at Sloppy Joe's!  Great food, cold drinks, and great music!!

headline: Great food!  Great fun!
content: Once you get a table at Sloppy Joe's (first come, first served), you get to listen to fun live music and have great food!  Try the Sloppy Joe Nachos!  They are amazing and definitely enough to share for 2-4 people (depending on how hungry you...More

headline: Fun!
content: Went for dinner and was going to sit in the main dining area, but decided to go back to the small bar area.Has a blast! Our bar tender Billy was so much fun and made us feel so welcomed. Food was good. Had the sloppy...More

headline: love this place
content: Best sloppy Joe I've ever had. The Key lime pie is also delicious! Great place to have a meal and listen to live music. Staff is friendly and eager to please.

headline: My girls love the boneless wings!
content: We eat here at least 2 or 3 times every year during our week long visits. My girls absolutely love the boneless wings. My wife and I have tried a lot of the other menu items and haven‚Äôt had a bad one yet. If you...More

headline: Good Food, Nice Location
content: Stopped for lunch and a few drinks.  All the food we ordered was good.  Nice waitresses who were attentive even though the place was jammed full of people.  Great location on Duval Street.  Had live music when were were there as well!

headline: Great location
content: This bar is in a great location. The bartender Billy was awesome! The food is really good and the drinks can‚Äôt be beat.

headline: Gotta go to Sloppy Joe's in Key West
content: Had a cold refreshing drink in mid afternoon heat. Wanted to eat but we had already eaten a bite up the street. We hit the weekend they did the Hemingway Look-a-like Contest. Fun place and a must when in Key West.

headline: Late lunch
content: Great atmosphere, and good music. The food was okay.... I would definitely the sloppy joe. We had the sloppy Joe fries and that were delicious. It was Seat yourself... so be prepared to grab a table as soon as you see one open up.

headline: Sloppy Joe's Midafternoon Live Music
content: Was very surprised to get to enjoy a live band in the middle of the lunch period here.  Great music but somewhat drowned out by the noise level from the multiple bars they have.  The food and drinks were great and the service fast.  A...More

headline: A most stop in Key West
content: Anytime we go to Key West ..it is s must stop. I services was fast and friendly. I love the Sloppy Joe's. Live music every time I have gone. Lunch time it is family friendly.

headline: Good sloppy joes
content: Service is quick and attentive and the sloppy joes were good. If you want to grab food, go during the day because at night it‚Äôs a whole bar seen.

headline: Must Do, OK food
content: Have to do this place, even if just for a drink.  Sloppy Joe was real good, so where sloppy fries.  Drinks pricey but expected from touristy spot.  Great pictures on the walls and live music almost at all times.

headline: Best sloppy joe's ever!!!
content: Excellent service as always!!! Excellent food!!! Please sell the sloppy joe seasoning!!!!!!! Live music is always good... definitely a must stop place in paradise!

headline: One of My Favorite Places in Key West!
content: Strolling through the reviews, it surprises me that folks are only giving 4 out of 5 stars.  But I love this place, so I'm giving it 5 stars.  The only, and I mean only, bad thing you can encounter here is a packed house!  It's...More

headline: Late lunch
content:
We wanted to stop here for lunch as we heard so many wonderful things! We were very pleased we did!

Two of us, of course, had the infamous sloppy joe and one had the blackened chicken sandwich.  The sloppy joe was the best we have...More

headline: Family stop
content: Historical aspect is a five. Service and music was fantastic as we really enjoyed that. Food was just okay at best. Be aware that there is no hostesses and you have to position your self to get a table

headline: A Nice Bar/Restaurant
content: They did have good food for a reasonable price.  They had a live band, but I really didn't care for their music.  I really didn't recognize much of their music.  If you go be sure to go early to get a table.

headline: Key West
content: I had the eat and peel shrimp while my wife had a sloppy joe!  Washed down both with rum runners and beer.  This is a fun place.  Good or bad there is usually live music.  The food is better than average, the drinks are sooo...More

headline: Great drink selection
content: I have been here before and just found it average. Drinks were good as far as liquor goes. One of the friends in the party went somewhere else to get a draft beer since they had limited basic choices here.

headline: Sloppy Joes is Sloppy Joes
content: Sloppy Joes is on just about everybody's list for a Duval Street visit either to dine or a t-shirt. Nice place to visit but it is a tourist bar as the same goes for the Hog's Breath.If you are looking for a Key West bar...More

headline: What a racket
content: Visited Sloppy Joes Friday evening and there was a band on called cucumber something. What an absolute racket. Two drinks and I was that bad we left to go out into the pouring rain rather than listen to anymore.  I‚Äôm sure some would like it...More

headline: Pretty Standard
content:
My daughters and I stopped in on a weekday at lunchtime. It was packed but was pretty easy to find an open table. Even though is was a Wednesday afternoon, there was live music! Gotta love that. 

I got a pulled pork sandwich in their...More

headline: Great Band, Delicious Sloppy Rita & Fish Tacos
content: We always have to pop into Sloppy Joe's when in Key West per my husband's request. He ordered a Sloppy Rita and loved it. The Sloppy Joe was a little spicy for my taste but still good. My husband recommends the Key West Fish Tacos....More

headline: Great vibe
content:
A must if you're visiting Key West. We went on a Monday night, it was packed. Great music and beer.
Food looked pretty good too.

headline: Fun place to eat
content:
Live music, easy going atmosphere, nice service, food was decent.
This was an open air restaurant but they had air conditioning and fans that kept the temperature cool and pleasant.

headline: One Of Those Places You Have To Visit
content: Sloppy Joe's is one of those places you have to visit while in Key West. The service is fine, the food isn't great, and the live music is way to loud, but you don't go for any of those reasons, you go for the atmosphere...More

headline: If you like pina coladas...
content: Sat at the bar during our Duval crawl and enjoyed the Trader Vics Pina Coladas which my wife and I agree were the best pina colada's we've ever had. They should get an award or something for these! The mustard bbq chicken wings were good,...More

headline: Girls trip BBQ sandwich fish tacos
content: Fun place. Always live music and plenty of seating. The sandwich was wonderful and very tender!  Fish tacos were very flavorful and made with mahi mahi

headline: Went for a Papa Doble and Hemingway Mojito
content: Went here today for a Papa Doble and Hemingway Mojito today. They were ok but nothing great. I would come back only if a deal.

headline: Always a great place
content:
It was crazy busy but they had people helping everyone find a seat. The live music was very cool, and always is.

Beer is cold & the food good.

I never miss a stop at Sloppy Joes' when in KW.

headline: Excellent
content:
Love this place. Great drinks. Really good food.  Entertainment in the afternoon. Busy Upbeat atmosphere. Attentive wait staff. 
Went there twice

headline: So many people, but still quick service
content: This is a very popular place and we were there for Hemingway Days and the place was packed. They have such fast staff and you never have to wait for a drink. Had the sloppy joes nachos and they were amazing. You have to pay...More

headline: Lot's of fun, great live music
content: We went for drinks and only had appetizers at the bar. The overall experience was very good, it had great live music. Almost every bar in Key West has live music so you will not be disappointed, it's rather a matter of taste in music....More

headline: The best
content: One of the ‚Äúmust go to‚Äùplaces in Key West. Lots of fun great staff fun energy. You have to go just to say you‚Äôve been there

headline: Don't eat the actual sloppy joes
content: We visited with our four children. They were all excited to try the actual sloppy joes. This bar has a pretty cool atmosphere but it is definitely not known for its food. Yuck.

headline: Weekend Away
content: Love it...its hot so if it's summertime prepare to sweatüòÉ food is good, atmosphere is fabulous, great music and people!

headline: Don't miss this place!
content: This place is more than a very well known tourist attraction, the atmosphere is another Key West must see. Service was actually pretty fast which is more of a tourist thing than a laid back Key West time thing (Relax, never plan for the fast...More

headline: Priced right
content: Had the famous Sloppy Joe. It was fairly priced (around 9.99). Waitress was fantastic with good service and drink suggestion..

headline: Gotta Go To Sloppy Joes!
content:
This is a must stop on your visit to KW. 
Not just drinks. Food is good too.
Loved the fresh Florida "Pinks"
1 pound basket was ample and large sized shrimp.  Not skimpy on the order.
Cold beer, great mixed drinks and of course don't...More

headline: Fun
content:
If you're looking for a nice, quiet dinner this is not the place for you. This bar is loud and fun.
The DJ did a nice job bringing people in off of the street with his mixes.

headline: Sloppy Joe
content: Just gotta go there.  Try a sloppy joe and key lime pie. Go early with the family before the lunch crowd.  It's just iconic!

headline: Ace!
content:
You can‚Äôt go to Key West and not go to Sloppy Joes! It‚Äôs busy, fab and fun.

We lovely the atmosphere here, has a few beers and some fast food. 

Very friendly staff!

headline: The best bar in the world
content:
If you‚Äôve not been here you must put it on your bucket list.
It‚Äôs just the best. Music is always good, atmosphere is brilliant and food good.
Very busy at all times but worth just sitting, watching and taking in what goes on, great fun.

headline: A must experience for any vacationers in Key West
content: My family lives coming here for lunch, light munchies and drive ks along with live music.  Sometimes there are events going on there where it's supercrowded, such as thus weekend with the Ernest Hemingway look alike contest held at Sloppy Joe's.  Love this place but...More

headline: Good Food and Drinks
content: The conch fritters were great.  The drinks were a tad expensive, but we had fun.  Parking is hard to find.  There is a parking garage right around the corner.

headline: The Best
content: Really enjoyed our visit . Great place and many thanks to Julie, a sweet lady with a sympathetic ear who made my wife feel better after an unexpected furbaby loss.

headline: Best bar in Key West
content: We visited this each day during our three day trip to Key West. Great music and food. The draft selection was probably the only knock.

headline: It's Sloppy Joes. Crowded, noisy and great food.
content:
Sloppy Joes is a place you have to visit when you are in Key West. It is like the Southern Most Point, you just have to go.

Keep in mind, everyone else will want to go there too, so it's crowded, and noisy. That's the...More

headline: The infamous sloppy joes of key west
content: This place was packed and had great live music.  Unique atmosphere with ample bars to meet customers needs

headline: Strong drinks!
content: I have visited this place many times. The only bad thing I can say (if you call it bad) is that their drinks are very strong. Some may like that, I do not. Other than that, great music, great atmosphere, definitely a tourist location.

headline: Nice Place
content: We went in there for drinks and to cool off. The bartender was very attentive and great service. Would go back again

headline: Good bar food
content: The sloppy joes were good. Roast beef sandwich was really good. Everything was good for bar food. The bartender was good and very attentive. Overall a good experience.

headline: Upbeat, lively atmosphere
content: We were happy with our choice to stop in here first for lunch and another time for dinner.   The place was packed but we did manage to find a table within a few minutes.  Their menu has many tasty options, great beer and cocktail choices,...More

headline: Don‚Äôt leave KW without visiting!
content: A KW must! Delicious house cocktails and a great menu with a large selection. Obviously, you have to get the Sloppy Joe- either as a sandwich, on fries, nachos, or on a hotdog. Their fish tacos and burgers will not disappoint. The live music on...More

headline: Partytime
content: Not much to say.Great place with great drinks and great live music.Always worth visiting.We loved it.

headline: Try not to spend your whole vacaton here
content: What a great place. Friendly staff, great food, at a great price. The live band that was there were funny, entertaining, and talented. The main singer was like a cross, between Mama Cass, and Janis Joplin. Do yourself a favor and try the Cuban sandwhich.

headline: Great place to cool off
content: I have been to Sloppy Joe‚Äôs in previous visit & decided to stop in again. Service was great. As was the entertainment.

headline: Just had to stop in...
content: We had to stop in and grab lunch at the famous sloppy joes, and had to order the sloppy joe. It was okay. Tomato sauce was too sweet for me. But it was still pretty good. Place fills up very quickly. We sat down at...More

headline: Great music
content: Had a blast at this place we enjoyed the bands and watching all the people dancing and having a good time

headline: Great Corner spot
content:
Watch the world go by as you have Cocktails and listen to some great music.
The building has an old feel to it with open windows and a great view of Duval Street...

headline: Cool Place
content:
This was a cool hangout, not quite my taste. 
My boyfriend and I prefer The Green Room across the street.

headline: Not worth the stop - Very Sub-Par
content: We stopped in for lunch around 1pm and it wasn't too busy.  Were seated fairly quickly at a hi-top table.  Not much space for groups of 5.  Order included pulled pork sandwich, the signature sloppy Joe and a pound of peel and eat shrimp.  Do...More

headline: And I thought MY sloppy joes were the absolute best!
content: Probably THE best bloody Mary I've ever had - and lots of choices from mild to fiery. (I chose mild but absolutely delish - lots of wonderful flavors). Sadly, I have to turn in my crown as queen of sloppy Joe sandwiches as I must...More

headline: FUN FUN FUN
content: Good food from an established (1937) bar and grill. So much fun to eat, drink, and sing along to a live band. Consider this place as an alternative to the upscale Key West restaurants at least for one night. You will not regret it if...More

headline: What a cool bar
content: Just one of those places you have to visit. Not only because Hemmingway used to come here, but because of the atmosphere. Great music, cold drinks, small delicious dishes but best of all .... I had to should show id and I'm 50 years old...More

headline: Fun fun fun
content: The food is good and the live music at night is great.  The place is hoping with lots of fun.  Will definitely return again.

headline: Really try a sloppy joe!
content: Just try a sloppy joe! It really makes sense to try something the place is named after! At night the place is jamming with music and there seems to be fun here each day ! Very unique and awesome place to stop!

headline: Touristy but a Hemingway stop
content: This was a nice place with live music. Not the original Sloppy Joe‚Äôs from the Hemingway days (it moved here from the original building). Worth checking out for a bit. Crowded, strong drinks, average food, and lots of Hemingway decor and memorabilia.

headline: Busy bar restaurant!
content:
The Sloppy Joe sandwich was tasty, but not for the price, $10 for and average size sandwich.  No Fries or Chips included for this price.  They could give you a hand full of something to go with it at this price!
It was always busy...More

headline: When in Key West....
content: Having been to the Keys numerous times this is one of the essential bars you visit. They do offer food, but we only go in for drinks. They have added a small tap room off to the side which has some speciality beers, but my...More

headline: Tourist trap with bar food
content: The atmosphere was mediocre as was the food. Can eat this anywhere. It is in a hot part of town,  but time and money could be better spent somewhere else.

headline: Rebecca
content: My husband, grandson and I had dinner at Sloppy Joe‚Äôs.  We found the last small table near the door!  I‚Äôm glad we were farther from the stage due to the band playing. It was a noisy, bustling place! We ordered conch fritters, they were tasty,...More

headline: Good Food, Good Tunes, & Kit!
content: I took my twin nieces to Sloppy Joe's in Key West today because they didn't remember their first visit (4 years old). Surprisingly, we found a table immediately since it's seat yourself here. We were waited on by Kit and she was solid gold. She...More

headline: A go-to!
content: Some might say this is a bit of a tourist trap, but I absolutely LOVE it. I've been to Key West more than a dozen times, and Sloppy Joe's is a go-to every time. They have great food at a totally reasonable price, a large...More

headline: Sloppy Joe's Fries
content: We never go to Key West without stopping in for great live music and the sloppy Joe's fries, wife loves them

headline: Delicious
content: It was delicious.  Prices were ok.  It is seat yourself so come when it‚Äôs not crowded.  Live band was a nice touch and service was excellent.

headline: Loud But Fun
content: This is a large bar with live music, drinks and food. We went around 6:00 on a weeknight and we were able to get a table and not get overwhelmed with cigarette smoke. There were lots of tourists enjoying the music, food and drinks. They...More

headline: Mid-afternoon break
content: Stopped in for a mid-afternoon break from walking around Key West.  Great drinks and friendly staff.  Local music was great as well!

headline: A must while in Key West!
content:
This place is really fun.  Great, cold drinks!
The boneless wings were very good. Sloppy Joe sandwich was off the chain.
We loved the Sloppy Fries!
The entertainment that day was amazing as well.  We were in town at a very hot time of year....More

headline: Great Food and Atmosphere
content: Went with a group of friends for a wedding. Super fun atmosphere both during the day and at night. Fish tacos were amazing and great music.

headline: A Landmark
content: Sloppy Joe‚Äôs is a landmark and a must-see whenever you were in Key West. We were in gauge there on my 40th birthday 16 years ago so every time We go to Key West sloppy Joe‚Äôs is our first stop. We always see Uncle Lou...More

headline: Sloppy Joe Nachos
content: were do yummy, daughter enjoyed the philly cheesesteak pizza.  the environment while loud was still good.  the rum runner was very good also

headline: Best Sloppy Joe Ever!
content: Sloppy Joe‚Äôs certainly lives up to is eponymous moniker! Wow! Terrific and local music mixed with a whole lot of charm!

headline: Here is a fun place to eat and drink
content: Ernest Hemingway is said to have been in Sloppy Joe's many times when he lived and wrote in his home on Key West.  It is a fun place to eat and drink and the food portions are large and reasonably priced.  Guides say that its...More

headline: Fun But Average
content: Food was reasonably priced but was just average bar food. It is a bar atmosophere so go for the drinks and music, not the food.

headline: Sloppy!
content: we decided we needed a burger, so went to sloppy Joes, had the most average burger ever, poorly presented, glad we had the extra bacon and cheese otherwise it is a bread bun and  burger, and not that great either. Had some fries with it...More

headline: Great Night
content: Dropped in a couple of times during our stay in Key West - great staff so friendly and welcoming the food was great and reasonably priced the beer was good as was the entertainment

headline: Tourist spot for sure
content: It‚Äôs a great space, but the live music we saw there was a notch above karaoke. Irish Kevin‚Äôs offered way more fun and entertaining musicians.

headline: First ever Visit to Key West
content: Yesterday, was our first ever visit to Key West. We are staying in islandamora and decided to take the drive to Key West while we had the opportunity. Parking was very difficult to find, expensive, and cumbersome.  While perusing the  downtown area we decided to...More

headline: Sunny afternoon stopped in for music and beverages
content: My husband had been to Sloppy Joe's in 1982. He wanted to see how it had changed. Still fun. Great live music in the middle of the afternoon. Enjoyed drinks at the bar meeting people sitting on both sides of us. Friendly with great service.

headline: Great place to cool off with the AC and live music.
content: The service was friendly and prompt.  We had drinks and lunch and enjoyed the live music provided by the establishment.

headline: Great music and great fun
content: One of our favorite spots on Key West, always has good music. Has a great atmosphere and ice cold beers

headline: Drunken rage
content: The live bands were awesome. We had a fantastic time drinking our cup of liquor. Well worth the price.

headline: Underwhelmed
content: After all the hoopla of the history of this place, it is just a bar. The drinks were cold but I could barely taste any alcohol. I ordered the famous sloppy joe and my husband ordered the pulled pork. Both were average. There was live...More

headline: Mediocre food overpriced
content: Pizza featured canned mushrooms. Crab cake was so fishy and old we stopped at 3 bites. How do you get stale seafood in key west? High price for not much, but our waitress was nice. Would not go to this tourist trap. Good for drinks...More

headline: Iconic bar right on Duval
content: We stopped in here for a couple of beers while walking around Duval.  The live music was great and the bartender was friendly.  Its one of those places you feel like you have to go to because of the history but at $11 for two...More

headline: Fun
content: Of course sloppy Joe‚Äôs has a history of being the place to go when you go to Key West that that that it did not disappoint fun servers find out list for your great entertainment would recommend for anybody who goes to key west

headline: Sloppy Joes
content: Sloppy Joe‚Äôs was an awesome place to eat,  the food was great.  I think anyone that is traveling to Key West should definitely check this place out if you like Sloppy Joe!!

headline: Boys taking a break
content: After shopping for a bit met up with the boys relaxing at the bar.  Bartender was quite comical and friendly.  We decided to grab a quick bite have a drink and listen to the entertainment.  Food was good, service was good as well despite how...More

headline: Love sloppy joes!
content: Sloppy joes is amazing. We love going sloppy joes and the food and atmosphere is awesome. There was live music when we went and that was really cool. Their sloppy joe is delicious and I do not even like sloppy joes that much. Everyone enjoyed...More

headline: A classic
content: Good food, great band playing and fun atmosphere! Always a good time  here! The nachos were amazing!!

headline: The center of the start of the party
content: When I was here 15 years ago with my best friend, this was the start of our night of partying.  This past weekend, I brought my boyfriend for his first time, and it's like the place hasn't changed.  It was the perfect place to start...More

headline: Open Air Bar
content: Went here based on a family recommendation. Waiter Jesse was very friendly and efficient. Very busy atmosphere. I had CrabCake Sandwich, $14, large and very good. Husband had Teriyaki Boneless Wings, $11, also good. Great live music. Kind of loud. Open air bar/restaurant. Seat yourself.

headline: Cool vibes but overrated
content: A main attraction on Duval St., Key West. Usually very busy. Cool interior and live music of variable standard throughout the day. Some late evening bands such as Whiskey Kiss are very good but Pete and Wayne are a sad pair who are not funny...More

headline: Gotta go!
content: Perfectly positioned at the bottom of Duval Street, live music playing and a lively crowd. Great place to grab a beer and just chill.

headline: Great Atmosphere
content: Good food. Great staff. All sorts of entertainment on stage. Historical story of the business. Located in the Heart of Key West.

headline: Required Stop
content: The restaurant was very interesting from a historical point of view.  The food was good and the music was great.  It was wonderful to sit out of the sun and look at all of the items on the wall and placed around the room.  If...More

headline: Live music and good grub!
content: A great relief from the heat to enjoy the live island music with a few oldies mixed in, and to chow on the huge sloppy joe sandwich! Just had to do it, but it was worth it. A great place to relax and enjoy a...More

headline: An hour in afternoon
content: Called in whilst walking Duval Street, had a couple of drinks, and had a great time, the pianist who was on was definitely average mind!!!  Place was really busy with people buying meals, and t shirts, worth a look in.

headline: great drinks
content: a very busy place, but a lot of fun and noisy, great drinks and the music was good. They are pretty quick on getting your orders out and the store next door good for t-shirts, hats and stuff.

headline: Vacation
content: Fun and always a happening place no matter what time of day or night.  Good food and drinks. This is a must stop on your visit to Duval st

headline: Great spot, friendly staff
content: Try the Sloppy Joe.  Very busy and loud, we stopped for lunch and had a great time. They have live music I would not sit close to the stage. Worth checking the place out.

headline: Great Bar an Restaurant
content: We had an awesome time, listening to the band, and the Sloppy Joes were very good. Great time with friends and family.

headline: Busy legendary place
content: Busy, loud and lots of tables. You seat yourself. It can be an issue when the tables are all taken. I had a hamburger is was a good hamburger. Live band was playing which made it a very loud place. Service was poor. For those...More

headline: Great fish dip.
content: Visited as a quick stop because I wanted to try the fish dip. It was yummy ! There was live music and a great atmosphere. The frozen pina colada with daiquiri mix was delicious !

headline: Best Mojito on Key West!
content: Get the Hemingway Mojito! The smoked fish dip is awesome!  They always have great live music as well.

headline: don't miss!
content: spent some time and money here.. dancing and drinking and eating and shopping.. great dance band after 10 ..don't miss this place...

headline: Sloppy Joe‚Äôs
content: Nice place yo experience history and a place Ernst Hemingway enjoyed for drinking. However very touristy and good is ok.

headline: Our favorite stop on Duval Street!
content: This place was jumping when my wife and I rolled in on a Thursday night - the band was AWESOME playing everything from Tom Petty and Journey to 4 Non Blondes and Dr Dre (acoustic - was awesome!) - such a fun and historical spot...More

headline: Great bar!
content: Really good surprise. We had a beer, a strawberry colada and a fish dip snack with crackers (very tasty): 25$. The barman was super friendly, In a natural way, which is not so common :)

headline: Good music but tourist vibe
content: Sloppy Joe's is a must visit in Key West but the overall feel eventually ends up touristy. Great music and good drinks.

headline: Key West History
content: Sloppy Joe's never disappoints. They have great food, great drinks, and awesome entertainment. It is a loud atmosphere when bands are playing, so if you want a quiet dinner, I wouldn't recommend. But I've always had a good meal and a good time when I've...More

headline: Lots of fun!
content: We went for lunch on a Thursday.  The food was good and the live music was great. The performer was really good.

headline: Fun bar with good food
content: As I researched Key West I knew this was one place we would go for sure. It did not disappoint! Great food, great drinks, and great time!

headline: Fun place..good food
content:
We stopped at sloppy Joe's for a quick evening snack. Food was good..helpings lavish and the vibrant energy of the cafe was infectious. The live band was nice.
The  vegetarian pizzas was actually yummy and so was the foot long open sandwich.
Located in the...More

headline: A must see in Key West
content: Always great entertainment at Sloppy Joe's.  The burgers aren't bad and the drinks get a decent pour.  Just walk in, no cover and the prices are reasonable.  Afternoon entertainment usually a little more reserved then night time comes the rock groups.

headline: Drinks
content: Our group stopped in to enjoy the music and have a drink. The atmosphere was nice and the drinks were tasty. We didn't eat so not sure about the food.

headline: Good food, good atmosphere!
content: While in town this place was recommended. We walked there from our hotel, and enjoyed the music of the live band, and the food was great!

headline: Great lunch spot
content: We had lunch here twice during our stay. It has a great atmosphere. Live music all day, always busy and reasonably friendly waiting staff. The food is really good, portions are big so we shared. Very busy at lunch time, be prepared to wait for...More

headline: Couples Dinner
content: We enjoyed the bar and the bar staff.  Singers weren't that great.  The food was good.... think this place is hopping because it has been around a long time.  I   don't think we would go back.  typical bar nothing special.

headline: Fun wild music food and brew
content: Another must stop in Key West. This is the tourist scene, but you must go. Lots of locals with local music. We just had drinks, but the food served around us looked great. Don't miss it for fun.

headline: Tourist Bar
content: Drinks are better than average...food is average...service and ambience are excellent!  And you simply can't beat the location!

headline: Good Grub Good Tunes!
content: Sloppy Joe and fries were good. The two buds playing Hank Williams, Buck Owens and Hank Snow were even better! Glad we stopped in.

headline: Not a place we care for
content: We simply do not care for a place trying to make if's living off of Hemmingway..In reality Hemmingway did most of his drinking at the bar Captain Tony's

headline: Fun Place!
content: Went for lunch and after dinner cocktails and the place was rocking both times.  Interesting history.

headline: Packed All the Time
content: This place was packed all the time, it seemed like the place to be, the service was good and drinks were awesome. I could have stayed here a bit longer and enjoyed the music and the atmosphere

headline: Thoroughly Enjoyed It!
content: After eating at quite a few mediocre spots in the Keys, we stopped here on the recommendation of a friend.  It was during the day,and we had children with us, but that wasn't a problem at all.  We absolutely loved the live music, had a...More

headline: A bar...
content: Despite been very famous and worth the visit for pictures so you can say "I've been there", it's a bar... Live music (very loud, not allowing for conversation ) but fast and pleasant server, sat down right away, had drinks and we were done. If...More

headline: Fun Place for Drinks and Entertainment
content:
Sloppy Joe's is one of the traditional "must-go-to" bars in Key West. It's loud, fun, and a good place to get a drink and some bar food. 

We were a group of 4, and we went for a drink and to listen to the band...More

headline: Duvall staple
content: If you‚Äôre doing a Duvall crawl you MUST stop into sloppy Joes! Buckets for drink holders, live music, and non stop action. Sloppy joes is a Key West staple!

headline: Good atmosphere
content: This place had good food and a great atmosphere. Service was also good. It's a seat yourself place so get there early for dinner. The music was excellent, just a little too loud. I couldn't hear anything.

headline: Good drinks,  fun times
content:
Walking Duvall street, had to stop at this iconic bar /restaurant.   +20% pours made the place special
  Young adults and old timers will enjoy the true bar atmosphere 
  Good times roll wherever they are open

headline: The evening/late night music-- INSANE!
content: Just visited Key West for my brother-in-law's 40th birthday, and we ended up at Sloppy Joe's three of the four nights of our stay. Heard the most amazing two bands on Sunday evening!  Food and service are great, and so are the drinks!

headline: Upstairs/water front
content: Went there twice for lunch. Conveniet to walk from the beach. Boiled shrimp were great, chicken on salad was over cooked and dry. The BLT was huge & delicious. Sweet potato tots were excellent. This location is more of a restaurant (they have a bar)...More

headline: Cute place, great music
content: I was told ‚Äúif you go to the Keys, you have to stop at Sloppy Joes‚Äù. So I did. There was live music and it was really good.  Such a cute place, very busy, but excellent service. I had the sloppy joe. It was okay,...More

headline: Tourist trap with bar food- big party at night
content: We stopped by to check out a Key West legendary restaurant- where Ernest Hemingway used to party.  Now a tourist trap with all sorts of bar food.  We walked by in the evening and it reminded me more of a New Orleans party kinda feel....More

headline: Must eat here!!
content: Was told I needed to eat here by a friend, and she was right. Great atmosphere & live music too! Food & drinks were great. Definitely will go back.

headline: Horrible service
content: Don‚Äôt get me wrong the food and drink was tops the original sloppy joe was really good. The main issue was the service. There were a lot of open tables and it was before the dinner rush it. Our waitress only stopped by to take...More

headline: Great music, drink and atmosphere
content: A Key West icon.  Need to stop by for a frosty beverage on a cold day.  Band was playing and beer was cold.  I tried the Sloppy Rita and Hemingway Mojito both good.  This is a Must see place.

headline: Fantastic Place
content: Sloppy Joes Bar is a fantastic place to eat and have a few cocktails. No matter what time of day or night you visit Sloppy Joe‚Äôs, you‚Äôll enjoy yourself. At night, they have live entertainment. As far as the food goes, it‚Äôs all very good...More

headline: Icon in Key West
content: Great music , Great atmosphere,  Good food, and great drinks. Such an awesome place to relax, and enjoy the Key West vibes.

headline: A Key West Must
content: We went for drinks and to see the band. It was loud, open aired and a ton of fun. Exactly what we were looking for at night. So fun!

headline: Your typical dive bar
content: Hot and humid. Doors are open which makes for an uncomfortable atmosphere especially when it‚Äôs in the 90‚Äôs outside. One of our bartenders was great and then his shift ended. After he left, another bartender took over and he had the personality of a stump....More

headline: Lot of fun
content: There are lots of bars on Duvall st that have live bands, but the band that they had during our weekend was awesome.  We actually went back there a second night just to watch them again. There is seating area as well as an area...More

headline: Great atmosphere
content: My wife stopped in for a few drinks and some dinner.  The drinks were good and the food was really good.   Especially for a bar.    They had some great music playing.     Also it was great place to do some people watching.

headline: Food was terrible!
content: We went for lunch, because it is a well known place.  The food was really bad!  One of the meals was a fish sandwich and the fish was paper thin, the bread was thick, hard, and cold.  No flavor at all, it was like trying...More

headline: Awesome Bar stop
content: Great live music and fun cocktails! The Hemingway mojito was awesome! Live music was very excellent.

headline: Great night out
content: Wow this place rocks, live music two bars and friendly staff. We tried to get dinner but missed last orders, so they let me bring in a pizza from over the road, very accommodating and then we danced the night away....can‚Äôt remember leaving!!

headline: Probably okay if you‚Äôre drunk already
content: I wouldn‚Äôt return. But I was sober upon arrival here, so that was probably my mistake. It was okay, I guess. Best part was the drinks, which were good. Pass on the food - soft pretzels were clearly those super pretzels you can buy in...More

headline: Sit back and enjoy, eat and drink
content: Great entertainment, just loud enough to have conversations with friends and family. Busy but comfortable, good service. Have to have the Sloppy Joe, they were good but not the best we‚Äôve had, cheese fries were delicious. The shop has a great selection of T-shirt‚Äôs. Have...More

headline: Good food!
content: Good food! Good atmosphere! Centrally located. Everyone should try it. The sandwiches are great! Enjoy!

headline: Needs improvement
content: Entertainment horrible! Too loud, Food not so good. Drinks ok. Staff friendly and helpful. There is a nice webcam outside for you to wave to the world. Not a place I would go to again.

headline: Fun Bar
content: We enjoyed Sloppy Joe's, but some of the drinks were just plain awful.  I wouldn't go back there again.

headline: Gotta love Sloopy Joe‚Äôs!
content: Like many others I‚Äôm sure, Sloopy Joe‚Äôs is my number one go to in Key West! Food is simple and typical bar food but is very tasty. Service is always quick and we always had a cold beverage in from of us! No trip is...More

headline: Classic
content: Hemingway‚Äôs buddy Joe moved his bar to this location in the late 1930s because he received a $1 increase in his rent in a building down the street. The rest is history.  Lots of Hemingway memorabilia.

headline: Best bar in keywest
content: Great live music, funny staff. Would recommend to visit this place if you are in keywest. Had great options on bar.

headline: Great bar, not great food
content: Fun atmosphere on Duval for drinks and socializing. Eat before or after you go though, food not very good.

headline: Great Music
content: Great music.. The waitress,was friendly and drinks food was awesome. I cant wait for my next vist to The keys

headline: Gotta stop
content: Our third trip to Joe's, and basically a "must do". Good Sloppy Rita's.... But not my favorite of all places in Key West.

headline: Dependably good
content: This is one of those mandatory places to visit in key West.   Food is always great and service to match.

headline: Fun night out
content: Great live entertainment and great service,food was delicious and drinks were strong Just a fun atmosphere.

headline: Quick Stop
content: We stopped in for a drink and smoked fish dip. Friendly service. Fish dip was excellent. Drinks were good. Nice gift shop. A good place to take a break.

headline: Great Night!
content: Great Band! Great dancing! Heavy pours on the drinks! Friendly and fun staff! Air conditioned! Had a great time!

headline: Interesting and historic
content: Stopped in for lunch and drinks at Sloppy Joe's.  There  was a gentleman playing the piano and singing and he was extraordinary.  He added the enjoyment of being there.  The food was good but the rum drinks needed a little more rum.  Overall experience was...More

headline: Lively place, great service and drinks, food okay
content: We came in here one midweek evening. Nice and full but we found a table ok and were soon served. Nice nachos to start and mains were just ok. Great service which seemed to be done by just one person. Worth a visit for the...More

headline: Great place to visit !
content:
Very busy place, with some great live music. The table service was really good and we didn't feel ripped off with either food or drink prices.
It's a tourist attraction but the food was excellent (it's mainly burgers, chese steaks and fish & chips etc)...More

headline: Must Visit
content:
When in Key West, you must visit Sloppy Joes. This was my 7th visit to Sloppy Joes. I stop in every time I‚Äôm in the Keys. 

The entertainment and staff are great. The Food is excellent. I always get, you guessed it a Sloppy Joe....More

headline: OK stop
content: We stopped here just to say we were there in Key West.  It was not surprisingly very crowded in here on a weekend night, with some OK beer options, and live music.  I'm not into standing room only crowds, so this place wasn't quite my...More

headline: Just your average Joe
content:
Had a bite to eat at Sloppy Joes with two other couples. 

Very busy, but wait service was good, the beer cold, and food portions large - big enough to split and still have enough to eat. We tried the fish n chips, onion rings,...More

headline: Drinks
content: Stopped at pretty much every bar for drinks! Bartenders were nice and place was packed as always ! Always enjoy stopping by for a shot

headline: Worth it for the history, not the food.
content: I‚Äôm a huge Hemingway fan and loved the history of Sloppy Joe‚Äôs; however, the food definitely was nothing special. It was not bad, just not great.

headline: tradition but conmercail as well
content: packed on a memorial day weekend  and service was kinda quick  but they pack em in and drinks are ok  didn't try the food but the plate next to me looked good  I would say stop in to say you have been there  but that's...More

headline: A Key West tradition
content: It has been years since my last visit to Sloppy Joe's, but nothing has changed.  Lots of noise, music, food, drinks and good company.  I did not have a sloppy joe this time, instead I had their version of a Cuban Sandwich in the basket...More

headline: A great tourist attraction
content:
Great music all day
Great drinks all day
Great food all day
Great fun all day =
Fun fun fun
It is a very iconic restaurant it‚Äôs interesting to hear the whole story

headline: Sloppy Joe's
content: I recently had lunch at Sloppy Joe's, Key West.  It was a fun place.  Very active - good food and good service.  Daytime music was also very talented.  I enjoyed being there.  A must do while in Key West.  Its a very well known place,...More

headline: Not impressed
content: I‚Äôve visited this bar for years when visiting Key West but was not impressed during this visit. We tried to go and have a good time, but the drinks weren‚Äôt up to par. Also, there are two guys who have a comical act that is...More

headline: Sippy Cup for Beer
content: My cousins and I decided to stop here for lunch and drinks.  The atmosphere was very lively with a couple of guitarists performing.  The place was packed and luckily we found a table that was being vacated.  We ordered some beer while deciding on what...More

headline: A must
content: Sloppy Joes is an iconic restaurant on DeVul street. There is live entertainment throughout the day and evening non-stop.it is a great place for family and friends. I never miss this place when I go to Key West.

headline: Great Place on Duval Street
content: Been here a few times now. Always a great atmosphere and normally live music. The food is pretty good and the wings are fantastic. Well worth a visit.

headline: No trip complete without a visit
content: Went there while in Key West.  Food was good, the place was crowded.  That being said, it's a must stop when in the Key West.

headline: Been there
content: Love music was solid, food was subpar. Service was good! Drinks were cold. It is famous and simply survives on its reputation, not awful, but far frin good.

headline: Best Food in the Party Area of Key West
content: This is one of the oldest and coolest places to stop in and eat and enjoy live entertainment all day and night.  Food selection is awesome very reasonably priced for a ‚Äútourist/vacation‚Äù venue.  Lots of scenery....

headline: Legendary Bar
content: There are better Key West bars for sure but none have the history that this one does. Stop off and have a drink to say you have visited, but you'll soon be running from the way this bar has embraced the tourists.

headline: Best Atmosphere
content: Sloppy Joe‚Äôs is a must see, eat & drink location. Live Music, Best Mojitos on the Key! Do not go to Key West without eating a Sloppy Joe from Sloppy Joes!

headline: Sloppy Joes
content: Just arrived in Key West, very hungry and Sloppy Joes were on our way to our accommodation. Very busy place but could find seating for 2. Service was prompt and meal was good also. Our server was very friendly and took good care of us.

headline: Iconic
content: We stopped in Sloppy Joe's while on a cruise via Key West.  It is Iconic so we had a drink and appetizer.  The place is fun and staff was really nice.  I recommend.

headline: Tourist attraction
content:
When in Key West you should definitely stop in. Food was ok and portions kinda small.
But stop in for a drink so you can say you were there!

headline: Overrated
content: One word, OVERRATED. We were going around to each bar to find the best mojito and Sloppy Joe's was the worst tasting, smallest, and most expensive (because we ordered the souviner cup, which was only a child's plastic cup size). It tasted like coffee because...More

headline: good stop!
content: it's noisy, has live music, great bartenders, and we had a snack of conch fritters that were so good, we had them so fast that i couldnt believe it! fun friendly place with good food, and drinks.

headline: 25th Wedding Anniversary trip
content: Spent the last 3 nights in Sloppys, didn‚Äôt eat but enjoyed Sun, Monday and Tuesday night in there until the early hours.  The boys that were on from 10 were absolutely amazing, lead singer was awesome!!!! Made our holiday, we will definitely be back!!!!

headline: Delicious
content: Hubby and I went here for lunch.  He ordered the original Sloppy Joe & I ordered the cheese fries with Sloppy Joe on top.  Both were delicious.  The fries would have been enough to serve us both.  I also had a frozen strawberry margarita that...More

headline: Fun atmosphere, excellent service!
content: While the food is average, the atmosphere is fun and the service is excellent!  Our service, Wendy, was fun and friendly.

headline: Great food and atmosphere
