content: Loved this place! Had a live singer who was great and the food was amazing! I had the crab cake sandwich which was amazing! Cocktails sure aren‚Äôt for the weak so at least you know you get your money‚Äôs worth! My husband got the quesadilla...More

headline: Lively spot if you can get in, very busy
content: I know that Sloppy Joe‚Äôs is probably the most famous bar on the Key, and trying to get to the bar or a table can be quite difficult, but on our second attempt a space at the bar was available. Friendly bartenders and very reasonable...More

headline: Lunch
content: Great atmosphere, staff friendly and the food was great.   Music was good and not so loud we couldn‚Äôt hear ourselves talk.

headline: Pete!  Wayne!   Da Bomb!
content: Great place. Pete and Wayne are incredibly talented. Bartenders are great as well. A favorite stop for us annually.

headline: Live music great drinks
content: Friendly locals and servers. Drinks are awesome, as is all the food.  We loved just hanging out there. Very chill place.

headline: Love Sloppy Joe's
content: Good place to get a drink or a famous shirt.  Usually have music in the evening.  Look at the walls for entertainment

headline: Can you say sloppy Joe on nachos!
content: On of the best bar specialties I have ever ordered. Nachos with cheese, black beans, onions. Jalapenos, sloppy joe mix, black beans and to top it all off they give you some sour cream and salsa. What more could you ask for, paired with one...More

headline: A must of Key West
content: When you are in Key West one of the places that you have to visit is Sloppy Joe's. Its a fabulous place with great atmosphere, great music and good drinks. Its loads of fun

headline: Drink stop
content: I mean what can you say, Ernest Hemingway drink here...as any blue blooded you should as well. We stop here every time where in Key West. Must see

headline: Sloppy Joe‚Äôs
content: We ate lunch one day at Sloppy Joe‚Äôs.  Service was excellent and the food was very good.  I had a Philly Cheesesteak sandwich and my husband had their original Sloppy Joe. Both were excellent.

headline: So good!
content: We ate here twice in two days and had Sloppy Joes both times. Very good! The service was fast and the food was good. Definitely a Key West experience that shouldn‚Äôt be missed!

headline: Lives Up To Its Reviews
content: Low key high hype atmosphere.  Live music, lots of hustle and bustle.  Diverse, simple menu with something for everyone.  Fun for all.

headline: Denny is awesome
content:
Bartender was helpful and thoughtful, with a sense of humor!

He gave great suggestions for local restaurants.

headline: Okay food, good service and music.
content: A place that any visitor to Key West should visit. Our waitress was efficient and nice; the food was okay. The music was good and not so loud that you couldn't converse with others. A tourist bar that I had to visit and would stop...More

headline: good service and great music
content: the food was blah.... of all the excellent places to eat nearby, we were disappointed with the food here.  But the waitress, mojitos, and the musicians were awesome.

headline: Great food and atmosphere - if you are ok woth crowds
content: I had the Sloppy Joe and a pi√±a colada. Very good and our barmaid Juulie was very friendly :) The live music is the cherry on top!

headline: A must do
content:
A great place. It is loud but you are able to say i have been to Sloppy Joe's in Key West.
We saw the introductory band and they were excellent.   I am sure the main band was even better.
This is a place that you...More

headline: Music Music Music
content: Great music! Great wait staff and drinks! Food was ‚Äújust ok‚Äù. Definitely would go again for the music and drinks!

headline: Fun But Loud
content: It was extremely crowded when we visited.  It was so loud inside, we could barely talk to each other.

headline: Always a Fun Stop for Live Entertainment and Cold Drinks
content: We usually just stop for a cold drink and to catch a little music in the afternoon.  The food is pretty good bar food.  The bands and crowds are much louder and bigger at night so we always go in the afternoon.  There is a...More

headline: Fun place for great cocktails
content: Had the conch fritters (outstanding), a sloppy joe (very good) and mango daiquiri‚Äôs. Place had a band playing, cruise ship had just come in, and we still got table and served in minutes. Fun athmosphere.

headline: Awesome
content: Really fun spot! Great food and drinks!! Pleasant staff! Would definitely go again. The store staff women was very helpful!

headline: Too noisy
content:
It‚Äôs too full and too noisy  Basic beers and food
Relies on cruise ship trade so can get away with anything

headline: Great Cocktails
content: Have visited here many times over the years just for a drink in the afternoon. Great atmosphere, friendly courteous servers and cocktails to knock you out. Will eat here one day as it‚Äôs always finding the right time to get a table, but the food...More

headline: Eat the Sloppy Joe
content: After five years, I finally ate my first real Sloppy Joe. My husband had the hot dog with Sloppy Joe on it. It was delicious and the entertainment was great. This is a must-do in Key West.

headline: Friendly, efficient, good drink and food
content: Ten of us invaded the small, what I would call 'Tap Room' at the rear of this popular place as we could not fit into the large main bar that had good live music playing.  The chap keeping this small bar was very welcoming and...More

headline: Live music was excellent
content: Don't know who was performing when we went, but the girl singing was awesome. Great spot to grab a cocktail. Had a sloppy joe, was okay--but environment was fun and lively.

headline: Great Mojitos
content: Good service and great music on the evening were there. Lived up to its good reputation. Would definitely visit again.

headline: Fun place, always packed.
content: Kind of hard to get a drink, the place is always packed. Music was awesome. Cherry on Top was fantastic!

headline: Vacation
content: The fellas went to the main bar one day. Beer was cold, 3-man band was terrible. Next day we went to the bar connected called the Tap Room. That was great and had a little street level porch where we planted ourselves for the afternoon....More

headline: Great bar, great atmosphere
content: Visited at lunch time. Great service and music too. Atmosphere was amazing and friendly. Didn't return at night, only because the music was less generic and not my taste

headline: NOT COOL!  BAD FOOD AND ENTERTAINMENT!
content: We have heard alot of comedy routines and we are not prudes, but this comedy duo was raunchy and as I looked around the room, people were getting the heck out as soon as they finished their not-so-great food.  Just one crude comment after another....More

headline: Great fun
content: We just stayed for couple of drinks, but in that time we saw a great female solo artist and after her a rockband. The atmosphere was great and people were dancing and singing along. Heard the food was good too.

headline: It‚Äôs a must visit when in KW
content:
How do you go to Key West and NOT go
to Sloppy Joes?   

We came and hung out for a while to take in some great live music and have a couple drinks.  We also ordered up a plate of nachos, but they didn‚Äôt really...More

headline: Fab bar, beverly what a great barmaid!
content: What can you say, this is the best bar in keywest an institution and a must! You always have a fab time and get chatting to everyone. Special hi to Beverly your service and friendliness made our visit, keep doing what you do.

headline: Order a sloppy joe
content: No joke.. you'll be craving Sloppy Joe's after these.. so good! Fun place - easy to stop in and grab a drink and simple, good food.

headline: A must go to!
content: Historic Restaurant with Live Music.  Great place to visit, grab a drink and some food.  A must see when in Key West.

headline: Excellent night out
content:
Great live entertainment every night, drinks are good, 
Always busy but the restrooms were a bit messy

headline: This is where the action is!
content: This is where the action is! Sloppy Joe's is super fun. I loved the live music. Great energy! If you are out to have a good time, you'll find it here!

headline: Always a good time!
content: A must stop for good food and cold drink while visiting Key West! Centrally located and easy to find!

headline: Great show
content: Well, Ernest Hemingway and many other famous people have hung out at this very historic restaurant so had to check it out.  Music was fantastic but can't really say the same for the sloppy joe!

headline: Best Bar and Restaurant in the country!
content: Always go to Sloppy Joes every time we visit Key West! Service is awesome and the best cheeseburger and Taco salad ever!

headline: Just get the Original!
content: DH and I both ordered the original.  Sandwiches were large and very tasty. Fries are more than enough to share and also very tasty. Frozen drinks were very refreshing and music was enjoyable. A great way to beat the afternoon heat in Key West!

headline: Worth stopping in
content: Had to at least try it.  Sloppy Joe was ok,  chicken sandwich was ok.  Service was fast and the place was full of life and history.

headline: Lunch
content:
We have been there a couple of times in the past and the food and the drinks are always fine.
We bought a couple of shirts this time and the man in that shop needs an attitude adjustment.
Not helpful or friendly.

headline: Live music
content: Like with most all restaurants and pubs on Duval Street there is live music. The place was packed so service reflects that a little slow but the food was ok and the entertainment was good.

headline: Great place
content: We had a great night here. Our family in Australia watching us on the live webcam was a highlight. Our meals were so good. The band was good too. Staff were really friendly... taking pics for us! Overall a great atmosphere.

headline: More Fun than Humans should be allowed to have
content: This place rocks!  Different bands throughout the night, every night.  Food is great.  We stopped for lunch, came back for some mid-day music and then came back after dinner and then a few more times during out stay.  I be I was there 7 times...More

headline: Fun with sister
content: Lots going on! Great food, service, and Fun time! Full restaurant. We were seated and waited on quickly. Group there from Stan's Bar and Grill entertaining. Helped make our Key West trip memorable.

headline: Good Margarita
content: We had to stop and have a Margarita and it was very good but served in a plastic cup we did eat but the food was average at best.

headline: Great food & live music
content:
Sloppy Joe's is a world famous funky bar with lots of colorful history!
The bar drinks and wide variety of menu choices ,including their "Sloppy Joe" for which the bar & restaurant is named, is delicious & reasonably priced.
I have been there several times...More

headline: Mediocre food but decent drinks
content: Fish sandwich and burger were about as mediocre as you can get - we stopped in because I had heard of it before, but the semi-talented musicians and the t-shirt shop in the front didn't help the experience. The waitress was nice and the bartender...More

headline: Dancing
content: Our first night to key west involved perfectly prepared cocktails and a band that could not stop us from Dancing!!! Sloppy joes is a must stop at anytime of day!!!! Draft Beers and plenty of cocktails, great dance floor!!!  Be there or be square!

headline: Great Food, Great Music, Great Legacy!
content:
Just walk right in where the party never ends. Great food and service. Never felt rushed and grooved to some great music.
Good variety on menu, and variety throughout the day on music.
Good place for any size group.

headline: Sloppy for sure
content: Visited Key West last weekend.  When cruise ships are in port, there is no way to get into Sloppy Joes.

headline: Great Time
content: We usually always stop in at Sloppy Joe's.  Entertainment is fabulous.  Food is very good and the drinks are really good.  Yes it's touristy, but then again, your in Key West!

headline: Great bar with best entertainment in Key West
content: Do you like ice cold beer?  Do you like tasty frozen adult beverages?  Do you like the best live music around?  If you answered yes to any of these questions you have to swing into Sloppy Joe's, order up a round or two and just...More

headline: Vacation
content: A lively friendly atmosphere with live music and a good variety of drinks beer and eats. This is a must visit. Fun for all

headline: The place gives a good drink though prices are higher it is a tourist spot
content: This is a must stop if you are in the city of Key West. this is the bar that Ernest Hemingway used to stop and eat and drink. It is like being a part of history. Since this is the place to be it is...More

headline: Entertainment and drinks
content: Great music, super atmosphere, and very friendly service, makes this a must stop. Large venue with great food and plenty of bar space.

headline: Noisy tourist place
content: Food was good and fairly quick. Lots of tourists but attentive servers. Duval Street location.  Prices a bit inflated but refills on sodas and water

headline: Good Music, Food and Drinks
content: You pretty much have to go to Sloppy Joes when you are visiting Key West. All kinds of art and memorabilia on the walls. Food was good, atmosphere and music were great. Plan to kick back and spend some time.

headline: Great band
content: Fun time- band was fantastic. Security was nice when they explained that you can‚Äôt enter the bar with alcohol. Seems obvious, but things are pretty different in Key West.

headline: Great food in Key West!
content: We loved the food, drinks and service in Sloppy Joe's. Our kids told us to make sure we stopped in. Very glad we did! Enjoyed the live music too. The atmosphere was fun & lively. Great choice if you're in Key West. Don't miss out!

headline: Must visit
content: This is one of the most famous bars in Key West and a must visit! I have never tried the food; but the drinks are cold and at a great price. The entertainment is first class. The place is large; but seats can be hard...More

headline: "Sloppy"? you ask.
content: The name, address, and history all have a great story behind them, but I'm not going to be the one to tell them. You'll just gave to get the information elsewhere. And, you just have to try the famous and popular place yourself. Ernest Hemingway...More

headline: Don't fall for the trap
content: The name is enticing and the history of this place more. That is the only reason my husband dragged me into this. Loud place, with mediocre expensive food. Beer was good. Is a good sight seeing spot if you are lucky to get a table...More

headline: Been there, done that!
content: If you go to Key West, you have to at least say you went there.  We did and the place was crowded, noisy, and pretty much your average tourist trap.  We had lunch and a couple of drinks.  Food was mediocre, but drinks were good....More

headline: Great food and Atmosphere
content: It was good service, good music and great drinks! I would for sure go here again. It was crowded every time I passed it!

headline: Excellent entertainment
content: The food NOTHING fo brag about. Service sucks. They didnt bring ketchup with fries. Took the server a long while to even offer is a drink and when you got to order the drink..i told her i would put in my food order and she...More

headline: Plastic cups, no thanks
content: Intended to sit a while and enjoy a beer here, but not when it's in plastic cups, so that was a shame

headline: A classic--
content: we stopped here for beers and appetizer late afternoon. A great local duo was playing covers. I was last here in the 70s and it's as fun now as it was then.

headline: Go Just Once
content: Sloppy Joe's is classic Key West. Everyone needs to go at least once. It's very over-priced ($6.50 beer), but it is what it is. Staff knows that have a sure thing, so aren't very customer friendly. The live music played most of the day is...More

headline: Sloppy ginger
content:
Fun bar.  Service was good.  Had a Sloppy Ginger Moscow mule.   Very good.
Lots of low top tablees-i hate high tops,  the dangle leg issue.üòâ

headline: Always A Favorite
content: You can stop here, day or night,Monday or Saturday and have fun. Live music, great staff and unbelievable people watching. Not sure if the decor changes, doesn't matter great place.

headline: Not worth it
content: Went on a Friday mid morningish.  Not very busy, but waitress acted like she was swamped and totally rushed us, clearly not enjoying her job anymore.  I didnt bother ordering anything as I was so off put by her.  Quickly went elsewhere.

headline: Great food in addition to location and music
content:
This was our favorite spot for lunch.  Open air in the Keys with local artist jammin in the background... just love it!  Wings were awesome.

Had pizza one Eve for Happy hour was also fun time.

headline: Great for drinks
content: If it was good enough for Hemingway it's good enough for me, didn't eat but enjoyed the music and drinks, every time I am in key West I visit, always a good buzz

headline: Must Do in Key West
content: We've been to Key West 4 times before.  But for this trip we brought my wife's sister and sister's husband.  And this was their first trip.  So, we took them to Sloppy Joe's for the classic tourist visit.  But I knew the music would be...More

headline: Yes, you‚Äôve got to do it!
content:
....and it‚Äôs a one off!  It‚Äôs noisy, it‚Äôs hot, it‚Äôs busy, it‚Äôs crammed it‚Äôs full of  all ages.  
Getting served isn‚Äôt easy...in fact we gave up.
But you should still visit.......don‚Äôt listen to this iconoclastic reviewer!

headline: Great entertainment and great consistent food
content: So don't think this is high eating because it's not. It's great lunch food that is always consistent in a great fun live music atmosphere. It's a Key West staple. Go go go now.

headline: Big, big, big!
content: Sloppy Joe's is a Key West mainstay so its a big deal for tourists, owing in part to its legacy of being one of Ernest Hemingway's favorite drinking holes. Over the years the business has hopped around town to increasingly larger digs. Their current site...More

headline: Hemingway‚Äôs pub
content:
We went for dinner and enjoyed a good meal, good service and a very good live gig by Never in Vegas.
Stop by for a drink or meal if you‚Äôre in Key West

headline: Great live music
content: Great place for a dance, few drinks and some fun. We didn't eat here and wouldn't as so many nice places. The band we saw were great and atmosphere was friendly.

headline: Come for the Entertainment!
content: Sloppy Joe's was recommended to me by several people, as a Key West classic. Since it seemed to be a hot spot for entertainment and food I had to check it out. First, this place is chaotic and loud, but that was expected. I ordered...More

headline: Great Location/ Entertainment/ and Food
content: Our stay was directly down the street from this location and it was very convenient to go and have a drink and get a bite to eat.  The Sloppy Joe sandwich was awesome.  The entertainment was great as well.

headline: Just check it off the list
content:
Came in for a drink based on the historical importance of the place. 

Possibly the worst Mojito ever made. Seriously, shoving a mint leaf in a glass of sprite with some rum does not a Mojito make. 

Basically a divey joint (cool) crammed with sweaty...More

headline: GREAT MUSIC!!  GREAT PLACE TO DANCE!
content: Sloppy Joes is a very casual fun and loud place to drink and dance!!!  The band had everyone on their feet singing and dancing!!!  Reasonably priced and fun!!!

headline: Not so cool as we think
content:
Its a huge bar with live music. But only its a touristic attraction. Thats very sad. 
The blond servicegirl gave me the bill after my first order. But we wanted drink and eat much more. We had a lot of time and we were hungry....More

headline: Service and food was OK
content: We decided to stop here for lunch since it's well known as "Hemingway's" bar and restaurant. It was quite crowded and noisy, but we expected that. My husband ordered a pork BBQ sandwich and didn't like it. It wasn't a very big sandwich and came...More

headline: Best Bar on Duval!
content: Just returned from a 4 day guys trip and this bar is without a doubt a must do on Duval!  We visited nightly and always had a blast.  Great drinks, staff and music!

headline: Fun for dancing!
content: Enjoyed sloppy Joe‚Äôs one night for late night dancing with friends.   Band was good and played lots of 80s hits

headline: Sloppy Joe's 201 Duval St, Key West, F
content: A very well known place in Key West and a hang out for Ernest Hemingway when he lived in Key West. Good food, Great service, Great Value, Great time!  Within fairly easy walking distance of the Cruise port if you come to Key West by...More

headline: Famous
content:
Tried the famous Sloppy Joe's for lunch.  Sloppy Joe was different, a bit to tomatoey, but good, and good size, with fresh cut fries.  Piano man played and sang well, providing good entertainment while we ate.  
Very busy around noon.
Recomend on a key west...More

headline: Fun lunch entertainment
content: Got to enjoy live entertainment while we ate lunch!  Signature sloppy joe's were excellent & a good value!  Service was good even at a very busy time during on a rainy day.

headline: Awesome Wait Staff and Good Entertainment
content: We always stop into Sloppy Joe's while visiting Key West. The wait staff is topnotch! It is amazing to watch them. They are efficient and clearly experienced. The drinks are a heavy pour, which we always appreciate when you're paying resort town prices. The food...More

headline: Great entertainment
content: We had a nice afternoon listening to great music in this place.  The food is typical bar food and the service is okay.  Listen to the great music and have some drinks and snacks, not a proper meal.  Awesome atmosphere and entertainment.

headline: Not the original.
content: It‚Äôs true. Captain Tonys bar was the original. It‚Äôs ok. Always packed. Good food but one of those places u have to stop at.

headline: Good times
content: We went at night after our sunset viewing. Usually music by a band and busy. Our waitress was pretty good, considering the place was pretty full on a Thursday night. We had drinks while we were there listening to the band. World famous bar and...More

headline: Must do on Duval!
content: Stopped by Sloppy Joe's several times on our visit. Relaxed informal setting to hear some great music, drink and eat delicious food.  While the place can be loud and busy, you are in KW afterall!  Even though busy, it was easy to find a seat...More

headline: Excellent experience! You should make time to stop in
content: We stopped in to check Sloppy Joes out. The staff there are fantastic. It was my husbands birthday and they made it very special. The drinks were nice and cold, the atmosphere is really fun.

headline: Friends and solo
content: Went the first night in town and met a few bartenders, all very nice and when I came back on my own remembered me.

headline: No doubts!
content: Sloppy and wonderful, this is a good hangout for a drink and/or a snack for example a plate of nachos. Great staff - friendly and service minded, fast service! Also really tasty drinks, don‚Äôt miss out!! You haven‚Äôt really visited Key west if you don‚Äôt...More

headline: Have to go!
content: Great bands playing every night! Did not eat here this time but it‚Äôs your typical bar food. Iconic  place

headline: Ok but crowd
content:
Good location Green Street and Doval Street 
Very busy place food so so and the guy that sang was ok 
The place fills up early and get noise

headline: Good ambience... but typical bar
content: It's extremely touristy but it's worth going in for a drink. We got some food which was really good. The drinks were great too! Our server was awesome.

headline: Not sure why anyone likes this place
content:
Everything says you must visit Sloppy Joe's, but I am not sure why.  It was your typical bar, the music was good, but the food was horrible.  

The ordered the boneless wings, plain and they were overdone and hard as a rock.  I also ordered...More

headline: Great for ambience
content: Drinks ok. My wife's Sloppy Joe was very good. My fish tacos were not that great. I'm not used to the fish being breaded inside a corn tortilla. But the service was good and the music was great.

headline: Touristy but a great place to drink and listen to music
content: Busier than I remember from twenty-two years ago. Fun musicians every day all the time. We brought our teenage kids here and they loved the noise the music and the activity. They even loved the food. Of course everyone left with a t-shirt and mom...More

headline: Popular spot in Key West
content: We had lunch there and really enjoyed it.  Prices were reasonable and the food was very good.  They also served local craft beer.

headline: Classic Key West
content: A must do when visiting Key West. Great live music & fun atmosphere. Food was fine, beer was cold...what more do you need?

headline: Mixed Drinks Were Expensive But Live Band Was Super Fun
content: I got two mixed drinks and the price was around $15.  The cups were like maybe 10-12 ounces (very small).  My drink was pretty strong but I still felt for the size of the drinks that they were still over priced alittle.  The live band...More

headline: Great place to visit
content: My husband has heard of this place for years and we finally got to go on our first trip to the Keys. This was on his must go to list and it did not disappoint. The food and drinks were good and worth the money.

headline: "water brake"
content: Large/loud corner bar. People watching at its best! Typical bar; fun for a drink and recharge. Reasonable with lots of drink options.

headline: Must do in Key West!
content: Great drinks and live music!  Try the frozen pi√±a coladas on a hot day and grab some bar food.  Fun environment for a group or couple.

headline: Grab an open table
content:
Don‚Äôt wait to be seated. Just sit and someone will be to you shortly. 
Always some live music to be enjoyed.. average prices for food and drink for the island.

headline: Fun
content: We go here every time we come and it‚Äôs a must see in key west! Great beer and live music. Food is ok but atmosphere is awesome!

headline: Must Go
content: No trip to Key West is complete without a stop to Sloppy Joe's.  Good food, good drinks, and live music.

headline: Fun bar with food - live music
content: We were in Key West for the day and stopped in for some drinks and appetizers.  The place was busy with patrons and families doing the same.   They have a stage for live music and since it was around lunch time, they had a guy...More

headline: Mojito
content: Had to make sure I stopped by and have Hemingway‚Äôs special drink. A really nice place with great ambiance. I could‚Äôve spent a few hours here.

headline: A giant bar
content: Just a giant bar - the focal point of this end of Duval street. Disappointed that there were very few craft beer selections - it was mostly the macrobrewery fizzy water beer that you get at ball parks. Music was live in the middle of...More

headline: What a racket!
content: Sloppy Joes seems to be the watering hole sought out by near to all Key West visitors. It is kind'a hard to imagine Mr. Hemingway enduring the enormous racket at the place. Of course it is a tourist trap, but the bar staff do their...More

headline: Cool place- just as expected!!
content: I liked it! I have had dreams of Hemingway and it was really cool to see it. Key West is what it is (AWESOME!!), and this place fots in. We didn‚Äôt eat. And the live music is too loud for kids...

headline: This is Not for Hemingway Fans
content: After having a great tour of the Hemingway House, my husband decided unfortunately to continue onto Ernest‚Äôs favorite watering hole Sloppy Joes. We sat at the bar, ordered our drinks and meals.   I forget what my husband ordered but he said it was worth two...More

headline: Touristy But Fun!
content: Uncle Lou took care of us and he was super to our kids.  The food is typical fried fare and OK.  They have live music all the time and like most places in Key West you have to go just to say you went.

headline: Get Drunk with Hemingway
content: This is the best place in Key West for a booze party even if you are not a fan of alkohol :) It is really good beer, very good service, nice atmosphere and a lot of people, specialiy of season is one of the places...More

headline: Best sloppy joe
content: Everyone I know who has been to Key West says you have to try Sloppy Joes, so we did, and we all had the namesake for lunch, their famous sloppy joe.  It didn‚Äôt disappoint; it was excellent.  That and a cold draft beer and my...More

headline: You have to go to Sloppy Joe's
content: My family and I stayed in Key West for Spring Break. First night we were there, my  husband and I walked over to SJ for drinks and we shared the nachos (delicious!!). We then went back the next night with our teenage kids. Sloppy Joe's...More

headline: Great drinks & bands- Super Fun
content: Went 2 nights in a row & had lunch. Food was good. Drinks are reasonably priced and heavy pours. Fun crowd of locals and tourists. Fun live music day & night

headline: Fun Stop!
content: Everyone knows about Sloppy Joe's and it is a bit of a KW tourist trap. However, it is a fun place to stop in and experience. On my past trip to the island, we actually stopped in for lunch and had the famous sloppy joe....More

headline: Just Don‚Äôt
content: Honestly, we have gone in before for the music and just because it‚Äôs a Key West icon and it‚Äôs been ok but it‚Äôs gets worse each time. There is no excuse for the rude service especially for the prices they charge. You have many other...More

headline: One of most popular hot spots
content: Great food, great music, on the trolley stop, a visitor hot spot.  One of the most popular stops for food and drink in Key West.  On popular Duval street.

headline: Fun stop for lunch.
content: Great place to have lunch. It was crowded but we were seated right away. Live music was fun the food was excellent and portions huge.

headline: Fun
content: Went for st Patrick‚Äôs Day. Was really crowded but still able to get drinks. We didn‚Äôt eat there but food looked like normal bar food.

headline: SOOOO GOOD!
content: We got a table by the open windows, and the weather was beautiful. Service was good, the sloppy joe was amazing! Also, the best rum runner I had on the island!

headline: Fun Family Joint
content: We didn't know where to eat for lunch and decided on Sloppy Joe's.  Fun atmosphere and good food!  What more could you want!

headline: Iconic Must Do Bar Visit
content: Sloppy Joes is a fun bar and it‚Äôs one of those must do on the vacation must do‚Äôs while in Key West type of things. It‚Äôs a great place to sit and grab a drink to start your night or end your evening.

headline: Fun Place To Visit
content: Great music, atmosphere, average food and cold beer. Not a must see but in Key West it‚Äôs the place to go.

headline: Excellent
content: We went there after learning the history and Sloppy Joes didn't disappoint. The place was packed and I see why. Excellent service, the food tasted like it was made from scratch, & it gives a Great Cuban Vibe.

headline: fun place
content: A great place anytime of Day 7 days a week. The pizza for 1 is really good and so are the burgers.music music and more music.

headline: Everything that is Duval St
content: Ate at Sloppy Joes and liked the atmosphere.  Live music open doors to Duval St.  and good food.  The Philly steak sandwich melted in my mouth.  The sloppy joes were good but not the best we had.  The music was playing and you quickly put...More

headline: It's a Key West tradition great vibe.
content: So great bar and food plus everyone in place wants to have fun pretty much equels a good time. If you like that kind of math, welcome to Sloppy Joe's.

headline: Great Fun
content: Nine of us went to Sloppy Joe's for lunch on a Sunday. Other than being too crowded, everything else was very good. The place opened at 12:00 noon; and we waited outside from 11:45. Once inside, we found four tables to push together; and the...More

headline: Lunch
content: Stopped in for lunch after walking Duval Street. Very busy...you seat yourself and they are literally seating as others leave. Food was good, your typical bar food place, live music was a plus. Our waiter was busy that he hardly attended us. We asked for...More

headline: Iconic
content: No trip would be complete without a stop here. The signature sandwich (Sloppy Joe) is always good, and the fries are always hot. It's a little noisy inside, but if the weather is nice, and it usually is, there's a small back porch with a...More

headline: No trip complete to Key West without eating at Sloppy Joe's
content: The atmosphere is authentic Key West- relaxed, casual, and welcoming.  I got the sloppy joe and it was great!  Although the place is always busy, there is plenty of seating and the wait has never been long when I have been there.  Great music and...More

headline: It was PACKED!
content: We had to sit at the bar, food was ok, but the guy singing was SUPER loud. It was fine we went on recommendation of a friend.

headline: Not What We Had Hoped For
content:
Stopped in before lunch and it was already crowded and noisy.

Really not what we had anticipated but at least we can say we saw it.

headline: Dinner and Music
content: Sloppy Joe was great. Drinks and service were great. Music not so much. Visited several times. Singing was not appealing. A dj would be better

headline: Worth a stop
content: The food was good and the service attentive. We had nachos, sloppy joes, cheese fries, and a turkey wrap. Pizza was meh. We were there at lunch and it was very busy - but food was still served reasonably fast.

headline: Always music
content: Always seems to be music going on.  Nice place to visit, but is usually quite crowded.  Also has food to offer

headline: Must Go
content: Just go check it out.  It's a "landmark". Didn't eat here but it's a fun place to check out!  I have hear the food is good and they are known for their sloppy Joe's (makes sense, right?)

headline: Tourist attraction.
content: It is a tourist attraction for sure, but one that nearly everyone has to make a stop at just to say "you've been there".  So join the crowd.   Good place but not worth spending a lot of time at.

headline: Great Atmosphere
content: I was hungry for a light lunch. So, we decided to stop and get a Sloppy Joe. There was live music and the place was packed in the middle of the afternoon. The food was good. The open air atmosphere was great! It confirmed that...More

headline: Not my favorite spot for lunch in Key West
content: Maybe in the evening. For lunch we went for the famous Sloppy Joe sandwich. It was in my opinion severely lacking. I can see where later in the afternoon or evening with the music and alcohol this could be a fun place. Not impressed with...More

headline: Sloppy Joes
content: Good food, great drinks and an awesome staff, very good entertainment at all hours, nice gift shop. A true tradition in Key West.

headline: Great fun
content: Buy a cocktail, enjoy the live entertainment and have fun. If you started out being in a bad mood, it won't last for long.

headline: Tap Room for a beer.
content:
The Tap Room as opposed to the main bar, which can be busy and noisy is a haven for beer drinkers. We visited three times during our week in Key West, each time we were welcomed by a sociable and knowledgable bartender.
In our view...More

headline: What's Not To Love??
content: Great live music on the weekends.  Friendly service and local conversation.  A must-see if you are in Key West!!

headline: LOVE Sloppy Joe's
content: If you are looking for really good food, great bands and a fun atmosphere, Sloppy Joe's is your bar.  Wouldn't go to Key West without going here.  The drinks are a good pour and the bartenders are awesome.

headline: OK food - liked the band - would not consider this a must do
content: This place was packed and loud.  I had been told it was a must do for the area, an icon bar/restaurant where the sloppy joe sandwich was invented.  Fortunately, right when we came in we saw one open table that was well located and had...More

headline: An institution...
content: Came to Key West for the first time last weekend and was told that Sloppy Joe's was a must-see.  Personally I find a "sloppy joe" sandwich a little weird to eat in Key West but when in Rome.  It was packed but we found a...More

headline: I must live in a different world...
content: I do not get it. A very popular place with overpriced so-so food and beverage. Since I hadn't had a Sloppy Joe past childhood, what the heck, I went for it. Frankly it was not that good. My server was very busy so seemed a...More

headline: Great Bar
content: We were drawn into the bar as it was rather warm outside and it had been at least 150m since our last beer. Once inside we discovered that most of the passengers on our cruise ship and the other one in port had had the...More

headline: Lively Place
content: Lively place with great live music. We had good nachos and good service. It has three bars and is very spacious.

headline: Fun place to eat
content: Sloppy Joes is fun, relaxed place to eat. Windows were open and had live music when we were there for lunch. Good selection of drinks and good food. We shared conch fritters for appetizers and ha crab cake sandwich and peel and eat shrimp for...More

headline: Sloppy Joes stays true it's name
content: Simply the history of the restaurant made us want to try it.  The Sloppy Joe is a good description of the sandwich.  We also had the pulled pork and that good as well.. The sandwiches at $12 are maybe a bit overpriced but who cares---...More

headline: Crowded, but nice staff
content: We had to visit Sloppy Joe's of legend fame. The drinks were great, the servers were terrific even though they were run off their feet. Very crowded and busy with a mix of serving drinks and food orders. It was noisy and the place had...More

headline: Entertaining
content: Good entertainment, gets crowded and hard to get a seat but if your patient you will get one. Not bad priced for beers. Staff is good they work hard people are lined up all the time wanting drinks. Food was ok, my wife ordered roast...More

headline: Cruise Destination
content: We had a short visit to the Keys on a cruise ship. Did the hop on hop off trip around the Island, but, found out most things are really a short walking distance. We do have to go to Sloppy Joe's for lunch and a...More

headline: Key West fun
content: Touristy but live music, cold beer and reasonable food make Sloppy Joe's worth a visit. We had chili, burgers and fish sandwich. All were fine for the price. The live music was good and service was good too. We did see a very drunk patron...More

headline: Gotta have a beer here!
content: This is The Sloppy Joes at Key West. Hemingway legend. Its not pretty, just a bar, but what a history!  Stop in for a beer.

headline: Fun time
content: Eight of us visited Key West this last week and really enjoyed the town.  Sloppy Joe's is a great place to visit and eat.  They have  great menu and great entertainment while eating.  I always look forward to visiting Key West and Sloppy Joe's.

headline: Great Place for Drinks!
content: Stopped in for drinks while walking around Key West on a cruise ship stop.  I had their Sloppy Rita and she had the ever elusive Kendall-Jackson Chardonnay!  She is always delighted to get that wine and the margarita was outstanding!

headline: Gimmicky
content: We stopped by the famous Sloppy Joes during our three day trip to Key West. Think every gimmicky Florida type tourist trap bar and this is it! You do not have to travel to key West for this.. The staff behind the bar was not...More

headline: Lunch time fun
content: We went to Sloppy Joes for lunch. Great atmosphere, live music (60's, 70's my generation) and our waitress was exceptional.  I couldn't stop smiling because I was in an adult daycare.  Some of us had a few tropical drinks.  Yummy good. I ordered a Sloppy...More

headline: Fun music, food better than expected
content: We went to Sloppy Joes around 5:30 for music, drinks, and an early bite.  Atmosphere and music was great.  Totally fun environment.  Got a table easily and ordered drinks and food.  Frozen drinks were excellent and the draft beer selection was good and cold.  We...More

headline: About time we got to the Key West tradition!
content: Stopped in for cocktails and a snack.  Very crowded.  A bit noisy but we could hear performer on stage.  Didn't seem to have any hurricane damage.  Many places seem to have recovered and repaired.

headline: Delicious lunch and good atmosphere.
content: It was perfect lunch with beer! Pizza and clab cake sandwich were delicious:) Pizza with cheese and Boneless wings are good for my kid.

headline: Good bar food
content: My wife and I stopped here for lunch. We sat at the bar. We looked through the menu and ordered appetizers and a lunch. The margarita twist with club soda was interesting. The pretzels and quesadilla was really good. The service was ok. There was...More

headline: Must See
content: First time in Key West and heard about this place for years from friends that have been there. Drinks were excellent. The staff is friendly and professional. Enjoyed the music. It does get really crowded and loud. Overall, great time.

headline: Fun times
content: Great place for drinks and great bands and entertainment ! Wait staff great very friendly! Fun time with friends and family!

headline: A staple
content: Been there done that.. Really loud, but good music and never ate there. It is kinda dirty crowed and it seem so not have the place I want to send a day.. Much rather see the water. But I don't hate it..

headline: Drinks
content: Went there for drinks and nostalgia place to see in Key West,,,, was ok been here before don‚Äôt need to go back

headline: dinner
content: Delicious, speedy and polite service and enjoyable atmosphere.  A bit loud but, that was expected.  We definitely would visit again.

headline: hemingway bar
content: always tourist and very lively. live music most of the time. friendly staff. big dance floor. one of ernest heimway's old haunts.

headline: nice stop ,good tunes..........
content: stopped a couple times on the visit . always good tunes , picked up some clothing for the p.i.b. week and  looks good..bobbie was very helpful..

headline: Cool Well Known Bar
content: We stopped at Sloppy Joes during our recent vacation to the Keys. This is a typical bar that everyone makes it a point to check out. You‚Äôll be satisfied with the typical bar fare.

headline: Fun
content: This is a must see stop for first time visitors. Bar food, great drinks, good music. Lots of fun all around.

headline: Great entertainment
content: Pete and Wayne were on stage and didn‚Äôt want to miss that.  They are great adult entertainment.  Had to have a sloppy joe...it‚Äôs the name of the placeüò¨. Enjoyed the sandwich and show.

headline: Overrated
content: Went with friends who live this place. Combination of music and Pub atmosphere. We went early around 4:30 in order to get a decent seat and so we ended up in second row, right out front of the band.  The music was too loud for...More

headline: Good food, good music, and great service
content: Went there for the sloppy joes, amazing.  The service was top notch.  The mixed drinks were also quite good.  The music was simply a bonus.

headline: The original is best
content: Great visit with great food of conch fritters and sloppy fries, love music. Its seat yourself so be prepared to wait is busy, but staff fun and quick. Easy to kindergartens why papa Hemingway love this place.

headline: Awesome Atmosphere!
content: I'm not a big party person but this place is the place to be in Key West! You can grab a drink, a bite to eat, and listen to live music on the stage. You can also shop in their souvenir store connected to the...More

headline: The Famous Bar
content: Sloppy Joe's is one of Key West's most famous bars. It was Ernest Hemmingway's favorite joint. It's a big open warehouse type place. It was crowded on the Saturday in January we were there.  Our server was nice,  friendly and efficient.  We had a cheese...More

headline: Loud and fun
content: Alot of laughter with fun bar staff. Singers, musicians and great for a group offering. Will be loud there though, just a warning if you don't like crowds.

headline: Great fish sandwich
content: The fish sandwich was great, the drinks were good, you have to try the rum runner and all this while listening to a singer playing 70s and 80s hits.

headline: Fun times!
content: Sloppy Joe‚Äôs is the place for good food, great bands, & all around fantastic nightlife!  You gotta visit Sloppy Joe‚Äôs when in Key West!

headline: Just Average
content: Great music.  Fun guitar duo.  We stopped here for lunch.  Sent the Conch Chowder back, we were expecting cream based chowder, not tomato based.  The Philly Cheese steak sandwich was very good.   The Mojito was not good.  Too sour.  I added Splenda to make it...More

headline: Key West tradition-Sloppy Joe's
content: Sloppy Joe's is the best known bar in Key West. Music of some sort playing all the time. Great place to grab a drink along with lots of others! It gets pretty crazy on the weekends with dancing and fun.

headline: Fun place
content: We stopped in here just for a beer. It is quite a large place & has a stage - so we imagine there are bands during the evening hours. We sat at the bar & had a nice time people watching.

headline: A pretty great time
content: We went wandering Rival street one night, and got sucked in to Sloppy Joe's to listen to the music. Every night we went by we paused to hear it, eventually we decided to actually go in and order a drink. We got a seat right...More

headline: Good Timeüé∂
content: Enjoyed SJs towards the end of our night. You can‚Äôt beat live music and plenty of room to dance. It was on a Sunday night and wasn‚Äôt crowded at all. Even participated in the ‚Äúgames‚Äù on stage. Big bar and plenty of tables for large...More

headline: Fun at Sloppy's.  Always a great place!
content: We go to Sloppy Joe's every time we're in Key West.  I ordered the Greek Salad.  OMG was that ever good....and HUGE.  Best one I ever had.

headline: Interesting Night Out
content: We enjoyed the food, the restaurant is interesting to see. We were going to stop for lunch when we drove through town, but the parking is very difficult to find. So we checked into our hotel and took a shuttle to Duval St. Live music...More

headline: Fun
content: Very fun atmosphere. Live music at noon. Great drinks, bartender was friendly and fast. Lots of beers to choose from.

headline: Make it a stop but the band matters
content: Sloppy Joe‚Äôs is fun and famous. They pour strong drinks which is great but we feel the band makes the experience. We have been with bands that people don‚Äôt really get into and it makes for a more subdued evening. We have been with great...More

headline: Dime a Dozen
content: It's definitely a party atmosphere.  Good beers, decent food, and it's always packed.  If you've been to any tropical resort area , you'll find bars like these.   It's a nice mix of locals and tourists.   The music is loud and the service is average.  If...More

headline: GOOD FOOD
content: Been to Key West many times and never visited Sloppy Joe‚Äôs, always to crowded but this time, it was on my bucket list. GREAT PLACE!!!! Good service, drinks, food and entertainment. Of course I got a Sloppy Joe even though I don‚Äôt do red meat,,,...More

headline: Beer and bar food
content: Great stop for a cold beer, some bar food and music.   Waitress was quick and helpful.  Sloppy joes fries were amazing!

headline: Good experience of first sloppy joe
content:
After never having a sloppy joe we decided to pay a visit. Not that we have anything to compare to, we weren‚Äôt disappointed. Portions were huge and the taste of the sloppy joe burger and fries were great. 

The music and atmosphere in the restaurant...More

headline: Nothing Special
content: A tourist hangout with a bar and restaurant. The food is average Key West bar food/seafood with no major surprises. The service can be VERY slow if there is a cruise ship in port. Nothing truly special here--close your eyes and you could be at...More

headline: Loud music and like a campus bar
content: If you are in college you may really like this place.  It was early afternoon and the music was so loud we could hardly hear each other.  The price is good if you can stand the loud music.  It is worth at least seeing it....More

headline: Good Service, Bad Cooks
content: We ordered blackened shrimp tacos, and they sent them out breaded. We sent the back and they just put the blackened seasoning on the breaded shrimp. They ended up giving us it for free and 20% off our bill.

headline: Yummy!
content: Good sized menu with different options. Pretty reasonably priced, tasty food and drinks! Fast and friendly service. They had live music, which was enjoyable and not obtrusive. Would definitely go back!

headline: FUN!
content: I was very excited to eat at the famous Sloppy Joe's during our stay in Key West. The band, staff, and vibe of the place were all great! The people watching is amazing!!! The food definitely was meh. We'd probably go back, but only for...More

headline: Lively place!
content: Fun and friendly rowdy bar! Great music and fantastic simple food! The burgers were delicious.The atmosphere of the place is fun and everyone was having a great time singing along with the live band. We actually seen a family band that moved from our own...More

headline: Lunch with friends
content:
Sloppy Joe‚Äôs is a landmark in key west
They have great music  good drinks
Try the key west lemonade 
Sloppy joe was delicious
Shrimp Po Boy was good 
And the fish tacos were yummy

headline: Great place fore lunch!
content: Had a great lunch, served by the bartender, he manages his time well! Great service, food was delicious, would definitely visit again.

headline: Fun and delish
content: Fun touristy place with history and live music. Had to get a sloppy joe and it was yummy. Burger was good. Service was fine.

headline: Have a try!!!
content: This bar i visited several times already.When is no cruise ship in the port easy to get a lunch or drink.Otherwise..step in line please!!Bar has a good menu,sometimes live music and always full bar.Do not forget a pixtures...and t-shirt as a proof that you have...More

headline: Nice but more of an attraction with bar food
content: Ok, this is a bar with food and live entertainment, gee same as much of Key West‚Äôs restaurants.  There is some neatness with a few things but honestly it bar food and nice but nothing outstanding.  If you‚Äôre going here it‚Äôs either for the live...More

headline: The Party Starts here !!!!
content: The staple spot for party #1 on Duval. Get a drink and have fun !!! Crinks can be a little pricey but hey? Your on vacation !!!!

headline: PAPA HEMINGWAY WOULD SAY "NYET!"
content: Right in the commercial heart of Duval Street,near Mallory Square and the ocean/bay. It still thrives by its Hemingway association, but Papa would not be pleased. The eponymous "Sloppy Joe" sandwich,sad to say,is a gloopy mess reminiscent of Chef Boyardee meat sauce out of a...More

headline: You have got to visit this place
content: Visited Key west while cruising with celebrity cruises, this vibrant  port has many varied types of eateries and sights to see but a visit to sloppy joes is a must, from ice cold beers to key lime pie and fantastic entertainment, pop in and have...More

headline: Absolutely fun crazy
content: We've heard so much about this famous bar, we just had to visit it and soak up the atmosphere , so we did!! We had a fabulous time,  live music , cold beers, we didn't want to leave! ! Well worth a stopover and enjoy...More

headline: Generic bar food, nothing special. Expected fresh ingredients in a fish sandwich
content: Considering the highly competitive restaurant market in Key West, Sloppy Joe's was a total disappointment. Heavily breaded frozen fish fillet, waxy cheese, canned mushrooms & mushy red peppers, raw onion all lost in a big bun. Ala Carte. Woopie! $15.95. All meals served at our...More

headline: Popular Bar
content: Hemingway hung out here years ago.  Well, that seems to be bringing in a lot of people today.  Food is fair, expensive and the restaurant is loud.  There is decent music to enjoy however.

headline: Hang out spot
content: Had fish tacos and cheese fries both were excellent but the cheese fries was more than I needed they are huge! I also had one of the house beers different and worth a try if your into local beers. They had live music which added...More

headline: Hemmingway's Bar of Choice, Maybe
content: Sloppy Joe‚Äôs is touted as Ernest Hemmingway‚Äôs ‚Äúdrinking place of choice‚Äù. Actually, there are two ‚Äúdrinking places of choice‚Äù, the other just a block away, and relocated only because of a local tax issue. Well, when in Key West you have to visit Slopping Joe‚Äôs...More

headline: Great Party
content: Came here after dinner and drinks at another place. Came in here for the live music and party.  We had a blast singing until the wee hours of the morning. A staple stop while in Key West.

headline: Great place to hang out and have a burger
content: Fun place to listen to music and have a great burger.  Good atmosphere and they usually have good performers

headline: Fun pub to have a drink!
content: Located right in the heart of Duval Street, it is a very trendy hip place to sip a drink and people watch on Duval street. The music was good too!

headline: So much fun
content: Sloppy joes is a must in key west!! Such good vibes and great food and drinks. The infamous sloppy joe is huge and yummy comfort food!

headline: Great Nacho Spot
content: After a ride on the Conch Train we wanting eats and a Margarita.  Sloppy Joe's had both.We had the Nachos with the chili based on the recommendation of our server and she was correct.  The Margaritas were good and the nachos were spicy.  The fellow...More

headline: Shouldve named it Salty Joes
content: The sloppy joes here were salty and pretty nasty. The house band was great and the drinks were strong but sheesh.....at least make sure that the item that youre named for is edible. Manwich out of a can is much better. That should tell you...More

headline: Gotta Do It
content: Stopped in for a drink.  Drinks were ok, but not different than any other bar in the U.S.  The bartender was friendly and got to talking to him a bit.  That was pretty nice considering how busy it was.  Forgot his name, but his family...More

headline: Sloppy Joes - Loved it!
content: The restaurant lived up to it‚Äôs reputation. Went with my wife and children - three teenagers and an 8 year old. We went early (4:30ish) so we could get to Mallory Square with time to check out street performers and poke around before the sun...More

headline: Good Atmosphere
content: My husband and I had lunch and drinks here and the food was good. My husband had a pulled pork sandwich and he said it was the best one he'd ever had! The atmosphere was a lot of fun with live entertainment. I did think...More

headline: Fun !
content:
Year after year a fun place to visit .
Great music.
 We do not care too much for the plastic cups they serve the drinks in. 
But we still enjoyed our visit.

headline: Beverly was great
content: Good drinks. Great atmosphere but our bartender is definitely what set this place apart. She was witty and fun but also very helpful. Highly recommend.

headline: Rockin place at night!
content: We didn't eat here, but had several drinks and listened to the live bands! The entertainment was very good and different each night during our visit. Definitely worth the stop while you're on Duval St.

headline: Go for the history
content: This is one of the larger bars in Key West. It can be pretty crowded. The history is very interesting. You should check it out if in Key West

headline: Great
content: Very nice bar women, good vibe, great music, and singers with live music . nice place and atmosphere best place in the key west

headline: Fun bar with good food!
content: We enjoyed our time at Sloppy Joe's, especially the Pete and Wayne show on Thursday and Friday nights. This famous bar has a nice selection of sandwiches and appetizers and a menu of specialty drinks. If you visit Key West, you must stop in at...More

headline: Fun Place
content: A famous place probably coasting on its reputation for live music and fun, which it has in abundance.  Food is average. Good place for drinks and people watching.

headline: Music and Drinks Galore
content: They have a popular gift shop and seems busy mot of the time. A good place for a drink and the staff is friendly and helpful.

headline: An Iconic Key West Tradition
content: A trip to Sloppy Joes is all about the experience, not the food or drinks. It is a party, whenever it is open! The doors are open to the street and their is a camera inside the bar and out front that is linked to...More

headline: Tourist thing you must do.
content:
Go here and have a drink and a sloppy Joe sandwich.  it's not great but you need to do this in Key West.
It's a hub of activity on a busy corner and it's right where you want to be.
  Evening entertainment the night we...More

headline: Great bar..and nightclub
content: Great bar atmosphere up until 8pm...and then,..when the sun goes down..the party and club atmosphere begins...dance away till the early hours with a great vibe and modern dance/club music. Most patrons are under 40 years old....but having said that...if you can dance,...you will fit right...More

headline: Loving some sloppy joes
content: Great atmosphere! Starts early in the morning and goes to the wee hours of the next day. Good music good food great bartenders! Always a great time!

headline: Good times
content: The food is not great but average. Besides no one goes for the food anyways. It's just fun to drink, people watch, and enjoy a decent live band. Staff was very friendly too!

headline: You haven't seen Key West if you haven't been to Sloppy Joe's
content: Very possibly the most famous bar/restaurant in Key West. Established in 1933 the day prohibition was repealed and has been located on the corner of Greene and Duval Street since 1937. A favorite of Hemingway. Snacks, sandwiches, salads, desserts, beer, wine and cocktails. Live music....More

headline: Beer & food
content:
Had some nice bar food and a few beers there  at lunch time today, Bar was busy, with some nice live music. 
Fish & chips were real good as was my wifes chicken wings. All was reasonably priced. 
Denise , the irish barman was fantastic,...More

headline: Loud Music and Souvenirs, too
content: Nice, lively spot to get into the swing of things along Duval Street!! The crowd is festive and the music is loud--not the best spot for families with small children but it fits most others to a "T"!!

headline: Sloppy Joe‚Äôs
content:
Sloppy Joe‚Äôs bar on Duval
In key West is one of the busiest and most fun bars. It‚Äôs a great spot to spend some time with a drink listening to live music.

headline: Yum!
content: We visited Sloppy Joe's twice during our recent trip to Key West. The service was fast and friendly despite being a very crowded place. The sloppy joe's were delicious. Lively, fun atmosphere.

headline: Not just a bar but Hemingway's bar of choice!
content: Basically, it's a bar with stiff drinks and decent service.  The flatbread pizza was good and I hear the sloppy joe is excellent.  They have a wall dedicated to Ernest Hemingway.  Good live music.  One thing I found funny was the herd of mopeds sitting...More

headline: Party TIme
content: If you want a party time and loud music this is the place for  you. Try a Sloppy Joe pulled pork sandwich and a Key West  Sunshine red ale and you'll never want to leave.

headline: A Must Stop
content: Sloppy Joe lover or not, this is a place to see.  Fun, full of energy and music throughout the day.  Every time we come to Key West we make sure to have lunch at least once at Sloppy Joe's.

headline: Can‚Äôt beat a great sloppy joe
content: The place is just a bar...but I love the sloppy joes! I get one every time we visit! They typically have fun music during the days as well as evenings. Get there early to get a seat!

headline: Attentive bartenders
content: Fun place, live bands, we were impressed with the female bartenders who kept an eye on things and were efficiently friendly.

headline: Atmosphere as great as Hemingway
content: What did we eat you ask? Well, a Sloppy Joe of course. It was very good, it was hot, and it was fast service. The Conch Fritters are pretty darn good too.Just the atmosphere made them even better, not to mention the very good, very...More

headline: Famous tourist trap on Duval.
content: A must see, but after a few times its more of the routine. People in the evenings get way too silly for me, so I leave before the night crowd settles in.

headline: Great Souvenirs To Take Home
content: Famous location on Duval Street that many tourists go to when in Key West.  Was fairly busy when we were there since there were several cruise ships in port..  Historic place because Hemmingway frequented here.  Gift shop had a lot of nice items and shirts...More

headline: Great bands, fair food, good drinks
content: If you're here for a fine dining, you're in the wrong place. Grab a Key West Lemonade at the bar and enjoy one of the best bars in town.  Order a flat bread if you need a snack but don't use your credit card, pay...More

headline: Great Music
content: Stopped in for a "few" cocktails and to listen to the live music.  Great place.  Lots of history here and was a haunt for Hemingway and many other "famous" folks.

headline: Great atmosphere and food
content: My husband and I went to the famous Sloppy Joe's for drinks and appetizers.  The margarita was strong, but good, and the wings were great!  The service is fast and efficient.

headline: Average food
content: first time there.  it was OK.  I ordered a sandwich - doesn't come with fries or anything so if you're hungry it will cost you more.  BBQ sauce was good but value for the dollar wasn't.  won't go there again

headline: Come for any reason, except tv sports.
content:
Great photos of Papa and a fun place.
Food good enough, no band when we were there, sure it's kicking when there is.
Maybe owners intentionally have subpar tv presence, it's all about EH,  right?

headline: Fun and Lively
content: No visit to Key West is complete without a visit to Sloppy Joe's.  Always lively, a tourist trap to be sure, but one with great drinks.

headline: Sloppy Joe's special
content: Enjoyed a beer and entertainment.  Shorty and his band were great.  Not smokey which is an exception in Key West.

headline: Great visit with Friends
content: Stopped in with friends for a drink. Fun place, live music. Great service, good drinks. Had just gone to Ernest Hemingways home so had to check out where he liked to hang out

headline: Fantastic place
content: We visit Sloppy Joes every time we go to Key West. Staff is great and so is the food! And the drinks are pretty good too!! Can‚Äôt wait til our next visit.

headline: Great Entertainment and Iconic Landmark
content:
Sloppy Joes had a great band and comic entertainers throughout the night! Kept us laughing all nite! They also offered food, we had Conch fritters and they were served fresh n hot. 
The waitstaff was very attentive and courteous. Adult venue, Definitely not appropriate for...More

headline: Great food and outstanding entertainment!
content:
Had lunch at Sloppy Joe's with a party of 6. Everyone loved their meal. 
 Great singer at lunch. Enjoyed so much we went back for the band at night....which totally rocked! Loved this place!

headline: Great place!!
content: Great atmosphere, good food, good bands, what more can you ask for? Drinks...beer's cold and the Sloppy Ritas are awesome! Frozen Rum Runners too! Beat the heat!

headline: Awesome place
content: Went there because my new wife is a huge Nick Carter fan and she thought he was arrested there last year. Anyway, Rom, the bartender, set us up with a special version of a Key West lemonade. Excellent. Wife found out they had mango rum...More

headline: Lite lunch
content: Great service. Their Key Lime Pie was excellent! We got to see ourselves on the roving camera as well as a friend from out of state who could tune in to the view. Very laid back environment.

headline: Cool place but only had appetizers
content: The place was good because of the music and great to hang out but only had appetizers but they were good. Place is usually crowded but to be expected but you have to have a beer there.

headline: Always a great time
content: Always a great party atmosphere. Friendly service. Good music. We spent several nights enjoying the scene.   We will

headline: Ok
content: It‚Äôs ok. They have great drinks, pricey but that‚Äôs key west.... wasn‚Äôt anything on the menu I was really interested in seems like mostly bar food. Just went for one drink, because of the popularity of the name.

headline: A Guilty Pleasure
content: I hate to admit it, but I love Sloppy's and have since I was a teenager. I know it is the most touristy of the tourist traps, but Hemmingway really did hang out there, and the pictures and paraphanelia on the wall are real. I...More

headline: Yummy pina colada
content: We stopped by around 11ish during the week. I had a pina colada and it was delicious, the bartender was very friendly.

headline: Ernest Hemmingway's old hangout
content: Hemmingway used to spend lots of time here, drinking and telling stories. It is definatelty a fun place.  They have live music most nights, and a great selection of drinks at the bar.

headline: Quick Appetizer Stop
content: We stopped here on a self-designed pub crawl. We had wings and mozzerella sticks in addition to drinks. It was busy but we were able to find a table without any issues. Service was pretty fast.

headline: Love this bar!
content: Always a favorite stop while in Key West!  Music is always good and the bartenders are friendly and fun !

headline: We love Lou
content: Best bartender in KeyWest!!!!!! The food okay, nothing special, prices are high, but we still stop to see Lou, he is the best. Wouldn‚Äôt even bother otherwise.

headline: Historic but not memorable
content: Bar and restaurant where Hemingway hung out...but there are better places to eat and drink in town.  Depends on why you are there...  I wanted to see it once...that was enough.

headline: Great place with live music and a good vibe
content:
You've got to go and enjoy this place and have a cool beverage. We went before the main band came in at 10, so it wasn't too crowded. The warm up band was terrific and we all had a lot of laughs.
The waitstaff is...More

headline: Cheers to Hemingway
content: Stoped here after our visit to Hemingway museum.  Big, loud,and fun place. .very friendly service. Try smoked fish dip with crackers.

headline: Ok
content: Everything was very salty-I‚Äôm sure that helps with drink sales. Prices were ok, food was ok, singer/ guitar player was pretty good. Appreciated the military discount discount.

headline: Always a fun stop
content: Gotta stop here at least once on every trip to Key West.  Everyones meals and drinks were very well prepared and our server was attentive.  It is a must do on the next trip down to the keys!

headline: Hemingway‚Äôs Favourite Watering Hole
content: No stroll down Duval Street would be complete without stopping in at Sloppy Joes, which years ago was a favoured drinking spot of the legendary author Ernest Hemming.  Stop for an ice cold pint of beer or have a bite to eat. In the evenings...More

headline: Just plain fun
content: Great band, great food and generous drinks. Don't miss the fun that this place offers. Generally crowded but for good reason.

headline: Bad Service
content: We come here every Monday and usually get great service. Tonight, after the usual excellent service from Jenny we ended up with Jesse, a pushy jerk whose only objective was to fill his tables with tourists who would make him money. We were forced to...More

headline: Dining
content: We stopped to have lunch here recently. We had noted that it is very popular. We arrived just after noon. Very busy. It is "seat yourself". Fortunately we found to seats at the bar. The wait staff is very friendly. My wife had the Conch...More

headline: Fun bar. Cool atmosphere.
content: This bar seemed to have the potential to be really good but most of the bands were not great. We were in Key West for 6 days and kept going back hoping it would get better. Unfortunately it didn‚Äôt while we were there.

headline: Sloppy Saturday
content: My husband and I were visiting Key West and heard that Sloppy Joe‚Äôs was a great place to visit. We stopped in and found a table around noon on a Saturday. The service was great. He had a sloppy joe sandwich and a I had...More

headline: Classic Key West
content: A trip to Sloppy Joe‚Äôs is always a must when we are able to visit! We absolutely love the atmosphere, bartenders, live music, drinks and Sloppy Joe‚Äôs! Definitely more fun once the cruise crowds exit and all the locals come out! Our favorite bar at...More

headline: tourist mecca
content: Sloppy Joe's is a tourist mecca, but I knew that in advance. The drinks were adequate, the food was okay, the prices were good for this type of place. The bartender was top flight--and the customers tipped her generously. I wanted to cross this off...More

headline: Trading too much on their "history"
content: So, yeah, Sloppy Joe's has been there forever; Jimmy Buffet drank there and so did Hemingway. If you want to check this one off your bucket list, by all means go in for a drink. We didn't eat anything, as the place was packed with...More

headline: A Key West Landmark
content: This is one of those places that you must visit when in Key West.  Right on Duval Street in the middle of all the action, it‚Äôs a great spot for people watching.  You can‚Äôt go wrong with the Sloppy Joe sandwich.

headline: Glad we checked it out!
content: The drinks were good, entertainment was fun and the chicken Alfredo pizza was fair.  It‚Äôs all part of the Key West experience and, as learned on our trolley tour, this was not the first location.  What a fun story!

headline: Great place.
content: Great place to hang out at night. Live music. Lots of drink choices. Excellent people watching. Good service!

headline: Where the Cruise Ship People Go
content: Packed with tourists, we had a beer just to say we were there, like just about everyone else in the place. Live music was ok, just not the kind of place I‚Äôd hang out in. Hemingway‚Äôs hangout? Probably, the guy was an alcoholic- couldn‚Äôt go...More

headline: Fun place
content: Ok so I used to love this place but I guess I‚Äôm getting old lol.  Good live music, too crowded for my taste and my Landshark draft beer was bad.  The waitress was kind enough to exchange it for me for a draft beer from...More

headline: Great margaritas
content: The food was delicious but pricey, but everything is in Key West. You pay for products being shipped clear down there. What a cool laid-back place. I know why Hemingway liked it.

headline: Adult vacation
content: This is a busy place even in middle of day. Live entertainment was great. Food was good . Waitress was very good with great service.

headline: Sloppy Joes far too noisy
content: Sorry, I am not a killjoy and I know this is a world famous pub but it was so noisy with very loud live music we didn‚Äôt stay. Not only was the live music too loud, many of the patrons were too!

headline: Will be back
content: Most people like certain foods a certain way and that way only.  That is the way it was for me and their signature sloppy joe meal, just so-so. Next time I will try something else.  As for everything else,  I loved the atmosphere and music....More

headline: Proper spit and sawdust bar
content: We enjoyed a couple of pints here and had a good time. We liked the live bands and the atmosphere was great. Heard it was a must to visit and glad we did.

headline: Great people, mediocre food
content: When in Key West, Sloppy Joes is a must visit. That being said, don‚Äôt expect too much from the food.  Drinks are ok and the people are very nice.  The staff is what makes this place worth the visit. And of course the location. Good...More

headline: Music and Drinks
content: Had some drinks at this KW landmark. Pretty crowded but our waiter never missed a step. Great guitarist/singer. Will visit again when we can enjoy the bands at night.

headline: great atmosphere
content: food was okay not great, it's a landmark and a good time so I recommend everyone at least go once, friendly staff

headline: Great sandwich; great vibe
content: Our sloppy joe sandwich was perfection and a welcome change from the seafood we have eaten every other meal since we arrived. It was generous in size and in bread-to-filling ratio.  The Margarita and mojito were both terrific, made to order, and with care. We...More

headline: Iconic, Historical, Fun
content: This rustic place takes you back a 100 years but fast forwards to good food, fun times, great atmosphere at all hours of the day. Check it out with there video feed online.

headline: Bar Crawl
content: This was the second stop on our Key West Bar Crawl. We wanted to stop at each bar and have one drink but the music was so good here we stayed for quite a few and didn't leave until the band took a break. Went...More

headline: Nice watering hole
content: Honestly, if this place DIDN‚ÄôT have the Hemingway connection - I‚Äôd never have come and wouldn‚Äôt come back. There‚Äôs nothing wrong with it, it‚Äôs just that without the history it‚Äôs just a big, rowdy tourist bar, which isn‚Äôt my kind of place. It‚Äôs huge, crowded...More

headline: Fun bar‚Äînot for the faint of heart
content:
So, this is KE, and sometimes people swear. At Sloppy Joe‚Äôs there is lots of it. IF Pete and Wayne are there, it is pretty strong. It is really very funny, but also very adult. 

I have heard other performers there that are much more...More

headline: Pop in for music and a drink
content: Large high ceilings, varnished wood and plastic cups set the tone for this southern roadhouse type bar. Decent drink prices if you are ordering rum go local!

headline: Do it at least once
content: This is a landmark in Key West, and a neat place.  Very raucous and loud, fun experience, but not a place I'd go every evening, for sure.

headline: Excellent!!
content: We ate here while touring the Keys as it is almost a historical registry point. It was VERY crowded and noisy but to be expected. The service was good and the food was excellent. Prices were also very reasonable. Would definitely eat here again!!! Lots...More

headline: Just walking by.
content: Been in Key West like 10 times in the past 15 years. We stop for 1 drink in this supposedly famous place. Which is very dirty. So would not eat anything there.

headline: Delicious sloppy joe sandwich and a Speakeasy Punch
content: Outstanding service. My server came back within minutes of me giving her my order. The sloppy joe was outstanding. Delicious. Of course, I cut it with a fork and knife, so I don't get messy. The Speakeasy Punch tastes similar to a Bahama Mama. They...More

headline: Okay - it's a must!
content: It's a bar - in a great location - with lots and lots of people to watch!  You have to stop, just to say you did!!

headline: Night out
content:
This place had Great drinks, entertainment was top notch, wait staff was quick and attentive.
Fun place, easy to find.  Good appetizers.
Will definitely visit again

headline: Always fun & lively
content:
Sloppy Joe's is an iconic KW stop that seems to never change. Time stands still here.

The band was pretty good, beer always cold and it's enjoyable to just sit, relax and people watch as Sloppy Joe's brings in young & old. 

I did enjoy...More

headline: Fun, loud and what you‚Äôd expect on Duvall
content: Fun place... not really my kind of place. The band was entertaining. The sloppy joe ‚Äústuff‚Äù was really sweet for me. We tried the sloppy joe fries and wings. All just average pub food- just not my thing. And our drinks were gross. I‚Äôm picky...More

headline: crazy nights
content: Had food and too many drinks here.  Place was packed, food above average and waitress was the BEST!!  Good entertainment, not my favorite place in Key West but a really great place.

headline: Just really fun
content: The bands are the best - enjoyed just having drinks and listening to them play. The Trader Vic‚Äôs pina colada is the best ever. Great gift shop - yes you need that T shirt!

headline: Fun ambiance!
content: Mojitos were tasty and they didn't skimp on the booze! (Though I think I preferred all the options for different mojitos at Willie T's). Hemingway decor was quite fun!

headline: Recommended
content: Very busy and crowded. Tables are all the same size which made it difficult for a group of 5. On the upside: service was quick and friendly. Drinks and food were pretty good. The youngest 2 kids had pizza which easily could have been shared...More

headline: Sloppy Joes!
content: We went to have a sloppy joe at Sloppy Joes!  Ok, if you are there for the food, well, it wasn't the best.  But the music and atmosphere was pretty good!!  We listened through our meal and it was entertaining!  But I wouldn't go there...More

headline: Great place for live music
content: Really good spot for live music and entertainment in the evening . Must enjoy busy crowded places !   Did not eat here but have heard food is good as well .

headline: Must visit
content: What can I say? It‚Äôs a must visit on your trip to Key West. The atmosphere was great!! The food was awesome. I got the famous sloppy joe which was delicious!! My husband got wings which he loved!! The service was excellent even though they...More

headline: About what I expected
content: Large and open bar(s) and restaurant area with stage and live music.  We had a Sloppy Joe sandwich and buffalo chicken wrap and fries.  I thought the food was pretty standard but okay.   Singer was also passable during the early afternoon mid-week time we visited....More

headline: Loved it
content: This place is hopping. Loved the atmosphere, the music and the food. I arrived at 11:50 for lunch and got a table no problem (its seat yourself) but by the time I got my food they were full. The band was playing for lunch, which...More

headline: A must do
content: Seat yourself so could be hard to get a table.  We were fortunate. Amazing sloppy joe nachos!!  Good drinks and good service.  Great entertainment and great food!  A must do!
