headline: A fun Place
content:
We stopped in this historical restaurant one day. My husband had a sloppy Joe sandwich. He said it was the best sloppy joe sandwich. I had the teriyaki chicken wings with celery. They were delicious.

There was a guitar player singing his heart out, He...More

headline: Fun Historical Bar & Grill
content: Sloppy Joe's is a must-see when in Key West, if only for the fun atmosphere, entertainment and history.  The food is not very good, just tourist trap type fare, but it is fun for an hour or so to have a drink and an appetizer...More

headline: Cool bar
content: This is a cool place to get a drink any time of day. Offering good vibes and live music this place is a good example of what Key West is all about.

headline: This place is an institution.
content: Always come to Key West. Always come to Sloppy Joe's. This time just for drinks. I think they have the best Mojito's. Whatever bartender we have is great. We love the d√©cor, the history, the ambience of this place. Love the Live Cam out front....More

headline: Historical Hot Spot
content: Sloppy Joe‚Äôs has all the ambiance of old Key West! Ernish Hemingway flavor adds to the festive atmosphere of music, food, drinks and open floor plan.

headline: A must see
content: Everyone talks about this place so you have to go. 3-4 bars inside. Huge dining area. We tried conch fritters. The key lime sauce is amazing. Glad I tried the fritters but once was enough. Very expensive gift shop!! But yes, you must go. The...More

headline: Elevated Bar Food and Entertainment
content:
Food is reasonably priced and tastes great. Drinks are a good value and poured with zeal. The "Original Sloppy Joe" sandwich and the "Full Moon Fish Sandwich" are delicious! The staff and live entertainment provide a friendly, pleasing atmosphere.
 You should try this Key West...More

headline: great historic bar
content: key west has a few institutions in the form of bars and this is certainly one of them.  the food is good and inexpensive and is a fun experience...

headline: It never changed
content:
It‚Äôs a must visit item on everyone‚Äôs itinerary - cold drinks, live music and bar fare - open to 4am.
For me one visit was enough as there are over 100 bars on Duval St you want to visit a few more!!!
Check it out!!

headline: The biggest, most fun bar on Duval street
content: Sloppy Joe's is one of the most eye catching bars on Duval street and I highly recommend you stop in. The drinks are fairly priced and the specialty cocktails are yummy. The atmosphere inside is super fun. The night I went there was an 80s...More

headline: Awesome atmosphere
content: Excellent service, live music, drinks and good easy menu! Air con was a bit too chilly! Very busy and very relaxed setting.

headline: For a great time!
content: Sloppy Joes! What a Key West tradition in the best sense of the word. Great food, the nachos are insane! The best anywhere! Great drinks, menu, staff all exceed what you hope. It‚Äôs like having a big family reunion but everyone likes each other and...More

headline: Tourist trap check in the box for Key West
content: Had the famous drinks. Tipped the guitarist. Headed out. Did it.srrvice was good and friendly.  #keywestlife.

headline: Not As Great As the Reputation
content: The food lives up to the name of the restaurant. It was very messy. The Sloppy Joe meat was too sweet. This was our first visit to Key West so we had to go to this iconic place but I don't think I'd ever have...More

headline: Sloppy Joe's
content: Great place for the whole family. If you are taking little ones I would advise to go early for like maybe lunch... Great place and live music...

headline: Excellent conch chowder
content:
Hadn't been in Sloppy Joes in many years, so we popped in. Ordered the Sloppy Joes, but also a conch chowder. 
The chowder was served in a styrofoam bowl with a plastic lid, deep in a serving basket, making it difficult to remove the top....More

headline: Still the best bar on Duval
content: Stopped into many bars during our first visit to Key West and Sloppy Joe's had the most action - good music with dancing in the evenings.

headline: Good food and good drinks!
content: This is a must see for both food and atmosphere. The Havana Nachos were delicious and the margaritas perfect.

headline: Party time
content: My high school friend and I stopped in for food and drink. We sat at the bar. The bartender was so friendly that we all engaged each other in conversation. I had a sloppy Joe it tasted great. The place was  packed but our food...More

headline: Average bar with live music
content: Nothing special here.  It‚Äôs a bar but  not the bar Hemingway spent his time at.  Stop by It‚Äôs lively and the food isn‚Äôt bad.  The music isn‚Äôt my taste (think old man rock from the 70‚Äôs) but it‚Äôs packed.  You might bump into someone to...More

headline: Tour de Florida, part 4, Key West
content: Nobody can come to Key West without a visit to Sloppy Joes, what a great place, fantastic atmosphere, great staff (Jess) the Hemi Mojito was brilliant and powerful, music was great, well worth the drive down, üëçüòÅ

headline: Classic bar.
content:
The great bar that Mr. Hemingway hung out at. It has great music and is a very popular place to drink at in Key West.
It is iconic and a great place to take pictures in front of and they have a T-shirt Store also....More

headline: A must see
content: The vibe of the place is awesome. The margaritas are some of the best I have had. The rum runner authentic and very good. When visiting Key West you must stop in at Sloppy Joes.

headline: Dinner and Drinks
content: Popped in at Sloppy Joe's and had some fantastic frozen drinks while listening to a great guitarist. Ordered sloppy joe, quesadilla & cheese fries for dinner. The food wasn't anything special, but the drinks and atmosphere were great!

headline: Sloppy Joes is quintessential Key West
content: Sloppy Joes on Duval Street is a famous local and tourist watering hole. We visited in Dec 2017 for an afternoon. We stopped at SJs for a beer as we wandered down Duval St. Lots of interesting memorabilia to look out. Not horribly expensive. They...More

headline: Nice
content: If your looking for a fun time in Key West this is a must see.Luch was great and service was outstanding

headline: A must do!
content: Sloppy Joe's is a must for us anytime we visit Key West.  Get the sloppy fries.  You won't be disappointed!

headline: Far From Sloppy
content: If you visit Key West this is a compulsory destination. This is more than a bar it is the real deal experience. It is superbly organized, run by a highly sophisticated team and goes beyond just as regular Bar. It is clean, spacious, friendly and...More

headline: Always great food and service in here!
content:
Had great New Year. Food fab and service fantastic. New Years eve was great fun.
A must if you are visiting Key West.

headline: Fun place and good times.
content: A great place to meet people from all over the world.  It seems to be a gathering place for people coming off the cruise ships.  The original sloppy joe sandwich was very good as was all of the different things we tried.  The staff was...More

headline: A must stop place in Key West
content: If for no other reason check out Sloppy Joe's just to say you did. We had lunch there and it was crazy busy being the day before NY's Eve but our server was prompt and of course the Sloppy Joe's were very tasty. We also...More

headline: Gotta have a drink where Hemingway was a regular
content: OK, so it‚Äôs a bit tacky but it also has an authentic air about it too - I‚Äôm sure Hemingway had a favourite table under a large stuffed Marlin to regale friends about his fishing trips.  The food is edible, the drinks are good and...More

headline: Fun times
content: My wife and I enjoyed the live music and the lively atmosphere. The food was outstanding and we will definitely return.

headline: Great food/Great time!
content: Never had a bad meal yet! Love the live bands! They don't skimp on their mixed drinks either! It is always a must for us when we are in the Keys!

headline: Conch Drop on NYE!
content: Great place to watch the conch drop on New Year's Eve, where the party was at! great bar with live music and always lively.

headline: Sloppy Joe‚Äôs - Iconic
content:
After touring Hemingway‚Äôs house, couldn‚Äôt help but go to this establishment. 

It being New Years Eve day, it was probably busier than normal.  

Band had a great horn player and sounded like it had a Cuban mix in it.  Fun to read all the stuff...More

headline: Fun Night of Music and Cocktails
content: We made our first visit to the Keys in December. One stop we really enjoyed was Sloppy Joes. We had already eaten before our arrival, so I can't comment on the food. I can say the beer was cold, and the music was very entertaining....More

headline: Duval crawl
content: When in Key West you must do a Duval crawl start at one end and drink your way to the other. Stopping at sloppy joes is a must for great drinks and music. They also have a live webcam inside and out that you can...More

headline: Fun place to stop in for lunch
content: Large place, lots of seating. Lunch crowd turns over pretty quickly. Portions of food and the appetizers are large. We had a couple of their special "Sloppy Joe" entrees. The entertainment (young guitar player / singer ) was good. Waitress friendly - busy but still...More

headline: Hemmingway‚Äôs Bar
content: Had an incredible time listening to live music, eating great food (who doesn‚Äôt like Sloppy Joes), dancing the night away (starts at 9:30pm), and a friendly staff.  A great bar to let it all hang out!

headline: paradise
content: drinks were great atmosphere was unbelievable..Music was great.  Service was fantastic.  Recommend everyone visit sloppy joes.

headline: You Need To Stop In For One!
content: My wife and I spent about 45 minutes here We had a delicious cocktail and listen to some live music! The place was full with a lot of smiling people Everyone needs to try it at least once to see if it‚Äôs there cup of...More

headline: A MUST
content: When in key west Sloppy Joe‚Äôs is a must. The food is good and the atmosphere fun. A must when visiting Key West.

headline: tourist place
content: too noisy  just for tourists bad music=noise, bad food,for cruise people who want to drink ,too expensive

headline: Must visit in Key West
content: Great old bar with great atmosphere. Always a fun group of people here. Also everytime I have been here there has been good live music. Love the Sloppy Joe sandwich. Gift shop has cool Sloppy Joe t shirts. Live it

headline: Great place to go
content: I have been goi g to sloppy Joes for 30 year's.  The food is always good and the entertainment is good always. I live in Dania Beach Florida and I wear an orange sloppy Joes shirt. It's awesome. I recommend this to anyone who goes...More

headline: Fun place and good food
content: Was off cruise ship and had time for just one restaurant. Great choice!  Enjoyed taco (sloppy joe) salad and other items.  Sloppy joe mix is amazing and so different than the usual. Enjoyed the conversation from waitress and the live music at noon!  Go!!

headline: Lovely venue, but all the plastic had to go!
content: Had a real nice time here last night. One of the famous hotspots in Key West with good reason! Lovely atmosphere, great life music and nice food (especially there own beer is worth a try). The only thing we really did not like was all...More

headline: One week in Key West to see the central Ohio band "No Regrets".
content: My husband's band played at Sloppy Joes for 6 nights. The staff and service was great and we were warmly welcomed. I would definitely return to your establishment and check out the live music.

headline: Great cocktails & live music
content: Great relaxed bar, lots of cocktails, live music. We only popped in for one, and ended up having a few! Great place.

headline: Nice hang out
content: Went before the crowd arrived. Friendly bartender. $5 beer is average price to expect. Great location to draw in a crowd.

headline: Classic. Historic. Key West.
content: A key west staple since the 30s. Good drinks. The food is good. The wings especially. They hosts bands from all over the country daily and nightly. GO!

headline: Great band and athmospere on a Sat night
content: My wife and I went there on a Sat night after dinner and had a great time having some drinks and listening to and dancing to a great live band from Ohio called No Regrets. They were very entertaining and Sloppy Joe's itself is a...More

headline: An institution!
content:
No visit to Key West is complete (as far as I am concerned) without a visit to Sloppy Joe's.

Just had a drink this time round, the draft beer is always the best value here, but it is about bums on seats, especially when the...More

headline: Can't Miss this brief stop!
content: Walk a couple blocks up to Papa Pilar's distillery first, do a tasting, then head back here for a Hemingway Mojito!  Great music and peoe watching to!

headline: I will never go back to a Manwich!
content: Since we were at Sloppy Joe's, home of the sloppy Joe, I had a sloppy Joe. It was amazing. I don't know what the spices are they use, but it is absolutely the best sloppy Joe I've ever had. Service was fast. Prices were reasonable.

headline: Hemingway drank here
content: Another good bar, busy with people. Live music, good crowds. A lot of people. Great history and building is very fun setting.

headline: Entertaining music venue, food and drinks.
content: Popular and famous place. I heard lots of folks asking directions to Sloppy Joes. We went there twice in 3 days but did not eat there. They seem to have music all the time even during the day.

headline: The Flavor of Key West
content: A trip to KW is not complete until you visit Sloppy Joe‚Äôs!  It is a salon-style barroom on the corner of Duval and Green Streets. The brief history of it‚Äôs existence and name is interesting, including Hemingway‚Äôs influence. The menu for both food and drinks...More

headline: Save Your Money = Not Like Hemingway is There
content: So touristy and cramped that we had to get out and find another place to relax.Sorry for the negative vote. Historical, maybe!

headline: Great place
content: Food?  Check.  Adult beverages?  Check.  Live music?  Check.  What are you waiting for?  Stop in, grab a bite and a brew and relax... You're in Key West!

headline: Always a Must In Key West
content: Love going to Sloppy Joes for the Drinks and atmosphere.  Great Live Music. My favorite is the back bar. They have the best drinks and most interesting people to watch!

headline: Fun, fun, fun
content: We didn't eat here, just had a few drinks.  What we loved was the entertainment.  If you can catch Pet and Wayne [search them on YouTube] you will laugh so hard it will hurt.

headline: Classic Key West
content: This is classic Key West.  Super friendly staff.  Must stop for Key West bar scene. Loved the gift shop.  They had a great Christmas edition T-shirt.

headline: It is not a trip to Key West w/o a trip to Sloppy Joes
content: Ok it is bar food but the atmosphere, the drinks, the music it is all part of Key West. It is fun, you meet great people, dance, port people watch. It is just plain fun!

headline: Bloody Mary's
content: We stopped for refreshments and had a Yuengling and everyone else had the bloodymarys. They raved about how good they were. I tried a sip. Delicious. Stuck with my beer. Just know after a couple of them, they required a nap.

headline: Night out
content: Sloppy Joe‚Äôs has a great specialty drink menu. We were there when they had a band. Great music. Drinks were reasonably priced. Great service.

headline: Tourist Mecca
content: Food and service was decent.  The band that was there when we visited made it worth taking some time to hang out but other than that it felt like a tourist trap I couldn‚Äôt wait to leave.

headline: Drinks
content: Clean and friendly. I loved the saloon style attire the bar tenders had on. My drink was delicious. Great selection if beer.

headline: Drinks at Sloppy Joes
content: The drinks were really good, however, the bartender was a first class jerk.  He was an older fellow with a top hat.  When we asked him about a place, he was extremely rude and made sarcastic remarks.  I was with my cousins and we talked...More

headline: Cold beer
content: Me and my wife were here December 1 we stopped in to have a cold beer üç∫ staff was friendly and the place was clean and just a great place to go

headline: Very Interesting Experience
content: This was the highlight of the bars we visited.  Great music and extreme selection of drinks.  The bartender was very accommodating.  The singer was very entertaining. Well worth the trip.

headline: Bustling, loud & fabulous
content: The food is good, the cocktails are great & the live music is excellent. The walls are full of  amazing aviation photo's with world flags and squadron insignias hanging from the ceiling. Full of history, Sloppy Joe's is a must when visiting Key West

headline: The best Sloppy Joe's ever, a place you have to visit!
content:
They tell you to visit Sloppy Joe's in Key West because Mr. Hemingway frequent there.
The prices was good and you can visit during lunch as we did, and here a piano player play in the background.  We had the Sloopy Joe's sandwich each and...More

headline: Beleive it or not, decent food, great drinks, and in the day, its VERY FAMILY FRIENDLY!
content:
Went to lunch on 2 occasions with my wife & 4 year old.  Live music, very good bar food even for my daughter, and their house margarita is actually REALLY good (a very good mix is used or its made each time).
Music & environment...More

headline: Love this place!
content: Time after time, we end up making a trip to KW and every time we make sure to stop at Sloppy Joe‚Äôs.  My husband gets a rum runner and I enjoy the Sloppy Rita‚Äôs.  Great service, and the place is good for people watching.  Also,...More

headline: Exciting place with great live music you could hear
content: Waitstaff was superb. Sloppy Joe was delicious. You need to walk around the bar and see all the pictures on the wall. The "Rita" packed a punch!

headline: Can't visit Key West without a visit to Sloppy Joe's.
content: The beer is cold.  Price's are o.k. I don't recommend the couch fritters, couldn't find one piece of couch in 3 fritters-greasy. Not worth it. The calamari was o.k. big menu to choose from. Service was fast. Expect to wait when cruise ships are in...More

headline: Bachelorette night out
content: Great music for a night out with the girls for a bachelor's party! Staff were friendly and quick to provide service.

headline: Great atmosphere
content: Ice cold beer, live music, great atmosphere. Reputed to be the drinking hole of Earnest Hemingway. Now I know why. Good pub grub without being exceptional. Its all about being there. Great after sunset or for a chilled out afternoon.

headline: Great place for music
content: Absolute awesome time. Great place to let loose! Drinks may be more expensive, but atmosphere is worth it.

headline: Great
content: I wanted to check this place out because it's a well known establishment in Key West. I was there during the day and received excellent service and a really good mojito. I asked the bartender to go easy on the simple syrup and it was...More

headline: Drink
content: This please is a bit overrated in my eyes a bit expensive for what you get good music all trough the day.

headline: Fun time at a Key West landmark
content: Sloppy Joe's is a Key West staple. If you haven't stopped here for a bite to eat or a beer then you haven't been to Key West. Great location at the corner of Duval and Front Sts. This bar is laid back and friendly. Great...More

headline: Great lunch
content:
Tired and fed up wandering around we went in for lunch. There were cocktails on the menu so that was a plus, I had pina colada and my friend a marguerite, both were very good.

We had quesadilla and sloppy joe sandwich. Both were very...More

headline: Leisure
content: Good margaritas.  Fun place.  Music was good.  The service was excellent.  We were there right after sunset and did not have a problem finding a table.  Love the pictures in walls.

headline: Iconic but still good.
content: This is one place that nearly everyone recommends visiting while in Key West. Staff were great. The food was ok. Drinks were reasonable priced in my opinion. The live entertainment was exceptionally good on the nights we were there. And we loved to see the...More

headline: Live music and good bar food
content: The atmosphere was fun and lively. We stopped by for a local brew and peel n eat shrimp and salad. Lots of tables and chairs. The food served at surrounding tables seemed to be well received as well. Musician was good but not too loud...More

headline: Key West must!
content: Our family (including a 5 and 2 year old) went mid day for some appetizers and drinks. Average prices for drinks for the area. Drinks were very good and cold. Fish dip and nachos were both very good and decently priced, too! You have to...More

headline: Nov 20 visit
content: Negative. Really disappointed. Everyone raved over the sloppies but took one bite and turned mine back in for a crabcake sandwich. Tasted like a cheap, sweet spaghetti sauce. Would not recommend and don't understand all the reviews.

headline: Great music and good food
content: We got the sloppy joes. They were pretty good. The live music on the big stage was great and the staff was fast and friendly.

headline: Cool and Casual
content: Found Sloppy Joes to be very laid back and casual.  Waiter was friendly and our meal and drinks came quickly.  Ice water was provided without asking.  On the stage was a singer/piano player who was very entertaining.  I enjoyed him and his conversation with the...More

headline: Great lunch spot
content: Great place and really hopping at lunch time.  Ice cold drinks and I experienced superb service.  The live entertainment was great.  Food, they really need to work on and their Key Lime pie is on my "skip it" list.  Go for the drinks and the...More

headline: Typical bar food
content: If you like bar food this place will be good. Don‚Äôt expect outstanding meal.  Drinks were good and piano man was great!

headline: Mango Mojitos
content: Mango mojitos! There are not enough mango mojitos in the world, alone. However, Sloppy Joe‚Äôs ranks up here with the best prepared ones!

headline: Lots of fun
content:
This is a seat yourself restaurant with fast, almost immediate service, friendly staff, reasonable prices and great music. 
Not to forget the very best pulled pork and pulled chicken sandwiches EVER.  It IS however noisy which you could expect.  We made two visits in two...More

headline: Average
content:
Had to stop at this historical spot... lively atmosphere, friendly staff, good band
Food was tasty but portions were small
Mixed drinks were expensive and weak.
Worth a visit to see all the artifacts

headline: Good to have visited in view of history
content: Glad we went in view of the history of Sloppy Joe‚Äôs. Live music was good, beer was cold but everything else was fairly average. Salads were huge. Calamari a bit too deeply fried. Frozen Pina Colada distinctly average.

headline: Just gross....
content:
Guess this place has a little place in history but it‚Äôs just gross. 

Not really a dive bar nor is it a touristy history bar. It just tries to mix it all into one without success. 

Lastly, the sloppy joes are just not good! I...More

headline: Great Place
content: My wife and I stopped here on our first visit to Key West after hearing that it was Ernest  Hemingway‚Äôs favorite bar. The service was great, we really enjoyed the entertainment and I had the best Sloppy Joe ever at a very reasonable price! I...More

headline: My Type of Bar
content: First time in Key West and well will be back. Great place with loads going on everywhere, only rake up to Key West if you are broadminded and any think goes. A Bar sign said Clothing Optional (Get My Drift) Still good fun we kept...More

headline: Hemmingway's Hangout
content: Ernest Hemmingway put this place on the map, although I wonder if any of the decorations are the same & I'm sure the drinks were better back when. I enjoyed this bar & atmosphere & the historical value. Plus, the prices of drinks were less...More

headline: Tourist Alert
content: Want to get drunk on alcoholic slurpees?  This is your first stop. Casual drinking spot for tourists. I can‚Äôt say much more except if you are on Duval St. and have to use a restroom, just walk in and make yourself at home.

headline: Dinner
content: Dinner was so so.  Nothing fabulous. I guess you are there for atmosphere!!  There was a duo that evening and they were ok.

headline: Key West Lunch
content: After spending several hours at the beach in Key West we decided to go to a casual restaurant for a late lunch.  We decided on Sloppy Joes.  It was the right decision.  I had the Ernie burger and my husband had the blackened chicken sandwich....More

headline: Good place to pop into
content: Pretty decent place, it's a landmark of Key West so you have to check that box.  Beer selection was really limited, so that will turn some people off.  Get a beer, get a shirt, and then move on to the next place.

headline: lunch and drinks
content: The service is very good here and the drinks are cold.  The problem is the food is just frozen and microwaved. The atmosphere is fun and the place should be visited by everyone but dont eat there. There are so many other wonderful places you...More

headline: Great atmosphere... great beer... ok food...
content: This is the second time my wife and I have been to this place and I love the atmosphere. The beer is good and the good and the service is great. The food was better the first time. We had the conch fritters and they...More

headline: Its a trap
content: This place is over rated.  The service is sub-par and the food is not great.  There is much better food in key west to go ahead and skip this place.

headline: Party party
content:
Great fun tourist central! 
Everybody has to check it out... 
good drinks and music. It‚Äôs central on Duval street. Rick‚Äôs is across the street ( another tourist bar). You will see many people with there T-shirts on

headline: Stopped in because you kinda have to.
content: Stopped in just because you kinda have to when you‚Äôre in Key West. We sat at the main bar, I actually sat in Junebug‚Äôs chair. Ordered a beer and had to order a sloppy joe sandwich. The food can super quick. The sandwich was ok....More

headline: Okay
content: I know it's a thing, but to me it didn't live up to the hype.  That being said the drinks were good as were the nachos.  Go early to get a sit.  Clean restrooms

headline: Fun and great sloppy fries
content:
How can you go to KW and not go to Sloppy Joe's?  You just cannot. :-)
It's a KW classic and they have a nice gift shop too.

headline: A must-visit for its history
content: Once you are in Key West you have to see this place. I would not say it is popular for its quality food (rather simple dishes), but the service is nice, drinks are good and affordable, and entertainment and atmosphere are great.

headline: A Must Stop in Key west
content: Tradition, history, FUN. Had to make sure we stopped in Sloppy Joe's during our visit to Key West and during Fantasy Fest. Always great drinks, Sloppy Ritas and Blood Mary's. We just drank this time (2 stops), but the food is excellent also.

headline: Great food
content: Food was delicious and service was great. I had the best bbq chicken in my life. We are here on vacation and had heard of this place and just had to give it a try. It sure wasnt a disappointment. We then went next door...More

headline: A must see for its history and reputation
content: I personally think I make a better sloppy joe, but hats off to the Sloppy Joe for creating the original.  Drinks were good and the server was very attentive.  I was there during "Meeting of the Minds" which is a Trop rock festival so I...More

headline: Historic Bar with Bar Food
content: It's a touristy place but a lot of fun. We had a great time. But, if you are looking for a cuisine experience, go somewhere else. If one goes to Key West, one must go to Sloppy Joe's.

headline: It's Sloppy Joe's
content: It's Sloppy Joe's. What else is there to say? Come on in, get your drink and relax. Nice and simple.

headline: Great place must experience
content: Went 30 days after Irma and it was like nothing had ever happened. The folks were so nice and made sure the service was excellent. Will go back every time we go back.

headline: Great Bands and Solid food
content: the crowd was so much fun as teh bands were great and the drinks were cold, Joe's is a fun, fun place with solid food options

headline: An oasis from the heat
content: Delicious food and frozen drinks!  We spent probably an hour and a half just cooling off, enjoying the music, food, and beverages.  The service was excellent, the music was fun, and it was a wonderful way to spend time on Key West!

headline: Post-Irma!
content: Always a great place to go in Key West! Very good food with many options for all eaters, lots of drink options too. Very fun, always a live band!

headline: My favorite bar in key west
content: Stayed in Key west for a while and tried a few other bars and this one is my favorite by far! I kept going back to it and a great atmosphere. The fish and chips here are delicious!

headline: Hit the spot
content: Just got into town and we were tired and starving. Jumped in grabbed a table and were helped immediately. Hubby had the sloppy joe (which he loved) and I had the shrimp po'boy with beers for both. Loved the sandwiches and saved room for key...More

headline: Great Original Sloppt Joe Sandwich!
content: Stopped buy to have the Original Sloppy Joe sandwich! Was well worth it! Had live music and a great wait staff!

headline: A have to eat here
content: This is another place you just have to eat when in key West. And you must try the sloppy joe. Live music, the bar & fun

headline: You have to stop by the Icon of the island
content: I guess it is just an must to stop by the iconic Sloppy üòâ. Not our kind of bar as the live music can be very laud and we are more wine drinkers than cocktail drinkers.  But the people who stayed there looked very well...More

headline: Vacation
content: We love sloppy Joes.  We visit a bunch when we come to town . Great atmosphere.  Great wait staff. Very friendly.   Love love this place. Great entertainment.  Best pina coladas in town .They are my all time favorite .

headline: A must see
content: We ate lunch here while on shore from a boy scout sailing trip. It was 3 moms and we were not drinking since it was a scout trip and it was lunch but the service was great. They had music playing. We had fun. Our...More

headline: Busy place
content: We were in Key West for two weekdays and  this place was always hoppin. I think this is probably one the most frequented places in Key West and especially so when the cruise ships are in. Live music and it happens to be the place...More

headline: Bucket list
content: I've heard all my life about THE action and entertainment venue of Key West, so this was a mandatory stop on the cultural tour.  Food was above average bar cuisine. Entertainment always good.

headline: Grab a Drink
content: Stopped in with a group of 9 people and sat at the bar to grab some frozen drinks after a long hot day exploring Key West.  I really liked the laid back atmosphere and our bartender was very cool.  There was a musicians singing Tom...More

headline: Just ok
content: We stopped in but I have to say I wasn't impressed very crowded music way too load mostly young people I would say you have to stop in just because it's sloppy joes

headline: Drunken stooper
content: A tourist attraction for sure but worth seeing and getting drinks! The food is so so but who cares... you wot remember anyway.  Live music and colorful wait staff.  A must stop!!

headline: Great fun
content: Not going to write loads here as this is an experience you need to try for yourselves, believe me you won‚Äôt be disappointed, great drinks, great staff and great fun!!!

headline: Great time
content: Awesome fun saloon. Food was good, music was trendy, drinks were great. Wait staff and security friendly. Dont miss stopping in for food or drinks st SloppyJoes

headline: Fantasy Fest Visit
content: You want a great place at night to go drink and listen to live music this is it.  You will have a blast and the music is always great.

headline: Can you say touristy?
content: Just average drinks and food and the music was pretty bad the whole week.  Many other better places like Hogs Breath or the Conch Republic. They don't deserve all the hype they get.

headline: Key West 2017
content: Wonderful food, great music and excellent service.  A must go to place in Key West!  Never had a bad experience every time I've gone!

headline: Killer wings
content: Place is jumpin..fun..loud..surprisingly good food! Music, great service..be prepared to wait for a table

headline: Legend
content: Good bar with mix of locals and tourists.  Generally local bands with some name brands on special occasions.  Open air all around.  Decent appetizers.  Go for the atmosphere.

headline: 5 years
content: later we came by again and we took a drink there, it is a great place with a lot of puls all people are nice and somehow it feels good to be there, live music and very relaxed atmosphere

headline: Expensive and busy
content: Very touristic and stressed environment. Ended up only having drinks, because of the long wait everywhere.

headline: Hemingway's Haunt
content: I loved the nautical theme of this Large venue.Pictures of Hemingway and a Large Sailfish on the wall reminded me of his novel "Old Man and the Sea" . Live music ,good food and cold beer ,what's not to like.

headline: Great Live music mediocre food
content: We went here because it‚Äôs famously known as  Hemingway‚Äôs bar (after it moved to this location from the original one). They had amazing live music and it‚Äôs definitely neat to go there and have a drink but the food was mediocre and the drinks were...More

headline: Top notch tourist stop
content: World famous Sloppy Joe's is the place everyone visits, of course.  We were pleasantly surprised at the fine service and quality of the food at what we had expected was a "tourist trap"  We couldn't have been happier.

headline: Good lunch and music
content: Went for lunch. everyone was pleased with food quality. A little pricey for sandwiches since no sides included. Pizza was good. The sloppy Joe French fries were huge and very good. Service on the slow side, but OK with listening to the music.

headline: Fun Place
content: Great bar and people watching location.  Live music.   Sorry we can't tell about the food....didn't eat there.  But the drinks were great.

headline: Run of the mill
content: Interestng because of the history..the food is ok...nothing great. Best service bet...is to sit at the bar. Always have good music.

headline: Iconic Key West Stop
content: After watching the live webcams for six months, I couldn't Not eat there.  Good service, live music and pretty good bar food; plus lots of atmosphere.  Wasn't crazy about the conch fritters, but I had to try them.

headline: Iconic restaurant
content: Must visit if you are a Hemingway fan!!  Food was very good.  And service was excellent.  We tried the sloppy joe, pulled pork, turkey wrap, hamburgers and a hotdog...  All were very good.  Prices were high but in line with other restaurants in the area....More

headline: What you expect
content: Just what you think of when you think of Key West.  Nothing fancy just a friendly place with great drinks.

headline: One of the best places in Key West
content: This is probably one of the best places to get a feel for the real Key West lifestyle. Great music, people having a great time, and great food. This is a must visit when in Key West.

headline: Iconic restaurant
content: Of course if you come to Key West you have to have the sandwich-Sloppy Joe.  A bit pricey but what isn't in Key West. Just the sandwich and a slice of pickle $10.  Sandwich is a fairly good size. Frozen onion rings deep fried 6.75....More

headline: Great music
content: This last trip we had our son along with us and arrived late.  While he wasn't able to go hangout inside, we were able to hang out outside and enjoy the awesome bands.  Steamed shrimp is delicious

headline: drinks
content:
popped in yesterday for a beer, live music on. very good and fast service. good range of beers. 

food menu looked good but we didnt eat here

headline: Leave your stress at the door
content: Such a fun, festive atmosphere! Try the hot peel n eat shrimp with a cold draft. The music will keep you entertained and helps you forget about everyday worries. Don't miss this one..

headline: Dinner
content: We all tried there signature margarita and sloppy joes. Very quick service, good food and music. Not inexpensive but a fun place.

headline: Dancing
content: If you want a place that is great for live music, dancing and drinks then this is the place for you.

headline: Sloppy Joes at Sloppy Joes
content: Yep. Had the Sloppy Joe at Sloppy Joes, check that off my bucket list. Much better than Manwich LOL. Not many people milling around during the day, but seem to come alive at night. Service ok, Sloppy Joe great.

headline: Love this Place
content: The ambeince was great.  Drinks were very good and the band they had while we were there, Whiskey Kiss was wonderful.

headline: First stop every time
content: We stop in for nachos and cold beverages before going anywhere else every time we come to Key West. Laid back vibe, great music, and friendly company every time!!!

headline: Best pub for food, drinks and live music
content:
On Main Street and we found it the best and most popular pub for food, drinks and music.

Flags on roof and pictures on walls.

headline: Just  a tourist trap!  Don't waste your time here!
content: The drinks are from a "Slurpy" type machine with no real booze in them unless you ask ans pay for a floater!!

headline: Fun...Must Stop By for a Sloppy Joe!
content: One of the places you simply need to visit when in Key West. Yes, order a sloppy joe just because. No, it is nothing super special... it is a Sloppy Joe! But, eating one at Sloppy Joe's in Key West is a must. There is...More

headline: Raucous Pub
content: This little bar looks like something you would see on Bourbon Street. It's raucous and lively at night with loud entertainment and crowds. During the day, it's a little more tame and you can almost imagine why it was a frequent haunt of Ernest Hemingway.

headline: Fun Place!!
content: This is just a fun place to hang out with friends. The Hemingway memorabilia alone is worth it. The beer is cold and the food is good!!

headline: I guess you have to hit Sloppy Joe's while in Key West
content:
Had a late lunch at Sloppy Joe's the other day just because it's Sloppy Joe's.
We found the food OK but nothing great and service was perfect and beers cold. 
One thing you do have to try is their Sloppy Joe Fries. These fries topped...More

headline: Famous Sloppy Joe's
content: Peculiar American bar, you can have hamburgers, drinks for the day. At night live music is entertaining to young or older people.

headline: Absolutely fun and memorable.
content: I bartenders & waiters all have such great personalities.  While we vacationed there we returned several times to hang out. The bartenders were full of knowlege and history of the island  The food was also great.  They did have live music everyday, afternoon and late...More

headline: Popular stop
content: Beverly was great.  Glad to see them open after the hurricane. Drinks were a little pricey but felt the need to get Key West up and running

headline: Great atmosphere
content: We visited here twice on our three day key west trip as we enjoyed the atmosphere so much. The food and beer was good and there was great live music. Even though the place seemed full of locals we didn't feel out of place and...More

headline: More than just a tourist trap
content: With the location and association with Hemingway, it would be easy to understand if they mailed it in and were nothing more than a tourist trap. Fortunately, that's not the case at Sloppy Joe's. The drinks are cold, the service is great and there is...More

headline: No Fun Zone No Dancing !!!
content: My crew and I stopped in for an ice cold beer and to buy the t shirt. The place was empty at 4 in the afternoon and in late August. There was a band playing and they were really good. My husband and I love...More

headline: A busy packed bar
content: If in key west you have to stop to at least visit. Hemmingways old hang out. Live music every night. Packed to the rafters with tourists. Stop have a beer and stay if not to packed. But expect it to be packed. Go early so...More

headline: Bar, restaurant, music... top
content: a nice meal @luch time with all family, all enjoyed the atmosphere, the music, the decoration and the food

headline: Hemingway hangout checklist
content: This is definitely a place you want to go to sit and drink in the same bar that Hemingway did. Apparently much is the same now as it was then.  Even without that history it is a good place, big place, with nice wait staff...More

headline: Gotta Go!
content: Following island tour, this is a great place to stop for lunch.  WITHIN WALKING DISTANCE OF THE CRUISE PORT and air conditioned.  While typical bar food, the BBQ is out of this world good.  Live entertainment and lively bar keep it interesting and fun.  Attached...More

headline: Packed
content:
Stepped in, looked around, totally packed! Took a moment to cool off and headed elsewhere! 
Very tourist driven.

headline: Historic landmark, average food and drink, a MUST stop though
content: An historic place to feel the Hemingway presence and stories of he past. Some very loud music at times chased us out but a drink at the aging bar is a must while in KW.

headline: Sloppy Joe's in Key West
content:
A must to visit this cool bar if you visit Key West. Worn bar where time has stood still, but history is sitting in the walls.
//Mats Samaras, Stockholm, Sweden

headline: One of the most fun spots on the island
content: Great atmosphere, definitely a KW institution. Attracts a mixed crowd, boy guaranteed to have a fun evening!

headline: An Old Key West Standard
content: We had a large party (9). They were gracious to accommodate us. However it was very noisy and the food was only fair. Granted this was "Hemingway Days" so maybe this is why. Definitely for the "Young Crowd"!

headline: Hoppin' Place!
content: This is a must-see in Key West. There's live music, great food, and a LOT of people! Much of the seating is on high stools, but if you're desperate to get a table, you'll take it.

headline: tourist spot
content:
everyone told us we had to go here.....
have to say i found it just so so.
food was not the best i have ever had.
music was good.
but far to noisy for me.

headline: Great live music
content: The music was super good there - I loved it.  Drinks were good and waitress was friendly.  We only had soft pretzels but all the food we saw looked good.

headline: The best possible place in Key West
content: No matter what time you go, winter or summer, noon or 10 pm, this is THE spot. Impossible to discover the way they manage to be always crowded...and have a seat for you! The food is good, portions are huge, beers cold, mojitos and margaritas...More

headline: Great Friday night Fun
content: Went there with a group of people last Friday night, the band (Screaming Broccoli) was great and the food was also, the wait staff is very attentive. One of the must do spots in Key West

headline: Sloppy Joe's a good time
content: We had a great time at Sloppy Joe's. We started out with some fish dip, fish tacos, & of course a Sloopy Joe sandwich. Food was good, beer cold, and the Papa Doble  drinks will kick your butt. Excellent entertainment, both bands were great.

headline: Fun!
content: A great place to grab a bite to eat and listen to live music. It's busy so grab a table when one opens up. The food was great and music even better. A must see on my to see list in the Keys. So much...More

headline: Live band, Awesome Bar!
content: Awesome bar with a large variety of drinks. There was a super fun live band there over the Labor Day weekend!

headline: Always Fun!
content: On my second trip to the Key's I had to stop at Sloppy Joe's.  It was once again a fun stop.  I will say that most of the enjoyment here is the band that's playing.  The drinks are good and the beer is cold.  Will...More

headline: OUCH!
content: I'm all for a good time. In fact I'm still basically a college kid at heart. I love to party and I love music, so I went to Key West planning to lay it down at Sloppy Joe's. What a disappointment. This place is louder...More

headline: Fun times Great food
content: Stopped in to Sloppy Joes with friends for a quick lunch and cold drinks. We were pleasantly surprised. The atmosphere of the place is fun if not a little rowdy. We ordered sloppy Joes all around and they were the best we ever had. The...More

headline: For Many people, it's THE MUST bar/restaurant!
content: Sloppy Joe's is THE bar/restaurant that most people like to say they have been to, when visiting Key West. The evening has a party atmosphere, with its entertainment. But daytime is family friendly (if your family is ok with crowds and noise). Prices are reasonable,...More

headline: Worst service ever
content:
The food was ok, the environment was good. But the service was the worst ever!!
After we got our food, our waiter never came back even after I waved at him a bunch of times. Result: I had to get up and get my own...More

headline: Standard excellent service and entertainment
content: As always this place never disappoints. It has been a staple in Key West for as long as I can remember.

headline: A drink or 2
content: Visited Sloppys in 2015 and now in 2017. Still a great bar with a lot of atmosphere. Live music, hot wings and some Gin & Tonic and beer. I will be back!

headline: This place knows how to find good bands!
content: On my week-long trip in Key West, I came back to this place FOUR times and basically became a groupie :) Their bartenders are excellent, nightlife is great for those that want to sit, stand, and dance...they have it all!

headline: Fun
content: Fun place to hang out with friends to have drinks along Duval street. It's one of Key West icon places to go.

headline: Gem! Joes Tap Room is Part of Sloppy Joes
content: So we walked into sloppy joes after a long plane ride waiting for our new homes check in at 3pm. We found Joes to be very busy, packed in fact, music was ok and not really our speed but we sat down in a side...More

headline: Really did live up to all the Hype!
content: Friends of mine suggested we go to Sloppy Joe's! Glad we did! Amazing Band, Open air Atmosphere, Good Food, and I was on vacation with Friends, so my husband was able to look up the webcam, while at work, and see us! So much Fun!

headline: Best party bar in Key West
content: The best time!  You have to visit on a weekend evening/night.  My favorite!!  If you don't go you don't know what you're missing.  Put this on your must visit list.

headline: Love this place
content: This is a hoppin' place. The service was excellent. We just had a burger and a drink, but it was very good. THE place to be on Duval Street.

headline: Great drinks and entertainment
content: The rum runners are GREAT went there every time we we're on Duvall!!  The music at night was always good too.....but those RUM RUNNERS were the absolute best!!!

headline: Had to see!
content: Of course we enjoyed a sloppy Joe! Good music, good stop with a history displayed on the walls, and good hospitality. Don't forget a tshirt!

headline: Great atmosphere
content: My husband and I were in Key West for a day trip and wanted to check Sloppy Joes out after finding them online. We found Sloppys on the corner and were relieved to get out of the heat, it was extremely busy inside but we...More

headline: Good sloppy joe
content: Good food. Terrible service. Server was a old lady that could've cared less about us. Had to flag her down for anything we wanted. Even then she would ignore us.

headline: Sat night
content: We went out sat night for a few drinks and went to sloppy joes even though it is a high tourist destanation it was still amazing they had live band and it was fun

headline: Everyone must hit Sloppy Joe's
content: LandMark with a live camera outside. We had a fantastic time. Great entertainment, drinks and employees.

headline: Great music.
content: Popped in on a saturday night. This place was rockin. Fantastic band, busy bar. You want some great american rock over a drink, well worth it.

headline: Summer
content: Great food, fun atmosphere for all, good tunes, open restaurant seating, live band, gift shop, and live street web cam! It's a must if your vacationing in the Florida keys

headline: Great music and food
content: We had a big group and everyone in our group loved it.  Great music and food.  The atmosphere was fun.

headline: Always fun and yummy!
content: We drove to Key West from Duck Key for a day trip.  My family of 5 had lunch here.  The kids all had a sloppy joe.  I had a sloppy joe pizza and my husband a burger.  Everything was great and the service was perfect....More

headline: Good place nice music
content: You have to get here, tipical american food, that mesn is good not great! Good place for live music and some party with rock, the service is fast but they ask you for pay like almost you finish eating. Still is a place that you...More

headline: Day trip
content: My wife and I visited Key West while staying in Marathon, we  had lunch at Sloppy Joe's and overall it was great with my excellent service.  I had the Havana nachos and they were excellent, my wife had the fish sandwich and it was not...More

headline: Make sure to go to beer area
content: The main area was very loud and very crowded. We ended up going to the craft brew area in the back which was very pleasant, and was able to get served both beer and food. We found it amusing to see that they had local...More

headline: Epic food
content: Great spot right on Duval! Incredible sandwiches and awesome atmosphere. Would definitely come back again.

headline: Good supper
content: Our family had supper here one evening on our vacation.  Entertainment was funny.  Food was good.  They even played a video of sunset on the TV screen.

headline: Best Frozen Rum Runner on Duvall St.
content:
Looking for a great frozen rum runner.....stop at Sloppy Joe's. The tropical flavors are so refreshing as the right amount of Capt. Morgan's hits the spot!!

Very refreshing!!

headline: Lunch off the cruise
content:
Visited here with my wife when our cruise docked in key West.  This is a great spot for lunch or a drink or both. 
Their house beer is very good,  it is quite hoppy and would be similar an IPA.  We had the house wings...More

headline: Hemingway's haunt
content:
Full of tourists, prices designed for that purpose, however the raucous atmosphere that Papa loved remains. I went for the history of the bar where Hemingway met Martha Gelhorn.
Food is passable, as are the drinks. The photos of the legendary writer are something else....More

headline: Great atmosphere
content: Ate and drank here with my husband and children, great atmosphere, great range of drinks, quick service, good good

headline: SLOPPY JOES!!!
content: we went for lunch the food was really tasty and there was a live band on. The boys beers were nice. The waiting on staff are okay. The food though and the atmosphere was really good!! really recommend. We also got tshirts from the shop...More

headline: Sloppy, but great!
content:
The place is best described as the name of the place, Sloppy. But that is the way it is supposed to be.

A big bar, which serves both inhouse brews and importen beers. Live music seems to be a common feature and a meny of...More

headline: Fun place
content: Good is just okay, nothing out of the extraordinary. But at night is a good place to hang out. It's gets super packed. They have a life band. The band sings a variety of songs. They get the party popping.

headline: Nice friendly
content: Econic and efficient, rapid and tasty, obviously not memorable but if You're the, on the way to go You could stop and eat, surely polite

headline: Unplanned Visit
content: We stopped by on a whim at around 2:30. They were very busy and I didn't think we were going to find a table. We finally located a small table up against the wall, which was fine. Chris took care of us while we were...More

headline: Largest shot of tequila
content: Sloppy Joe's was where we ended our night the first night we were in Key West.  It was a long day of travel followed by walking throughout Mallory Square.  Had no idea the origin or history of the place, and I wasn't really interested in...More

headline: Typical tourist destination
content: Sloppy Joes is a bar that usually has great music, fair prices and a limited menue. It is not a locals place but a tourist attraction. It is mostly famed for being a place Ernest Hemingway would be found. Try it once and make up...More

headline: Good food and drinks, great atmosphere
content: The first place we dined at when we reached Key West on our trip to the Florida Keys was Sloppy Joe's, the favorite haunt of Ernest Hemingway during his nine years on the island. It was early afternoon, and the eatery no doubt was in...More

headline: Best Frozen Margarita in Key West !
content: the frozen margaritas are the BEST in Key West. I made at least one trip to Sloppy Joe's each day just to get a margarita (or two). Had lunch there one day and tried "the Sloppy Joe Sandwich". Not a big a big sloopy joe...More

headline: Large, open, airy....and busy
content: We where in there early afternoon. Very busy...even at 2 o' clock. Service was slow. The singer was great though. They have some good line ups for entertainment. High quality stuff. Full bar. Very popular. Also, this is not the original sloppy joe sandwich place...in...More

headline: Got out quick!
content:
One of the worst - no THE WORST place we went into during our USA tour!
Crude, rude, poor live entertainment - especially as there were loads of young children in there! Terrible food - got out as quick as we could!

headline: Drop in
content: Six of us dropped in for a historical visit to sloppy Joe's.  We got to sit at the front bar where there were 6 to 7 chairs and Rahm took care of us.  We had a great experience.  Ate  dinner, had a few drinks and...More

headline: Great location
content: This is a staple of Key west. This place is usually full and you need to find your own seats. They have live music all the time so it makes it a great place to hang out especially on a hot day.

headline: Kenny
content: Great place to unwind. Live music all day and really friendly staff. Don't miss this party place! One for the bucket list!

headline: Conch frittersüëé
content: I know most people go there for the atmosphere and the drinks, but the conch fritters are guaranteed the worlds worst!

headline: Great Bar!
content: This is such a fun place! Great live entertainment, friendly bar service, yummy drinks and a cool little gift shop!

headline: Must visit!
content: Loud, and just what you would expect!  Live music and Icy cold drinks.  Great place to start the crawl.  You can't drink all day if you don't start in the morning!

headline: Great time!
content: We had great food here.  Drinks were good - pricey, as is any place like this, but hey, it's vacation!  Entertainment was high quality (not kid friendly - but it IS a bar).  I have to give top kudos to our server.  The place was...More

headline: Great spot
content: Great spot to stop and have a cold one. Staff friendly and good music. Defiantly a must stop when visiting the keys.

headline: Live Music, Great Service, Good Food!
content: Sloppy Joe's is a Key West tradition for a reason. We ordered several appetizers and drinks and were happy with everything - the smoked fish dip and sloppy joe nachos were particular favorites. Definitely recommend!

headline: A Key West must!
content: If you are a first time visitor of Key West, Sloppy Joes should be on your list. It really is a Key West tradition. The food is very good, and from a guy who normally doesn't care much for an actual sloppy joe sandwich, I...More

headline: Sloppy Joe's Bar Key West
content: The famous Sloppy Joe's Bar!! What can one say? It should be on your list.  Live music every day, the food is good and plentiful.  The last time I was here (several years ago) I had the pleasure of meeting Dale Earnhardt Jr and Casey...More

headline: Our Favorite Bar in Key West!
content: We stumbled into this bar on Saturday night after seeing a Drag Queen show (also recommended), and they had a live bar playing and the place was packed. We made friends with the one bartender and she told us all the must see places we...More

headline: Fun, music, good food and drinks
content: It's a fun must go bar when visiting Key West.  Always a good band.  Must try the conch chowder.  Drinks are well poured and beer is cold.

headline: Good as usual
content: The is a Key West standard.  It's always busy bit also very good.  Nothing outstanding except the history but worth a visit every trip.

headline: Fun as usual!
content: We visited Key West 8/8/17 and had to make a stop at Sloppy Joe's. Food is good but the atmosphere is great!! Always good entertainment and the servers are first class. That means friendly, fun and attentive!! A must stop if in Key West.

headline: Love the vibe and ask for Beverly
content: Love love love. Love live music, great food and great Bartender, ask for Beverly.  Friendly for family and couples. Lots to see and good choices for on the menu.  Sloppy Joes are my favorite there.  Corn bread with melted cheese was really good too!

headline: Have to check it out
content: Loved Sloppy Joes. Two grand bands played the evening we were there. It was great once it turned to 21 and over at 10pm. Dance floor opens up.

headline: We had a blast!
content: Fantastic night out at the legendary Sloppy Joe's! Fabulous atmosphere, great food and drink, excellent service, terrific live music. What's not to like about this amazing bar chock full of associations and history? Can't wait to go back!

headline: Good food, decent prices
content: Menu was good, but not extraordinary. Was a great place for casual dining after walking downtown Key West. Live music makes it fun.

headline: Pre anniversary trip
content: I enjoyed sloppy joes. Good food as usually great service   Live music was good as well for lunch  BBQ chicken wrap was plenty. Couldn't finish it all. The wings and Cajun fire were good as well. The food selection is a variety something for everyone

headline: Atmosphere!
content: We were in Key West on a cruise, cloudy day. We walked around, took the train tour, but the highlight was our visit to Sloppy Joe's! Fun atmosphere, friendly staff. Delicious drinks! A great place to spend some time on Key West....

headline: Late lunch Monday
content: You have to go to Sloppy Joe's when in Key West for Key Lime Shooters.  We also had their new special frozen drink, while the guys just had beers.  After a few drinks we decided to have a sandwich there.  There drinks are excellent, food...More

headline: A Must Try
content: While in Key West and on Duval St. you owe it to yourself to try Sloppy Joe's. It has an entertaining club like atmosphere.  The food is good and so is the live music.  At times it may be tough to get a table, it...More

headline: You have to see it!
content: Sloppy Joe's is truly one of the sights you should plan on seeing on your visit to Key West. It is a very unique bar with music, great food and drinks and a staff that is "native" and exceptional. As soon as you are seated,...More

headline: Time to let loose....
content: Place is open and big the drinks and food were great the atmosphere was great a place for you to relax and enjoy I was there with family this time, I stopped there all of the times I am in the Keys one of my...More

headline: Beer after dark
content: We came here 3 buddies, there was lots of people but we got some seats by the bar. The live music was excellent and we really had a good night.

headline: Lively bar!!
content: Probably the best bar in Key West! Full of history, vibrant and great live music. We also ate there I had the pulled park barbecue sandwich and it was delicious.

headline: A fun venue for afternoon fun!
content: A rainy day in Key West had me google "what to do in Key West on a rainy day."  The answer...."eat and drink."  So that's what we did.  We went to Sloppy Joe's and had a great time with good drinks, pub food and a...More

headline: great place
content: great food and live music, cold drinks, we would go there again. very comfortable atmosphere, kick back and relax ,

headline: Fun Place
content: Live music old style saloon place with a good crowd and very good food , fun place to people watch and listen to music .

headline: Drinks and Key Lime Pie
content:
Had to visit here!

Excellent waitress service very friendly.

Great atmosphere with live music.

Suitable for all ages.

Nice gift shop.

Nice Key Lime pie.

Would recommend.

headline: Good bar food
content: Above average bar food.  Located in the heart of Key West on Duvall St.  Happening scene.  Fun atmosphere.

headline: Great lunch, the sloppy Joe's are not what you grow up eating!
content: Great Food and Service in a very crowded restaurant!  No A/C all open eating, it was quite warm when we visited in October.  The food was great and we were stuffed and satisfied.  I personally would not order the Sloppy Joe's again but I'd definitely...More

headline: Fun and bar staff super nice
content: Stopped in with a large group of 20 people and Jen at the bar was super nice and accommodating. She took care of us and we took care of her. We got her to ring the bell lol

headline: Something everyone has to at least go into.
content: we went because everyone has to at least walk in. Very busy. Food was good and came out fast. Just a famous bar.

headline: Not great
content: After going to the Sloppy Joes in Tresure Island this place was a huge disappointment. The food was terrible. The entertainment was good but too many other places to go for good food and entertainment

headline: Tourist thing to do
content:
Just your average bar food
The piano player was very good
Service was very good 
Just a popular tourist bar but I would say it's a must see

headline: Good Sloppy Joes
content:
Good sloppy joes - as one would hope as it bills itself as the home of the original sloppy joe.The entertainment was not exactly family-friendly and not for all tastes, however. I guess we missed the memo when we walked in. 

The waitress neglected to...More

headline: Live music & Sloppy Joes!!!
content: The live music was awesome!! The Sloppy Joe's are great & drinks are great!  Service was excellent!  We will surely be back!!

headline: Fantastic!
content: Great food, fast and friendly service, reasonable prices. Around 10 they kick people out of tables to open up a dance floor.  Then it gets loud! But loved it both times we were here!

headline: Fun bar
content: Great music and fun atmosphere! Live music is great and friendly bartenders. We did not eat here but a must see if you into the bar scene and want a good party.

headline: Typical bar food; good music
content: Burgers are great and the drinks are plentiful.  At night they have live bands that rotate about every 90 minutes and the atmosphere is very festive.

headline: Cool tourist place
content: Cool bar. Very crowded. Middle of the day. Serves food but we just had beers. Staff very friendly and attentive. Bought t shirts. Typical tourist stuff

headline: Not great
content: Came in for a quick bite to eat. Food overpriced, my husband said he's had a better burger out if a machine. Not much food for price.  Live band so loud you can't even talk during dinner. More if a bar I'd say... Won't be...More

headline: Getting sloppy
content: Waitress was friendly and provides good service. There was a live band performing. Portions are good sized. We  had the sloppy joes, crab cakes sandwiches, many sandwich and buffalo chicken wrap.   Each person was happy with their selection. It was fun!

headline: A Key West must do
content: There is controversy over the oldest bar in Florida. Sloppy Joes may be the oldest in name but not location. That honor belongs to Captain Tony's. Both are worth a visit.

headline: Been there, done that...
content: Always a must do for Key West visitors, fun place.  On our bar hopping outing stopped in, had a shot of tequila, listened to the live music, then on to the next bar.  Fun experience.

headline: Typical beach bar
content: I really didn't see anything that made this place so special just another typical beach bar to me, live music was nice, blah menu and not that great frozen drinks

headline: Calamari
content:
Do Not order the calamari ! It is the worst in the world 
Years ago I had bragged how this place had the best , now it's the worst ! 
Told the waitress and she could have cared less she said " I wouldn't know...More

headline: Love this Place!!
content: Not the Orginial  (both are great) but good times!! Great live music (most bars have live music in Key West). Exceptional service. Great ambience. Reasonably priced drinks. When in Key West this is a must stop for me. Like most well known bars they have...More

headline: Best Bar in Town
content: We were in Key West over a long weekend in mid-July for my besties dirty thirty Birthday. On our first night in Key West we went out to Sloppy Joe's to check out the Music. OMG...I am so happy that we did. IDT Band was...More

headline: Good food and fun atmosphere!!
content: We enjoyed the food and the music!  Lots of choices and lots of history from the area!  You know when you have to wait for a seat it's good!

headline: No better 'sloppy joe' from anywhere, just like mom makes.
content: The music is always 'top notch' too!  It's such a lively place to eat and drink.  Alone or with a group of friends.  Dancing all day long.

headline: Iconic
content: You must go to Sloppy Joe's if you go to Key West.  Have a beer and soak in the ambiance.  Don't forget to buy an overpriced t-shirt, because you will wear it and it will serve as a remembrance of your trip to Key West!...More

headline: Dog Friendly, Sloppy Rita
content:
Went twice during a week long stay, each time during the afternoon/early evening. Live music on a big stage! Seat yourself: plenty of seating, but crowds quickly. Dog-friendly.
You can add a test tube of rum to any drink for just $2; quickly turn over...More

headline: Always visit this wonderful place
content: When we are on vacation in Key West, we always go to Sloppy Joe's. I haven't eaten here, but I do get drinks and listen to the awesome bands that place live music. Even got tshirts in the gift store. Love this bar.

headline: Birthday weekend
content: Brought my daughter to the Keys for her 31st birthday. We always ended up here. The band Big Daddy played the weekend and they were great. 2 guitar guys before them on Thursday were really raunchy and disgusting. I'm no prude but it was sick....More

headline: The classic bar
content:
Known for being one of Hemingway's hangouts and a place you should visit while in Key West. 

Great drinks, live music and a really fantastic party feeling place. Food is OK, but the drinks are great!

headline: Raunchy fun
content: This is a bar...house band was entertaining. Waitresses are hard working. Please tip well as they work their fannies off to make you happy. When I said I was good the waitress brought me a cup of ice water. No pressure to consume alcohol so...More

headline: Hemingway Look-a-like contest 2017
content: A friend entered the look-a-like contest (placed in the semi-finals!) so we spent 2 days at Sloppy Joes! OK it was actually about 16 hours over the 2 days but we had a blast! The contest was fun, the food great, and the drinks awesome!...More

headline: Hemingway's Bar
content: Very interesting and crowded bar.  The drinks were good and the service was fast. But the food is only so-so.  But wanted to check this bar out because Hemingway used to drink there.

headline: YOU MUST STOP TO EAT HERE
content: S0o i must say the later the better we stopped in around 830 and the place was packed, they have live bands that switch on and off with different type of music. the FOOD was amazing i had the quesadilla with sloppy joe in it.....More

headline: Great good and atmosphere!
content: Great food and atmosphere! Live music was playing and we sat near the stage so it was a little loud to talk but overall a lot of fun! Highly recommend to add to your Ley West bucket list.

headline: Birthday weekend
content: Love this place. Every time we come to Key West this is the first place we hit. Highly recommended.  The entertainment is always the best on Duval street.

headline: A must stop in Key West
content:
Sloppy Joe's is a true Key West destination.
If you want to bring the family, you need to be there before noon... it fills up fast and gets pretty rowdy. Try the original Sloppy Joe, it is delicious.. Also, all drinks include a generous pour.

headline: Lots of character and great food!
content: Loved the atmosphere and the food! Fun live entertainment! We had great service and loved the sloppy joes and taco salad! We had no idea it was the day of the annual Ernest Hemingway Look Alike contest, so that was an added plus to our...More

headline: Large but laid back place
content: Stopped in for a drink since they had live music that wasn't blasting out into the street. Our waitress was very friendly, music was good, and bathrooms were clean. Frozen run runner was pretty tasty. Even though they were packed, still got good service and...More

headline: MANY GREAT NIGHTS!!!
content: This is a GO TOO place...music is awesome, food too...lots of fun people and priced just right...you will definitely enjoy it here.

headline: Iconic place
content: A million bras hanging from the ceiling and a huge crowd drinking. That suma my experience lol I had been here many years ago and it's still the same. People come here to see this Key West iconic place, have a few drinks, take a...More

headline: Cosy family  cafe
content: Large open cafe with all kinds of visitors. Locals and tourists. Many different drinks available and of course the local cocktail specialties reasonable priced. One of the special cosy hot spots in Duval Street. Key West is one of the most nice places in the...More

headline: See Once
content: Nice vibe. Food was just ok. Frozen Rum Runner was very good. It gets very crowded at night. Would recommend stopping once, but that was enough.

headline: Always great !
content: Every time we come to key west, we stop in here. We've had lunch and dinner here before, and always excellent. Servers and bartenders are always nice and friendly. Food = awesome. It's a must to come in here while in key west. Entertainment has...More

headline: Fun times...good food
content: All of our food was great,  especially the sloppy joes, and our waitress, Sue, was attentive and friendly Live music was fun. Even though it is always busy, we always have a good time.

headline: A duval standard!
content: Go and experience this if you haven't. Learn the story about how the bar was literally moved overnight, and then go to capt Tony's to read about it on the walls! Key west is wonderful but duval's history is actually pretty entertaining!

headline: Just OK
content: My husband and I ate here while visiting Duval Street. The food was just okay. We were there around 5:30 p.m. and the band playing was terrible. I do not recommend bringing children here. I can check being here off the list but I do...More

headline: noisy
content: lots of young people, & lots of drinking. had to wait for a seat at the bar. bar tender busy, not a great personality, def a tourist attraction. won't return here, so many great places in key west!

headline: Good Times
content: Great service , fun music , huge portions !!! Took food to the hotel for snacks ! Great time . Loved me some frozen margaritas lol

headline: Great Music and so much fun!
content:
Great music whenever we went , go lunch
After dinner...
We so enjoy Sloppy Joe's and ho every year we 
Come down to the Keys...
Great to a wick lunch too!
Thank you
We will always come back!
K Ippolito

headline: Same place after 36 years
content: I was here in 1981 and am now back after 26 years. The place remains quite the same with a lot of more tourists coming to key west so the place is quite crowded. What I do not like is beer in plastic glass but...More

headline: Great place!
content: If you're in Key West you must go there!  It is well known place there.  You have to order their sloppy joes.  It's their signature sandwich obviously! It's delicious!!  It's hard to get in though.  Very busy all the time.  We finally just got there...More

headline: Island Times
content: We went two days for lunch had Havana nachos, and taco salad we shared with our spouses and drank rum runners on rocks ultra, blue moon, and margeriteas we enjoyed ourselves got full and paid less than $50 each couple

headline: Fun! Fun! Fun!
content: Sloppy Joe's is a must do if you're in Key West! Live music, great drinks and happy people. If you're looking to have a great time stop by it's always busy!!!

headline: Crowd Entertainment
content: This spot offered one of the best highlight of my trip.  Its crowded, and you have to look for your own seats, so sometimes you end up stalking a table hoping to land their seat when they leave.  The waitresses are quick, efficient, and helpful....More

headline: A Sloppy Experience!
content: Upon my visit, I decided to drop in because I read that the Sloppy Joe sandwich originated in Key West. I put my taste buds to the test. The Sloppy Joe served was the best that I have ever had (sorry Manwich). Sloppy but very...More

headline: Nicer than I thought!
content: Bellied up to the bar first thing in the morning for a cool drink (Sloppy Rita) to start the day and it wasn't busy. Bartender was a nice brunette who made a pretty kids' drink and conversation with a little girl who was with another...More

headline: A Key West tradition
content: You cant't come to Key West and not visit Sloppy Joes! Good range of artisan beers, great atmosphere, bands on stage in the evening, all round fun place.

headline: Skip this
content: This place was packed. Could not get a seat in the place. We tried just for the heck of it but it is more of a bar. Very loud crowdy.

headline: Cold Beer!
content: Great way to cool off!  A/C, live entertainment and by far the coldest beer in the keys!  Our waiter was on his toes.  We never had to ask for another beer or our food.  A must visit while in Key West.

headline: An iconic tourist trap
content: If you visit Key West, you have to stop at Sloppy Joe's on the corner Duval St. and Greene St.  If not to have a drink or a bite to eat, but at least to say you've been there or buy that t-shirt for yourself...More

headline: Every ounce Key West!
content: This is a bar with live music and food. We went there because we were hungry and thirsty as it was a hot day. We ordered a few appetizers (nachos and chicken wings)  to share and had drinks. Everything was delicious. The live entertainment was...More

headline: Lunch
content: Sloppy Joe's is a must on every visit to Key West. Good food and fun atmosphere. Live music even during the day.

headline: Tourist Trap but in a good way
content: What can you say that hasn't been said. It is against the law to visit Duval Street and not have a drink in this place. Inside it is about what you would expect, big and loud and busy. We made it a regular stop on...More

headline: Had to go
content: This is a must go place in Key West. The Havana nachos were fantastic and the drinks were not weak. Good times, good music and good food. Not disappointed.

headline: Lively & Entertaining
content: The place was packed with standing-room only due to the Hemingway Look Alike festivities. Great event with several charities benefitting. Bartenders were swamped, but were up to the task with prompt service. Will do it again!!

headline: A "Must Go To Place" in Key West
content: I love Sloppy Joe's!  I have been to Key West numerous times and this restaurant is my "Must Go To Place".  I had the sloppy joe sandwich along with a wonderful rum punch. Amazing. The restaurant was very busy but I managed to find a...More

headline: Best bar in town
content: What an atmosphere! Live music, drinks, burgers, friendly staff. We were so lucky to get a place at the bar. It was packed!

headline: Great fun in Key West.
content: Sloppy Joes should always be visited on any trip to Key West. The food is really good bar-food and sandwiches. Lots of good beers on tap, and live music. It can get quite crowded at times, but worth a visit for a drink at Ernest...More

headline: Fun Times
content: Had a good time at this bar. They have good food, spirits and music. Can be a busy place, but that is not uncommon for Key West

headline: If the cruise ships are in... good luck finding a seat
content: I've been here several time in years gone by; however, since the cruise lines have come to Key West, this place is a huge tourist hangout.  After finally getting a table, no one ever came by to take an order.  We had to go to...More

headline: Great Bar
content: This place is great. Good atmosphere wonderful service and the prices are not to bad. They have live music and a great t-shirt selection if u like collecting that stuff.

headline: Great band, a must stop
content: Sloppy Joes is one of those must stop places to grab a beer and say you were there. Awesome band, good food. Only thing was it was packed and service was a little slow, still a must see

headline: Key West Tradition
content:
If you like a great atmosphere, cold beverages, good food, and entertainment this is a must.
Service was great also!!!!

headline: Been there now
content: We've been to Key West several times but never went to Sloppy's. Well I've been there and done that but never again. The food is usual bar food for KW nothing special. I guess the nachos were ok  but certainly not worth a trip back.

headline: Fun Times great Vibe
content: look your not going here for fine dining but the cool real vibe great music and awesome drinks make up for that. a Key West institution this placed may have served Hemmingway but definitely has served many cool and interesting characters over the years. go...More

headline: Mojito Time
content: Dropped in here for beer and mojito before sunset - a must visit for everyone coming to Key West - live music was great and the mojito was strong

headline: Never Disappoints
