content: Stop here to cool off and have an adult beverage and lunch or appetizers. Had the smoked fish dip( delish). Had young ones and all had fun with the atmosphere and music.

headline: Must go..food not great
content: So I've heard about this place for years being a native Floridian I've seen the T-shirt so obviously I had to go I went earlier in the day and had a custom beer of theirs it was nice and cold it was very hot outside...More

headline: Perfect Rum runner
content:
Captain Rum runner is the best ever in key west and maybe Florida... Dennis was our server at the bar and he was very attentive and friendly and fast.  

The music is on point... loving the vibe... should have stop here first. A must for...More

headline: Save your dollars
content: OK been there done that didn't buy the t-shirt. We must have caught the waitress on a bad day, she could barely smile let alone give us the time of day. It's a bar, the food is mediocre too much gloopy sauce. Rum runner cocktail...More

headline: Sloppy Joe Bar foods and walk in seating for 8...
content: We traveled to Key West for 4th of July weekend. We went to Sloppy Joe's around 3pm on Saturday afternoon. We sat right away, the waitress helped us throw a few high top tables together near the stage. There was some music going, which was...More

headline: A Key West must do
content: Obviously the Hemingway hype is there, but it is also a cool bar in its own right. Live music, great Margaritas, nice bar food - would recommend the Sloppy Joe nachos.

headline: Can't bring my drink in? What??
content: So, we were out on a Sunday night, had just left Caroline's where we had got a drink and wanted to go listen to some music and check out the popular Sloppy Joe's. Well, I guess there are young people at night more so then...More

headline: Well, it's been around, it's a historical place. It's a must.
content: But, if not, I'd say; food is underperforming, no spices, served in plastic containers with plastic. Drinks are strange tasting and unimpressive. Overall: a tourist must do but not worth while if going for the food/drinks. Waiter was prompt and nice but food servant hated...More

headline: Come for the brand, not for the food...
content: So we stopped in to Sloppy Joe's because everyone kept saying it was "the bar" in Key West. The service was great, the drinks were reasonably priced, and the food was just average. I found their famous sloppy joe meat to be a little too...More

headline: popular funspot
content: Sloppy Joes is one of the most popular bars in Key West. they always have good music and it is a fun environment. The food is just OK but what it lacks in the food makes up for in the overall experience of Duval Street.

headline: Always a Good Time
content: Every time we come to Key West we have to stop into Sloppy Joe's for lunch and a blended drink. Fresh Peel and Eat Key West Pink Shrimp, Blue Crab cake sandwich, amazing as always. Family friendly until 10pm then it is adults only as...More

headline: Bar
content: This place was awesome. The bar maid was from the Iowa, she was great and very upbeat. The drinks was worth the money . She knew the words of the live band that was playing. Her energy alone was enough to make you feel at...More

headline: Lunch time
content:
It's a sloppy joe.  I eat them.  They are good.  This place does them right...which I'd hope so since they originated it?
Wait staff was alright.  Smiles.  But they seemed distracted. My sloppy joe hit the spot!

headline: Sloppy Joe's great as always
content: Got a taxi to deliver us here drank all night danced all night loved it as always took a taxi back home slept half of the following day always worth it

headline: Sloppy Joes !
content:
It's what it says on label, but great atmosphere!
You must try a Sloppy Joes my friend told me, and I did it definitely is sloppy so be warned as you will probably be wearing some of it tyne time you leave.

It's one of...More

headline: Good music and good drinks
content: This was the bar that I found I frequented the most during my visit. One night they had a cover band which I adored. I danced the entire night. Drinks are strong and they offer an array of specialty shots...pineapple upside down cake shot was...More

headline: Hasn't changed
content: Always a nice stop for a cold beer and great music. Great service even when its crowded. Food looks great.

headline: Key West Trip
content: It is seat yourself, so watch closely for a table of people to leave and move in.  It is crowded and loud.  My husband had the Sloppy Joe sandwich and I had the Sloppy Joe fries.  The food was ok, the live music was great.

headline: The "Wetherspoons" of Key West
content: So this is one of those advertised "must go to" bars on Key West and it's true: great location, live music and food (I had spicy chicken wraps that were served quickly and tasted great) BUT it is quite large and a bit impersonal -...More

headline: Good atmosphere
content: What is a trip to Key West without a stop at Sloppy Joes? The drinks were good and not as expensive as other places in the Keys. Good atmosphere with live music.

headline: Get Sloppy
content: Ate here twice during our visit. Easy seating, you just find a table. Great fast service while you enjoy the live band. You have to try the sloppy it's so good.

headline: Classic...gotta go!!!
content: You must check out the famous Sloppy Joe's Restaurant. There are live-streaming cameras so you can wave at loved ones back home! So fun! Great bands, food, service! We had a great time! Consistently awesome!!! I don't feel I'm in Key West until I've ordered...More

headline: Great entertainment! Everyone was so friendly. Bartenders were awesome!!  Appetizers were good.
content: This place was recommended; we stopped for drinks and they had an awesome band playing. Everyone was very nice. Bartenders were awesome! Easy to strike up conversations with everyone there. Would definitely visit again!

headline: Popular bar
content: Nice bar where there always is music and usually a lot of people. Nice place for adults who like live music and (usually) crowded bar.

headline: A must
content: Not the original, but as close as you can get.  The original Sloppy Joe's is two blocks down. The owner of that building raised the rent $1 a week, Sloppy Joe got mad, told the patrons to take their drinks and stools and move to...More

headline: Fun place with friendly bartenders
content: It was fun sitting at the small bar on the side and talking with the bartenders and locals.  The fish dip was very good, and so was my mojito.  A fun place.

headline: Great place for adult beverages and great times
content: Went there several afternoons while in Key West.  Cold adult beverages flow great wait staff and average prices for the Keys.  This is one place that needs to be in your pub crawl!  Bar type food and fast efficient service.

headline: Always good
content: They've been around a long time for a reason. Good food, good service, great love music. Family friendly (in the daytime). A little loud for kiddies, but we were ok.

headline: So much fun
content: We stopped in here because it's an institution and you have to. We ordered drinks and the fish dip recommended by the waitress. It was so hot outside so it was great to come in and cool off. My drink was a pina colada/strawberry daiquiri...More

headline: Fun place for music, drinks and food
content: Expect a packed house when the cruise ships come in. We were lucky to get a table for 8. Waitress was super friendly and helpful. Honky tonk piano player makes for a fun atmosphere. Menu provided usual bar food. The Sloppy Joe sandwich wasn't that...More

headline: Key West Trip
content: Of course you need to visit this place, its Iconic!! They had great music and the food was great for lunch! It right off Duval St so its not far from all the other attractions and shops.

headline: Lunch at Sloppy Joe's, Key West, Fl
content: We had lunch at usually reliable Sloppy Joe's, for their signature Sloppy Joe sandwich. Unfortunately, the recipe has changed and the amount of meat has diminished such that I can't recommend the meal anymore. We did complain and management did the right thing by not...More

headline: Weekend at key west
content: Visited key west for the weekend went to a few bars in Duval street sloppy joes being one to say this street on a Saturday night is full on is an understatement all the bars seem to have some sort of entertainment going on so...More

headline: Night out
content: Second time in key west and had to visit Sloppy Joes again fantastic atmosphere great live music and good mojitos! Well worth a visit

headline: Highly Recommend
content: 5 Stars all around for this iconic landmark in Key West. The service is upstanding and the atmosphere is fun and engaging. We went there 2 times and the drinks are made very well and the food is great and well presented. I am not...More

headline: Bad service
content: Went on the evening of July 5th based on recommendations. The service was poor. The waitress was so rushed and not friendly at all. Definitely not the vibe I was looking for. The conch fritters were good.   Had to stop different waitresses to ask for...More

headline: Fun, Inviting Atmosphere
content: Our waitress was very nice. The food and the drinks came out quickly. The waitress came past our table several times to check on us and see if we needed refills or anything. The quesadilla was very tasty. I ordered mine with just cheese and...More

headline: Fun, funky vibe
content: Our sloppy joes were delish, the music was great and we liked it. They need sweet tea to make it the best.

headline: Kick back and laugh
content: The love music entertainment was warm, southern, snarky and humorous. True musical talent on stage and great heavy liquor pours. Food was quick too even with a packed house.

headline: Sloppy Joe's
content:
This bar is so nostalgic and that's what makes it so cool. It could use some updating but then again it would change the place.. Always entertainment and plenty of cold beer.. 
Have fun.

headline: Fun place to stop for a drink
content: Stopped here to get out of the heat. Service was great , drinks were spot on. We didn't eat anything but the food that passed by looked appetizing.  Nice lively place to relax & enjoy the spirit of Key West

headline: Quick trip inside
content: We couldn't go to Key West and not get pictures of Sloppy Joe's so the kids and I waited outside while my husband zipped inside with the Go-pro to film the place.  The patrons were having a good time and were friendly and waving at...More

headline: 4th of July getaway
content: After spending time renting jet ski's at Sunset Watersports, we rode our bikes for a nice lunch of sloppy joe's (of course) and a couple of adult frozen beverages. Music was good, food and drinks were good. Then off for more bike riding.

headline: Very Popular Hemingway Haunt
content: Sloppy Joe's is reputed to be a favorite bar of Ernest Hemingway when he lived here and wrote 8 books. The bar has since moved from its original location across the street, but it is still gigantic, dimly lit, cavernous, with lots of seating and...More

headline: Fun!
content: Sloppy Joe's is an old Key West staple that has been around forever. The drinks are always good, the food is good, and the bands play a variety of music. First come first served is the rule but many tables are available.

headline: Surprisingly Enjoyable Meal
content: We have always passed by this establishment, and never got the urge to try.  So glad we did.  It is 'open', but once you go inside there is air conditioning, which makes you immediately enjoy the environment.  We had live entertainment which was very enjoyable,...More

headline: Sloppy Joe anyone?
content: Brace yourself for the prices ! Oh the food.. sloppy joes all around at our table with a side of sloppy fries. It was good. The sloppy joes were big and filling as well as messy. Music was playing and it was an enjoyable experience....More

headline: Great mid-afternoon stop!
content: Great place to visit for a mid-afternoon refresher stop!  The history and atmosphere are legendary Key West!  The staff is personable and friendly as well as knowledgeable about the area. We received several good travel tips!  The sloppy fries are wonderful and I highly recommend...More

headline: Best pi√±a colada ever
content: The waitress asked me if I wanted extra rum in my drink. The girl sat next to me said yes. Next time here I won't hesitate. Soooo good. Must visit

headline: Another Fun Trip
content: Came back here and enjoyed the fun.  Same two guys playing live music from 2 years ago where there again.  Had the smoked fish dip again. Still a great stop.

headline: Thank goodness for AC
content: We stopped in to Sloppy Joes for the obligatory beer while in KeyWest.  We stayed longer than planned because the bartender was so friendly and the AC was on.  Definitely a must see!!

headline: Ernest drank here
content: Along with every tourist and local.  It's  famous.  Great atmosphere.  Always packed.  Good music decent bar food. Key west is sloppy Joes on Duvall.

headline: Must Do!
content: We stopped here for lunch after walking Duvall street a little and it is such a fun place they had live music and the food was excellent we had the fish sandwich and onion rings. we also had pina coladas that were very good Its...More

headline: Vacation!
content: Historic and a must for everyone visiting the shore! Enjoyed the environment and music! Has not changed in 30 plus years since the last visit!

headline: Good live entertainment
content: This is on famous Duval Street where many bars/restaurants/shops are located. Live band was playing & they were good. Service is good. Had steamed 1 lb shrimp which we really enjoyed along with fried calamari & conch fritters which was also good.

headline: Cool if you come to party in the evening
content: Big bar with live concert in the evening, so partytime place. We were here only in the evening, the music was good, but it's crowded.

headline: A very busy bar
content: A very busy bar. If you are looking for fun and good drinks, this will be your favorite bar in the city.

headline: Traditional Fun
content: Another never gets old!  A lot of fun listening to great music from the live band. With nine family and friends together, makes for a great time!

headline: Average food, more the atmosphere
content: Seems everyone wants to stop here when in Key West and who can blame them. Food and drink no different than any of the other bars. I would rather go to Irish Kevin's for the music .

headline: Fun place among many fun places in Key West to eat and drink!
content: If you are looking for a fun atmosphere, with a very friendly staff of bartenders and waiter/waitresses if you choose to eat at a table or around the bars, where you can get good, no frills but tasty food with relatively inexpensive drinks for Key...More

headline: Seafood and music
content: The steamed shrimp is among the best on the island. It is flavorful and light.  The bands are very good and the atmosphere is fun!! We went there several times during our stay.

headline: Sloppy Joe's is a special place!
content: This is the place to see and eat at if you want traditional Key West. Excellent food and great service!  Live music and a happening atmosphere!

headline: If you are in key west no questions GO
content: Hamburgers are good but the sloppy joe fries are awesome. You go to key west you must try at least once. Drinks are great get the sloppy Rita. Very good. Also it is set yourself so it does get crowded but not that long a...More

headline: Quick lunch
content: Great location & great service!  We stopped in for a quick bite and drink before our boat tour.  Our bartender was awesome and she recommended some great food & drinks.

headline: First Vist
content: Great history, food was great, service not so great. The margarita was weak and our waitress was a little rude. My son got the Sloppy Joe, it wasn't good. I got the Buffalo chicken tool up and it was awesome.

headline: Super Friendly Staff
content: This is essentially ground zero for Key West - great open bar/restaurant with wonderful service.  The food is pretty good - the drinks are great - but the service is the best.  Very friendly atmosphere - will definitely go here next time we're in Key...More

headline: Nice dinner!
content: We had a nice dinner here although I was slightly disappointed in the sloppy joes. I absolutely LOVE sloppy joes and had high expectations. Don't get me wrong, it was not bad by any means, I think I was just expecting like the best one...More

headline: Birthday
content: Smoked fish dip was great. It was my sons 24th birthday and they were quick to help us celebrate. Great live music. We will return.

headline: Skip the food, go for a nostalgic drink
content: This is uber famous and touristy. We had to stop in for a drink. Lots of fun...even got the T-shirt. But, we wanted a snack and got an order of conch fritters. Ugh. Compared to other restaurants and bars, they were not good. But get...More

headline: Lunch!
content: Fabulous! Perfect lunch in the Tap room. Great barfood and good service! Must have Sloppy Joe Fries. Nice beer selection!

headline: One of my faves
content: Tried hard not to be a Sloppy Joe's regular, but I can't resist. Sloppy Rita's and Papa Doble's are great. The entertainment is always good and the crowd is fun to watch. We stop in late afternoons and always worthwhile.

headline: GOTTA GOTTA GO!!
content: You can't go to Key West without stopping in here.  Get the nachos and top them with the Sloppy Joe mix.  YUM.  Fun place, great wait staff, usually live music going on, drinks are cold.  Stop by the souvenir store on your way out if...More

headline: WAITRESS STOLE CREDIT CARD
content: Went here one night we were staying in key west , opened a bar tab about an hour before we left and the bartenders keep the cards . We went to check out after a couple drinks and some food and the bartender only gave...More

headline: Awesome Lunch Visit!
content: Ordered the famous Sloppy Rita and it did not disappoint (got two!). For my entree I went with the Sloppy Joe. I would never order a sloppy joe at any other restaurant, but figured I would give it a try since they are famous for...More

headline: Sloppy Fries
content: So everyone knows you must go to Sloppy Joe's when visiting Key West. Great variety on menu, outstanding music and drinks. Sloppy fries were deliciously cheesy and sloppy.

headline: Review of Sloppy Joe's
content: The food was good and the service was wonderful. It was very busy and they had enough staff on hand to handle the crowds.

headline: Yum yum
content: Good was great and came out super fast! Live music really spiced up dinner and had a great overall atmosphere

headline: Birthday celebration
content: Had an absolute blast at sloppy joes for my friend's birthday. Big age range in there. Mostly twenty and thirty somethings there, but us young at heart fifty something's had a great time dancing all night with these kids, lol. The live band was fantastic...More

headline: Great Bar with Live Music
content: This bar has been steadily busy every time we pass it so we decided to stop in this afternoon. I had the Frozen Bacardi Light Rum Runner and then a Frozen Strawberry Colada - my favorite was the first one. My husband had the Sloppy...More

headline: Always A Good Time
content: Great drinks, good live music.  Always the Key West vibe!  Blacked fish tacos were great as well as the Sloppy Rita!  Had a excellent server named Justin.  It was the perfect place to relax and cool off on a hot day.

headline: Great 1st Time!
content: Stopped at Sloppy Joe's for 1st time in Key West. The place is like a pub, live local singer was playing and he was great, matched the atmosphere that you expect in Key West. Food was great, my son and I had the Sloppy Joe...More

headline: Average
content:
Atmosphere is cool but food is just average. I did like my BBQ mustard sandwich. Nachos were ok, not great.
The live music was cool.
This place is definitely more about atmosphere and the bar than the food.

headline: Love this place great atmosphere good food.
content: Great fun bar with live music, there is a really good crowd that go into Sloppy Joe's, always had great service from the bar staff, and the food has always been good quality and served really hot. Beware the meals are very large

headline: Food
content: We had high expectations....but were disappointed with the food. The entertainment was good, so was the service. The food was just ok.

headline: Lunch
content: Great lunch!  Had the sloppy Joe sandwich, which was great.  My husband and son loved their choices too!  Crab party sandwich and a smothered fish sandwich.  There was live music also which was great!  Casual atmosphere and friendly employees.

headline: Poor Treatment and Attitude at Sloppy Joe's
content: We were not treated well by our waiter who was somewhat rude and inefficient.  He was obnoxious and condescending with his behavior.

headline: "Disappointed" Emoji
content: It could have been great but the waitress was a complete "witch" (W=B). No-one would help us find a table and we were left to stand above people who were finishing their meals in order to secure our own table; I felt horrible hovering over...More

headline: Day one of vacation
content: Our first meal in Key West at Hemingway's hangout and we were not disappointed. Lunchtime live music, incredible fish & chips, fish tacos, and monitors. A MUST if you're visiting Key West.

headline: A home for rummy's
content: Yes, it's a tourist trap. Yes, it's packed to the gills. However, the staff is great and the drinks are great. The food is what the food is. Good pub crub.

headline: Hemingway's place.
content: We had to go there because of Hemingway. The food was ok, kind of just average, but the beer was cold and good and the guitarist was good........

headline: Great place
content: This was awesome. The drinks were cold and quickly served. We had the burgers and they were delicious. Our server had 10 tables and she was good, she came by our table often.

headline: The Ernest Emingway's favorite bar! mine too!
content:
The Ernest Emingway's favorite bar! mine too! Besides of good food, the beer is cold, and there is always good life music in the air. Once is Key 
west, it is a must go there!

headline: Ducked in to avoid the rain
content: This was the perfect spot to duck in while the rain moved thru.  The bartender was very friendly and kept the drinks coming while it poured outside.  Live music was good too.  What I saw people eating looked really good we just never had the...More

headline: You have to go to say you did
content: I am not really sure where I am going to take this. I have spent a lot time in Key West over the last 20-years, and I think Sloppy Joe's might be declining. The entertainment was ok, nothing to write home about. The drinks were...More

headline: Hot time on Duval
content: This is a happen place. The music was going early the day we stopped in. We sat in the back bar to talk. The bar tender was very good and offered up some good places to eat. Night life is a hoot. Be sure to...More

headline: Still the Best Party in Town
content: Great place to hang out at night and listen to some great music.  There is always a different type and style of music at Sloppy Joes. There are 2 guys that have been there forever and they plays Thursday to Saturday.  They take real songs...More

headline: Always full of entertainment
content: We came here one night to see a band from Cleveland. They were great! Funny songs but definitely just for adults. We stayed after for the next band and enjoyed ourselves all night. Drinks are great and the atmosphere is enjoyable.

headline: Fun place!
content: We had heard about Sloppy Joe's, so we had to check it out.  Their sloppy fries were yummo!  We had sloppy joe sandwiches, taco salad with sloppy joe meat and quesadillas with sloppy joe inside.  Everything was great, the guy singing and playing the piano...More

headline: always a place to stop
content: It is a place everyone should stop and grab an Sloppy Joe and a Margarita. The food is not great but is worth stopping by just because there is a little bit of history there.  Live music is my favourite part.

headline: If on Duval St...stop in.
content: Stopped here for drinks.  Drinks were good, but expensive....but it is Key West. Seemed like the normal price for drinks in Key West.  The band was good. A fun stop when walking down Duval.

headline: Must go
content: This is a must see and experience local landmark. Go during the day but definitely come back at night. So much fun!  The food and drinks are excellent and you can't beat the atmosphere!  Highly recommended!

headline: amazing
content: walking past here on duval street you just have to stop and go in or just take a view of the place, historic.

headline: Trip through the Keys
content:
Out of all the bars on Duvall St. This was by far my favorite. Service was excellent and everyone was so friendly. The atmosphere and the band's were awesome

J Lewis

headline: Iconic Key West
content: If you're in key west, sloppy joes is one of the places you have to stop and experience. There's nothing else like it.

headline: Great for happy hour
content: I'd love to say that I've only been in here a few times lol. But since I've lived here for the past 40 years I've stop by from time to time and had a few cold beers the food is actually excellent. And the live...More

headline: Another Bar in the famous bar in the Key's .
content: Again I say if you are bar hopping, you have to stop in Sloppy Joe's for a drink... The food looked and smelled good but only had drinks and listened to good music..

headline: Cool history
content: It's worth stopping in for a drink and seeing all the old pictures on the wall. Friendly bartenders. Food nothing special and there is better music in other bars. Still a pretty cool spot though.

headline: Honeymoon
content: Sloppy Joes is a bar and a restaurant. Kids can go in but I think it is mainly for adults. The Naxos with sloppy joes was a huge portion and it was good. They have live bands and loud music but it was fun to...More

headline: Ernest Hemingway's old digs are a great stop in Key West.
content: If you like a rowdy spot, the front bar would be the place for you as they have live music and lots of folks having a blast. But if you like it a bit quieter, then go out of the side door, around to the...More

headline: Good service & atmosphere, food average
content: A group of six went here for lunch. Live music playing and friendly waiter made it a nice escape from the heat. The shrimp po-boy was disappointing and needs work. Drinks were tasty. A chicken wrap was good.

headline: Tourist spot
content:
So yes, I do call Sloppy Joe's a tourist spot. Yes, I am a tourist but I had rather experience places that have more of an island flavor
We shared mozzarella sticks and boiled shrimp, both typical bar food.  Rum runners were good.  Live music...More

headline: Wanna have fun ?
content: There is not a more iconic place in Key West than Sloppy Joes. The fun, the music and the atmosphere are what make it the best. Two of the bartenders....Jordan and Heather are just so friendly and treat every patron with a smile. When you...More

headline: Exactly as expected
content: We loved this place, it's what you would expect and it's got such great history with it being Ernest Hemingway favourite spot fur a drink and his involvement of it moving l. We've had been watching their live cams fur some months before going there...More

headline: Must Place To Visit
content: We came down for the day to Key West as we were staying in Miami.I watch this place regularly on there online webcam.It is a must place visit.We got there around lunchtime and fish and chips and a few beers listening to guy playing Guitar.Its...More

headline: Great Arepas!
content: The best thing on the menu is the Arepas!  Delicious!  I would go back there just for them.  I also enjoyed listening to the piano player while eating.  He was very entertaining.  The sloppy joe was a little too sweet for me.  The food was...More

headline: Way Overrated
content: The place is a zoo! Packed with people and families with kids running around.  The food was clean but not the best‚Ä¶less deserving from an OK diner.  They do offer a musical band ‚Äì they could sing, play and they were fun to listen too....More

headline: Fun
content: Stopped in to have a beer and listen to the entertainment.   Very busy but that's to be expected.   Bartender was nice but not much of a personality.

headline: Nice place, good music.
content: We were informed by friends that we had to stop here when in the Keys, so we did. Had a late supper and listened to some good local musicians. Blackened chicken sandwich was great, highly recommend it. I know I should have tried the Sloppy...More

headline: Name says it all
content: Another tourist trap. I prefer the smaller type places when I want drinks. Ordered a burger and beer. It was good and the service was friendly

headline: Great lil bar
content: Enjoyed the atmosphere, the music and our bartender Dave Guest was great. Definitely recommend hanging out here. Try the sloppy joe fries. Great drinks... try the End of the World frozen drink

headline: A must see for drinks.
content:
We stopped in for drinks. Sat at the bar. This place stays pretty busy. People watching is good here. I had been here a few years ago as well. I would go back. 

It's interesting that this was Hemmingway's favorite bar. Pictures of him on...More

headline: THis place is a great party bar!!!!
content: The live bands were amazing!!! Waiters were very good! Hemingway history!! We had such a good time there ( twice in our weeks stray) dancing  You have to go especially if a band called National Act is going to be performing. Quite a show!!!

headline: Live Music and Great Drinks
content: This was one of my favorite places to go to during our stay in key west.  Live music each day from noon until close.  Great assortment of beer on draft and cocktails.  The drinks were very good and the food was also excellent--which exceeded expectations....More

headline: Cool place to eat!
content: I liked the food, the atmosphere, the people, and good stopover to cool off when we walked a lot.  All food looked great.  I had a great salad.

headline: Amazing place!
content: Had a great time. Awesome Sloppy Joe and Sloppy Fries! The Hemingway Mojito was great as well. Atmosphere was great too! If you're a Hemingway fan, you HAVE to stop in.

headline: A Mainstay in Key West
content: YOu have to stop in for at least a cold beverage while in Key West. The place is loud, open and lots of fun. Live music and the live internet camera feed add to the fun.

headline: Just OK food
content: We thoroughly enjoyed the guitar player, and the vibe of the restaurant, but all 6 of us thought the food was sub par.

headline: Birthday
content:
Fabulous!!! Music and dancing was awesome.  The nachos were great the bands were tight !
Cancelled dinner reservations and stayed til close

headline: Great Atmosphere!
content: We were fortunate to be in Key West whilst Big Daddy's Band were in town. They played nightly at Sloppy Joe's and their gig was the highlight of our evening. Great service, great atmosphere. Fabulous times all round!

headline: Fun place with live music.
content: Primarily a bar with live music as well as a dance floor if you wish to dance.  They do have food if you want.  It is a historic place in a good location on Duval Street, and a lot of fun to go in and...More

headline: Cold beer üçª
content: So hot outside and even though it has open doors it was still very comfortable in side! AC running! Very cold beer which is what we needed! Music was good! We also had the fish dip which was very tasty and a nice snack to...More

headline: Not impressed
content: The restaurant was fun, there was a lady playing guitar with her dog. Service was a little slow but we were in no hurry. I was excited to try a sloppy joe from Sloppy Joe's before we even went to Key West. Boy was I...More

headline: Very Entertaining
content: We stopped by last night to wait out the rain and thunderstorms. Pete & Wayne were "preforming."  They are very entertaining and comical. Lou was an excellent bartender. The couple of appetizers we purchased were good, but typical bar food quality. Overall, a fun place...More

headline: Stop for a drink and life music...
content: The live music is awesome and drinks. However food was mediocre at best. I would recommend a cocktail and keep on going elsewhere for food. The servers were awesome tho!

headline: Seriously???
content: We stopped by on a busy Thursday evening for a beer and a snack. The food was good, and the bartender was gracious and professional. However, the house band was performing a nonstop string of dirty ditties that would be more likely to be sung...More

headline: Just Okay.
content: Took wife and daughter to Sloppy Joes and it just wasn't our thing.  Not quite sure what I expected but it was too crowded and service was slow to say the least.  I'm 44 and perhaps 20 years ago this would have been cool.  My...More

headline: There are better places
content: My girlfriend and I went here for lunch.  I had the mozzarella sticks, which were average.  My girlfriend had the blackened fish tacos, which she said she would not get again.  The staff was very nice and the atmosphere was neat, but if you are...More

headline: Fun Place, A Must Stop
content: All we did was stop in for a drink and a chance to cool off, so I can't say if the food is good or not but I have to admit, it looked VERY good.  Beer was cold, entertainment was above average, service was good,...More

headline: Lou is the best!
content: We had so much fun at Sloppy Joes... we went back each day for a little (ok, a lot of) day drinking. Lou, the bartender, is awesome and hilarious. He totally made our trip so much more fun. The atmosphere at Sloppy Joes is so...More

headline: Worth stopping in on your trip to KW
content: Stopped here for lunch on a Sunday afternoon last weekend with my girlfriend. Place was virtually full but we were able to grab a table immediately.  I've been here several times over the last 20 years and its just a good place to hang out....More

headline: Nasty, Cold, Poor Tasting Slop for Food Which Was Poorly Served
content:
This place might be good to have a beer if you get lucky enough with the right server but man the food was horrible, our worse restaurant experience in KW.

Their server was like the walking dead, either hung over or didn't care or both....More

headline: Daydrinking
content: Great bands,crowded but fun,always the best bands,lots of dancing.  I loved shopping at the store for great shirts...lots of bars inside  it gets real crowded ,if you don't like crowds

headline: Quick drinks!
content: I love everything about this place. Great drinks and staff and a good spot to get out of the sun and cool off.

headline: Lunch visit
content: Justin our waiter was terrific. Be sure to try the local ale. Had a couple of appetizers. Gets pretty busy at lunchtime when cruise ship is docked. Get an early lunch or wait until crowd thins out

headline: Good fun with excellent live bands
content: Great craic here. Very lively spot with great music. Would recommend for a party night but not for the ones who want a quiet night

headline: Decent Food and Great Service
content: My wife and I made repeat trips to Sloppy Joes which is not something we did for most of the other places we stopped in on.  The live entertainment was good, bar food decent (The Arepas are awesome!!) and bar tenders were super friendly.

headline: Best music is town!
content: Sloppy Joe's is awesome! Great bands playing with an upbeat and fun vibe. They have milagro- my favorite tequila and the staff and quick and helpful.

headline: Fun time
content: Had some drinks, met some annual visitors.  Friendly bartenders, great mojitos.  This during the day.  Returned at night and again we had a wonderful time.  The band was very good. Even tho a tourist venue....still enjoyed.

headline: Excellent cold beer
content: Was not impressed with fried cheese sticks,,  apparently they had thawed out before frying and they were full of water,, conch fritters were discussing with rubbery items that you could not chew !!  Definitely a place to visit for the first time,

headline: "Don't miss this place"
content: Wow! What a great place. Food is great. Gotta try their namesake. Sloppy Joe comes out hot and wonderful. The bar is great and the drinks are cold. Live band on stage knocks your socks off! They have live video outside on Duval St. Fun...More

headline: Drinks were cold, music was great, food was hot!
content:
Fun place to have a cold beverage, hot sandwich or pizza and enjoy the music.
Great service and friendly place to hang out!

headline: Over rated
content: What can we say we had to try this place it was ok nothing great and kinda pricey we had the sloppy joes sandwich it was good did not come with fries had to order them on the side. I can say I ate there....More

headline: Must see
content: Classic must see place. When I think of Key West, I think of the world famous Sloppy Joes! Live music, great drinks, friendly staff, Duvall street party!

headline: Soooooo crowded!üò±
content: This restaurant is very very busy in the weekends. Food is good and drinks are good too. It is kind of noisy but a very good place to have a good time. I recommend this restaurant for people that do not mind to stay in...More

headline: Fun times on Duval St.
content: This place has been one of our must stops on our stroll down Duval. It has several web cams so we end of texting family and friends to watch us do our shots live. Plenty of cocktails and beer to make everyone happy. The food...More

headline: Location Music Fun
content:
Great place. Live music!
Great drink selection and food!
Wait staff and bar staff made this a great place to visit!
Try the frozen varieties!!
On Duval near waterfront and Mallory Square.

headline: Lunch on Key West
content: This place was recommended to me by my grandson. It is very popular. I had the conch fritters they were ok but more batter than conch. The fish tacos were very good.

headline: Great Lunch
content: We were able to walk right in and sit down with a party of five. Service was good and the live music was good as well. We tried many different entrees and all were very good. The House Specialty Sloppy Rita was excellent.

headline: Keep on going back
content: Started coming to Key West 20 years ago.  Sloppy Joes & the staff there have always treated us great!  We have been going back to see our favorite bartender, Carla C, year after year!  Every time we know someone going to KW, we always tell...More

headline: Odd but delicious experience
content: I went to Sloppy Joe's with a group of 8 ladies for a bachelorette party. We luckily found a table to accommodate, but note that all seating is first come, first served. This is especially hard for a larger group of people like us. We...More

headline: Iconic bar lived up to its reputation
content:
History seeps from the pores of this place. Yes, it's filled with tourists, just like every other place in Key West. But that is part of the charm. 

I had to have the traditional Sloppy Joe. It was the best I've had. Drinks and service...More

headline: Great live music and place full of personality
content: Nice to find some air conditioning and great / cold drinks!  A really famous and hard case place - great live music (old hippy stuff!), and fab decor.  Cool spot.  Quite a big place.

headline: Relaxing after a day of touring Key West
content: Stopped in at Sloppy Joes after a long day touring Key West. This bar is a Key West institution and there is a good mix of locals and tourists. The staff were very friendly and the food looked delicious - I wish we could have...More

headline: One-Day visit to Key West
content:
Stayed at the penthouse, Marriott Waterfront.  Great accommodations for
5 of us. Two bedrooms, two bathrooms
And living room. Only drawback is that
Is not near the center of action in Key West.  The service and accommodations 
Made up for that. Good breakfast and Starbucks...More

headline: Quick stop
content: Need to visit just due to the history and tales of the bar owner and Hemingway.  Quick drink and move on but is another must stop in place in Key West.

headline: Great Music
content: Had a blast not only with the live band but with the dj. Super fun place to spend a nice night out. Loved it

headline: Best Rum runner on the island
content: Excellent food!! Obviously recommend the sloppy joe or sloppy fries....so good!! Hands down the best rum runner and pina colada on the island!! Great atmosphere and live music too!

headline: Key west with my girls
content: Tons of fun day or night... friendly staff...great music...great drinks...all ages...  would defiantly go back

headline: Sloppy Joe's, a Key West Mainstay
content: Tourist or local, If you want a bar that captures the essence of Key West and the spirit of Hemingway, this is your spot. Be it a beer or Margurita, you can settle in at the bar with welcoming staff and clientele. At the center...More

headline: Overrated
content: We had drink and food here, which were fine. It all started looking up when we found the side bar. Part of the same place, but quieter and cooler.

headline: Not going back
content: Second time here and not sure what the big deal is.. I guess because they have live entertainment.. that is the only thing good about it and they have air condition. Process food/poor bar food, Just go for drinks and music.

headline: FUN PLACE TO DANCE! Great service!
content: We actually came here twice in the four days we were in KW because the band was awesome, the dance floor was big, the drinks were good and the service was friendly! Highly recommend!

headline: Fun place
content:
We were pleasantly surprised by the way this place is managed, although there's a lot of drinking and dancing the security staff strictly
Maintains order and doesn't allow anyone to get out of control and cause problems, we we're able to drink, eat and dance...More

headline: Military
content: Was having a Great time until security decided to get aggressive on a miltary person from another country that spilt a beer at our table yes hes was drunk, but they had to of called the police before security came to the table. the poor...More

headline: Must stop by
content:
This is a Key West tradition. Awesome decor, and solid food. Of course you should try a sloppy joe (or sloppy fries).  

Entertainment is awesome and the night time this place turns into a dancing girl's dreams.

headline: It's ok
content: It's famous place for what it is. Music, food, drinks. Hoped for a particular band but wasn't there. Loud but fun. It is what it is.

headline: A Classic KW Spot
content: Sloppy' sis just one of those places you must go to when you visit KW!  It epitomizes the "feel" of Duval and the bar scene overall.  The live music is always good and the nostalgic feeling is cool.  Justin is our favorite server!  He's super...More

headline: A lot of fun
content: A fun place with really good music and pretty good food. I thought the hot dog was better than the signature "Sloppy Joe". Hemingway's old hangout is worth a visit.

headline: Awesome Music
content: Went in with a group of girls for a few drinks since we were celebrating a bachelorette party. Shots were good, music was great

headline: What's Key West without Sloppy Joe's?
content: It does not matter what night you go, Duval Street is always hopping! We ate there Sunday night and enjoyed some great music, a huge plate full of nachos and some chicken wings! (I guess we had had enough seafood recently...) The noise is always...More

headline: A Tradition
content: Had a great time. The BBQ Pulled Pork sandwich was amazing, the live band was a bonus and the gift shop was to pricey. They could use a little help on mojito drink making all the leaves were at the bottom. Otherwise it was a...More

headline: Best Tourist trap in key west
content: It's a party. Band is always there and service is quick. In and out baby. The food looked good. Their version of poutine is definitely sharable and looked real good.

headline: A lunch stop
content: Made a stop here for the food (lunch). Food was great with adequate portions. The service was awesome as well considering there was a cruise ship in town.

headline: Day trip 36 years after my first visit
content: Went to sloppy joes 36 years ago. I was pregnant then and couldn't eat. Made up for it second time round. Great food and great cocktails. Especially the one that tasted like key lime pie! Well worth a visit.

headline: Love this place...
content: Pete and Wayne make it a treat to go here. Too bad they cut their shows down. Staff pretty friendly, would recommend!

headline: Stopped in for a Sloppy Joe
content:
A friend and I stopped here after some Duval crawling. Enjoyed the sloppy Joes and the beers. Music was good. Sloppy Joes are really large. Service was good and atmosphere was great.

Stop in for a bite!

headline: You can't Miss this one!!!
content: Sloppy Joe's is one of the coolest places to hang out!! The bartenders are great and the history of the place is awesome as well.

headline: Fun bar!
content: Just had cocktails but they were good. Great, party atmosphere with free live music (like most of the bars on Duval). Servers were nice and quick. 3 bars total in this large establishment. Lots of pix of Hemingway hung on the walls.

headline: Good Beer!
content: Came here today while on a cruise.  Crowded but found a table quick and ordered the Sloppy Joe's Pale Ale and Havana Nachos.  Only thing would be if it had more chips with the nachos.  Was great!

headline: Awsome, old, historic, just plane fun
content: As a Floridian, I have visited here many times over my lifetime. It has not changed, nothing. It was fun, upbeat, the food was good. But the frozen drinks were the best in key west. We came back at night and danced for hours. In...More

headline: Great atmosphere
content: My first time here and will be back everytime in Key West. Great food and drinks. They had live music that was very good while we were here. It's a legendary place that's been here for 80 years.

headline: The Place To Be
content: If you go to Key West, you have to go here.  We had the sloppy joe sandwiches and beer.  The sandwich was much better that the typical sloppy joe.  Live music.  Very crowded.  Now I can say I've been here but I'll try other bars...More

headline: You just have to go
content: This place is so historic you just can't miss it and besides that they have the best sloppy joe's we've ever had. Live entertainment, good food and drinks. What's not to love. Great place to visit any time of the day.

headline: A must visit at least once
content: Went to Sloppy Joe's for lunch. They always have entertainment, which was pretty good when we were there. (Guitarist/vocalist) Good cocktails and good food. Their sloppy joe is definitely worth trying.

headline: A Key West Iconic Place
content: A definite must for a drink or their famous sloppy joe sandwich. Wait staff was very attentive to your requests and LIVE MUSIC. Stop by for a drink and take a break. You will be glad you did! Story has it that it was one...More

headline: Had a blast!
content: Great band, generous drinks, hard-working staff. You can't help but have fun and dance in this place. Even though Sloppy Joes is a famous KW institution, the staff still busts their behinds to give great service.

headline: Just a place to watch the rowdy drunks and maybe get a bite to eat
content: Sloppy Joes is a landmark on Duval Street, so we came in for lunch in late April, 2017, to see what all the hype is about. My wife had their signature sandwich, a sloppy joe. I had a taste, and was not too impressed. Stacie's...More

headline: So much fun!
content: Yes, it's a touristy spot, but people gather here for a reason! They have fun & friendly staff, good drinks and live music! We enjoyed our time at Sloppy Joe's more than any other bar, can't wait to go back!

headline: Classic key West watering hole.
content:
Classic tourist trap bar of Key West, food if just bar food. Drinks are just so so and the music keeps you there.
Gift shop for souvenirs.

headline: Went just to say I did it...
content: The drinks are good here, and the food is ok. The conch chowder was really good, but the conch fritters were so-so. I've had better in the Keys. The decor isn't very interesting, except, as an electrician's daughter, I wondered how they managed to keep...More

headline: Great good and fun atmosphere
content: His was a great place to stop for a beer and grab some food.  The smoked fish spread was amazing.  My husband had a flight of beer that he enjoyed.  Then we shared some nachos with Sloppy Joe sauce.  So good.

headline: Fun Place!
content: We stopped in for a beer three times during our stay in Key West.  The music was great and service good.  My husband had a sloppy Joe (why wouldn't you?)  A bit expensive ($10.00) and a bit too much tomato....but everyone likes their own sloppy...More

headline: Great bar atmosphere
content: Terrific bar food and the coldest beer you have ever had. You have to try the sloppy joe and the mexican cornbread is outstanding.

headline: Could be anywhere
content: Starting to sound old and grumpy and this bar could now be anywhere. The layout when we were last here seemed different and bit bohemian, now it looks like a standard corporate bar. We stayed one drink and left.

headline: Interesting
content:
Just for the Hemingway experience worth the visit. We were lucky to listen to a really good singer, it is worth it for music venue as  it has a good sized stage for larger bands.

Interesting feel with what felt like a good drinking hole,...More

headline: Obsessed.
content: Ate here 3 days in a row on our Key West visit and had their famous sloppy joe each time with a side of cajun fries.  I can't speak for the drinks, but the atmosphere was laid but but always busy.  For the most part,...More

headline: Pleasantly surprised
content: Although this place was very crowded, because of it's size we were able to find a nice table quickly. The service was quick and friendly, and the food was good and reasonably priced considering the area.

headline: Finally made it here
content: This was a hopping place that everyone must visit when in Key West.  We were lucky and got a table right away.  Our waitress had way too many people to help and was throwing stuff around.  The drinks are good and the fish tacos are...More

headline: One of my favorite spots in Key west
content: Bustling bar on a busy corner.   One of my favs, as every year we have gone to Key West, there is always an exceptional band playing at Sloppy Joes, and you can't help but smile and have fun.

headline: Good Beer
content: My friend that we went with has a friend that wroks there and we hooked up with him and gave us a small history esson about Key West and he is the one that took us to Hogfish Bar and Grill

headline: Nice place way, drink and hear great live music.
content: Good food.  I had the best hot roast beef sandwich with au jus that I remember having.  Busy place seat yourself dining, but the food comes fast so turn over is good nobody seem to look for a table long even with the place being...More

headline: Great time!
content: Fun, lively place with great music and fair drink prices!  Happened to be in Key West during the singer/songwriter fest so there was a great band!  It's a pretty big place with multiple bars so even though it was crowded it wasn't overwhelming.

headline: Very busy but good food
content: It was quite hard finding a table as you have to find your owns its a bit stressful having to keep an eye for people who are leaving so you can get their table. Once seated the waiter was friendly but service was a bit...More

headline: Must see location
content: After the Hemingway tour, we felt we needed to take the kids (15/11) to Sloppy Joe's. Being Spring Break, it was packed even mid-afternoon. We stalked a table that was leaving and got in fairly quickly. Had quick, friendly service. Ordered a sloppy joe to...More

headline: Fun times
content:
We stopped in here with family and friends while traveling they Key West. Some in our group had been here and were excited to return to this high energy, social media involved, music-filled bar. 
Known for sloppy Joe's and sandwiches they are great with your...More

headline: Late Night Snack
content: Our son had heard that this place was great, and it did not disappoint. We snagged 3 seats at the bar, and Carla, our bartender served us well. We ordered Conch Chowder, Smoked Fish Dip, and Honey BBQ Wings. The food came fast and was...More

headline: Mr
content: Nice to enjoy. Music was good. Pretty crowded but thats what gives it the atmosphere.  Only downside had was lady was not well need to get to bathroom. Secur6iry refused her even though she was patronising the same resturant . Needless to say she had...More

headline: Fun bar
content: A fun bar with good live music with great frozen drinks. A frozen bar at the end of the world was delicious as well as there frozen pain in the a--.

headline: A Must Do
content: You simply must stop at Sloppy Joe's to have a drink and to tell everyone you went there.  Expect to be surrounded by similar people who are there to celebrate a birthday, anniversary, engagement, bachelorette party.  There you will experience why drinking is an Olympic...More

headline: Laid back key west style
content: Drinks and food good. Friendly staff. Prices are good what to expect in key west. Good music local place

headline: Fun!!
content: Fun place to go. Good food, drinks are good but need to be bigger. Live band when we were there. Open and friendly.

headline: So FUN!
content: Grab a drink or 5 and enjoy the atmosphere! Tell your friends to watch you live on the webcam and grab some awesome gear in the gift shop! If I had to go to one bar in Key West- this would be it!

headline: A must stop in key west
content: I  most most impressed with this place because of excellent customer service I received from Erin the waitress.  The place was extremely busy with loud music playing,  and waiting on about 10 tables,  and nobody waited for a drink,she was also  polite and friendly. She...More

headline: Very Good Entertainment and dancing
content: Sloppy Joes has a bit of history with Ernest Hemmingway's hangout, the d√©cor is old but always has music playing with unknown bands that are very good and when they aren't preforming, the DJ keeps the people of the dance floor. This place is always...More

headline: quick stop
content: Ordered a couple of drinks and hade some munchies to go with them. Drinks were good, food was basic bar fried food. Large area, good size crowd but had no problem getting seated in the middle of the afternoon. D√©cor is interesting and it does...More

headline: Food and Drinks
content: Wow. This is a place everyone needs to go to at least once. Such a fun place with live music , drinks & beer and food. We has the sloppy nachos. They were to die for. Also they have a camera with live feed so...More

headline: Just go!
content: Yes, it's a tourist trap. Yes, it's super loud. Yes, it's always crowded. Should you still go? YES! What's a trip to Key West without stopping at Sloppy Joes?! Just go already! The sloppy joes are good. I'm hooked on the fish and chips though....More

headline: Fun visit
content: Great live music, great drinks and food. One of our first stops on our trip. Would definitely return.

headline: Quick stop but worth it!
content: It was our first stop in the morning off our cruise boat. We had a great drink, fast and friendly service. Can't wait to go back when we have more time.

headline: Gotta go there!
content: Busy, loud, noisy. Fast service. Great music on our first visit, not great the next night - depends what u like

headline: Fun Place
content: The band plying the night we went was great. Rather crowded but to be expected. Drinks a little pricey, but again to be expected. A definitive must stop sight.

headline: Great Stop for a Late Night Snack
content: I came here with my dad around 1 or 2 am - the place was packed, but we were lucky to grab a small table for two next to the stage. Great live music, and after a night of walking around and drinking the sloppy...More

headline: A Fun Place to Hang Out
content: A unique place to visit with a great atmosphere. Good food, great service and friendly staff. Sloppy Joe's was a frequent hangout for Ernest Hemingway. Fun to sit at the bar and watch the world go by.

headline: Just join the crowd.
content: Fast service.  Had the famous sloppy joe and enjoyed it.  I think you go for the atmosphere and say "I ate there" (or drank).  It was fun.

headline: Great wings!
content: This was one of our stops as we made our way down Duval St. Fast service, good drinks, and wings were perfectly cooked with great flavor. Very busy place but quality was very good. Love the history of Sloppy Joe's as well.

headline: Sloppy Joe's
content: The best mojitos I had in Key West. The second best were at Blue Heaven. Its a lively place in the evening so you have to enjoy noise and crowds then but later afternoon / early evening is less crowded if that is more to...More

headline: It was ok
content: typical bar food.  wouldn't go there to eat but it is a fun, loud, crazy place for a nice drink. high priced, and just ok.  you would go there for the history more than anything.

headline: Great
content: Only came in for drinks but service was excellent, drinks were good and reasonably priced.  Great atmosphere.  Bought a t-shirt in the gift shop...happy to pay the extortionate price for a bit of fun memorabilia...shame the server was a misery!

headline: Horrible Service
content: This place has the potential to be awesome. However, we came in with a drink from Fat Tuesday  (which was almost empty) and the server then told me that we had to leave because we had outside drinks. I asked him why if we were...More

headline: Key West Staple
content: Sloppy Joe's has Key West ambiance, good live music, but average food.  Prices are mid-range. Service is pretty decent.

headline: Fun Place, Great Food!
content: This place is what you picture Key West Restaurants to be!  Noisy, busy bar, lots of fun stuff on the walls, just plain fun!  It's the birthplace of the sloppy joe!  My family alternated between the sloppy joe, nachos, and crabcake sandwiches.  Everything was yummy!...More

headline: Fun time and a band
content: We went in to grab a few drinks. It's definitely a laid back party atmosphere! They had live music and a decent drink selection. We tried the sloppy joe fries (recommended by bartender) and they were pretty good! Made some new friends, watched some sports...More

headline: Fun atmosphere
content: We stopped in for a quick drink and appetizer.  The place was busy with live music and a good crowd.  We ended up ordering a Namesake Sloppy Joe sandwich.  Why not?

headline: Ask for Rahm
content: We had finished lunch and had a couple of hours to kill before leaving the island...so we bellied up to the bar at Sloppy Joes.  The music was great...and the beers were cold and reasonable and the place has history.  Rahm is a great bartender...going...More

headline: Always interesting
content: Great watering hole, meet the best people there, and bartender was from Ireland and was very informative.  Thanks

headline: Just ok.
content: When we went it was a live family  band and one of the performers was a 7 year old boy. He was so good. It was the typical place to catch a bite and a drink. We ordered the sloppy joe that made them famous...More

headline: Hemingway Mojito
content: Delicious Hemingway mojito and super friendly bartender tho I did not catch his name.  Big area so you aren't cramped elbow to elbow!

headline: Great bar - good music!
content: Great place for a drink and fab music the day we were there  - people watching is great too!  It's a big KW tradition to come here so come and enjoy!

headline: Great atmosphere
content:
Great place to have a drink and listen to music while visiting KeyWest.
Nice to sit at the bar. Great atmosphere.

headline: Lunch at Sloppy Joes
content:
Wow....the entertainment, live cams, people and food were all worth the visit.
We tried for dinner but too packed.  We went back next day and busy but able to get a seat.  Great entertainment and great food.

headline: Great restaurant
content: Had a great time, has good food and entertainment.  Open til the wee hours of the morning, though I didn't stay that late. Hubby bought a tshirt, his only souvenir on the trip.  :)

headline: Great time
content: We were able to sit at the back bar. The band sounded really good....apparently a family group. You could talk, listen to the music and have a nice cold drink. A definite for us the next time back!

headline: fun
content: went for lunch and it was very busy, as usual, but not uncomfortable.  Food was good, and there is always live music, which makes it a great experience.

headline: One of those places
content: This is one of those places you just have to go to.  Are the drink and food prices worth it?  Not really; but you can't beat the ambiance of the place and the live music.  How does one go to Key West and then go...More

headline: An entertaining evening
content: Sloppy Joe's has a great atmosphere that gives one a true taste of the laid back culture of Key West. A local band was playing the night that we visited, they very very personable while interacting with the crowd. We had dinner and the food...More

headline: It's a bar
content: Okay band typical Duval Street bar, bartenders are fast. It is a must do on the checklist if visiting KeyWest.

headline: Friendly and fun
content: We were in Key West very briefly during a cruise. With limited time, we decided to visit Hemingway House and this one legendary bar. Sure, it was crowded and touristy, but our bartender Jessica was attentive, genuine, and warm. We shared some delicious peel and...More

headline: Live Music
content: We went two nights in a row because the band was awesome!! The bar is clean and a lot of fun. The drinks were well made & the service was fast and friendly.

headline: Rum Runners!
content: Had friends in town decided to drive down to Key West for sunset! Stopped at Sloppy Joes for their famous rum runners... no food... the place is a dive ( i'm guessing that's part of the  appeal) but then it's been there since the 1930!...More

headline: Excellent atmosphere
content: When in the Keys you have to stop at Sloppy Joe's. The staff is great, drinks cold and food great! Always entertaining and best to get there early on in the day because it fills up quickly. Live entertainment all the time.

headline: drinks
content: Always a fun place to stop in for a drink.  Usually has entertainment and it is certainly a quick way to make friends.

headline: Resting place
content: We stop in every time we want to sit and relax.  Have very good entertainment and good selection of food not to mention their drinks.

headline: Great food, band was dreadful.
content: Sloppy joe's was packed so we decided to give it a try.  Well the food & service was great but the 2 man band was crude & distasteful.  Not at all fun to listen to their vulgar comments & even worse to listen to their...More

headline: Good Food and Bar
content: A busy but fun place to go.   Bar food and good drink selection.  Friendly staff and the bartenders were attentive.

headline: Best sloppy joe ever
content: If you like a sloppy joe sandwich you will love their original sloppy joe. The location is in the middle of all the action so stop by have a great sandwich and a drink, you won't regret it!

headline: Fun place
content:
A definite place to pop into,  but it's really really crowded,  your not going to get a drink straight away so be patient. 
We were there and I guess the band was very popular,  so no was seating available. 
Great vibe but way too crowded.

headline: Fun and good food
content: You kinda can't go to key west and not hit sloppy joes. Got the original, could have eaten a few more after a long day of outdoor fun. Same raucous atmosphere I'd have expected from the days of hemingway. Highly recommended just to say you...More

headline: Tourist Spot
content: Full of tourists making to obligatory visit.  Quite noisy when music plays.  The beer was cold!  The basket of fries was huge.  Lots of wall art to ogle.

headline: Just Fun
content: Nice little place to people watch, and the rum runners were very good! The sloppy joes were quite tasty.

headline: Had to try this place because of the history!
content: My husband had a fish sandwich which he enjoyed, I had to go for the sloppy joe, huge, kinda sweet and a little spicy.  But the reason to go back was the conch chowder, so so good!!. Busy place yet food came quickly and service...More

headline: Good food and great entertainment. Service was excellent.
content: Fun on Duval Street.  Always have live entertainment.  Service was great and fast and food was good. Not expensive.

headline: A must do in Key West
content:
Needless to say, it's world famous! We went on a Saturday night, excellent bands! A Johnny Cash tribute type of band first, and then a pop/rock type later. 

Bartenders and wait staff kept the drinks coming!

Great time!

headline: Fun place to visit
content: Fun place to have drinks and have something to eat. Entertainment was great although very loud if you are sitting near the stage. Food was ok. Just a great spot to watch people!

headline: Must see local establishment!
content: I brought a group of 11 here and we had the best time.  The food was good, the drinks better, and the band was the best!  We had great service and our drinks were never dry.  The band did comedy spoof songs and I can't...More

headline: Sloppy Joe Pizza and a Sloppy Rita
content: This is a great place for food, drinks and entertainment. Actually I really like the food. My favorite for a different food item, is the Sloppy Joe Pizza. Your Sloppy Joe beef mix on a pizza. My wife likes the Sloppy Rita drink. Icon first...More

headline: A rockin' time
content: We went on a rainy Saturday, and the place was hopping! We tried the sloppy Joe's, onion rings, and French fries- all were delicious! Bar staff was great, and our new favorite drink is the Rum Runner! The music was great too! Not appropriate for...More

headline: Must see
content: This place has the best breakfast hands down. Lobster Benedict was amazing. Ambiance was so quaint and cool. Staff was great. You have to eat here.

headline: Best pina colada ever!
content: Loved this place. Good place to just chill out and get a drink or a little dinner. The sloppy Joe was delicious. The pina coladas were phenomenal! This place definitely put me in the "island vibe" and I fully suspect I will return several times...More

headline: Fun and yum
content: We came here in a pouring rain day.  It was packed and so much fun. Good band and really good nachos. Even though there was not meat on them they were very good with a lot of cheese !

headline: Great place for lunch
content: The place was packed, as it always is, but we found a couple of seats at the bar and were served right away. Ice cold beer and great burgers. Great entertainment on the stage.

headline: Great Bar, Must see when in town.
content: Great historic iconic joint. Been in town since 1933 at this location since 1937. Ernest Hemingway's fave. Funny the house special is a Sloppy Joe sandwich but the name came from the original owner Joe was accused of running a sloppy place. Then the sandwich...More

headline: Drinks
content: It was our last day and we had time to spend before getting on the ferry. Stopped in here for a couple of beers!!! Service was fast, live music!!! Did not eat.

headline: Good party spot !
content:
Good music most nights...popular spot..But big enough to handle crowds.  Good place for shirts.
Drinks reasonably priced...fun happy hour spot

headline: Great spot in key west
content: Went there just to grab a beer and then stayed for awhile just to hear a live band. Music was decent but atmosphere was awesome

headline: Iconic Key West establishment! Great bar.
content: You do not come here for the food. It is average at best. But the entertainment is fantastic and you'd be missing out if you don't, at least, stop by for a drink. Hemingway drank here, how can you not pay it a visit? Great...More

headline: Bababoom everything
content: Just to say....great vibes all around!! The music entertainment fabulous!! Appetizers great...not complain at all. Very busy place, but you get serve very fast. Staff very attentive to your needs. Love yhe mozzarella sticks. 100% recommend this place to hang out with a difference but...More

headline: Good food and fun entertainment
content: Went in the afternoon and got a seat at the bar right away. Ordered the Hemingway mojito and it was delicious! Also grabbed a table pretty easily and our service was very good. I had the conch fritters and pork sandwich and my husband had...More

headline: Fun
content: Restaurant that you go to because of its history.  Fun bar for drinking and people watching.  Usually pretty busy. You seat yourself, so you just watch for an open seat. Typical bar food, I had the flat pizza that was okay, nothing special.  If going...More

headline: A Must Visit!
content: Our second night in Key West and we found ourselves in the festive, iconic Sloppy Joes. All the doors were open to the street and a live band was rockin' on stage. Photographs of Hemingway in and around KW hung on the walls next to...More

headline: Another must stop place in Key West
content: A big tourist attraction because of Hemingway, they even have a booth you can sit in with a huge fish caught by hemingway above it. Good drinks and we only had appetizes but they were tasty. This is a busy place right on Duval St...More

headline: "Help"
content: Went with some friends and family during lunch. When we walked in, we were instantly greeted with beers being slurped, loud chatter, and a piano player struggling to remember the 2nd verse of American Pie. Truly a party place. We ordered many appetizers, which were...More

headline: Live Entertainment
content: Thought it would be cool to see where Hemingway hung out in the day. Outstanding live entertainment, fabulous mimosas & delicious fresh sea food. Had a wonderful time. If there were any set backs, it was that our server was never around. All in all,...More

headline: Okay Bar Scene
content:
This place was fun and lively! Live musicians play here...
The typical bar scene and bar food.
I will admit their appetizers are not much to write home about by way of portions and presentation. The staff appears to be so rushed that you're not...More

headline: Great music
content: There was a band from Boston playing all week that was fantastic! Great drinks and the crowd was a good mix of ages and travelers.

headline: Sloppy your day
content:
Ok so Schooner is s great dive, my lost of great dives also includes Sloppy Joe's

The live music is also great.  I did not try their food but counting to do so on my next swing by

Great place, great drinks!!!

headline: Caught a quick lunch here
content: We were looking for a place to have lunch. Picked Sloppy Joe's. Had an over priced Sloppy Joe. The music was good. Fun spot to stop.

headline: Yes It‚Äôs Touristy, But the Music and Service is Good
content: I know it‚Äôs not the original where Hemingway stole the urinal and I know it‚Äôs a very touristy and crowded place, but Sloppy Joe‚Äôs seems to epitomize Key West like no other bar can.  The Porch ‚Äì Craft Beer down the street is more my...More

headline: So much fun!!!
content: Great location on Duval. Food was delicious and drinks were very good. Really enjoyed the live entertainment. Definitely a must do while in Key West.

headline: Quick drink
content: A very much happening bar and great atmosphere and right in the centre of what's going on. Good music and great central location

headline: A brief visit via Carnival Cruise
content: Nothing fancy, it's a restaurant/bar you would expect to see in a place like Key West.  Food was good - not a huge fan of conch fritters, but the key lime pie was best I've had.  People aren't overly friendly.  Tee shirts are on the...More

headline: Great place!
content: Enjoyed our drinks and appetizers here while listening to a couple of funny musicians. Food was good and so was the atmosphere.  Would go back.

headline: Tourist trap
content: Decent drinks awful food . Staff was very friendly but the music was just so so . Many other places that are fun and less touristy.

headline: LOVE LOU
content:
We have come to Sloppy Joes to see our Maryland bartender Lou (though his station was full)!  Great drinks and eats (strawberry daiquiri, Coors light, wings and nachos)
My daughter told me of a band that plays where she works (SoPro) in Canton that was...More

headline: Just OK
content: Went to this establishment while in Key West because its a popular place to be. The food was just OK and a bit expensive for what you get. The roast beef sandwich was $12.00 so I included a picture of it. There was entertainment playing...More

headline: Great atmosphere
content: We stopped here for a few drinks after sunset on Mallory square. The drinks are delicious. The staff was friendly and quick. I loved the band of brothers from New York that played. Great time

headline: Must-See on Hemingway Tour!
content: This is obviously a must-see for any Hemingway fan, and this was one of the first places we went into when we got to Key West.  Yeah, it's a tourist trap, but there's really nothing wrong with that  - things change.  Hemingway left Key West...More

headline: Always fun!
content: This place is great!  It is a must stop for us anytime we are in Key West. Good drinks, good cheese fries, great service, great entertainment. We always have a good time at sloppy joes!

headline: Get the t shirt
content: Get the t shirt and leave. Music too loud. Lousy drinks. Historic but not memorable in any way. No ac.

headline: had a great time
content: I had the fish tacos and they were great.  the drinks were good and the entertainment was raunchy but hilarious!  no cover charge, which was great, we had a good ole time at Sloppy Joes.

headline: Very Fun and Great Bands!
content: We rolled into Sloppy Joes after a sunset cruise and really enjoyed the music. The band on stage was really good and the intermission music was great to dance to. Overall, we had a blast!

headline: No visit to Key West without visiting Sloopy jeo's
content: A legendary pub! Hemmingways favorite pub, so no visiting Key West, without visiting Sloppy Joe's. The pub is crowded, with a lot of atmosphere, by our visit, there was live music. Nice cold beer and food is served, staff is friendly, and the place is...More

headline: April vacation
content: We  were there for drinks and the music. Always a fun crowd. A must stop on your travels down Duval street.

headline: You Just Have To Go Here
content: Go for the music and the gear and definitely the nachos with Sloppy Joe on top! It's a Key West institution.

headline: A landmark but not impressed
content: Went in the afternoon so it wasn't terribly busy but still slow service.  Had one drink and left.  Went because of the name...didn't go back because of the service.  Pour a strong drink though.

headline: LOVED This Bar
content: I am a Hemingway fan so after visiting his home in Key West, I had to make a stop at this bar.  We loved our time here.  The bartender was awesome and super helpful...he special-made a house cocktail to my specs because I have to...More

headline: Hemingway Fan
content: Been waiting to go here for years and we finally made it. It was so much fun and exciting to be there!  Great bands played each night.  Great bar and good food.  The atmosphere was Party, Party, Party!  Lots of people having a great time...More

headline: Best in key west
content: Act like a conch and enjoy sloppy Joe's! Food is great, music best in key west, good drinks! Let your hair down and enjoy!

headline: Fun
content: Sloppy Joes is one of my favorite places to have a drink bar food and listen to the entertainment. It is a true Key West wonder you just feel relaxed n mellow n everyone is friendly. I have neen 7 times n I would always...More

headline: Sloppy Joe's pizza...yum
content: I always go here when I go to Key West...a frozen pain in the a$$ is a yummy drink! Sloppy joes pizza is delicious! My son had soft pretzels that were great! Service is a tad slow but it is a very busy place! Avoid...More

headline: Good times!
content: The live music was incredible and the Bartender Jim is by far the best bartender in Key West! Great atmosphere for nothing but good times

headline: You can't go to Key West without a stop at Sloppy Joe's
content: My wife and I were pleasantly suprised when we stoped in at Sloppy Joe's. The live music was very good and the food was also not bad for tavern comfort food.

headline: Totally worth the stop
content: This is a great little place to hit while you're in Key West. It has a very rugged feel to the place, like Hemingway might actually walk right in. They have doors/windows around the building that they open to bring the breeze through. It has...More

headline: good burgers and music
content: if you want to have some good bugers and a drink while being entertained by some live music then this is the place to go , it is near the busy center so there is a lot to do

headline: good old American bar
content: My husband and I went to this bar for one day excersion to Key West after the conference in Holywood.  Live music and casual food and beer.  A lot of tourists looked so happy.  Very friendly waitress.  I took best pictures of my husband here.

headline: Another Key West must
content: Great place to grab some food and hear some good music no matter what time of day.  Try the sloppy Joe it's delicious.

headline: Great live music & bar vibe in the heart of Mallory Square
content: This is simply a very fun place! There for a wedding with a huge group of people in April. The service was friendly, drinks were good & the music & fun flowed freely! I definitely recommend stopping by there when you visit Key West!

headline: Party Central in Key West
content: Whenever we come to Key West ( 15 times and counting), Sloppy Joes is a must stop.We love the live music and the friendly atmosphere that is always present. My wife and I wind up here every time we have finished doing some KW water...More

headline: Just ok
content: Very noisy, probably better for a younger crowd. Plenty of seating and live music. Waitress was extremely busy but we still got our drinks in a timely manner. Rum Runner was delicious but very little alcohol.

headline: Quintessential Key West.
content: Laid back. Low key. Live music. Nice drinks served by a friendly server. A 'must see' kind of bar. You can't come to Key West without stopping by this Duval Street classic. Links to Hemingway.

headline: Lunch
