headline: Dinner was good
content:
The food was good crowded and the waitresses were overwhelmed 
We had a 18 and 19 with us and we just ordered food and the bouncer tried to throw them out at 8 why let them in than after there food was done we left...More

headline: Great Pub
content: This is a must place to visit. The music is great. The Drinks are cold. It is a hoppin place. Great entertainment.

headline: Good live music
content: We went on a Monday night after arriving. To my surprise, there were quite a few people there. After about a half hour a group of guys with mustaches showed up and were fun. Turns out they had passed their "Top Gun" flight training and...More

headline: Food ok and pricey
content: We found the sloppy joe's to be just so-so.  We got a basket of fries and it was more than the two of us could eat.  Our waitress was friendly, but very slow, because she was talking to possibly a family member or friend that...More

headline: Fun place
content:
The music here was very good. Great crowd (without getting over-crowded) but consider we also left around 11pm. 
The bands were keeping it lively.  
The food was good but not great, but food isn't why you would go to a place known for drinks &...More

headline: Historic, plus it has great food
content: It you visit Key West, stopping by Sloppy Joe's for a beer or lunch is a must. Great Ernest Hemingway tradition; always packed with tourists. Take a few minutes to examine the photographs on the walls. Good food, good service, reasonable prices.

headline: Must Visit Sloppy Joe's
content: So we went to Sloppy Joe's because people who have been to Key West said we must go.... We went on a weekday at about 1 pm and it was full so we went to a few shops and came back and although it was...More

headline: Always our first stop!
content: We have been going to Key West for 15 years, the past 6 as a family. It has always been our tradition to make Sloppy Joe's our first meal upon arrival regardless of the time of day. We love the casual,open air environment. It is...More

headline: Fun place!
content: Party place! Always a good time, This is a place you need to go. Loud and fun. Good food and time to relax.

headline: Christmas
content:
Had to stop in for a sloppy joe! Ordered the sloppy joe Nachos
Which was awesome! Four of us shared the
Nachos and it was plenty for an appetizer!
Staff was friendly. Got a great tee shirt and coffee mug for Christmas! 
A must do...More

headline: An institution
content: Good food, entertainment and very good service. Would certainly return. This place serves bar type food. It I enjoyed mine.

headline: Average Food - Nothing Special But Cool Place
content: We stopped in Sloppy Joe's for an early dinner after walking around Duval Street.  Nobody greeted us upon entering and I had to stop a waitress to ask about seating.  Seat yourself.  Found a table towards the back next to the stage.  Not bad.  Ordered...More

headline: delicious
content: ok, it's big, it's crowded, it's loud, totally not the kind of place we'd normally eat at. after a long walk from the southernmost point marker on a hot day, we weren't in any shape to pick another place. could have done without the live...More

headline: Good live music
content: Enjoyed a few beers here and listened to a great live band.  It's hard to find a seat and it's all first come, first served.  Our server was very prompt and perky.  Good place to people watch!

headline: Bean
content:
Called in here as you must, the place was buzzing as two cruise boats docked that day and the bar man was heard to say it had been quiet until then.

The wings and fries were a dinner at the bar with the world famous...More

headline: Ate the sloppy Joes ,Winner !
content:
Stopped in to hear some music and have a drink .I had to try the sloppy Joes ! 
Really good ! The entertainment was over the top! Don't order a Hurricane if you love New Awlins. It's not good. Stick with simple drinks .So  much...More

headline: Yummy
content: With every visit to The Keys...a trip to Sloppy Joes for a coney and loaded fries is a must! Also love to sit there and listen to the singers sing during our meal!

headline: Can't Manage Customer Count
content:
No host/hostess...place is a mess. Disorganized...long lines,  zero management. 
Not very smart during "season..."

headline: Fantastic Family Restaurant
content: Our waiter was funny...service was great.  The food was fantastic. Highly recommended and we're glad we went.

headline: Great staff, very friendly!
content: After visiting the Hemingway House we were inspired to go to one of his favorite spots in Key West, Sloppy Joes. The staff was happy to suggest a cocktail that Earnest would have enjoyed,  a Mojito.  Sloppy Joes is also pet friendly which was a...More

headline: A well known dive in Key West
content: Walk in and seat your self at this establishment. The food was solid, nothing spectacular. We just went in for drinks and appetizers. The service was pretty quick. We had loaded nachos and wings which were good. We enjoyed the live music and dark ambiance....More

headline: Best Drink and Service
content: We always end up seeing a good group. This time I have to say they have served the best drink I have had in Key West. My husband and I usually share an entree so we can try several restaurants. The sloppy Joe sandwich was...More

headline: Music, Good Drinks
content: Had a great experience here.  Friendly staff, shared their knowledge of the area. Enjoyed the entertainment. Gets crowded but staff makes sure you feel welcome and are seated in a reasonable amount of time.  Good generous drinks from a full stocked bar. Nice Sloppy Joes...More

headline: vacation fun
content: We stopped in for lunch, the atmosphere was great. Live music on a weekday! I had a shrimp poboy and my husband had a fish sandwich and fries. I had a sloppy rita and my husband had a beer. The service was okay, it was...More

headline: I love this place
content: Love to go there and watch a band. You better off getting a bier than a cocktail because the cocktail I took, a margarita, tasted like juice...

headline: Fun atmosphere
content: Sloppy Joe's is a must eat at tourist destination.  Home of the original Sloppy Joe, the food is decent and the beer is cold.  Fun atmosphere with live music!

headline: Great live entertainment
content: Stopped here for a bite to eat. Food was good and service was quick. Live music was awesome.  We went around 6 pm. We were with our 21 and 22 year olds. Content of lyrics was a tad r rated at times. We enjoyed it...More

headline: Loads of character, customers and noise
content: One of Key West's best-known bars, this place is invariably very crowded. But live bands and its decor make it attractive and it is almost impossible to visit KW without visiting Sloppy Joe's.  Bear in and, though, that this is not the actual spot where...More

headline: Meh.
content: Not overly impressed with this Key West staple. The food was typical bar food and there's no happy hour- boo! But, the house margarita was delish and hit the spot after a long day of travel. I'd go again for the drinks, but skip the...More

headline: Loved the place
content: Keywest in December superb, especially if you are a tourist from London. Sloppy Joe incredibly casual atmosphere, live music.Three different bars serving cocktails and beer.  Friendly service at the bar. If you decide to take a table,the waiters are quick ,efficient abd ready to offer...More

headline: You're not missing anything here
content: This may be the bar Hemingway once went to but I can't imagine he'd set foot in it today. Ear-splitting loud, cavernous, ultra-touristy (even by Key West standards).

headline: Just a regular visitor
content: Plan on fun. Very friendly people food is okay beer is cold what more do you need a good time. Very central to everything. If you don't go you have missed a Key West icon

headline: Fun!
content: I wasnt expecting much, music drew  me in Doerffels! DRINKS WERE FINE. Service fine. The bar is as clean as one can expect an old always filled place is. I had a great time, and every! Staff person had a smile and was fast professioal...More

headline: Great place!
content: Went there for a couple of beers and there was a live rock band and a great atmosphere! Loved the decor and the laid back feel...Great staff, very friendly and attentive.

headline: A must when in Key West
content: Our first stop once we got settled into our room at the Westin.  Quick walk from the hotel to Duval.  Grabbed a couple quick drinks and moved on to the next stop.

headline: A fun bar with live music
content: Sloppy Joe's is a famous Key West bar. It has become a tourist destination. They have live entertainment and it's usually quite crowded.

headline: Very fun place!
content: Food very good, we had a fish dip with Jalape√±os.  Service was excellent & the band was very good.  A nice & friendly place to visit.

headline: Busy place
content: Peel and eat shrimp were great! The flat bread pizza just so-so. It needed to be more crunchy and lacked flavor. Live music added to the atmosphere. Multi-bars so easy to get a drink.

headline: Sloppy joes
content: It was great! Music live band!  It had a great atmosphere and we had a nice server. The food was good as well.  Not too pricy.  I didn't get a alcohol beverage, but a few looked yummy!  When you are down in Key West go...More

headline: " Must try the legendary Sloppy Joe's ! )
content:
On a fishing tip from from England with a couple of friends we decided to have a break from the angling and drove to Key West from Islamorada for a day's break.
Tried several bars on Duval whilst making our way to the infamous Sloppy...More

headline: Interesting it Over-rated
content: One of Hemingway's favorite spots ‚Äì very noisy, just fair food. An Interesting place to visit once but highly overrated probably because of its Hemingway fame

headline: Great Night Spot
content: Food and music were top notch at night, lunch service was OK, ignored by waitress during a day visit. Recommend the sloppy joe, worth the trip

headline: Its Sloppy Joe's after all
content: I felt compelled to stop here for a beer on the last trip for the history and relation to Key West and Hemingway.  Lots of pictures but mostly its fun because everyone there is having fun.  live musician was playing hits and had a nice...More

headline: Always lots of fun day or nite
content: Fun place for dining, drinking and music 7 days a week.  Mostly bar food and casual dining but good portions and quality for reasonable prices.  It's easy to run up a bar tab with the service staff on their toes and you will always want...More

headline: Must visit when in Key West.
content: We listened to music, we laughed, we were part of the crowd. It appeared everyone there was there to have fun and join in.  We only had one drink each and they were not particularly good.  But we went and enjoyed our few minutes there.

headline: Repetition is the simplest way "LOVE"
content: This is the second visit and to write the review. It is unusual for me to repeat but when you visit Key West, this is "MUST" place to visit. Repetition may describe consistency. Very comfortable, employees are so warm and hospitable. Of course, food and...More

headline: A must stop in KW
content: A must while strolling Duval. The front area is always to crowded and noisy for our tastes but there is a small bar area in back that's more pub like-heavy wood tables, stools and a large bar. They do have live music up front if...More

headline: Okay bar living off the name of Hemmingway
content: We stopped here after visiting the Hemingway House/Museum.  Of course we ordered mojitos... syrupy and weak.  The key lime pie was a disappointment.  We came here to see where Hemingway hung out.  We should have ordered beer.  Decent music scene.

headline: Fun, Friendly Place!
content: We stopped into Sloppy Joe's on Duval for drinks.  Two sides open to the streets, perfect for people watching.  The bar is a typical bar and it was busy.  We ordered drinks and the sampler platter (conch fritters, chicken wings, onion rings, cheese sticks).  The...More

headline: Ambience
content: We were hungry at lunchtime and popped in for a bite and beer.  Not disappointed, both were good.  Quick service, good music, lively atmosphere and interesting d√©cor.  We will return if in the area again.

headline: Fun Fun Fun
content: Sloppy Joe's is a must in Key West. Live music all day and night. Great bar food. Great drinks. Tee Shirts. Very old and rustic atmosphere. Just a place to have fun.

headline: Great Place!
content: Love this place! From the food, the music, the atmosphere and the staff it was a great time. Wish I lived closer (I'm in Indiana) I would be here all the time!

headline: Fun Place
content: Food was great!! Everyone should drop in no matter what time of day. Always has good entertainment! They keep all the doors open so there is always a breeze.

headline: Yum!
content: Highly recommend stopping by for lunch or dinner. We ordered the sloppy Joe pizza and a hot dog with sloppy Joe mix. Yummy!

headline: Key West atmosphere big time
content: We love Sloppy Joe¬¥s with all it brings of loud music, bar food, people pushing, fights for seats but its great. We always ends up having a seat, listening to great live music, snacking and drinking and we just enjoy the atmosphere in this place...More

headline: Highly recommended
content: Sloppy Joe's is one the many "must" visit bars in Key West.  Beer is ice cold, even at 10:42AM.  And very tasty, as well.

headline: December Visit
content: One of the go to destinations.  You need to see Lou Gammell at the side bar.   The entertainment early and late is always great.  Have to try the Havana nachos with Sloppy Joe mix

headline: SLOPPY JOE KEY WEST this you have to visit
content:
Sloppy Joe's bar is a place where you are always welcome and makes new friends
1 cozy atmosphere, 2 daily, there are artists on stage 3 you can have a snack or a more complete food at affordable prices

headline: Great food, drink and live music
content: So much fun!!!  Had live music and got great seats.  Shared Conch fritters and Fish & Chips.  Delish!  Waitress was great and attentive considering how busy it was there.  And the pina colada were the best we ever had!!!  Yum!!

headline: Dirty but real
content: Iconic Key West bar.  Good place to drop in to wet your whistle and if your lucky may have some live music.  Place could use a cleaning but then could lose some of that charm.  Sit where Hemmingway drifted out of reality.

headline: What can you say? An Icon
content: Great historic bar in Key West.  Lots of people, noisy, good music. Belly up to the bar and get a cold one.  Enjoy some living history

headline: Too Touristy For Me
content: Having travelled and lived in the Keys, I often take the "newbie" tourists here, but it's not a place I would usually visit otherwise. The drinks are fairly prices, so if you're there just for the drinks, you'll find better prices elsewhere. They do have...More

headline: Lunch at Sloppy Joe's
content: We visited this classic restaurant on our visit down to Key West. We ate "Key West snacks" and some of their good sandwich. The children ate their pizza. Location is prefect and here is also happy for a beer or two. Many tourists of course,...More

headline: Dance, dance, dance!
content: Although there is a lot of good bars for live music on Duval, this seemed to be the best place for dancing. Had lots of fun!

headline: Disappointed this year
content:
We loved Sloppy Joe's  last year.
 For some reason it just did not appeal to us this time....it took a while for a server to come to our table since she was chatting at the bar,,,, she seemed disinterested.... and the conch fritters did not...More

headline: Loved it!
content: I have heard about this place for years by some friends who had visited, so we had to try it and I'm glad we did! It had a great atmosphere and the Sloppy Joe that I had was wonderful.

headline: Best bar in town
content: Love this bar. Very accommodating even for large groups. Always have a good time when we visit. Drinks are strong and reasonable. They have the best bands

headline: Fun Place!
content:
Great drinks, decent bar food, great wait staff. Comfortable and fun atmosphere.

Chris was our bartender and he took very good care of us. Great time!

headline: Great Place to Dance
content: My wife and I joined my 30 something son and his wife and friends in Key West for a few days on his boat the beginning of August. Key West is all about night life and one of our favorite spots was Sloppy Joe's -...More

headline: DONT GO FOR THE FOOD...
content: If you want to be able to tell folks back home that you ate at Sloppy Joe's...then by all means go. BUT don't expect a Great culinary experience. I've tasted better Sloppy Joe's out of a can purchased at a grocery store. Our server was...More

headline: Out to the bar
content: It's a must go when you're there. Other than that, it's kind of like any vacation bar. There were so many others that were just as fun and entertaining. Don't spend your whole night there and miss the others.

headline: FRIENDLY STAFF
content: Sloppy Joes is a "must" when one visits Key West. We used to go every summer but haven't been back in about 10 years. Although we didn't eat this time, we did order Bloody Marys - which were tasty.  Staff was extremely friendly.  Would recommend.

headline: Iconic, Authentic, Historical, Memorable, ...and the foods great too!
content:
What a great way to step back in time and to enjoy a wonderful immersion in traditional surroundings, historical memorabilia, pleasant staff and great food. 

Sloppy Joes is a tourism highlight in Key West yet you feel like a local. 

We, like so many other...More

headline: Visit to take a photo nothing else!!!
content: I was there to visit the iconic place to have a drink and some food. In the beginning everything was really good we got some drinks and everything was like I thought it would be. But as soon as we got the food on the...More

headline: Always a must do for us.
content: Been going for years and the sloppy joe never disappoints for a good lunch. The onion rings are outstanding! A Key West must do.

headline: Must see
content: If you are on duval street you must stop at sloppy joes! It's a fun place good music! Check out the live web cam!!!

headline: A Key West Landmark
content: After several years of coming to Key West on vacation, we finally went to Sloppy Joe's today for lunch. All the tables were full, but we managed to find two empty bar stools--and this is a slow season here. The bartender was prompt in bringing...More

headline: Good food, good atmosphere and great entertainment
content: We really enjoy Sloppy Joes although our friends stopped going since they don't allow smoking.  We went late one evening for drinks and wings.  Great place, decent service and excellent food.

headline: A Must See
content: If you visit Duval Street, you must go to Sloppy Joes. It's a Historic Landmark and has great drinks and music. I would not take my kids though.

headline: Loud
content: I had their $10 sloppy joe and a $5 bud light draft.  It was good.  Big place.  It was hard for me to find a parking place, best to ride a bike.

headline: Awesome place as usual
content: Heather was the bartender both nights I came in. She remembered me by name the second night- that is amazing with all the people you see. Like the house drinks especially Key West Lemonade

headline: Great nighlife
content: Amazing nightlife there.  great security, drink prices are reasonable. The bands they have are incredible.  Always keeping the crowd going.

headline: A Little on the Raunchy Side
content: I was disappointed to find, for 2 years in a row, the same musicians who attempt to make up for their lack of musical talent with lyrics that would make a trucker blush.  Too bad, Sloppy Joes was a favorite of ours for several years.

headline: Fun bar
content:
The food is good.  Of course when the cruise ships are in, this place is busy. 
Nights they have some good bands in there.

headline: Tourist favorite
content: Sloppy Joe's is one of the most popular and well known bars in Key West. It is nearly always busy. The food is typical bar food. They, like many bars in Key West, have live music. The cost of food is what one would expect...More

headline: Just ok
content: Wife and I had lunch there. It was little loud but, had a good solo guitarist. The waitress was friendly . I had the Philly steak sub. Hardly any meat, more onions and peppers then anything. She had the sloppy joe . it was a...More

headline: Best bar ever
content:
Drinks, all kinds of people, extremely good feeling walking in, live music, shop, food...
If there were more places in the world like this one, there would be no wars...

headline: Get closer to Hemingway
content: It might be the best mojito that I ever had in my life and it might have had something to do with Hemingway, who was said to have enjoyed it the most, I will admit it. Either way, I was excited to visit this place....More

headline: Annual Stop
content: Annual stop, the entertainment is fun, the food is great and the staff very  pleasant. See ya next year!

headline: Just a hangout
content: Food was plain, wine was awful, entertainment was OK. Maybe beer was better. Don't think I'd ever be back.

headline: another unique cool place to go
content: my main theme for kw, is try the local unique bars--pubs--restaurants they are all cool, easy going laid back people...good food, great booze happy hrs and a lot of very friendly people..sloppy joes is unique, powerful, great people watching pub...good booze, and fresh casual food

headline: Loud, Crowded with Fried Foods
content: Sloppy Joe's doesn't pretend to be anything more than a "beer joint" with burgers, and a lot of fried food. That's where they get me. Fried cheese sticks, fried calamari, fried onion rings, and finally, fried shrimp. I ate it all.  It doesn't get any...More

headline: Nacho breakfast
content: This was our first bar we hit on Duval St...at 9am! Food service began at 10, so nachos and arrepas it was! The mojitos were delish and the sloppy Joe nachos were my boyfriend's favorite

headline: Local icon
content: Good food .. good atmosphere ...great time.   Must see for key west visit.  Historical reference to Ernest Hemingway is awesome.

headline: A staple of Key West Day and night life. during the day fun for the family, at night best to leave the kids at home.
content: So you  come to key west this is one of the destinations on your to see list. if you are in for the afternoon its right in the middle of down town Key West. you can get a bite to eat, a cold beer, and...More

headline: A Histirical Joint
content: Not even the real place Hemingway used to visit, this spot is, in my opinion, highly overrated. Dirty, too. But if you want to say "I've been there," like I did, go, have a beer, and then head somewhere nicer. Sloppy Joe's is nothing more...More

headline: Good place to chill in a busy resort!
content: Bar food was was good and really big portions and our waitress was friendly and helpful, then we had the guy up a height playing the piano who was a star turn what more could you want while visiting Duval St in Key West!

headline: Best Carolina BBQ
content: Fun Fun Fun! Food was delicious, service was exceptional, live entertainment enjoyed by all! We ordered the Carolina BBQ a new addition to their menu. Served with a mustard sauce. Sooooo good!

headline: Not what it's cracked up to be.
content: Just a famous landmark. Staff is rude and discurtious. No happy hour. Walked out do to rude staff. Will never go back. Many better bars that are happy to have the business.

headline: It's Sloppy Joe's!
content: This place is legendary. The entertainment was a legend in his own mind, but we didn't mind. Our waitress was friendly, as we're the other patrons. When we told them where we were from they made us dance to Achy Breaky Heart....hilarity at its finest!

headline: Tourist trap
content: The guy on the guitar singing was the best part of our lunch.  The meal was just fair.  The conch fritters were not good.  The drinks were average.  The meals were a tad greasy for our tastes.  The cruise ship recommended the place.  RC must...More

headline: Iconic
content: Came to this iconic Key West bar for lunch. Walked-in...place was reasonably crowded...and "seat-yourself". All sorts of decorations and memorabilia on the walls, much to look at. Attached gift store sells souvenirs and T-shirts. Shortly after we sat down, member of the wait staff gave...More

headline: Huge sloppy joe sandwich
content: My sister and I ate here on Thanksgiving Day. We ordered the Sloppy Joe sandwich. It doesn't come with a side. My sister ordered a side French fries and I ordered the hot wings. The fries are enough to feed several people. The sandwiches were...More

headline: Great Rum Drink
content: I had a wonderful rum punch which was flavorful.  I would have had a second but had to hop a plane.  Nice views from the window seats and good food.

headline: Traditional
content: Traditional bar in Key West. Good music and regular food but it is a must when in Key West. Music usually starts early in the afternoon.

headline: Great place to go dancing!!
content: Great band was playing and super fun crowd!!  Totally recommend going even if you just want to listen to the music!  Wait staff was friendly and fast!!

headline: Typical bar food
content: Head here to chill next to Duval St. And enjoy a drink, not for the food.  Menu was full of typical bar fare, all things fried and pre-frozen!

headline: A disappointment
content: Returned to Key west, a place that I really have enjoyed in the past, last visited 4 years go. Unfortunately whilst i had an excellent experience at Sloppy Joe's then, this time it had changed, noisy food ordinary and service under pressure. I am sure...More

headline: Tourist trap of the highest magnitude
content: Too crowded for me. Good music but hard to enjoy, and forget about getting a drink at the bar after it gets dark. This is not Hemingway's Sloppy Joe's hangout.

headline: Always a party!
content:
Casual party atmosphere. We had so much fun we went here twice!
Great live music that interacts with the crowd, good eats including their famous Sloppy Joe sandwich and a variety of specialty drinks! We love their Sloppy Ritas

headline: Very Touristy but great staff
content: Went with a group of 5 couples and grabbed a table and had a great friendly experience. Their staff are experienced and amazing. They could separate checks and if something did come out wrong, they would immediately correct it. The grabbing your own table is...More

headline: Good drinks, better music!
content: This is where Hemingway used to get plastered and meet future wives. The entertainment and drinks were good but the food is sub-par. Outside is a live feed to their website in case you want to show off to loved ones that you are hammered...More

headline: Great place, a landmark, but touristy
content:
Had a great time. Key west is great the live bands, great bar, good service and a bit pricy as tourists flock here and many drink a bit much but the overall experience is great 

I would suggest you come here and try it it's...More

headline: ICONIC KEY WEST BAR
content: Sloppy Joe's is the epitome of history and atmosphere.  My wife and I stopped around 3:00PM, late for lunch, and too early for dinner.  So we settled for a "Sloppy Margarita".  I great stop, and another Kodak moment.

headline: Nuts. In a good way
content: This is a great place. Good live music, loud, busy, lively. All sorts of people and characters frequent this place. You'll do well to get a seat in a Saturday though

headline: A classic stop
content: Catch the duo we call Wayne & Garth late afternoons Thursday and Friday for some good old raunchy Key West local musical entertainment, but also enjoy the liberal drinks and decent pub-ish food. Several bars inside so don't get discouraged if it looks crowded. It's...More

headline: Cold Beer & GOOD Music
content: We went into Sloppy Joe's several times on our trip, but the last night when the Doerfels were there was by far the best. This family band is very talented and play some great music.

headline: Tangy!
content: The food is good and the atmosphere fun. Very tangy sauce in the sloppy joes...and you get a pickle with it. Fries or onion rings are extra. Wouldn't recommend this place for young children.

headline: Atmosphere
content: Lucky to grab a seat, live music, totally packed.I had the cheeseburger, came with nothing else, my husband had the conch fritters.my burger was large and tasty. The conch was also very good. I ordered a pina colada , and another house drink, but I...More

headline: Key West Icon
content: We wanted to visit Sloppy Joe's because it was one of Hemingway's handouts. Pretty much a typical dive bar but that's not a bad thing. Big and noisy, open to the street, the bar was easy to get a seat at but there are tables...More

headline: If you came to party ......
content: This is your place!  Never a dull moment at Sloppy Joe's!  Bartenders keep the drinks flowing while you jam to great local musicians.   ANd ... you can have your friends watch you on the webcam out front as you visit with the cool parrots on...More

headline: History
content: What can you say, live music, drinks and great folks.   You have to go by SJs if nothing else go in to check out the history on the walls.

headline: Must See!
content: Fun, fun bar with great food! Live entertainment when we were there! For me, it captured the essence of Key West - laid back, extremely casual, great drinks, good food (get their namesake Sloppy Joe), fun, lots of noise and interesting people.

headline: Great Place, But Disappointing Nachos.
content: Love this place, and food is usually very good. But this time......I couldn't say the same thing. Ordered nachos, and they weren't very good at all. Way too much tomatoes and onions, and not near enough sloppy joe's. Love the place, and will return, but...More

headline: Fun Times
content: We always visit this place when we come to Key West.  Great atmosphere, good music and a lot of fun.  Love It!!

headline: Awesome tIme!!!
content: Awesome night out with friends.  Loved the band.  Really fun place.  Can't wait to get back here to visit.

headline: Landmark for sure
content: Great bar and entertainment. Didn't have food this time but have eaten there before and it's great bar fare. Serving are big so you might want to share.  Sloppy Joes is what Key West is all about.  Good times

headline: Wonderful
content: We went to Sloppy Joes on our first day in Key West.  Awesome place for getting to know all the wonderful things and people in Key West.  Noon time music was great and food and drinks were really great!!  Loved meeting Beverly!!!!  Can't wait to...More

headline: A classic
content: It's not the best place to eat, but if you like fish dip and conch fritters, it's good for a snack. The beer is cold. The band is hot. There's almost always live music, which is a huge plus. The service is pretty good. People...More

headline: Great bar
content:
Stumbled in after seeing the sign. The bad was great, cocktails were good.  Never had a long line at ladies room. Those bartenders must be pros to keep up the demands.
Classic party bar without being scuzzy.

headline: Fun stop - as usual!
content: The service was great, beer was cold and the entertainment was entertaining! We stuck around longer than planned because we were having a great time!

headline: You have to experience it!
content: We went there to be able to say we have been there, and ordered lunch.  Average food.  Had a pina colada that was delicious.  Sloppy Joe's was a hang out of Ernest Hemingway, so had to go there and experience it.  Food was average, just...More

headline: Stopped for a beer
content: We stopped in for a beer and a photo op. There was a band, and it seemed ok. Overpriced like all Key West alcohol, but a nice piece of history.

headline: Great deinks
content: Went for lunch on a day visit to Key West. Expect bar food...the sloppy Joe is worth it. What makes this place so special is the atmosphere and drinks and off course Hemingway loved this place. It's a must do if your in Key West.

headline: Go to drink and party
content: Great place to hear live music and drink. Did not like the food. Would definitely go back, but I would have dinner somewhere else first.

headline: This Place Rocks!!
content: Sloppy Joes is an awesome place to check out and its a lot of fun.  They have great music playing all day and night, that rocks, the food is good, service is good, and there is plenty of booze!  Try a frozen pina colada with...More

headline: Fun times
content: Good fun key west landmark restaurant. Must go!!! Their pizza is excellent!! Service is ok being that the place was packed. Only down fall is they don't except gift cards of any kind

headline: Historic...
content: We're not sure if this is the "must see" that all of our friends are raving about. Food is okay, drinks are good, live entertainment is very good. A great place for drinks and music but not necessarily dining and food.

headline: Great place to drink.
content: We only came to drink here. Big stage with bands playing. A very popular bar? Very busy. If you like a lively place this is for you.

headline: Gotta go, at least once.
content: Huge inside; lots of tables. Usually some live music. Good drinks and food. Can be unbelievably busy from lunch on, esp when the cruise ships are in. Smile at the Internet camera just outside the entrance ...wave to your buddies back home.

headline: You've got to go once.
content: Yes, it is loud. Yes, it's bar food. Yes, it's good and it's a Key West tradition. I'm not much of a sloppy joe fan, but it looked great. I had the Shrimp and Chips... Shrimp were fresh and crunchy (panko crust) and the fries...More

headline: Music and food good
content:
Had to go As this place is a key west legend

We weren't disappointed, it did what is said on the tin 

Music was good, atmosphere also and food was ok! Nothing special but we weren't expecting haute cuisine

Wings, fish dip followed by a...More

headline: Pianos, Pounds of food, ultimately underwhelming
content: Key West, Florida is one of the most architecturally beautiful towns I have ever seen, and on Duval St. sits Sloppy Joes. An interstingly boisterous bar that had live and loud music in the middle of the afternoon. With this atmosphere comes fairly large portions...More

headline: Music was great!
content: Went in because the music was nice from outside,  ordered their " famous" margherita,  was not a fan. I also ordered a burger with loaded fries, both were just mediocre. My husband ordered the sloppy joes of course and said it was also just ok....More

headline: The best cocktails
content: Our waitress was the best I have ever had. We loved our food. We had the conch fritters and they were really very good.  Cocktails were great I had a Hurricane and it was really good.

headline: Great music in the heart of duval
content: Sloppy Joes is great if you want to hear live music and have drinks on a busy part of Duval.  So much fun! It's one of the more touristy bars, but for sure worth a visit.  We found ourselves saying "one more song" several times...More

headline: Famous pub great music
content: Always busy here.  Live music and plenty of drinks to pick.  Staff are a wealth of knowledge and gave some great ideas.  Have a beer kick back and enjoy the music all day long.

headline: Let Your Hair Down FUN!
content: Beachy fun, great selection & really laid back!  Although most of their menu consists of 'regular' eats, as in fast food, their claim and best offerings will be anything that goes with their extensive selection of cold beer - oh, and they have fancy harder...More

headline: Time for some Night Time Fun
content: Drop in here for a couple of refreshments and some good music.  Lots of stuff going on here - so sit back and enjoy the music and maybe even dance a bit.

headline: Awesome food and great entertainment!
content: The 2 singers that were singing the early evening on October 25th were great! They sang a lot of their own songs and were hilarious.  Every one there was having a great time.

headline: Lunch Time
content: We were in Key West on Thursday, November 3  - a cruise ship stop.  Stopped in for lunch/drinks.  It was noon - we got a table immediately - I was surprised.  The waitress was quick - the food was quick and good - the drinks...More

headline: YOUVE GOT TO DO SLOPPY JOES!
content: A CLASSIC! This place encapsulates the Florida Keys and Key West better than any other! Food is pretty good, the service is good during slower hours. MUST DO!

headline: Toga!Toga!
content: Wild time during fantasy fest on Toga Night Party.  Food is regular bar food and is pretty good.   Great service despite the melee of party peeps.

headline: Greasiest Fish-n-Chips Ever
content: I love a good fish-n-chips and know it's deep fried food, but this was a disgusting waste of Mahi! The batter is way to heavy - made the fries underneath pool in oil. I tried to use napkins to soak up some of the grease,...More

headline: Girls trip
content:
Sloppy Joe's was fun! The band was loud and the restaurant was full!  The food was ok. We went for the entertainment and t- shirts! 
We stayed and drank danced and met new friends that were locals! Fun was had by all four of us!...More

headline: My favorite bar
content: This is my favorite bar. It's fun and lively. It has bands always playing and always busy. Great atmosphere

headline: Must stop
content: Good live music, great location in the famous Duval St., always good atmosphere and why not to have a drink where Hemingway used to hang out?

headline: Yum!
content: Cruise stopped for the day in Key West and we had to have lunch at Sloppy Joe's.  Great atmosphere, food, and drinks.

headline: Pre Happy Hour
content: Stopped by Sloppy Joe's for a drink this afternoon. The crowd was friendly and energized. The drunks weren't bad either. Very friendly staff and great location

headline: Good Atmosphere, Good Food, Good History
content: Went during Fantasy Fest, no wait time and excellent Fish and Chips. Even thought is was during one of the busiest days of the year. we weren't rushed. must visit.

headline: Great place for music and drinks
content: Our second visit to Key West gave us a chance to revisit Sloppy Joes. Wonderful place to sit and enjoy a drink and some great music. The Doerfels were playing and they are amazing- definitely check them out when they are there. Stopped for a...More

headline: An institution in Key West!
content: No trip to Key West is complete without a stop into Sloppy Joe's. Joe Armstrong the founder was an old friend of Ernest Hemingway. Lots of history and memorabilia on the walls. Good entertainment and friendly staff!

headline: Hype outweighs reality.
content: A decent enough, centrally placed bar that is obviously attractive to visitors for all sorts of reasons. The live music I saw was ok. Drinks were average prices. Ok but unremarkable.

headline: Relaxed, fun, good food, great music, lovely people!
content: The title says it all! Worth the stop! Stay for the entertainment! The food is good pub food. Land Shark beer with lime is now one of my favourite drinks! I can't remember what I ate there but I am on Weight Watchers so I...More

headline: The place was alive and kicking
content:
This was by far the best party spot we found in Key West. The band was awesome, No cover, drinks were reasonable and the staff was really cool and fun.
We ended here several times

headline: Good "island music"
content: Dumpy little watering hole that was "GREAT" ...it's not high class or even clean but it was a really cool hangout to go have a few drinks

headline: Cold Drinks
content: If you have been to Key West, I can't tell you anything about Sloopy Joe's you don't already know. If you haven't been, I can tell you stories all the way back to the 70's. This is a must see on Duval St. Always open...More

headline: Great Music, Great Vibe.......
content: What a great time we had walking into Sloppy Joe's..... The music was Fantastic and the staff was quick and courteous.. a MUST stop when in Key West!!!

headline: Great place!
content: Very entertaining bar! Live music a plenty, police horses popping in for drinks, great staff and lovely food!

headline: Okay, it was the touristy thin to do, but it was delicious!
content: We stopped here for lunch during our tour of Key West.  The food was very good and the service was, surprisingly, excellent.  But, like many things in Key West, it wasn't cheap!  But definitely worth a stop!

headline: Over priced drinks. Loud tourist spot
content:
A must see on the tourist tour of Key West but don't bother eating or drinking here. Salads are made by Sysco, dressings second rate and the ketchup is Sysco low grade. 

Take a picture and move on

headline: Local bar
content:
Decided to check out the live musican here.  Food average and good live music.
On weekends this place is packed and will not get a table for a while.  Not a good environment for young children to be at.

headline: Very Good Margaritas!
content: We stopped for refreshment at Sloppy Joe's and after an iced tea with lemon, I decided to try the Sloppy Rita Margarita. It was very good and very much the way I like it! Our server was very nice and attentive as well! One of...More

headline: Must See
content: As a Buffet fan, I had to see Sloppy Joe's when we visited the Conch Republic. It is a historical bar setting and is much as I expected. They have a nice little shop with some really nice t-shirts. They even have one for dogs!...More

headline: Fun, food, music and drinks
content: You have to hit Sloppy Joe's at least once. Good bands, get a sloppy joe and have a few drinks! Located right on Duval.

headline: Fantasy fest 2016
content: Had the nacho's with sloppy joe topping. Not my flavor. But the band was funny. Good easily spend a few hours just having a few drinks & relaxing. Only a few steps away to the pier to watch one of there world famous sunsets !

headline: So-so
content: Nothing spectacular here. Very very loud, just ok service and the food was expensive and only average. We won't go back.

headline: A great stop
content: Great stop along Duval street.  Bartender was friendly, plenty of room.  Open and airy, good music....

headline: Key West Good Time!
content: Live music every night we were here. Both bands we watched were great. Played 80's, 90's and some current songs.  Everyone in the party danced and enjoyed themselves.

headline: Party always happening
content: It's a fun place to hang out.  We've always had good food there.  There's always a crowd ready for a good time, good food, good drinks and good people.

headline: Great fun - Pete and Wayne
content: Everyone has heard of Sloppy Joe's and you must go at least once.  But they have a duo that play song parodies that are hilarious albeit quite "blue" in their humor and very raunchy.  But they are also great musicians and best when interacting with...More

headline: Paradise
content: Can there be anyplace better? So much history with a great atmosphere. Great service and the conch fritters are awesome. If the ship left me I would live here.

headline: Don't miss it.
content: Good food..great staff...great music...I love to hang in here while my friends roll up and down Devall st. It's not a 5 star meal...but a 5 star experience.  Ya can't leave town without a trip to this place

headline: Landmark
content: This bar is a landmark.  I believe it was the first bar in Key West and a favorite of Ernest Hemmingway.  We did not eat there but went for drinks and the live music was great!

headline: Great place
content: We had seen sloppy joes on the webcam and had to stop. They had great food and a good band. Service was good, although our waiter had a ton of tables and we did wait for our check. It was a fun casual place to...More

headline: Too much
content:
We came up to key West to see the zombie bike race stopped into sloppy Joes
for lunch as usual the food was great portions to big had a few beers then went for a walk came back to listen to music and have a...More

headline: Great place for live music and dancing
content: Stopped to listen to the music five nights in a row.  We didn't order any food, but enjoyed the music, beer and shots.

headline: quick drink
content:
Just popped  in for a beverage, been here many time over the years , fun music, good food , beer alway ok,
right in the hub

headline: Epic
content: I just came here so I could get a sticker and shirt for my nephew. Great drinks and overpriced bar food to match. Good fun but snotty uptight people that worked there

headline: Great Drinks!
content: Sloppy Joe's is a Key West icon and a "must stop" for visitors.  The crowd is rowdy and fun, the live entertainment high quality, and the drinks, especially the Bloody Mary, are well mixed and generously poured!  What's not to love about a joint with...More

headline: Good beer
content: We popped in for a few beers one evening and the beer was great, the atmosphere was buzzing.  The bar staff were great and welcoming. After we figured out what the bell ringing was for we couldn't help but tip after ordering our drinks ;)

headline: If you like Pina Coladas!!!!
content: Sloppy Joes is great!  You just can't go wrong with this place.  On our first trip to KW, I didn't like Pina Coladas...until Sloppy Joes!  They have the BEST!  The food is good and you just can't beat the atmosphere!  A definite MUST for anyone...More

headline: Decent Food, Fair Service, Good Music
content: I give this place 3 stars (or circles ;) due to the slow service and cleanliness. The food was what to expect and the guy performing on stage was really good and entertaining. The server/bartender could of used help, but never once came over to...More

headline: Good place to go
content: Didn't make it to Joe's this year, but remember the fine service and good food I had when I visited there last year. Best to get there at opening time if you don't want to wait too long.

headline: Great food!
content: I was expecting higher price for the famous name but it was reasonable price great food, great service and good live band.

headline: This place is where it is happening!
content: Several different musicians play all day long and let me tell you...IT IS WONDERFUL.  you just couldn't ask for a better place to be.

headline: Busy Bar
content: We stopped to have dinner on a Saturday night.  The place was extremely busy.  I felt like we waited a long time for our food.  They did offer substitute options because I have to eat gluten free.  Great place to party no matter what time...More

headline: Great atmosphere, great location and great food
content:
Popped in for a late lunch on the first day of our Key West trip.
We ordered the sloppy Joe and shrimp taco's. Both were very good. Live music is on most afternoons and evenings and thus creates a great atmosphere. 
Whilst we were there...More

headline: Amazing!!
content: My husband and I highly recommend sloppy joe's! Amazing food, wonderful service, good entertainment and very affordable! We ate there several times during our trip and were not disappointed!

headline: Fun drink spot with live entertainment
content: Great cocktails on a corner location. Fun live singer and they actually had real iced tea when we needed a quick non- alcoholic refresher. Visited several times!

headline: Iconic!  And the taxicab driver knew exactly where to pick us up :)
content: What a terrifically fun place!!  And the food is great too.  Our bartender was a hoot, the music was great, everybody was wonderfully friendly and all where there to have a great time.  Expect it to be full of sunlight during the day, it is...More

headline: A local favorite
content: Hemmingway used to frequent this pub.  Typical pub environment with bistro type food and a unique sloppy joe mix.  Good beer and food.

headline: Dive bar,  but iconic and usually good bands
content: We always stop at Sloppy's at least once while in the area.  The service is okay, drink prices are a little high, but the bands that play here are usually really good.

headline: Love, love, love this place!
content: During our 5 day  stay in Key West we went to this place every day and. One day we went twice in the same day! The drinks are great and not watered-down. Food is awesome! Try the sloppy fries. They have live bands all day....More

headline: Our local pub
content: This is my favorite watering hole on the island. It is a 1940's era bar virtually unchanged in ambiance.

headline: Fun fun place!
content: Stopped for drinks and supper. Happened upon a show! Was hilarious!!! Just not suited for kids or those offended easily. Great drinks and food! Had a great time! Server was fun as well which definitely added to the experience!

headline: Had a BLAST here!
content: Sloppy Joe's is a FAVORITE spot that never changes-- always a blast!  A fun, laid-back atmosphere, good bar food, cold beer, good music.

headline: Love the live music
content: Love the live music and service. I go to Key West multiple times a year and I never get tired of it. The food there is really good.

headline: #1 place to visit while in Key West
content: My sister asked a favor of me while visiting Key West.  To pick up a couple of Sloppy Joe koozies and have a sandwich while there.  It was our first stop after checking into the hotel.  Of course we had the sloppy joe sandwich and...More

headline: Great bands
content: We always visit Sloppy Joe's when we visit Key West. Not for the food lol. But the entertainment is pretty much always good.

headline: Classic Key West Destination
content:
Sloppy Joe's is another of those places you just need to see if you go to Key West. It's conveniently located on a Duval
Street in old town Key West in the heart of everything, They have live music all the time and it's a...More

headline: Good Music
content: We listened to a country singer and had beers and everyone there was really upbeat and into the music.

headline: Lunch stop
content: While visiting key west stopped in sloppy Joe's for lunch very busy open air type atmosphere live music food was fair but nothing special everyone was very friendly definitely worth the stop

headline: This is Key West for me
content: If you are in Key West then Sloppy Joe's is a must. They don't seat you, you seat yourself and this can be challenging. The waitress was on the ball. Service was excellent. I had a sloppy joe and my hubby had a burger. He...More

headline: Love this place
content: Love this placeThe music is good the food is good the drinks are some purred and the service is excellent can't say enough about sloppy Joe's it's always a winner

headline: Nice guys
content: We only stopped in to say that we had been there. Started talking to a couple of the guys in the gift shop about the Kenny Chesney concert. They told me some very interesting stuff they were really nice guys. The place was crowded there...More

headline: Drinks and snacks
content: My wife and I stopped in at Sloppy Joes for pina coladas and a snack. They had a great band playing and the drinks and fried cheese sticks were delicious.

headline: Fun place!
content: So fun to visit Sloppy Joes for lunch on our last day in Key West!  Reasonably priced and great atmosphere!

headline: Visit for the novelty
content: Went on a Saturday night. A couple of guys who were, at points, funny, but mostly just used swearing and vulgarity in their songs which made people laugh. Good to visit and there were a few hen and stag dos there that looked like they...More

headline: Why?
content: This is the name but not the location of "Hemingway's Bar." It is definitely a scene, but more than a bit contrived. My dry martini was instead served dirty. Not really worth a visit.

headline: Sloppy Joe's
content: The name says it all, this is simply a watering hole on Duval Street, the food is nothing to write home about probably why it got it's name. It has live entertainment whilst you guzzle your beer.

headline: What a night
content: Well we heard about the famous Sloppy Joes so had to go. The place was packed with a great band. The band was awesome getting everyone into a great party mood. The place had people of all ages so you did not feel out of...More

headline: Great Stop
content: Sloppy Joe's is a fun place to grab something to eat & check out some local musical talent. Something for everyone on the menu.

headline: Party
content: Only there for the nighttime. Drinks were normal (good). There was live music with a good atmosphere. Had a good time!

headline: Get the Sloppy Joe
content: Had to have the Sloppy Joe at Sloppy Joe's and it didn't disappoint.  Comfortable place and it had live music.  Football on the TV.

headline: Was good!
content: Only fault we could find was there was too much food but thank goodness the waitress gave us a box to bring leftovers back to our guesthouse. Food, service, atmosphere, price - was great. Music was good but you could not really have a decent...More

headline: FUN!!!
content: Just fun!!! Band was great!! Drinks good. Sloppy Joes very good- tangy and a little spicy. Pickles yummy. Conch fritters...ok. Loaded fries-ok. Key Lime pie delish!

headline: Music here is always top notch!
content: If you're looking for a place to sit down and relax and have a cold drink while listening to some great live music this is your place, if dancing is more your style this is your place.....if you are looking for a souvenir shirt or...More

headline: Decent band, unique venue
content: This is an interesting and unique venue. Went on a Friday night and stayed and listened to the band for a couple of hours. Wait staff very friendly. Would stop in for a drink again.

headline: famous
content: a truly famous restaurant/bar right on Duval street.  great entertainment all day and night. great food and friendliest staff.

headline: Good lively spot
content: We were here in mid September 2016 and visited a few times - busy most times, good band, service good and friendly, reasonably priced food and drink.  Worth calling in to.

headline: Ended up there every night.
content: While there are tons of bars and restaurants in Key West, we typically ended up at sloppy joe's at one point or another. They had a live band and good drinks!

headline: Great place for a drink
content: Great place to visit and have a few drinks. Great atmosphere and good selection of drinks. Close to main travel places

headline: It was OK
content: Came here for lunch.  Crowded and you get your own table and wait staff will approach you.  I had the fish tacos, which I was disappointed.  Not enough tartar and it took forever to get it.  When I got it the taco was soggy and...More

headline: Historic and Great Atmosphere!
content: Come to Sloppy Joe's to get that laid back Key West lifestyle while indulging in the history of the place! At night it transforms to an awesome place to listen to some live music, dance and grab some good drinks. There is always a great...More

headline: Good Experience
content: You really can't go to Key West without visiting Sloppy Joe's.  Ernest Hemingway and Tennessee Ford both frequented this bar and it is said the Hemingway wrote some of his books while here.  The is tourist oriented and this is not the original location, which...More

headline: Lunch review
content: Great Place to have a drink and lunch. Very friendly staff. Food is good and so is the atmosphere. Worth Going to visit.

headline: A Part of Key West
content:
This has to be one of the must visit places in Key West, obviously a tourist place but still a great night out. 
Food and drinks good, very good service, the entertainment was great a bar with great atmosphere. It does gets busy, so there...More

headline: Nice lunch option
content: Stopped in for lunch on a Saturday, got a delicious pulled pork sandwich and a frozen banana and rum beverage. Live music was outstanding and service was better than average

headline: Lunch
content: My wife and I stopped in for lunch and a drink. There was live music and the crowd was having a great time. The drinks and food are very good.

headline: Weekend in the keys
content: Loved it in here, great atmosphere. Not cheap, but nowhere is on the Keys . The band was good and we enjoyed our drinks in there !

headline: crowded music hall
content: went for early dinner, place was crowded no music yet.found a place to sit, waitress friendly ,took our order,was quite a bit of time before food arrived. by then live music started.loud and all songs sounded the same. enjoyed the meal,sloppy joe's, of course, lots...More

headline: Fun bar and restaurant
content: Sloppy Joes was fun place to grab a bite and drink and listen to some good music.  Grab a seat and order your beverage. Try the banana daiquiri if you need to cool down. Bathrooms are clean. Service is good  You will occasionally see a...More

headline: Outstanding
content: I visited Key West with some friends overt memorial weekend, and the highlight of our trip was time spent at Sloppy Joe's.  The drinks were fantastic, the music was great, as our bartender Jordan was one of their most friendly and skillful bartenders we've ever...More

headline: Love the historical aspect!
content: Really cool thought to know that Earnest Hemingway ate, drank, & fought here! Had to try their original Sloppy Joe sandwich. I'm not a fan of sweet tomato sauce but since that is their signature item I had to try it. It was ok -...More

headline: Sloppy Joes
content:
Ok we drove down to key west and had to go in ! 
It's large airy and has a buzz about it . 
A little bit touristy for me . 
But hey we've been . 
The Irish barman was friendly and welcoming

headline: Rude, crowded and no happy hour
content: Happy hours and coupons abound in Key West, but NOT at Sloppy Joe's. They know they are an attraction, so they act that way.The place was mobbed, the beer wasn't cheap and the waitress was super rude.One drink, and we left.

headline: Good Beer, Good Music
content: Last went in this bar about 40 years ago and, when i found myself in Key West again told my wife we must go for a drink in this famous old bar. I have to say i can't really remember my previous visit but by...More

headline: Consider this a "must see" during a visit to Key West.
content: Definitely a tourist type of place, but we had to at least stop in for a drink.  There was a nice local band playing.  Lots of memorabilia all over the place associated with Key West history.

headline: Dinner & Drinks
content: If you like tourist trap style restaurants this is your place. Loud music, mediocre at best food & expensive drinks in plastic cups. My guess is that once upon a time, back in the days of Earnest Hemingway, this was a family run restaurant with...More

headline: Touristy
content: Very touristy bar. It was cool to go there just didn't stay long. It wasn't our type of watering hole. Good thing there is plenty around. You have to at least check it out.

headline: Birthday Celebrations
content: Had a awesome weekend in Key West!  A most popular stop while on Duval is Sloppy Joe's.  Great for drinking, eating, live music and dancing.  We had a awesome time dancing to the live band.  It's a great place to hang out!

headline: A classic
content:
Good vibe, fair menu.
This place is great for friends who wants to relax in a bar/ restaurant. Live performances a plus.

headline: Came in for a quick lunch
content: My husband and I were happily surprised to see live music midday. The guitarist was great and played a lot of light and classic rock that for everyone singing in their seats.

headline: Best Bar Ever
content: Such a great place! So iconic yet still a great time. Got pictures taken there right before our wedding. They let us up on stage and we got to take pictures with the bartenders. Went to the bar ever night! Great times, great memories!

headline: Great place for a drink anytime of day!!
content: We stopped in at Sloppy Joes briefly while we were in Key West as a cruise port.  We were there at 10am and there was already a nice friendly crowd forming.  The bartender seemed like she'd been around for quite a while and she knew...More

headline: Bucket List - Must See!
content: Wait staff very friendly, accommodating, food was good for a bar...Again, split half with hubby, this town definitely gives you alot of food! Crab cake sandwich with onion rings was delicious, as was the Key Lime Pie!  Atmosphere was nice, live music (copy material- old...More

headline: Great Food, Drinks & Entertainment!!
content: We stopped into Sloppy Joe's twice while we were in Key West.  The drinks were good and the food was very good!  The Roast Beef Sub was awesome and we also ate an appetizer that was 2 corn "pancakes" with melted in the middle like...More

headline: Loud and brash
content: Famous bar, with the usual over the top drinking and loud but it's a part of history, no for faint hearted

headline: A must see.
content: No visit to key west would be complete with out a stop here. Even if you don't drink alcoholic beverages you good still have a nonalcoholic drink. Friendly staff. Best time would be at night when the neon lights are on. Photo op.

headline: Great Sloppy Joe's and fries!
content: Had lunch at the iconic establishment and was quickly served and the food was delicious. Not your everyday Grannies Sloppy Joe but very delicious. Price was fair, service great! A must try when in Key West!! Also had a great band in the evening hours,...More

headline: 2016 Trip
content:
Stopped several times at Sloppy Joe's during our trip for food & drinks & music. We love listening to live music, and the fine choice of adult beverages was very enjoyable.
Easy going and casual and friendly.

headline: Lots of FUN every night.
content: Lots of Fun every night. The entertainment was a lot better than expected. Drinks were OK and didn't eat there.

headline: Fun Place
content: This is a fun place with live music on Duval Street in the middle of all of the activity on the street. They have great live music and multiple bars and good food. It is a large place and open air. If you want a...More

headline: SHIRTS
content: Stopped to buy our tshirts.  They were very helpful as I'd picked up the wrong size for my husband.  We purchased 2 shirts.

headline: Sloppy Joe's 2016
content: Great classic place in Key West music and funüëç we have been there many times and the place is the same old Key West

headline: A must visit while in Key West
content: The food is good and it comes out of the kitchen fast.  The service is good, for the amount of tables the servers work, they do a great job moving through and keeping folks supplied with beverages.  The entertainment is always a blast.  The variety...More

headline: "must go" place to visit
content:
Rather iconic place to visit, last here over 16 years ago and pleased to say that nothing has changed, even the staff :-) 
Started off with a Rum Runner and a beer but the band were setting up so we settled down for some food...More

headline: GI distress
content: My husband and I both had intestinal issues after eating here. The " pina colda I had was awful, I wouldn't even call it that, more like frozen brown mush.

headline: Historically significant with poor food.
content: The food is not good. The portions are large, but quality is bad. Typical crappy bar food. It's always loud and service is poor.

headline: So impressed with the bartenders.
content: Great atmosphere, even better bartenders. We had Jordan take care of us. He went out of his way to help me meet one of the band members that plays there often. And then when leaving gave me advice on where to see more music, which...More

headline: Fun place
content: Good music, good drinks, great place. To cool off and relax. Go in or walk by and check out yourself live on sloppy joes web site.

headline: what a blast
content: we had such a great time hear the staff were so fun always had something up their sleeve great drinks, food  and very entertaining.

headline: A MUST STOP IN KEY WEST!
content: I have never been to Key West without stopping in Sloppy Joe's.  As usual hard to find a table but such is life for a busy establishment.  We did find a small table for the 4 of us and enjoyed fish and chips.... Fantastic (very...More

headline: Good Live Music Venue but...
content: It's called "Sloppy" for a reason!  People tend to get a bit messy here.  Best for the younger crowd. It hasn't changed a bit since the last time I went here years ago. If you haven't been, it's one of those "must experience" places because...More

headline: Bar Hopping
content: Friends and I went bar hopping and we decided to try Sloppy Joes . The bartenders were very nice. The music was good! They play music that caters to people of every single taste. Id definitely visit the next time I'm in town.

headline: Great atmosphere
content: This is a popular key west spot. The live entertainment is excellent. The food is average burger/greasy. I recommend for the drinks and music.

headline: Key West Institution - for 20-somethings
content: A Key West institution.  Decent hot trendy music from Nationwide. Very crowded , loud,  with sticky floors. Best for 20-somethings (I'm 40)

headline: Popular place, but busy and noisy
content: Before leaving home for a week in Key West, I checked out various sources and made a list of restaurants, bars, and casual eateries to visit.  Sloppy Joe's was on list, as it is a perennial favorite among visitors of all stripes.  This place is...More

headline: Sloppy Joe's represents a taste of the "Conch Republic", or the real Key West!
content: Sloppy Joe's is an open air, sometimes crowded, but enjoyable experience.  Even though Ernest Hemmingway spent a majority of time drinking at Capt. Tony's, to think that he also imbibed more than the average man at Sloppy Joe's is historically significant for my wife's and...More

headline: Great place
content: We had lunch there. Service was very friendly,food was good,atmosphere was great!! We now know why they are always packed no matter what time of day you go

headline: So much fun!
content: I went here to enjoy a band and have some drinks.  They have 3 bands a night and this is one of the most popular bars in Key West. The bands were all good every time I went.  The crowd was good and was mixed...More

headline: Interesting and loud!
content: Loved the atmosphere in this place. A bit loud, food is amazing for the experience. Would definitely recommend it

headline: You have to come here
content:
It's a clich√© it's silly.
But you have to come here if you are in Key West 
The food is better than you think it will be and the drinks are fun

headline: Bar
content: Must see place. Staff is a lot of fun, check out the online cameras and you can take a screenshot of yourself there from your phone . Good food, lots of fun. Always packed so go early

headline: Lunch
content: Food was bland and not very much imagination. The key lime pie came in a take out container. For a plCe famous for key lime pie, this was not the best experience.

headline: Lunch
content:
Massive portions 

Good quality American food not overpriced 

Very good quick service 

Very busy hard to get a table (we had to wait 10mins but had a drink at the bar )

Good atmosphere

headline: Must visit
content:
If you go to Key West you must visit Sloppy Joe's.
It is always packed and it is a fun place.
The bartenders are fun and the crowd is always interesting.

headline: A Key West Landmark!
content: No trip to Key West would be complete without stopping in here.  This is a fun place with music going around the clock.  The food is good and reasonable.  Last visit there we had a pizza and found it to be very good.  Add this...More

headline: A MUST visit
content: We stopped in for drinks and appetizers.  It was loud and fun!  Live music added to the whole experience.  If you don't go anywhere else, go to Sloppy Joes!

headline: Must Visit
content: Great bar, live music, people everywhere.  Food menu good, good drinks. Live music every night open early, closes late. One of many, many bars/clubs along Duval St.

headline: Shelly Snyder
content: This place is very fun . Great prices good sloppy joes and great nachos . The bands that played every night were awesome . We tried to make a stop there every night no matter what we were doing . We were with another couple...More

headline: Drinks
content: Sat at the small bar area on the Duval Street side. Had a great bartender,  Jim was attentive to what we wanted to drink. I ate a Original sloppy joe sandwich. Drinks and food was very reasonable

headline: Joes tap bar.
content:
So I've given a review about the main area at Sloppy Joe's, but not Joe's tap bar . It's at the back, it even has its own entrance or you can go through the main bar, whichever suits you.
So you want somewhere quieter to...More

headline: Soooooo Key West!!!
content: One of Hemingway's haunts, this place is known for it's Sloppy Joe's.  They also serve Sloppy Joe French fries, which are a meal on their own.

headline: Laid back bar / restaurant
content: Great ambiance,  if you like 80's southern rock/Southern California beach rock 'n roll.    Fantastic setting and food sets well with the food.  If you go to Key West, Sloppy Joe's is a must!

headline: Nice lunch
content: Had a nice lunch with daughter and granddaughter. Food was pretty good, if not a bit pricey for what you get. Food service. Drinks were refreshing.

headline: Julie makes a good margarita
content:
Very nice bartender. It was our last stop on our last day. Julie made a
Great margarita and was nice to hear from a local.

headline: An overall great time
content: Great place, fun environment, great service from the door guys to the bar tenders. If you enjoy live music Sloppy Joe's is a must.

headline: Great Music, Great service
content: We stopped in to have a drink while in Key West but we were drawn to the great music. The service was excellent. We did not eat there but were told by many that the food was good. We stayed there for a few hours...More

headline: My favorite bar on the east coast.
content: This place is by far my favorite bar PERIOD! Open and airy and always great music playing. Drinks are cold and deeeelish! The atmosphere is the reason to go. Any time if the day is a good time to party at Sloppy Joe's!

headline: Good food
content: Very good lace to eat while touring Duval Street. The portions are large. We each ordered a Greek salad and the waitress was kind enough to tell us that one could feed both of us. She was right. I guess we liked it we ate...More

headline: Why not?
content: Not my favorite type of atmosphere but "when in Rome" you have to try out all the tourist hot spots... The band is crude but somewhat funny... Like I said, "why not".

headline: There's Nothing Sloppy About This Place
content: Good food, drinks and don't forget the music!!!! Service was awesome also. Family friendly and just a good time to be had by all.

headline: Crazy Fun Bar, But Apparently Not  Hemingway's Haunt
content: We ate a meal and had Nachos her one night.  I won't recommend the food.  It is a decent place to listen to music and have a few drinks.  No meal or drink deals here.  Not even the "real" joint that Hemingway visited, that's down...More

headline: The best
content: This bar is charming, fun and everything in the middle. Carla, she's the best bar tender in KW. I've been coming for years and this bar has captured my heart. It's a must.

headline: Great band and fun bar!
content: Our large group walked from bar to bar and found this one to be the most fun.  Great bartenders, they got our drinks out quickly.

headline: Is what it is
content: A fun, noisy bar with decent bar food and drinks. Music is playing all of the time- some good, some not so good.

headline: Must do just to say you were there!
content: Beer is great, service is great, atmosphere is entertaining!  Sloppy Joe sandwich was not to our liking:(  conch chowder just so so!  Replenished our koozies!

headline: Great setting
content: Stopped in here for a drink with my boyfriend. There was a band playing and they were pretty good. Good setting and good security set up.

headline: Ernest wouldn't like this
content: This isn't the place he hung out.  He never came here. The original is half a block away.  All hype and lies.  It's a noisy bar filled with a variety of interesting people to watch.  No class though. Ernest didn't live here long and if...More

headline: Good entertainment
content: The entertainment was very good.  The service was even better!  The food was OK.  We were there on a Friday night and it was very busy but our waitress never missed a beat.  She even mopped a spill on the floor in record time.   I...More

headline: It's a bar, but portions are huge
content: My husband tried the Sloppy Joe, he was not impressed.  Said it tasted like a sloppy joe. I had a Greek salad which was good and huge! Couldn't believe how big it was. We had a basket of fries and some beer and it was...More

headline: Fun place and good food
content: We visited Sloppy Joe's several times while in Key West.  The food was great and the atmosphere fun!  Nice place, no issues and reasonable price.  Families would be fine earlier in the day.  After 9 it is better for couples.

headline: Ok place
content: Nothing special but a must see place in key west . Many others places much better . Green Parrot  for example is a much better experience . Bands are ok drinks are expensive , the place is large and at least you don't feel crowded...More

headline: Fun spot on Duval Street
content: This is a fun atmosphere! Their food is good and the drinks are cold & tasty üëç live music along with good service makes this a hot spot and a must visit while in Key West.

headline: Dive bar
content: Key west is full of dive bars. Historical stuff all over with live entertainment food and drinks. Food was average service was good.

headline: Great old with charm and history
content: Here in town for annual Phil Peterson ride. Bobby Friss band in town. Great atmosphere. The historic Duval street was closed to traffic made experience that much nicer.

headline: Drinks and music
content: Stopped for drinks enjoyed the music. Service was excellent drinks were good. We liked it do much we stopped a second time the next day.

headline: Good ol'bar
content: You have to go just to see this place. Bar tenders are awesome, live music was good. Great place to people watch and meet people.

headline: Great piece of history but just OK
content: A really cool piece of history. If you are in KW this a must see. But the food is average. Our server was obviously over tourists. See it and am glad I did. But no need to see again

headline: The granddaddy of Key West
content: It the reason we come to Key West. There was a 16 year gap since last time I was here and it is just the same. Old time bar with that historical feel.  It may not be the original location but you feel like you...More

headline: Good honest fun
content:
Good music, great atmosphere  and a nightly visit on our 4 day stay. Enjoy ! We did
Don't expect a clear head in the morning though

headline: Always Great
content: You can't go to Key West without going to Sloppy Joes.  We stopped in here a few times a couple of weeks ago for lunch, dinner and drinks.  I always get the Sloppy Rita and love them.  All of the food items are good, noting...More

headline: A tourist trap worth a visit
content: Yes it is a tourist trap. Yes it is busy with tourists. And yes it is still worth visit. This is one of those iconic classic places that one has to visit while here.

headline: Good food and atmosphere
content: Had a great lunch.  Go here every visit.  Staff is nice.  Food is always good and portions are large.  I would recommend and go back again.

headline: A Must when visiting KW
content: What can I say ?  This is a legendary bar in KW ...we ALWAYS come by and have a few drinks when visiting..good decent prices and always have to get a T shirt too!!..this trip I had their Bloody Mary and it was really spicy...More

headline: Food
content: Best sloppy Joe I have ever had!! Great customer service! Located in main tourist area. Live music! Great atmosphere! Souvenier shop was cute. Must see stop when in Key West.

headline: Nice for a drink.... But there are better places...
content: Nice to stop in and say you've been there.. Nothing head turning about this joint tho.., stop in to say you did.. And then go see some other bars..

headline: Noisy
content: A little bit too noisy for us. If we were with a big group of people I am sure we would of liked to stay but .... we just weren't that interested.

headline: If my husband was writing this review, it would be 5 stars...
content: ...but I was not at all impressed. The drinks were the weakest we had and my sloppy joe was mostly bun. I know this is a key west landmark and such but the service and the door are mediocre at best. With so many awesome...More

headline: Key West Fixture
content: Sloppy's hasn't changed much since I first went there decades ago during Spring Break, which is a good thing!  The food is unusually good and varied for a bar, but still reasonably priced compared to most other restaurants on Duval Street.  There's plenty of live...More

headline: Great music and drinks
content: Went here in a recommendation from a friend and so glad we did. Best frozen banana daiquiri ever!  Live music was entertaining.

headline: Awesome band from AL
content: Don't know their name but the band there during 8/23-8/26 was one of the best bands I've ever seen . Great scene for dancing music and partying- drinks are tasty, food is just ok but I'll be back for entertainment!

headline: Fun place, must have for your Duval Crawl
content: Fun live band,(Friday night)  crowd varied in age, but a good range.  Service was fast and not super over priced.

headline: Nice place for live music and the Hemingway roots but very loud music
content: If you want to live the history of Key West, this is a place to go. Food is ok, as everywhere in America. you go there for the decoration, the huge room, the live music (excellent groups by the way, between rock and mumford and...More

headline: Nightlife
content: We stopped in for a drink and to listen to the band there...all very good! A definite stop for all tourists and locals!

headline: Hemingway Lunch!
content: Great Sloppy Philly Steak sandwich! I was very pleased with the meal. My lady had the Fish Tacos, and she was equally pleased. Also, we had a side order of French fries, and the fries appeared to be baked instead of fried? (In which I...More

headline: Had to eat here from word of mouth!!
content: This was one restaurant I wanted for sure to eat at and it didn't disappoint. The music was loud but we loved it and the whole scenario. Got a T-shirt of course to remember!!

headline: No trip to Key West is complete without a visit!
content: Great music, cold drinks, and fun atmosphere!  We tried the nachos with the sloppy joe meat on the side, and it was very good.

headline: We will come back
