content: This is a must on anyone's bucket list. We went a few times this trip and went 5 years ago also. Lunch is quieter so you have time to sit back look around and eat a bit. There is always live entertainment so it really...More

headline: Always a Must!
content: Stopped by again!!  : ) We just have to visit every time we are in Key West.  Margaritas and conch fritters  and off we go walking around the famous known streets. The place  never changes!

headline: We could hear the music from our pool.
content: It was so nice to be so close to Sloppy Joes. We stumbled in around 10:00PM after arriving and getting settled in and were disappointed the kitchen was closed. The musicians were singing well known songs, but they were twisting the lyrics into a crude...More

headline: Drinking and snacks. ..
content: Had a great time here.  6pm during the week. Drinks were perfect, people in the crowd were fun, music was Latin flavor.   I will return,  tomorrow, again

headline: one of the places you need to go in Key West
content: There are lots of stories you will hear about Sloppy Joes. It's a decent sandwich and a tourist filled place. However, our server was very good, the beer was cold and they had a few nice selections which did surprise me. I expected Corona or...More

headline: The atmosphere is wonderful
content: We only had drinks here but if you need a place with a warm vibe to it then this is your place. Be sure to see the walls because a lot of history has gone down in this bar. The huge wooden airplane prop over...More

headline: Great bar and band
content: The band was amazing!!! Perfect mix of old and new music. Waitress was awesome and very nice....lots of places to sit and room to dance...plus they have ac which is a huge plus

headline: Great Sloppy Margaritas
content: We just stopped by quickly for a drink, but the Sloppy Margarita, their signature drink, was super.  Everyone in the bar is very friendly and made for a great stop before dinner at another location in Key West.  (Trying to savor all we could in...More

headline: Had a blast
content: Awesome place with great live music. All the bands that played were a lot of fun, great for dancing at night. I liked this place a lot compared to other bars on the strip because it's such a big place that you didn't have to...More

headline: Go just for the history of it
content: This is a place to go have a beer just to say you have been there - because Sloppy Joes was a bar frequented by famous author Ernest Hemmingway.  The beer was cold, and the place did have a great vibe.

headline: Good
content: This is a pretty neat place to hang out.  It had pretty good food and the live band was funny.  I would not recommend children going there in the evening though.  Service was pretty good but it gets packed quickly.

headline: Great sloppy joes!
content: Our waitress was awesome, always smiled, was really funny and was fast! I wish I would've caught her name! The other waitresses weren't nearly as smiley! I ordered the hot roast beef and the husband ordered the sloppy joe. Drinks were great and refilled often....More

headline: Totally touristy, but still fun!
content: Wait staff is efficient even when super busy. Drinks are delicious and the food was good too! Music was great!restrooms could be checked and cleaned a little more often...

headline: Better than expected
content: Stopped in for a quick lunch and was pleased with the tasty and huge nachos, friendly bartender, and yummy rum runner on the rocks

headline: Yummy and fun.
content: The sloppy joe goes are to die for. Definitely not good for you but whatever the it's vacation. Right? The live bands get out of control good at night time too. A fun place

headline: Good laugh
content:
Nice for a drink, can get very noisy with groups of people having a good time.  Nice atmosphere, more the younger group.
Busy in the evening

headline: Good music and fab drink prices
content: What more is there to say. If you re in Key West and not spending at least one evening here, you are doing Key West wrong.

headline: Really Nice
content: We always make a stop when we are in Key West to have a fun time and good food.  There is such a nice group of people in here.  Thanks.

headline: Our 'go to' in Key West
content: Year after year, Sloppy Joes does not disappoint...I have not eaten here but we always stop for cocktails, listen to music, and peruse their gift shop.  A couple of weeks ago we met a great bartender there named Jordan, he's awesome.  We stopped in 3...More

headline: Fun time, good food
content:
Stopped in for dinner with the kids.  Hostess got us seated promptly and told us "those guys are going to be saying some things I can't repeat with kids present.  Are you ok with that?"  Sure.

Wow.  Definitely adult oriented, they were crude but very,...More

headline: Food good not great
content: Had dinner with my family here. It was great service but the food was just ok. Not bad, just ok. This is on Duval street which I assume is known more for the bars and not so much the food. Great cocktails.

headline: Cool place
content: Walked in wanting something cool to drink and got treated to some live music which was nice. The service was good despite the place being packed and the food was outstanding. We also liked the open doors that let you look out at the street...More

headline: Always a good time
content: We caught the tail end of an amazing band, The Doerfels. Wish we had gotten there sooner to hear their entire set! Great drinks, great party atmosphere..Sloppy Joe's is always a good time! The original!

headline: Great Music
content: Typical bar.  Nothing really fancy.  Live music was outstanding. Service was great. Drinks pretty standard. Worth your time if you like bars, and believe this is really a Hemingway hangout

headline: Treated better when KC was there.
content: Disappointed there were few smiling faces this third time eating at Sloppy Joes. The nicest face was a curly head kid at the door. Server never smiled. Took too long for drinks. Food just okay. I asked for a separate check for a traveling companion,...More

headline: Lots of fun
content: Yummy food and lots of good music. The sloppy joes is not your mothers sloppy joe. I had the fish and it was yummy

headline: Interesting
content: We visit this place each time we visit Key West.  Why I don't know, maybe because it's a local landmark, or maybe because it has great misic.  It's worth the visit but just for one drink.  There are so many other places to see.  The...More

headline: Popular spot
content: It's on the popular Duval Street. When I was there it was loud and crowded. Fortunately, the place is big enough to hold a crowd. It did have some good live music playing.

headline: The staff are soooo very friendly
content: great atmosphere and fun servers. drinks and food served very quickly and management is readily available.

headline: Hemingway's Hangout
content: Another of those 'must visit' locations in Key West. Fairly typical bar and grill; however, with a lot more history. The had live bands on the nights we went and it was Standing Room Only.

headline: Best Meal I had on the island
content:
I have always heard about this place, so we had to go and I was pleasantly surprised to find it's not all hype!
Awesome Sloppy Joes. Great atmosphere

headline: A must see at least once
content: A classic place!!! Can't stop in Key West and not visit here!! Great music and great beer!! A must see at least once!!! The lady in the gift shop is awesome and very knowledgable about great places in Key West!!

headline: Great Place to Kick Back, Relax and Enjoy!
content: Large open bar and restaurant with live music in the afternoons and evenings. Lots of appetizers, large menu and any drink you want!  Nice place to relieve your parched throat after walking Duval St.

headline: Great food great music
content: Enjoyed everything about this place..  was told to make the trip definitely worth it. Food was awesome!! Highly recommended

headline: Nachos
content: Stopped here with a group during a cruise. But this is always on my must list when I'm in Key West. Nachos with sloppy joe mix added is my favorite and the beer is nice and cold. (My friends thought the sloppy joe mix was...More

headline: Cold beer and great service!
content: Loved this place. Great people watching.  The beer was the coldest in town and Jordan, our bartender, was SO nice and seemed genuinely glad we were there (this was not the experience at most other KW places we visited).  We actually went twice, music was...More

headline: Noisy, Crowded, Bit Tacky - But Go Anyway
content: I have to say that 5 and 10 years ago, we enjoyed this place more because it was less overwhelmed by the tourist crush. I hold cruise ships partly responsible for discharging so many passengers at once, all aiming to make quick hits on the...More

headline: fun night spot
content: stopped by for drinks and music.  the margaritas are the slushy kind premade in the machines...a little sweet.  my well drink was fine.  music was high energy and crowd was nice.  the security guards were making sure rowdiness stayed at a good level.  good place...More

headline: So glad we went!
content: We were told by a local not to go, but my daughter had her heart set on this popular tourist stop. So, we thought ok we'll go but not have high expectations. Boy were we blown away! The music was OUTSTANDING! We were so entertained....More

headline: A Key West Icon
content: Sloppy Joe's is a Key West-must!  Crowded, but tables clear out pretty quickly.  Service is fast!  Famous sloppy joe was delicious, as well as pulled pork and shrimp po' boy.  Portions are not huge for the price, but it is Key West after all.  Check...More

headline: Bad fish tacos
content: Ate here and got sick!! When I called to management they argued with me about them serving me bad food! Incredible.... I will never go there again and I hope no one else has to go through puking and diarrhea from their food! Awful place...More

headline: A famous hangout
content: Long established bar with great atmosphere of Old Key West.  Live music all day long keeps this place going.  Good drinks, the food okay for bar food.  Many other good places to eat around.  Overall, great fun!

headline: just great ..... a bar full of noise ......
content: I didn't even know it was a restaurant.  When we called in it was just a great, slightly rough (that is intended as a compliment) bar full of noise with a better than average young band knocking the bejaysus out of some good rock'n'roll numbers...More

headline: Physical confrontation with security!
content: It was crowded last night and my friend and I needed to use the restroom. As we walked in I was right behind her when I saw a mans arm reach out and grab hers. I immediately removed his grip on her arm. He proceeded...More

headline: This USED to be Cool, now it's a JOKE!
content: This place used to be the one iconic Key West bar you had to visit. No more. It was already a bit corporate with poor music. Now it has crazy fierce security guys and they either ARE or are the response to a serious problem....More

headline: Top Notch Security
content: While I gather that the average patrons of this establishment wander in the door blitzed beyond reason, my best friend and I were the exception. We purposefully walked through the entrance sober, despite the shabby exterior and poor music, on a mission to purchase Pi√±a...More

headline: Curious but just okay
content: My mechanic said this was his favorite restaurant. Given the history behind this restaurant, I thought why not. Service was fantastic. The sloppy joe ale is good but not the place for conch fritters. The nachos were okay but not horrible.

headline: Good One Time
content: Sloppy Joe's was not a typical choice for my husband and I to eat at but well we were in Key West so why not. Very noisy and crowded at 8:30 at night. Had read about the Hemingway connection so very thrilled with decor. Pictures...More

headline: Fun Atmosphere, Food So-So
content: We stopped in this iconic bar one afternoon during Tropical Storm Collin.  It was packed with tourists trying to get out of the rain.  The atmosphere was lively, and there was a guitarist performing.  We were glad to get out of the rain and ordered...More

headline: Sloppy Joe;s
content: Alway's loud with a party vibe. A A good band was always playing. The drinks were pricey and a lot of room for dancing.

headline: Gotta Go to Joe's
content:
If you're in Key West then you must visit Sloppy Joe's.
It's a lively venu with live music, dancing, food and drink, with a long history in Key West.
Ok so it won't win any Michelin Stars for it's food and the drinks are served...More

headline: Live Music!
content: I went to this place while in Key West for a friend's wedding. They have live music and the people are great. My friends and I had so much fun that we want back the following night. While in Key West you must go to...More

headline: Best place to hang out, listen to music, have a few drinks, and just relax
content: We live in S.Florida, so we get down to the Keys pretty frequently.  When in Key West, Sloppy Joe's is always on our agenda.  The entertainment is terrific, although keep in mind that many of the acts are geared toward adults.  While enjoying a duo...More

headline: Good Drinks
content: Great food, Awesome party place, Beer is cold and music is awesome. Its not a trip to Key West without a visit to Sloppy Joe's.

headline: Nice place to visit
content: Did not eat here, but drinks are very good. Good entertainment on stage throughout the day. Will visit again next time in Key West.

headline: Very good drinks
content: You can't go to Key West and not stop in Sloppy Joes for a drink.  There's always a crowd and music playing but the bartenders are fast and make good drinks.

headline: Sloppy Rita
content: Awesome party place, Burgers are Great.  Beer is cold and music is awesome. Its not a trip to Key West without a visit to Sloppy Joe's.

headline: Drinks
content: We sent an hour or so here each day of our trip, bought many tees from the gift shop, really enjoyed the late night entertainment. Ate dinner here,wings were good with cold beer. Introduced my friend to key one shooters.  Very tasty!!

headline: Sloppy Joe's - Strong Drinks and even stronger personalities
content: Stopping by this watering hole is a Key West must, or so we were told.  People inside were fun to watch and with a view to the street - we sat through 2-3 rounds of drinks and had a great time.  The music in the...More

headline: Great band, staff, margarita, nachos
content: We stopped into Sloppy Joe's 2-3 times during our Key West stay.  It was a fun bar with great music (bands, dj). One of my favorite places!

headline: Iconic Dive Bar
content: Iconic dive bar just off of Duval St. The drinks are about average and nothing that stands out. However, the decor and atmosphere are quite unique. An actual tree trunk rises up in the middle of the bar. The walls are plastered with signed dollar...More

headline: packed but fun!
content: Great live entertainment ( both the band and the patrons)  Wow- you'll see everything here.  Crazy but fun and you'll see everything here.  Great bartenders and the nachos were tasty.  Saw an 80's hair band when we were there.  what a walk down memory lane!

headline: Fun bar
content: Right on Duval. Good bar with good  live music. They have their own beer, recommend trying it. Gets pretty packed at night.

headline: Entertaining Lunch
content: You are in Key West, so you must go to Sloppy Joe's.  We had the sloppy joe and hamburgers.  Everything was great, the entertainment was amazing, and the people in the establishment were friendly.  We had an enjoyable lunch and tasty food.  Definitely a must...More

headline: great bartender
content: 4 of us dropped into sloppy joes  decided to have a drink  they have a small bar inside  where we met carla  she was great  really knew her stuff  we drank what she recommended  and they were excellent  dont know about the food  but she...More

headline: Fun place live music
content: Great place to spend a few hours and have a drink while in Key West. The food is good but the atmosphere and the live bands make it even better.

headline: Honey moon
content: Busy place with lots of history. Ernest Hemingway hung out here when he was in town. This is our first time to stay in Key West also

headline: Loud but fun, food and drink with live music
content: Great fun, dress down type of place.  Different age groups but alot of the time 20 somethings. Can get very crowded

headline: Great music and drink.
content: A true key west staple to visit is Sloppy Joe's  food ok but not the best in Key West.  They always have great entertainment...not always good entertainment for small kids but lots of adult fun.

headline: Good Landmark to Find Your Friends on or off a cruise
content: We drove back down to Key West after our cruise stop to take more time in town and get to walk about after dark, ( When you stop here on a cruise you only get a few short hours during the day.)  We sort of...More

headline: Great vibe
content: This place definitely has a great vibe; live music, cheerful crowds and plenty of drinks, what more do you need? A must visit when in key west.

headline: A fun place to drink too much.
content: Love the bands, but you can have sloppy joes for food. This bar is for heavy drinking 21 yr olds. Just your typical open-air dancing bar. So if it's boozing your into, this is the place. Food is just ok. Know where you are before...More

headline: Food good, a bit crowded.  Big tourist hang out.
content: Had to eat here as a tourist.  Had the Sloppy Joe, it was good.  Place was a bit crowded with other tourists, Im not a fan of crowds.  It was o.k., wouldnt become a regular if I lived there.

headline: Dinner in Key West
content: We enjoyed the live music while we had a quick dinner of sandwiches and fries.  Two in our party had the Sloppy Joe's which they said were tasty. I had the Philly cheese steak which was good. The menu was definitely snack type, comfort food...More

headline: Average
content: Nothing special. Good location and the sloppy joe was good. It was open air with live entertainment. The service was quick but if you want to park will need to pay.

headline: Raucous and a little rowdy. That's NOT a bad thing.
content:
The wife and I and a couple Canadian friends wandered in pretty late on a week night. We were lucky enough to find a table and settled in for a fun time.

The drinks were a little on the pricey side and my wife said...More

headline: So so food
content: This place was neat to visit and the service was great but I thought the food was very bland and the calamari was not eatable, a lot of the music was not family friendly so beware taking children!!

headline: Tradition
content: Food here was subpar, but to be expected. We had the nachos with the sloppy joe mix on top, which I would suggest for some bar eats. The drinks were fairly well made, but nothing spectacular.

headline: Fun Party Atmosphere
content: Went about 630 or 7pm.  All different age groups and all kinds of people too which I like! (Well the place is famous) crowded because it was Saturday, but we found a table for two right by one of the doorways.  Lots of hips and...More

headline: Electric atmosphere, great food not too expensive
content:
We dashed into this bar to avoid a sudden rainstorm and we are very glad we did so.
Taking a seat at the bar we ordered a cocktail from their extensive list and a beer which they have an astounding list to choose from as...More

headline: Must visit
content:
Went to Key West as a day port on a recent cruise. We only had a few hours to spend there however stopped after some shopping and site seeing to grab a drink and lunch.
Slpoppy Jos's were delicious.. BEST I HAE HAD... and gotta...More

headline: Fun place to be at
content: Good live music played by great bands... great food and drinks menu... must try key West lime drink and loaded nachos...

headline: Had to try out this famous place...Sloppy Joe's
content: Great place to relax, have drinks, and enjoy the music. Very loud with everything going on - inside and outside - My  daughter tried the "sloppy Joe" and we tried several app's - all very good.

headline: Great
content: Awesome bartender and great drinks in a iconic location.. don't miss it. Great pics and stuff about papa's water hole as well as a cool ship to the side.

headline: Lively place
content: Drinks and appetizers here and a really good band.  The place was busy but our wait staff was very friendly and in good spirits.  Nothing worse than a waiter or bar staff with poor attitude.  We had the sloppy nachos and also shrimp.  Very good.

headline: A Key West Landmark
content: This is an old Key West landmark.  They have live entertainment.  Don't miss having a burger or sloppy joe here.  Mid afternoon is best and not as crowded.  I thought the food and the drinks were good. It is bar so food is not the...More

headline: Famous but still only a bar
content: I get that you go there because Hemingway did but at this point it is a bar. My dad was very interested so we had to go. We all got a drink and shared the sloppy fries--do not get them if you don't like chili!!

headline: Fun Environment
content: If you are looking for a "fun" drinking environment then this is your place. Located in a busy area of Duval street. We found the food to be average. The "famous" fish sandwich wasn't any better than something we get back home.

headline: Great service, good drinks, and good food
content:
Got into Key West quite late having driven from Miami and wanted a drink and some food. My partner remembered Sloppy Joe's from a previous trip so we headed down to Duval to check it out.

You just grab your own table and the waiter...More

headline: Fun
content: This is a classic, fun bar with a lot of history (even if it is in a different location from the original).  Good drinks, good folks, great music- fun stop for sure- thanks sloppy joes.

headline: Lovely
content: Excellent food .... Carolina pulled pork and BBQ pulled pork cooked to perfection .... Lovely Cajun fries with a kick ... Cocktails strong and fast service :)

headline: Fun place
content: Bartenders are nice and social. The drinks were ok.  The bands who play are always entertaining. Plan on staying a while once you enter.

headline: Not for everyone
content: We stopped in on a Thursday night and Pete and Wayne were playing on stage.  Drinks were good but we found the show a bit offensive.  I'm sure that is why they hire them, but all the profanity just made us want to leave.  Not...More

headline: smells like puke.
content: We started to go in for the music and a drink but I couldn't overcome the smell. Sorry , just stayed a minute.

headline: Fast bartenders
content: We stopped In and got a quick drink after having a few drinks on the deck at Dirty Harrys. It was a fun environment, very busy even on the random Thursday night we were there. There was a band that played a whole array of...More

headline: Dinner after Mallory Square
content: Enjoyed the strong drinks, live music, and tangy sloppy joes!! Great waitstaff and quick service.  Nice place to stop after the unusual entertainment on Mallory's square.

headline: Snack Break
content: Wandered in from Duval street to get out of the heat. Latin band was excellent but the appetizers were average. Drinks were ok and service was alright.

headline: Decent place filled with history.
content: The service is ok, the food is edible bar food, definitely nothing special. This is a bar that serves food not the other way around. If drinking is your game this is the go to place in key west, for food you can get better...More

headline: A Key West essential
content:
This is the bar of Ernest Hemingway fame. We popped in for a drink and just to soak up some of the nostalgia.

There was live music and the bar was full even during the day.

There was a great selection of drinks and the...More

headline: A must stop in Key West - Duval St
content: sorry I just had a drink - a nice beer but the place atmosphere is so great that I wanted to give a good review just for the drink and the friendly bar tender, I was there for 30 minutes and really had good time...More

headline: Restaurant
content: Great entertainment, the Sloppy Joe Fries are good but the Conch Fritters are not my cup of tea. Seat your self so come before 7 pm for a decent place.

headline: Key West Trip May 2016
content: I cool place to hang out and have a beer or meal if you like. Live music and great atmosphere, although getting a seat can take a while as it gets very busy.

headline: Lunch
content: Good food fun place. Has a taste for a burger, however ended up getting a personal pizza after seeing one being delivered to,the table next to us. It was very good, we also ordered fish tacos..they we also very good. There was a band playing...More

headline: A must when in West key
content: This gastro-pub has good food, good drink and music! It is not cheap, but atmosphere and ambiance makes up for what you pay. Food portions are typically American (large). Be prepared to pay a good tip if you want it appreciated with a bell ring.

headline: Hemingway and Me
content: One can get hot and sweaty walking up and down Duval Street in Key West practically year 'round, so why not stop at Sloppy Joe's to get a  drink or two?  Good enough for Ernest Hemingway, must be good enough for me. Large room with...More

headline: Lunch
content: If you want the BEST sloppy joes and conch fritters than this is the place to go. I will definitely go back for seconds. The entertainment is very good also. He sings songs from the 90's.

headline: A Shot of History
content: getting to experience Sloppy Joes means you have a drink and then get out and check out the rest of Key West. Be advised if you wander down towards or linger in the cruise Pier District you will find nothing that makes you feel like...More

headline: Great lunch stop along the way. Crazier after sundown.
content: Stopped in here for a lunch appetizer and a few drinks while on Duval street.  We had the nachos with the sloppy joes meat.  Awesome good nachos and great atmosphere with a live performer.  We popped back in later in the evening and it was...More

headline: fun to see
content: Fun place to stop and people watch, entertainment was funny, looked at the menu and was not impressed so we didn't stay.

headline: Iconic Spot in Key West
content:
Fun and interesting place to stop for a drink & bite to eat. Drinks and food were good, a little pricey. Music was very entertaining. 
Very crowded, but seats open up quickly.

headline: Iconic
content: Good drinking place.  Always a crowd of friendly people from all over.  Sit there long enough and someone will start a conversation with you.

headline: Old, historic bar
content: This bar is right in the middle of all the bar action. It's an open air, older bar. Don't look to close at things because it will gross you out (if your a clean freak)! Of course I had to try the sloppy joe. It...More

headline: Have a beer and move on to something better
content: We came here 24 years ago and it was a tourist destination and then hasn't changed at all. Drinks for pricey and the band absolutely sucked they were very loud and all they did was talk and try to be funny drove us out after...More

headline: Sloppy Joe's is Key West!
content: What can you say about Sloppy Joe's that hasn't been said a million times before.  It is a Key West Hallmark and a must see while in Key West.  Despite its recent franchising the original still remains intact and true to its original concept...a drinking...More

headline: Worth a visit
content:
Sloppy Joe's is one of the places that is a must see on a trip to Key West. Great Atmosphere; there was a live Band playing, when we were there, not great, but it added to the atmosphere.
The place was fairly full, so we...More

headline: Must do...
content: Fun afternoon stop for a drink and people watching. Sat at the bar and enjoyed atmosphere. Met some cool people and enjoyed good drinks. Only downside was cold French fries...we should have sent them back. Guys next to us got hot ones and shared so...More

headline: Rum runners were nice
content: The service was generally good. Their Rum runners were tasty.  We did not have lunch so cannot comment on their eats.  Live music is offered.  I think its a  nice pitstop between excursions, shopping and sightseeing activities.

headline: Perfect dining exoerience
content: We had a great time at Sloppy Joes. Was a little skeptical as it is definitely on all of those must go to tourist lists so I figured it would be crowded and not very good. We didn't wait at all, the food was excellent...More

headline: Good but not Great.
content: Everyone told us we just had to go to Sloppy Joe's. I did but, wasn't anything great. Food was average and the place was very noisy. Go for the name but don't expect great things.

headline: Great Watering Hole
content:
This must be our favourite american watering hole, with live music, a bustling atmosphere, good bar food and all at a reasonable price.
Have visited many times and it is always the same, never disappointed, well worth a visit.

headline: We had a great time!
content: This was our 4th trip to the Keys and we've always had a great experience, drinks, and food at Sloppy's Joes.   It was awesome to see Kenny Chesney.  We had a great time and looking forward to our 5th trip

headline: One of those MUST stops
content: We could not see the attraction until the second visit.  With or without cruise passengers the place always seems crowded and noisy. However the good live music, the really good bartenders, the naval and other military wall and flag displays makes one respect our past....More

headline: We had a great time!
content: This was my 2nd time visiting this bar. It is still one of my favorites..It was raining so we were out early about 1100am. Our server Beverly from England was great ..very personable and we even met her son who dropped by for a quick...More

headline: Boland vacay
content: We had a blast, the entertainment a little raunchy but very funny.  The sloppy Joe was really good.  Definitely be back to do it again, we love key west

headline: Loud and drinks don't have a lot of alcohol
content: This is a little bit of a tourist trap. You feel like you need to stop here and visit while you are in Key West. Save your money and your eardrums. If you are young and trashed, you'll probably love this place.  Drinks were expensive...More

headline: Favorite bar
content:
Not only were the Sloppy Joe's amazing... Their frozen drinks were too.

To top it off they had two of the most hilarious musician/comedians performing.

I could've stayed their and laughed all night!!

headline: Bar style
content: Band at dinner time is very very very adult oriented...don't bring the kids. Food was very good. Drinks were very good as well. Fun for adults. Music later in the night was great!

headline: Lunch
content: Food was good, atmosphere was better. This is a very touristy place that you should at least try. I'm sure that in the evening, things probably get rolling. Can't say anything bad, but can't rate it any more then middle of the road.

headline: Outstanding food and entertainment!
content: My daughter and I stopped here for lunch and this place was packed! It had such a great vibe! There was a man singing and playing the piano, good atmosphere. It was very crowded, but we were quickly seated and waited on. And our server...More

headline: Sloppy joe
content: Well my wife and I decided to try the house favorite meal, sloppy joe, and it was just that very big and sloppy. A good choice! Haven't had one of those in over five years and it tasted like I remembered only better. Thank you.

headline: Fun fun fun!!
content: After hours on the beach we came to SJ's and had a great time!  Refreshing cold bevs, great food, the staff is casual, laid back, and funny!  Not the type of place to go if you are a stick in the mud.

headline: Must have
content: A trip to Key West must include a Sloppy Joe from THE Sloppy Joe's Bar. Delicious food. Fun live music. Dance floor opens at 9:30 pm.

headline: Girls weekend
content: Good music, great location,  in the center of all the action on Duval didn't eat there this trip it's more bar food but have great drinks

headline: Nice atmosphere
content: Nice atmosphere with live music! Finally tried conch fritters! Good! Loved the key lime creamy sauce that they were served with

headline: Great place to hang
content: Right on the main strip this bar was a great place to get a drink. The two female band singers were very talented and entertaining. Drinks reasonably priced.

headline: One time visit just to say we went
content: The drinks were small (for the price) and the food just so so. Service was cavalier.  This is a place we went because of it's history.   We would not return.

headline: Of course you have to stop!
content: If you are in Key West you have to stop in at Sloppy Joes!  Fun servers with great drinks.  Even if you don't know much about Ernest Hemmingway you can appreciate the many many pictures of him that adorn the walls.

headline: Good live music
content: Heard the service was slow so arrived not in a hurry.. waitress quickly came over.. however it did take awhile for wings and a sloppy joe.. food was okay.. nothing crazy good. Had a few drinks and enjoyed the live entertainment.

headline: Sloppy Joe's Entertainment
content: This restaurant is famous because it was where Ernest Hemingway hung out daily while living in Key West. It's spacious, very busy, loud with live entertainment, but a good place for drinks, burgers and other food. Enjoyed a wonderful salad here for lunch.

headline: Another iconic bar.
content: We always pop in to "Sloppys" whenever we're in Key West. It's a tourist spot now but still a must visit for the atmosphere, especially at night. Always packed with some seriously good bands playing and the bar staff swinging the bell behind the bar...More

headline: Food and fun!
content: Stopped here on a Sunday night for a few drinks and some live music. What a great time! Drank, ate, danced and had a ball! Awesome live music and a great staff!

headline: KW Landmark
content: We were told this is a must stop when you come to Key West. Its a Key west Landmark.  Very crowded, but still comfortable. Our bartender Lou was fantastic.  A very fun stop

headline: Good Place for Drinks
content: this is a Good Place for Drinks.....gets really packed at times but the atmosphere is great...I've never eaten here but the service for drinks is excellent.

headline: Drinking
content:
This place is a must it you come to key west what ever time you come it's always busy , love it hear never eat here but they serve good and it aways look good .
The staff are always busy and always live music...More

headline: step back in time
content: sloppy joes is part of key west history it is always crowded cocktails is good music is great very loud much fun friendly people

headline: Great food and drinks
content: Sloppy Joe's is certainly one of the more famous places in Key West. It is very spacious. The staff is always friendly and helpful.  The food is good and the portions are good size.  The large stage accommodates some great live music.

headline: Good entertainment
content: The place was very crowded, sticky table top, area not very clean,average pub grub but the music was good.

headline: Don't Miss This!
content: A must do experience while in KW!  Friendly..busy..good music.  Great service and friendly staff.  The sloppy joes ARE   Very good.  We ordered them all three times we stopped in.  Don't miss this stop on your visit to Key West!

headline: Great food, good vibe, GREAT service!
content: Our waitress cared. She was on it. Barely had to ask for another round, she was VERY attentive. Fantastic service. Even when they were slammed busy. She was always kind & happy to help.

headline: Fun Place
content: We stopped in for a beer. Friendly people an good people watching. Live music. We sat at the bar and did not order food. Glad we stopped in.

headline: Music Everytime We walked By
content: This bar is part of Key West's history and the owner was great friends with Hemingway, so how could we not stop there? It's big and loud and fun. The drinks are good and the happy crowd (there's always a crowd) cheers the musicians on....More

headline: Vacation
content: Really loved this place.  Drinks were great and the atmosphere was fun!  Really enjoyed the pictures on the wall and all of the history.

headline: Birthday Lunch
content: Stopped in for a snack and a drink and were treated to some of the best service we enjoyed on our whole trip. The bartender was fun and attentive and even took our picture from outside in the street under the sloppy sign we were...More

headline: A Key West Tradition
content: Good food and a must visit while in Key West.  Great atmosphere and good service. We had the Sloppy Joes which were good but might suggest exploring the menu.

headline: Great atmosphere terrible food
content: Sloppy joes is a key west tradition... So we went there with our children (ages 9 and 11) for lunch. The music was great... Service was ok... But the food was not good! The shrimp tasted like Mrs. Paul's frozen shrimp. My son had the...More

headline: Bar at Key West
content: Fun bar with rowdy atmosphere. Staff was friendly. Service was good. Sloppy Joe sandwich was tasty. Frozen margarita was delish.

headline: Hemingway drank here and so did I
content: One can get hot and sweaty walking up and down Duval Street in Key West, so why not stop at Sloppy Joe's to get a cool drink ?  If it was good enough for Ernest Hemingway, must be good enough for me. Large room with...More

headline: Great Day!!
content:
We went to Sloppy Joes and enjoyed a 'pop-up' show with Kenny Chesney! Great show - Eric Church came out and played a few songs with him, as well as Matthew Ramsey from Old Dominion!
Dale Ernhardt, Jr. was 'in the house', too - 
It...More

headline: Nothing special
content: After 9 visit to key west we felt we should at least try it. The drink were west over price and the food average at best. Don't think we will come back anytime soon.

headline: Because you have to
content: We stopped last night because we hadn't yet. We always stop, listen to some music that sounds exactly the same as the last time, and have a few overpriced drinks. On this occasion we sat at the little bar just inside the door and were...More

headline: Over rated but still a must see
content: Sloppy Joe's is the most well known bar in Key West and even though it is a little over rated, you must go there at least once. It is a busy place, especially at night, but the place gets you in the mood to party,...More

headline: A Must Place to Visit!
content: You can't say you've been to the Keys without having stopped by Sloppy Joe's. This place is crowded with interesting people all day long. Get a seat early and enjoy the live bands and music. At night this place goes crazy. Weekend's plan on waiting...More

headline: ok
content: we stopped by for lunch because we've been told it was one of the lodest bars in town, so yes the music is good, people seem to spend a good time in there, food is not too bad, but the service needs some improvement. The...More

headline: vaca 2016
content: Food. Ehh.  Live music and atmosphere was great. At first they had a band where all the guy played was F U songs. Which was disturbing.  But the main band was great and played a lot of classic rock

headline: A Must Stop
content: Always stop here when in the Keys. If you haven't had them and your hungry try the sloppy fries. Make sure to get a napkin. This is a feat spot for live music, a drink and a bite to eat

headline: diappointedn
content: Early evening visit; well before party crowd. Open seating, but few clean tables. Had to wait to be acknowledged. After getting drinks and menus, we again waited a long period before our server reappeared. Food was quickly served. Enjoyed the sloppy joes. This well known...More

headline: Sorry. Not one of our favorites
content: We apologize in advance to the legion of fans that love this place.  It certainly has a grand history and it was originally where Capt Tony's is now.  Back a few decades ago, when we were discovering the "rock", we used to go there, too....More

headline: Good Bands
content: Band sounded really good from the street so we went on in. It was very crowded so we went to the little bar that was separate from the rest of the place behind closed doors in the back. It was quieter and we grabbed something...More

headline: Fun Times Had By All!
content: If you are Duval St. you must stop here.  It is a big tourist attraction and can get very busy.  It's a fun place to visit.  The food and entertainment are great.  The staff was friendly and the service fast.  We went several times while...More

headline: The Old time of Key West
content: Especially as I am Asian, this place is one of the holy place. After 5 hours drive from Miami (day trip), I have to say indeed great experience. comfortale food, nice drinks, ambiance. You can feel about how people felt and experienced about this place...More

headline: Just say no
content: The Sloppy Joe restaurant on Duvall Street is a well known restaurant so we stopped in. We ordered a sloppy joe, an appetizer sampler platter and margaritas. The service was poor. The food was barely edible. Just skip this place. There are so many better...More

headline: Best mojito!
content: Live music with a busy and lively bar scene.  Papa Hemingway memorabilia on the walls. Drinks are cold and well made.  I'd go back!

headline: Just stopped for a Drink
content: Sloppy Joe's is a landmark on Duval St and it was a fun time.  We stopped in for a drink and the place was packed.  There was a salsa band playing (which isn't our thing) but the music was great.  Everyone was having a great...More

headline: Dinner
content: Went here for dinner and a beer in a large group, the menu was great and the place was lively , we shared a pizza and fries and the service was great , it came out quiet quickly and was really hot ... We had...More

headline: Most alcohol for the buck
content: This place feasts on the fact that Hemingway drank here.    The place is typically packed because for Key West, drinks are stiff and cheap.   We did not eat because we were afraid of intruding on our buzz.  Live entertainment required a buzz to enjoy.

headline: Fun times
content: I am not usually a big fan of the tourist traps like this....but the music was good, the sloppy Rita's were great and we had the nachos which were tasty. It was a lot of fun. We will likely go back before we leave Key...More

headline: Party
content: Biggest party on Duval street. If you want to dance top a live band and party with a rowdy crowd this is the place to be.  All I did was booze it up there but in a little bar pack with hundreds of people, there...More

headline: Gotta visit at least once, then you can go to Joe's Tap Room
content: Everyone visiting Key West has to go to Sloppy Joe's at least one time. The main room is huge, food is usually good for bar food and music is going all the time. If you want to avoid the crowds, the place is going throughout...More

headline: Great live bands
content: visited while on vacation last month. had a great live rock band. good service, fair priced drinks, nice staff, good DJ and awesome rock band. people of all ages were there.

headline: Good Food
content: Although a little pricey for just having a beer the food was good and service was great and the atmosphere was good. Two of us shared the Havanna Nachos and it was more than enough for two people.

headline: Great Bar!
content: You have to stop and have at least one drink at Sloppy Joe's ! A lot of history and some great entertainment has played there! Great shop to get your t-shirts at!

headline: Great music and fun Vibe
content: Always a great time in this place! I prefer day time. Talented musicians- great drinks. No cover charge. Indoor/ outdoor setting. However- eat before u come. It's just average bar food. And way too many other good places to eat on that cool island.

headline: great place to grab lunch
content: Food was good and service was quick.  Live music to keep us entertained!  Music was not too loud so we could also visit at our table.

headline: Fun Atmosphere but gross fish tacos
content: The place had a fun vibe and the band was hilarious but he fish tacos were gross and soggy.  My husband's roast beef sandwich was good and the fries were good but go there for fun and drinks and eat somewhere else.

headline: Sloppy Joe's! Great stop for drinks!
content: Very upbeat! Great drinks! Alway live music and it's good. Was one of Hemingway's hangouts! Lots of fun!! Don't miss this one.

headline: Commercialized Key West at its finest
content:
Loud, crowded, lots of bouncers.  I remember a time it was causal Key West and the go to place for locals and visitors.

Lots of changes.   It was nice to walk by the line to get in and peer in at the crowd.   Or stand...More

headline: Rules are rules...
content: If you're in Key West you have to go to Sloppy Joe's, it's an unwritten rule (grin). The food is good, not memorable, but good. The atmosphere at Sloppy Joe's is Key West and should be experienced. The live music is usually an enjoyable gig,...More

headline: Can't visit Key West without a lunch at Sloppy Joe's
content: When in Key West we just love to stop here for a leisurely lunch and people watch especially on cruise ship port days. Sloppy Joe's sandwiches are great and try the loaded fries washed down with some local brews.

headline: Fun place
content: Great bar and entertainment. This is a must for a visit to Key West. Lot of fun and crazy people. Gets crowded but service is decent.

headline: Fun Afternoon at a Classic Key West Landmark
content: This is a great spot in Key West to enjoy a drink and fun entertainment.  Whether day or night, this spot is lively and the beer is cold.  I thoroughly enjoyed stopping by in the afternoon to take a break and enjoy this classic.

headline: Fun band, dancing and good vibe!
content: We stopped in for a drink and to hang out. There was a great live band playing and we ended up dancing, laughing, and having an awesome night. It was a busy spot but the waitress was very quick to keep our drinks coming.

headline: Sloppy Joe
content: Fun place to visit in the heart of Key West. Great t-shirt selection and the  sloppy joe was really tasty. Great venue for love music in the evenings.

headline: Nothing Special
content: Despite others telling us it's not the greatest, we went anyway - and they were right. Average to below average food. Server was good and attentive.

headline: The Bar where Hemingway would visit
content: Sloppy Joe's is a famous bar that you need stop by and look in. If you are hungry they have nice food and the service was great.

headline: Good mood; Good food.
content:
Hungry for lunch we stopped here at Sloppy Joe's. I've been to the one on Treasure Island many years ago but haven't been to the one in the Keys. 

We were the first ones in when it opened and it filled up FAST. If you're...More

headline: Absolutely great bar and food scene
content: Terrific place to eat, drink, and sing along with the musicians.  Very busy and noisy place at the center of the heart of KW.  Stop in for a drink or lots of them and you are guaranteed a great visit.

headline: Music venue
content:
We arrived around 9pm the first day of our travels to key west, what a great place for your first evening out. I had the best birthday night out and the longest 27 hours. What a night!!!!
The music is great the cocktails are awesome...More

headline: The worst food.
content:
The Sloppy Joe was really awful. Tasted like ketchup on a bun. Really poorly executed. Bean dip was good. 
Live music is fine, Nothing special. 

My husband ordered the Blackened Chicken sandwich and it was lacking all flavor that makes a chicken sandwich, let alone...More

headline: Famous is the name, no the place
content: EverBody likes to see Sloppy Joe's bar and that is probably the problem. I can imagine that was a great place at Hemingways time, but nor anymore. The music was lousy and the service too. Ther are emany better places on the Duval Street.

headline: 40th Wedding Anniversary Trip
content: It's our 40th Wedding Anniversary and it was our first time to Key West. Had to go to the famous Sloppy Joe's. It was certainly worth the trip. Our server Justin was so nice and the food was great. Hope to return there again in...More

headline: Wonderful Visit
content: Had to stop in at Sloppy Joes while in Key West.  I had the sloppy joe, wife had the roast beef.  Very good.  We sat too close to the stage.  Recommend waiting for a table away from stage

headline: Great Bar
content: We stopped here for drinks and listen to live music. Good drink prices and great live music. A fun place.

headline: Sloppy Joe
content: The sloppy joe is their specialty and it was amazing! We also had the sloppy fries tand they were equally delicious!! The drinks and service was great too!

headline: Vacation 2016
content: By far best restaurant/bar in key west.they have great food especially sloppy fries.employees are so nice.at night they have different bands at different times.they keep you on your feet for sure.i would most definitely recommend stopping by at least once while you are here.best atmosphere...More

headline: Songwriters weekend
content: Wall to wall the bar was rockin with the latest act on the stage. Got a good spot by the door to Greene St   The bartender was totally engaged and got our drinks quickly. Prices are reasonable here. This is one of the best stages...More

headline: Must visit
content: Do not go visit Key West without stopping here for a famous Sloppy Joe sandwich.  I ate everywhere in town, all kinds of seafood places but the best was this sandwich.  It's big and messy, eat with a knife and fork, but get one please....More

headline: Really Good Bar in Key West
content: Enjoyed drinking and eating at this bar in Key West. They had excellent live band and a good selection of beers and drinks. Friendliness of the staff is average. Food was very good, especially anything with the sloppy joe mix included. It is worth a...More

headline: Obligatory Sloppy Joe's Stop
content: My husband and I stopped here in the afternoon for drinks.  There was a guy singing and playing the guitar, and the place was relatively crowded for the mid-afternoon.  Our bartender was friendly and fun, and our margaritas were good.  We didn't eat, so I...More

headline: Good time bar!
content: Had a good meal at Joe's, but nothing spectacular. The entertainment was an added attraction! If you are looking for typical bar food, this is the place I the afternoon. Don't know what it would be likely night...maybe livelier.

headline: FUN!!!
content: We enjoyed the sloppy joes fries and ale. Conch fritters were so-so.  I was surprised we got a table since there were 3 cruise ships in town but we got there in early afternoon.  Our waitress was great and they had a singer who was...More

headline: Lunch -fish sandwich
content: Worst fresh fish sandwich I've ever had.... Stale bun... Thin dried up fish! They obviously aren't into fish... U r better off ordering just pork or bbq pork

headline: Sloppy Joes - Sloppy Rita
content: When walking all over the island, this is a great watering hole and the Sloppy Joes - Sloppy Rita is the PERFECT thirst quencher!  Always something going on at this popular location.

headline: Gotta See it Once
content: Old Bar, famous, you have to see it. Poor service, unfriendly older cocktail waitress, she liked her cell phone more than being attentive or hospitable.

headline: It is what it is a tourist place. DUVAL ST. must go to spots
content: Okay, yes you should stop in. Have a plastic cup cocktail just to say you did. Then move on. Caters to the cruise ship crowd. Drinks are week. Food simple.

headline: Nice bar in Key West...
content: ...and one of the most epic coverbands I have ever seen in my entire life (shake3X). These guys were really giving every guest of Sloppy Joes a wonderful time. Originally we just wanted to stop by for a beer after sunset. It ended up with...More

headline: Great place to people watch
content: It's a great place to people watch and a great place to grab an adult beverage but it can get crowded.    We met some friends there for drinks but quickly decided to go elsewhere for dinner.  It can get loud and packed so timing is...More

headline: Lunch!
content: Great beer.  Conch fritters were good and spicy. Music was loud and great.  Really crowded and the atmosphere is truly all KW

headline: Loved this place!!
content: We walked in at around 11.30pm and a band was playing, Shake3X. Great songs and the vibe was amazing! Good drinks, friendly staff and a clean place. They cleaned everything the whole evening, toilets and all. We were really amazed by it!! Really visit this...More

headline: Always good to eat at Sloppy's
content:
Landed at EYW at dinner time and needed to get some food.  We headed to Sloppy Joe's for a drink with sandwiches and sloppy fries.  Definitely filled our bellies.

The band was good for a few songs then went into a mood killing John Mayer...More

headline: Must go if you're on a Papa Hemingway Pilgrimage
content: From the title, you can tell we're not the rowdy barfly types.  But every trip needs a theme, and since Sloppy Joe's in Havana wasn't open when we stopped by,  we sought out the Key West location to pay homage to Earnest (yes, and we...More

headline: Fun place!
content: We were here for Easter in 2015 and had a blast. Had been to Key West before but not to this place..Didnt know what I was missing! We had fries and BBQ sammies and beer and a great time! Live music, interactive atmosphere and people...More

headline: lots of night time action. Fun
content: We stopped off here to ck this place out. It was packed. There was really good entertainment. The bands were great to listen too and the selection of songs were good as well. The drinks were tasty and the service great. Fun place togo dancing

headline: Sweat the night away
content: Great music, live & dj. great dancing! A must stop every trip. It does get crowded so be prepared to get your groove on tightly packed next to strangers.

headline: Lunch
content: When checking out Duval St, we decided to pop in here for lunch as it looked like a fun place. Lou introduced himself to us as being in charge of the small bar area where we chose to sit. We all enjoyed our cocktails and...More

headline: A Key West requirement
content: Live music and an electric atmosphere, Sloppy Joe's is laid back but energetic.  Their Sloppyritas are the best drink you can have in Key West.  Beer is good and cold too if that's your thing.  Oh, and if you want to escape the noise and...More

headline: Funky, fun
content: Apparently one of Hemingway's favorite watering holes.  Great drinks, great bartender.  Adjoining shop for souvenirs and tees.

headline: Spring vacation
content:
We went here several times for a drink and be entertained.
Drinks were good and staff was very good and quick service for a very busy bar.
Last night we were there we did not care for the live entertainment but they have to try...More

headline: Birthdays extended weekend
content: Food is great, entertainment is so good, and the drinks are very refreshing!! Sit a spell and enjoy, but you might have to wait for a seat because it is always crowded! It's a must see place for sure!! ‚ô°‚ô°

headline: I love this place
content:
We had been to Sloppy Joe's at lunch time a few years ago and had some good beer and listened to a great piano player/singer, Barry Cuda, who still plays there.

This time we went at night. Unfortunately, we missed Barry, but we heard a...More

headline: Good food
content: Great food, great environment! Staff was friendly! Resturant was clean! If you want a little souvenir from eating there they have a little store! Was great for me because I collect shot glasses from places that i visit!

headline: Great place to watch the parade.
content: Marginal sloppy Joe sandwich. Great place to watch the conch Republic parade. Funky little parade with lots of pirates and lights on automobiles carts and bicycles. The beer was delicious.

headline: Great bar with live music
content: Great bar close to the end of Duval street. Only went there for drinks with the family, great atmosphere, good service and good music.

headline: Birthday Bash
content: Great environment, excellent music, and great service. Drinks were amazing. Super friendly environment. Had a great time.

headline: A landmark in Key West
content: This should definitely be a must stop while in Key West. We stopped in for lunch and drinks. Sat at a table near the small bar. The bartender immediately came over to take our order. Food was very good and the service was excellent. No...More

headline: Lunch stop
content: Stopped in for lunch to get out of the heat. Had the famous sloppy joes sandwich and quesadilla. Excellent. Waiter was great and enjoyed the live music!!

headline: great bar
content: loved the ambiance, people were friendly, locals were very helpful. Restrooms were clean, open air atmosphere, everyone happy

headline: Fun bar
content: Great local live music! Great atmosphere! Always a good time. We had such a fun day! A must go while in town.Staff was very friendly and knowledgeable! We will be back.

headline: Stop in and sit at the small bar for fun
content: We had a party of 6 and just dropped in early one afternoon to see where Earnest would go from time to time. We found great live music, drinks and conversation with the bar tender who made us all laugh and have a good time...More

headline: What is the fuss about?
content: Not quite so sure what all the fuss is about..the food was just ok.  Our server was extremely nice.  If there is a singer, DO NOT sit next to the stage for the sake of your hearing....

headline: Who hasn't heard of Sloppy Joe's
content: This is a MUST stop in Key West. We always stop here for drinks and lunch and Barry Cuda.  Depending on when you go it can be very busy and loud or it can be a relaxing place for drinks, bar food, and entertainment. Your...More

headline: Okay but must go!
content: Since it's one of the Ernest Hemmingway hangouts, you have to check it off your bucket list. Live bands playing all day - some good, some average. Pretty typical bar food but not as cheap because after all it is Key West!

headline: Great Food and Atmosphere
content: So if you come here you of course have to try their famous Sloppy Joe's, they are really good!  The local music is entertaining with a great vibe. Plus this was Ernest Hemingway's hangout place.

headline: Gotta to Sloppy Joes
content: While in Key West everybody wants to go to this famous landmark. While it is typical bar food was all good. Wings were juicy, wraps great and of course sloppy joe was good. There was a band there of 14 year olds who were actually...More

headline: Beers and Bar Food
content: Went in for some beer and bar food one of the nights I was there. The band and staff were great, and the sandwich with conch fritters were tasty. A good place to go and have a few cold drinks, eat pub fare, and enjoy...More

headline: They Have Perfected the Delivery of Booze, Music & Pub Grub
content: What would a trip to Key West be without a stop in to Sloppy Joe's?  My friend and I walked passed the door as a wonderful band were playing, and that was enough to draw us in.  Sloppy Joe's rocks all day/night long.  Seating is...More

headline: Must do day and night!!
content: I've been to sloppy joes at night for the entertainment and has an awesome time. It can get packed but security does an awesome job keeping everyone in line and clearing anyone out that is disruptive. Their drink service is exceptional, they advertise a 20%...More

headline: Fun!
content: This place is iconic and always packed.  Regardless of the amount of people within, service is good.   Love the live music.  This particular trip a group of young boys were playing... excellent.  Spoke with two if them after their set and one was only 16!...More

headline: Great entertainment
content: Good luck getting a table in this place!  Always packed, great bands, typical tourist drink prices. Always fun to squeeze in there for a drink and a song or two and move along.

headline: Always good!
content: This is place is a mandatory stop in Key West; it;s not the original, but at this point, it doesn't really matter. Drinks are fairly cheap, staff is really laid back and they know you have been bar hopping so no one will ever harass...More

headline: Night stop on Duval street
content: Good food, reasonable prices and live entertainment all day....also name brand"Sloppy Joes" gear...a little more pricey than the average T..

headline: Old School Bar
content: The live music is always entertaining....The drinks are great and the service is fantastic....This is a must do on any trip to Key West....We stop by and drink every year when we visit.....

headline: Honeymooners
content: My husband and I enjoyed drinks and some awesome live music here while on our honeymoon. Great location. This is one of the iconic places in Key West. It was not very crowded when we were though so it didn't feel like a "touristy" thing.

headline: LARGE PORTIONS
content: The food was great and the atmosphere alive.  We were able to see a fun band play while enjoying our meal.

headline: All About Atmoshere
content:
You go here to see and feel the vibe. Lots of fun and good music.

The food is fine and the people watching better.

headline: Good burgers
content: Informal, cheerful place for burgers, wings and a brew.  Good selection of beers on tap.  Nice outside deck on second floor as well as first floor inside restaurant.  Waiter was friendly and attentive.  Live music at night (as at so many restaurants in Key West...More

headline: Good atmosphere.
content:
This was the first bar we went to after a walk around the old town. A key west institution, so we popped in for a quick bite and some cocktails.

Their signature margarita was very tasty! Food was also good and great value.

The place...More

headline: Fun Bar
content: Just a old time bar in the Keys. Live music and a lot of drunk people. Fun to sit and people watch. Bigger then normal pours and a lot of characters hanging out at the bar

headline: Fun times
content: This place was great. Live bands good drinks. Didn't try the food but was def a fun place! Always ended up here every night meeting up w everyone. A def try if your in the keys!

headline: Classic Key West!
content: Classic Key West bar, playing good music and serving good food. A visit to Key West would not be the same without visiting Sloppy Joe's. If you're ever in the area, don't miss it!

headline: Sloppy is an apt description
content: We stopped one early afternoon for a drink and to buy a t-shirt from this iconic Key West bar, but after I used the restroom we took the drinks to go without a t-shirt.  The toilets were backed up and the floor of the bathroom...More

headline: Sloppy Joe's- a great place for drinks, food, fun and history
content: Arriving at around 1:00 p.m. on a Friday just ahead of the crowd, we got a table by a side door with a nice breeze. Soon after we ordered, a single guitar started playing songs that everyone enjoyed. The service was fast, and the drinks...More

headline: So fun!
content: Be sure to make silly faces at the camera live streaming online just outside the door!  Great atmosphere, bartenders and drinks. Right in the heart of Duval. A must do!

headline: Classic Key West Bar
content: Sloppy Joe's is what you expect from a good bar on Duval Street. Music and great drinks. Was busy but they have three bars so was not to bad of a wait.

headline: Had a nice enough time
content: Arrived about 7:30p and were lucky to grab a table. Had sloppy joe nachos which were pretty good. Drinks were good and they are averaged price around $10 each. A lot of reviews complain about their prices - but they are typical for the keys...More

headline: Staff was wonderful
content:
Great little place to kick back, have a few cocktails and relax. 
No food, but we had just eaten :-)  
Staff was so friendly and courteous.

headline: Happy birthday
content: Good food good entertainment good band....The original sloppy joe is awesome. ..busy place ..sitting is limited if bands playing.

headline: "Just Give Me Some Of That Rock and Roll"
content: A restaurant/bar. Loaded with people singing, dancing and having a good time.  Food is served as well.  There is no cover.  They do sporadically check ID's so make sure you are of age and have an ID.  The live bands are relatively good as well....More

headline: Ugh
content: Too big of a crowd. Too loud. Too expensive. Way to many places to. Is it in key west  that is much better! Stay away from the tourist traps and have a better time!

headline: Must try the Sloppy Joe
content: This is a really cool place with a lot of history.  We enjoyed drinks and lunch here.  The Sloppy Joe's were delicious and a must! Next time we go back we will definitely be eating them again. The evening crowd was more of a night...More

headline: Good Time - but expensvie
content: Went there last week while in Key West.  Place was crowded with tourists and we had to wait for a table to open up.  Entertainment was great, but drinks were really expensive.  Stay for a little and move on to another Duvall watering hole.  There...More

headline: Great place for a drink
content: Great place to stop in for a drink! The bartender was nice, everyone having a great time! You have to stop in when you are in key west.

headline: Lunch in Key West
content: Food was very good, atmosphere laid back and friendly, close walking distance from our hotel and free entertainment of local police officer on horseback stopping so horse could check in at bar

headline: My Favorite in KW
content: By far my favorite bar in KW. The history, the music, the location. Can't get much better. I had the fish tacos and they blew my mind, never knew they could taste so good! I've been to Sloppy Joe's in Treasure Island, and this one...More

headline: Good Food - fun atmosphere
content: We've eaten here before and alway enjoy the food and service.  Sloppy Joe's a Key West institution!! Definitely a must do while in the Conch Republic!

headline: Outstanding
content: What can I say, it is a must visit if you are in Key West.  Their conch chowder is very good and the wife really liked their BBQ sandwich.  Sent our son their Web site so our grandson could see us on the web.  He...More

headline: Don't bother going it's only an overcrowded barn.
content: I was looking forward to visiting this place and having a drink here to try and imagine how it was back when Ernest Hemingway drank and partied here. I didn't even stay for a drink as it was just a big barn with not so...More

headline: tourist trap, bad vibes
content: Huge, crowded bar with tables, total tourist vibe. I kept hearing that it's a must see, so we went in, I was hoping to listen to some live music. There's a stage, on this particular day was a band-a duo-, that I'm sure was aiming...More

headline: Everyone needs to go there  once.
content: Had a couple of drinks there one day.  Bar staff was excellent.  It's a Key West icon so there can be crowds.  Good live music and the crowd was lively.

headline: The Party Zone
content: Sloppy Joe's a great place to eat, drink and be merry. Lots of tourists from all over the globe come together at this place. Great bands live every night. New and upcoming entertainment live. Great atmosphere, great food, just great if you enjoy LIFE. Pub...More

headline: Key West Tradition
content: It doesn't matter if this is the original Sloppy Joe's or not, it is a Key West icon.  We suggest lunch or a late dinner.  The entertainment is good - at least when we were there...  The bar food is, well bar food, just fine....More

headline: A must do in Key West!
content: Sloppy Joes is a funky little bar off Duvall Street. Filled with history, lots of music, great food and the waitresses keep the beer coming. You know it's good if it was Hemingways hang out back in the day. A not to miss stop on...More

headline: Supposed to have been Hemingway's hangout
content: Just keep walking by.  It's incredibly loud, pure tourist, and expensive.  Didn't even go in, but all the cruise shippers were there . . .

headline: Friendly Dog Loving People
content:
We walked into the store with two small dogs & the guy walks up with dog treats & a bowl of water, I told him I was just going to ask if dogs were allowed! 
He said we love dogs this is Key West !...More

headline: Love this place
content: Love everything about Sloppy joes except for the pork sandwich...literally half was fat that I put to the side and told waitres, when she replies I should have said something first. Huh

headline: Great Food - Worth a Trip
content: We really enjoyed our lunch at Sloppy Joe's.  A cruise ship was in town that day, and the place was packed.  But a waitress approached us as we entered and quickly found us a table.  The food was very, very food.  Tried the Conch Fritters...More

headline: Good music, good food and good fujn!
content: Stopped at Sloppy Joe's in honor of our favorite author - Papa Hemingway.  Haven't been here in 30 years and the place is still as original and genuine as it has been  since we were first here.  The drinks are well poured and the wait...More

headline: Great time
content: We have lunch at sloppy joe's. Food was good, excellent drinks but the server/bartender uncle toe was amazing, wonderful service... We will comeback for him

headline: Good night life.
content: A little tough to get to the bar, but it's otherwise not over crowded. Once you get your drinks it's a good time, and a key west landmark.

headline: So much fun!
content: You can just have fun and enjoy yourself here!  Get the nachos with sloppy joes!  To die for. Another open air bar restaurant Ina great location!! Great piano player. Not too loud. Really busy but manageable!! You'll love it!!

headline: Lively Bar
content: Stopped in for a drink and to listen to live music. Very crowded and lively bar. Music was good. Not much as far as food goes.

headline: Soooo loud at night
content: Good frozen drinks. Did not love the crowds at night, just not our scene, but we stopped in during the day and grabbed some drinks.

headline: Friendly place to have a drink üçπ
content: We spent a couple of hours in Sloppy Joe's & it is a really great place. The bar staff were friendly & welcoming. There were people who had just got off a cruise ship & popped in for lunch & we met people who had...More

headline: Great place, good music
content: Yes, it's touristy. But they still provide a great experience. We only went there for listening to music and having some drinks. Saw the doerfel family on stage (pretty neat gang when encountered live). We always stayed at the small bar at the duval street...More

headline: Staple of Key West but not the best
content: When visiting Key West, this is a must go to place. That being said, it is hard to get a seat and the service is never more that basic. They have regular entertainment (sometimes good and sometimes not). All ages are here, Food is adequate.

headline: Daughter visit
content: A very fun bar! Very busy but they are very very attentive to your needs. A very friendly atmosphere ! The food was good, I will definitely go back again

headline: Fun place to enjoy a cold one, a snack and live music
content: Stopped by late on a Saturday afternoon for a cold one and a snack.  Very large and lively place with live music even in the afternoon.  Leverages a big time history as a Hemingway hang out.  Also walked by in the evening and again the...More

headline: A must visit in Key West
content: Sloppy Joe's is just a must do in Key West.  It is one of the reasons you travel to Key West, loud, crowded and fun.  You have to be in the mood.  The drinks and beer are fair priced and there never is a cover...More

headline: Great fun, live music
content: We really enjoyed Sloppy Joe's.  Drinks were great, bartender was very informative on the local happenings and gave us some pointers.  Most importantly to me, this bar is veteran friendly.

headline: Had to stop...
content: Can only comment on the drink we had at the bar and it was ok...Did enjoy the music being done by a solo act. Only in Key West once, so had to stop...

headline: Party Place!
content: This place was recommended by one of the local businesses. As we went down Duval Street, we could hear so much activity coming from this restaurant/pub. It was such a party place at mid afternoon; we just had to go in and experience the excitement!...More

headline: Great entertainment and a must see
content: Enjoyed the music and entertainment and a great place to check out while in key west...duval street is so unique and interesting.

headline: Not what I expected.
content:
We went in thinking that we would find an escape from Duval Street. What we found instead of Hemingway lore, was a cover band singing songs about buttholes. Good reminder that yes, we are still in Florida. 

Great service, a little crowded.

headline: Not really a fan of the Sloppy Joe, but the fish is pretty good.
content: I went here with others that really liked it. I'm not really a fan of the Sloppy Joe sandwich, but others that I went with were so we tried this place. The service was lazy. The Sloppy Joe tasted better than average, but I much...More

headline: Great bar
content: Nice place. Good bands. Good service. Right on Duval. Definitely a place to stop in on your Duval exploring.

headline: Vacation
content: I absolutely loved this place and could see myself hanging out here on a regular basis! While here I imagined what it was like many years  ago and all of the celebrities that have been there! We all had the famous Sloppy Joes and really...More

headline: Party place
content: Food was good bar food. Good drinks. Lots of tables. Good music through out the day and at night. Service was good. Obviously the sloppy joes are very good.

headline: Crowded
content: Crowded and littered with drunk people in the middle of the day. It's open with no privacy, good is basic and waaaaaayy over priced.

headline: A go to bar
content: A long time favoriate. A must go to bar right in the center of the action. Live entertainment nightly. A place to see and be seen.

headline: Crowded bar with great service
content: We waited about 15-20 min for someone to get up so we could get a table. They don't seat you so you are on your own to get a seat as it is usually crowded. Food is typical bar food and prices are "tourist" average....More

headline: Ya, know ya gotta stop at least once while in KW.
content: Awesome place but probably more than any other place in KW it really depends on what time of day you hit it per what type of experience you are going to get.  This place is a classic.  Like all successful places in a extremely competitive...More

headline: popular watering hole features live music
content: swift service trumped food in this historic watering hole. open on to the street as it sits onto corners traffic is brush, music loud, and food made more with swift delivery in mind than flavor. the joint rocked on a busy lunch time saturday. souvenir...More

headline: Birthday drink
content: Stopped here for a birthday drink and was surrounded by hoards of fun loving people and staff. They had a wonderful piano player entertaining us. We sat at the open windows watching Key West life pass us by. I recommend this place for the nostalgia.

headline: Incentive trip
content: This was a great place. To sit back and relax to some live music! We visited Key West with a group and almost every night ended back here. Very friendly staff.

headline: Can't miss this classic
content: You just can't go to Key West and not stop by Sloppy Joe's, famous originally because it was Hemingway's favorite bar. We got a table quickly, and ordered drinks and food. Didn't have to wait too long for either. The musician playing was enjoyable and...More

headline: Wow.  What an atmosphere
content: My husband and I popped into Sloppy Joe'S for a beer, there was live music and a great atmosphere so we decided to dine there. The food was good, the service was great I would recommend for a lively interesting evening.

headline: Still Authentic
content: When you walk into Sloppy Joe's you really feel like you could still bump into Hemingway in his favourite drinking haunt in Key West! I can't imagine it has changed much since his day and is very lively and popular, with live music frequently available.

headline: Great food at a good price.
content: We wanted to come to Sloppy Joe's after learning that Ernst Hemingway used to hang there.   While we were not surprised that the Sloppy Joe's were wonderful we were a bit surprised the place gives you big servings at a fair price.   Their smoked fish...More

headline: Must See For Any New Tourist!
content: Yes, folks...this is the place you've always wanted to stop into in Key West! Since there are so many reviews..and crowds..the good news is they have a Tap Room with great Craft Beers tucked behind or around corner adjacent to Duval St. on Greene. It's...More

headline: Great Vib
content: After a day if sight seeing Key West we thought we'd try Hemingway favourite bar. When we went in the place was full and had a great vib . A band was playing which was a pleasant surprise. The food was quality and served in...More

headline: Lunch
content: Fun spot! Good music! Can get crowded. I had the taco salad with the sloppy mixture. It was huge. Tasty too. Our server was great!!

headline: Okay, it's touristy...but fun
content:
Hesitated to enter due to max touristy venue.  Glad we did because food and drinks were good and the place is fun.  Our "sloppy ritas" were quite good.  Sloppy joe sandwhich was good.  Roast beef sandwhich was quite good!   
  Live music, great service, go there!

headline: Snack
content: Stopped here for wings and a beverage. Excellent wings and a great place to hang out for awhile.  The wings were great.

headline: Good place for drinks and bands
content: Stopped by several times during our vacation for drinks and to watch the bands. Excellent entertainment and great place to chill and dance.

headline: A Key West Must-Do
content:
Great place with a ton of history, good food and service, fun live entertainment.
You can't go to Key West without visiting Sloppy Joe's!

headline: Great drinks Great Atmosphere Mediocre Food
content:
We went because we heard it was a must stop place as we strolled Duval Street. If you're going for drinks, and a fun atmosphere definitly stop in. If you're going for a meal find somewhere else. Way too many other choices!!!
Service was excellent!!!

headline: "Main Stay"
content: Good Ole' Sloppy Joe's always the same, a must while visiting! Good atmosphere, drinks and a shirt! Key West main stay!!

headline: Great Time!
