After a tour of the Hemingway House, my wife and I went to this restaurant because it was one of Hemingway‚Äôs favorite spots. 

I ordered the Original Sloppy Joe Sandwich and my wife ordered the Havana Nachos without the jalapenos or onions.  

The Sloppy Joe...More

headline: Sloppy Joe's... delish!
content: We recently spent an evening in Key West and decided to pop in for a beverage and a sloppy joe!  Honestly, its a great place.  Service was good, Sloppy Joe's were excellent and the drinks were cold!  A big plus was that even later in...More

headline: Over-rated Tourist Trap
content: I assume that people must only go to this bar because it's famous.  I walked in with my husband during happy hour time (not that they have a happy hour), and there wasn't a seat anywhere....not at the bar or a table.  And I couldn't...More

headline: Great Portion Size
content: We went for lunch.  There was live music which was a pleasant surprise for that time of day. It was crowded but we did not have to wait long for a seat. We ordered 1/2 of shrimp each. It was more than enough.  Two of...More

headline: Crowded but fun
content: Great music and good drinks! It was a bit crowded but we still had a lot of fun. The staff was friendly but it was hard to hear over the music.

headline: Great Bar in Key West
content: This was our first trip to Key West, After sightseeing we stopped in here.Great choice!  Frozen Pina Colatas and conch fritters were excellent. The services was fast and atmosphere was very welcome....

headline: Fun place for music, not so much for food
content: We stopped at Sloppy Joes after viewing sunset at Mallory Square to hear some good music AND eat dinner as it was about 8:30.  Fairly crowded but easily got a table.  Band was fantastic- lots of energy, great music.  Ordered two of house specialty drinks(don't...More

headline: Famous Bar in Key West
content: A good bet for live music, drinks and some good food. This is a bar so remember the menu is not large. Service is only average as the waiters are overworked, but friendly. A must see in downtown historic district of Key West. PLEASE remember...More

headline: Adult Friendly
content: Went there for drinks and appetizers.  Had a couple of guys playing music and it was definitely adult in nature.  Very funny and enjoyable.  Smoked fish dip was excellent and a great sized portion.

headline: Full Moon Sandwich
content: Best fish sandwich ever!!! Good music and atmosphere as well! Nice open area, two bars. I always stop in every time I visit.

headline: Great drinks and atmosphere
content: We were on a cruise that stopped in Key West, so the first place we went was Sloppy Joe's. The Rumrunner was fantastic and the food was good.  Just wish we could have spent a late night there to hang out more.

headline: Just OK
content: We have a family of six and wanted to eat on Duval street. This place was loud and served your typical bar food. But, we wanted to try it out for the Sloppy Joe which was okay. It had a sweet n tangy sauce. All...More

headline: Great place but didn't quite live up to the hype.
content: We liked the live music and atmosphere.  The food was good, drinks ok.  The staff was friendly but overworked.

headline: Phenomenal surprise!!
content: We kind of stumbled upon this place for lunch on a Wednesday and were greatly surprised.  There was a live musician playing all kinds of music and he was really, really entertaining.  I would expect that during the dinner hour, but for lunch midweek???  Very...More

headline: Great fun !
content: If you're looking for a true Key West atmosphere with some great music and cold drinks Sloppy Joe's is your place.

headline: MUSIC WAS GREAT, DRINKS MODERATE PRICED
content: We had a good time, listening to the music. Great atmosphere. Drinks were resonable price for duval street.

headline: Great for entertainment and drinks
content: Which is the reason I gave it 3.  The food was not good.  The Signature Sloppy Sandwich for $10 had little to no actual meat...mostly overly-sweet sauce, and came with nothing, no fries, chips, salad...oh!  Sorry, it came a pickle.  Our party ordered a number...More

headline: Reasonable on Duval
content: Great stop on Duval for an afternoon snack/lunch and cold beer. Great atmosphere, good food, excellent service, live entertainment. Known for their "sloppy Joe's" for a reason!

headline: Always a good time
content: This is a great bar to visit. There is often live music and it is always packed full of fun people. Try some of their specialized drinks and dance the night away!

headline: Good
content: Went here for drinks & music the one night. It is a really cool place and popular. Great selection of drinks.

headline: Great entertainment.
content: The food was ok but the service and entertainment were fantastic.  Saw Pete and Wayne.  Highly entertaining!  Recommend to anyone with a sense of humor that encompasses the risque'.

headline: very dissapointed
content: I have been to Sloppy Joe's before and we loved it. This trip one of our first stops was there. We were there maybe 20 minutes and had a couple rounds. When our group cashed out, one of our group paid with a $100 bill....More

headline: It was too loud... No, I'm not too old!
content:
We on a Sunday afternoon it wasn't crowded. The bartender was awesome, friendly. Struck up conversation with others around us then... The band started.. It got loud.. You no longer was talking you were yelling at the person next to you..
One cool thing was...More

headline: Classic place
content: We heard a trip to Key West would not be complete without a visit to Sloppy Joes!  Glad we stopped in to see this classic bar.   It was a fun environment.  Fast friendly service at the bar.  A trip to the gift shop completed our...More

headline: Great food and music
content: We had the best time here. We sat and enjoyed the best bands in town and had dinner and drinks. Cannot beat the chicken quesidellas they were out of this world. Go and have fun and enjoy this place.

headline: Must see Bar in Key West
content: We did not eat any food just went for drinks and to hear live music! It did not disappoint. It gets a good crowd at night and is a fun place to dance and party. Still good during the day but not as many people...More

headline: Fun lunch in Key West
content: While on Cruise to Bahamas, we enjoyed lunch at Sloppy Joes.  It was a touch pricey, but had good sloppy joe sandwich and Rum drink while listening to live music performance.  It definately was in keeping with atmosphere of Key West.

headline: Not what is was years ago
content: The place has seriously lost its charm.  Dirty and over priced with bad loud music. Where are all the great bands that used to frequent the place ? The feel of classic Key West is gone and replaced  with bad food and sticky tables. There...More

headline: great setting, good music, mediocre food
content: An iconic bar in Key West with good music, a lively atmosphere, but only average food,  Still it is a good time even for families.

headline: If you drink it won't be so terrible.
content: If you're a drinker, you'll love this place.  Sloppy is the right name as far as I'm concerned.  I found it noisy and not very clean and just plain poor Key West.

headline: Have to visit !
content:
Have to visit every time we're down this was way

Open early and very late 

Good music most of time 

Good bar food 

Been here for a very long time

Nice hang out

Will be back

headline: Great place to relax with a cold beer
content: We were in Key West and had to stop in Sloppy Joe's for a cold beer. We also tried a famous sloppy joe. It was good but not sure it was worth the $9.75 we paid for it. There was live music playing and the...More

headline: Great food, cocktails and service!
content: My boyfriend and I had a late lunch at Sloppy Joe's, we tried to get a table a few hours earlier but there were no seats available (it was super busy and this was a Monday lunchtime so we knew it must be good) so...More

headline: A Must
content: This is a happening place with good bands, food, and drinks. Head here if you're looking for a great night!!

headline: Good Music and drinks
content: Lovely place with good entertainment, the Band were called ENCORE, the night we were there and they were very good, played a great mix of stuff.  Drinks reasonably priced and staff polite and quick to serve

headline: Eh...it was okay
content: Everyone says "you have to stop at Sloppy Joes". It was okay.  There was live music and the band was good, but took 2 breaks in our hour and half visit. The service was slow, not too friendly and the margaritas were nothing to brag...More

headline: Fun time!
content: We went here our first night in Key West and had a fun time! Great atmosphere! Great drinks! Great appetizers!

headline: great place to dance the night away
content: one of the most fun bars in key west - and there are a lot of them!  have no idea how the food is - only came there late night to party, but it was super fun.

headline: The best Sloppy Joe I've had in years!
content: The sloppy joe was wonderfully sloppy, full of flavor, and large enough to satisfy my hunger. The band was very good, but very loud. The seating a little cramped, but the terrific margaritas let us overlook any little difficulties.

headline: Best party crowd bar in Key West
content: This place is great. I stopped in for some drinks and late evening snack. Next thing I know, you've got a DJ spinning and everyone singing and dancing a storm. I never pass this place up when I'm on Duval.

headline: We love Sloppy Joe's
content: We always make a point of eating at Sloppy Joe's whenever we come to Key West.  For some reason this visit, we wanted a salad rather than our typical burgers, etc. and we were surprised to find that the salad we got here was the...More

headline: best bar in key west
content: great place to have a drink order some food and listen top some live music. this place is a must to stop at when in key west

headline: Great find
content: We went into the centre of Key West and came across this place. We went in for a drink and then decided to have some lunch. A nice man showed us to our table and served us drinks and food and he was very pleasant....More

headline: Stopped for Drinks...
content: Stopped for a drink because of the history of the place mentioned on our bike tour.  Busy place.  Fun atmosphere.  Drinks were so-so and would say the same for the service.

headline: Packed with tourists
content: This bar has a great history, but its popularity is making it less enjoyable to visit. We were there this week because we enjoy the musician who was performing -- Barry Kuda. The entire place was jammed with cruise ship passengers.  Food was being delivered...More

headline: Doing Duval Street
content: Sloppy Joe's Bar is steeped in tradition and ambiance and memorabilia and all the things you go to Key West for.  It is not for the picky, the prim, the proper even the faint hearted.  There was a four legged hairy creature at the bar...More

headline: Great food and super service!
content: Stopped in during lunch rush; but our server, Jani, was amazing. She got us seated and had our food and drinks to us rapidly. Will definitely return and look for her.

headline: What a fun place!
content: It was easy to meet and talk with people at Sloppy Joe's, facilitated to a degree by our very personable bar tender Jim.  His sense of humor engaged everyone and kept them laughing.  I loved my Shipwreck.  I didn't try the food, but the first...More

headline: Legendary bar
content: Pretty cool bar with live music but if you want craft beer you have to go behind the scene to a small bar where they have a multitap.

headline: Worth a visit
content: We happened on this place around midday when we were hot and desperately needed a cool drink. We were attracted by the sound of the music and went in. We were really surprised to see a live music duo placing country and western music so...More

headline: The Height of HonkyTonk
content: Its a bar, its a tourist attraction, its entertainment (fellow diners) and its music too!  Hey, its downtown, on Duval, in Key West - gotta love it!  Let yourself go, expect barfood (tasty heaps), let the music carry you away and everything will be alright!

headline: Great meal
content: Visiting Key West we had to eat at Sloppy Joe's. I didn't have expectations as generally places that are on the tourist route don't have the greatest food. Well Sloppy Joe's proved this wrong as the food was great. Had the corn and cheese cakes...More

headline: A noisy place to drink
content: We arrived early, just before noon, on a Monday in the off season.  It was filled, but not overcrowded.  It's noisy in there.  We each had a drink and didn't eat there.  If you don't like your drink they will get you something else and...More

headline: Just a commercial place
content:
It was crowded but service was good.  It didn't seem as customer oriented as other places we went.  I think the commercialism of the place overwhelms the atmosphere.  The bartender was friendly and fast, but the drinks were more than average.
This would not be...More

headline: Got to visit!
content:
Always visit Sloppy Joe's at least once when staying in Key West. 

Trouble is it not cheap - the portion sizes are getting smaller - but we keep going back! It just one of those places that always has a great atmosphere and good live...More

headline: Great bar to visit!
content: We always go by Sloppy Joe's when in Key West....popular place with good drinks and good food as well.  Fun times on this end of Duval.

headline: Stopped in for lunch! (with Teenagers)
content: Considering this is a bar and we have teenagers we wanted to visit and have lunch.  Our main purpose was to try the "Original Sloppy Joe" yes, the actual sandwich.  But once we were in we decided to go with the Sloppy Joe's Fries.  It...More

headline: Tons O' fun
content: Our sever was great, the music was ok, but surprisingly great food... We where very happy, and can't wait to come back...

headline: Worth a trip for the vibe
content: It's big inside, seat your self with attentive waiting staff.  There is often live music performing on stage.  The food is ok, no more, the drinks are good and not too expensive but it has a great atmosphere.  If you aren't sure if you will...More

headline: Dropped in for drinks!
content: We decided to check out the live band and have some drinks. The music was great. Very entertaining. I had the frozen strawberry daiquiri and got the cool Sloppy Joe's cooler. Love it! Perfect for pool time. Also has the speakeasy punch. Highly recommend that...More

headline: Yummers!
content: The food was wonderful, the service was quick, and the band was interactive, all around a good time to be had at Sloppy Joe's!

headline: Good music.  Great people watching.
content: I never miss Sloppy Joes when I'm in Key West.  Great drinks (with a heavy pour).  Live music.  Yummy food.  Love it!

headline: Quick Lunch
content: Stopped in to get a quick bite while it was raining. Had live music that was nice. We had the fish tacos and appetizer sampler both good.  Sloppy Rita's were good also.

headline: crowded and loud
content: It was terribly crowded and the band that was playing was so loud. I do understand the attraction of this place, its very colorful. We had the sloppy joe's‚Ä¶‚Ä¶.they were good but, not the best that I have ever had. A real tourist trap to...More

headline: Great vibe
content: Visited here a while back whilst holidaying in Marco Island. A few friends chartered a small aircraft and flew down for the day. Good beer, good food and great live bands. A great place for a few beers with a great atmosphere.

headline: Always a good time at Sloppy Joe's!
content: My husband and I visit Key West every year and always enjoy an evening at Sloppy Joe's.  Fast, attentive service.  Great atmosphere.  Reasonable price for the drinks.  No complaints!

headline: Delicious drinks, funny entertainers, open feeling
content: Apparently a must-see in Key West! Great history and delicious drinks. Did I mention delicious? There were two guys on stage and the music wasn't my style of music but I enjoyed my time. We sat by the gift shop and it was always busy....More

headline: Typical
content: It's a staple in Key West.... tourist attraction, but the service wasn't very good, we seemed to be more of a bother to our waitress. We only ordered one beer, maybe we weren't spending enough, I don't know. It's a place to grab a beer,...More

headline: Good live music
content: The band that was playing was absolutely fun. The atmosphere pretty happy too. Drinks were ok but nothing fancy. Service was quite friendly and courteous. Will go there again.

headline: must see
content: historic bar. huge. live band. open windows and walk-throughs to outside. lots of fun. worth stopping by for a drink and or a bite. we had a great time.

headline: Bad entertainment
content: Drink was good, pie was good, entertainment was gross!  We were warned to leave if we were easily offended just as the entertainer dropped his pants!  I guess I am just too old.  LOL!

headline: Fun! Fun! Fun!
content: My only complaint is I didn't go to Sloppy Joes more often while we were in Key West! What a fun atmosphere and good drink prices.  We didn't eat anything, but by the looks and smells of what others were having, I'd say it was...More

headline: Best Place
content: The atmosphere and food are absolutely amazing. Definitely have something for everyone and even when its crowded its still pretty spacious.

headline: Atmosphere fun at Sloppy Joe's
content: Went to have a drink and listen to the excellent band. Decided to have fish n chips.  Stay away!  The chips were good but 2 small squares of fish looked like frozen out of the box.  Go for experience NOT food!

headline: Good bar to eat and drink
content: Nice, comfortable, bar to eat and drink at.  Great atmosphere and friendly staff.  Menu consisted of a good variety of options.  The original sloppy joe sandwich is a must try.  Easy location to find and located along historic Duval St.

headline: Not sure why this place is so popular
content: The music is great but the food was terrible. The mixed cocktails tasted like drinks you would get at a cheap night club when you just want to get intoxicated. I had a cheese pizza and it tasted like cardboard. I wouldn't visit on my...More

headline: Always a party!
content: This place is so much fun, and always has great live entertainment! It is a must visit when you are in Key West, as long as you can handle the crowds! We did not eat here, but the drinks and service were good!

headline: wow!
content:
This place is awesome our family loves to go here on vacation!
Best pizza I have many great memories at this place

headline: Love This Place!
content: First, I didn't give Sloppy Joe's a 5 because as busy as they get, it is impossible to give 5 Star service. With that being said, it is one of the best party's on Duval Street. One of Hemingway's (Papa), favorite hangouts, it is one...More

headline: All apart of the Duval crawl
content:
You cannot miss this place on the crawl
 They always have live music and a great atmosphere. We did not eat here, but the sloppy Rita is spot on.

headline: Great night
content: Decided to visit here as the restaurant in the hotel was closed and we were glad we did. The atmosphere was dynamic and with a live band people were definitely out to enjoy themselves. Service was quick, though we originally planned to have one drink...More

headline: Love! Love!Love!
content: This place is so much fun with the live music, fun drinks and the friendly staff and atmosphere.    Will defiantly go back.

headline: You just have to say you've been there!
content: Lunch at Sloppy Joe's on the second day of our stay. The place was hopping even though we were there well after 'normal' lunch hours. You need to be aggressive if you are looking for a table. The service was decent for the place being...More

headline: Must Go to Sloppy Joe's When Crawling the Bars on Duval Street
content: Sloppy Joe's lived up to its reputation as one of the Duval Street "must visits".  We dropped in for mid-day appetizers and the cold draft beers.  Friendly wait staff and good bar food.  Live entertainment was excellent and its a great party atmosphere.  If you...More

headline: Great place for entertainment
content: We ended up going here three times on our vacation.   The drink prices were cheaper than most of the places in Key West and there was always entertainment.  We didn't eat here so I'm not sure what the food is like.  We did see the...More

headline: Great Times
content: Friends reserved the side bar room for a rehearsal dinner it was fantastic.  I don't remember our bartenders name but she was great which always helps your experience at a bar/restaurant.  Good food, good beer (they had Founders, being from Michigan, that's really exciting).  We...More

headline: A Key West Tradition
content: Loud, touristy, good food and lots of live music.  You know you're in Key West while you're there. Friends recommended and we were glad we went.

headline: Fun Stop!
content: While visiting Duval Street on a dummy afternoon we had to make a stop at Sloppy Joe's.  Great drinks (try their Pi√±a Colada or Key Lime drink), good appetizers, live music and a unique atmosphere.

headline: Sloppy Joe's
content: Big tourist attraction.  Ernest Hemmingway's hang out when living in Key West.  Food was okay.  Big servings.  The waitress was very friendly.  Service was quick.

headline: good food
content: Quick excellent service, not rushed to leave. Was there on a Friday lunch time and it was very busy, but pleasurable.

headline: Not the best margarita
content: The food for a bar is good. I ordered Margarita cuz on the menu was like the best Margarita and it was nothing special about it. I really liked the band who was playing (it was on Monday) the girl had amazing voice. They played...More

headline: Good times good food!
content:
Had to check it out since seeing this place on TV so many times.
I had the fish and my Mom had the philly-pretty good!
There was live music, very entertaining, I would come back again next time I'm n the keys!

headline: Fun Place!
content:
The food here is typical bar food, nothing special. The service is very slow when they get busy. The atmosphere if nice and pleasant.

The best thing about this place is the comedy show, you don't want to miss it!

headline: Always great
content: Went for lunch stayed till dinner.  Our server Jessica was awesome and the fact that she was wearing mustache earrings and had rockin tattos didn't hurt.  Never miss a chance to drink and eat here!

headline: Must See
content: We stopped in with friends after a Sebago sunset cruise. We decide to have some drinks and food. The atmosphere was very lively and very busy. I was nervous about ordering food when they were this busy. At the time some band was playing on...More

headline: No crawl complete without this stop
content: Make sure you're there in the late afternoon or evening to see Pete and Wayne on the Sloppy stage.  You won't regret it.

headline: Classic Key West establishment
content: A mainstay on Duval Street.  Sloppy Joe's lives up to its reputation for being one of the best stops on Duval street.  Great, personable waitstaff, and good food.  Great to see the many different souls the frequent the touristy area, and it doesn't dissapoint.  Stopped...More

headline: Fun!!!
content: Very good food and drink in a fun atmosphere. If you don't like "bars" just forget about that and duck in for the food and the live music.

headline: Nice place
content: Just like all the other places in that area it is pricey.  We ordered drinks and an appetizer.  It was good but pricey.  They had a guy playing the piano.  It was fun.

headline: Great entertainment, No drink specials
content: Drinks can get a bit pricey here as this was one of the few places we visited that did not have drink specials noted or 2 for 1 vouchers being passed around.  Atmosphere and entertainment were great though

headline: Rum Runner Heaven
content: The World Famous Sloppy Joe's in the place to see and be seen. The drinks are strong and music load just as it should be. The Ernest Hemingway memorabilia adds to the history of the place.

headline: You have to go to Sloppy Joe's
content: This is just one of those places in Key West that everyone has to experience at least once. It's kind of loud, but you can hear it from outside too. Has great drinks and usually has live music.

headline: Great food and entertainment
content: We had great food and drinks while dining at Sloppy Joe's.  The atomosphere was great and we got to see The Doerfel's play.  They were a great family band!

headline: Eat, Drink, Be Merry, and get the T-shirt!
content: Every time we come to dinner, this is the first place we go to eat. For it being a touristy spot, it serves good food. Entertainment was awesome tonight. As it was a Monday night, this was the only place along Duval Sutreet where you...More

headline: Good vibrations and librations!
content: Settled in at the bar before noon ordering a great Bloody Mary and appetizer before our outing of museums and other attractions. Great memorabilia on walls in this historic venue. Top notch bartenders to accommodate your needs. A Key West must see!

headline: Rockin as always
content: Stopped in Sloppy Joes as is our tradition in Key West. Crazy busy as always. A good little stop for a drink but food is just okay. Not outstanding.

headline: My favorite meal year and year
content: This is the best key lime drink I have ever had. Nothing beats a Sloppy Joe. We had the nachos and the fries and the  basic Sloppy Joe sandwich. Cant be beat!! Music was loud but the band was great. Waiter was attentive and funny....More

headline: Busy, lively bar,
content: Visited Sloppy Joes during our visit to Key West. It was buzzing and very busy. The bar staff were very friendly. Would visit again.

headline: It's famous
content: People were nice drinks were cold ... just about everything you are looking for on a hot Key West day. The fritters were alright I'm glad I tried one but get the calimari. .. really good. It was a short walk from the boat ...glad...More

headline: Great
content: We stopped in for lunch and was pleasantly surprised at the cost of our meal and drinks. I thought it would be more expensive give that it is well known. The food was excellent.

headline: Gotta Go
content: This is one of the oldest and most famous bars on the strip. Was there twice once at night and once during the day, at night rowdy, loud and grubby; during the day clean, no noise and pretty nice place for lunch.

headline: Better Than Most; Not As Good As Others
content: By Duval standards the entertainment value outshines the food and service.  'Two Guys Having Fun' is the musical anchor that holds Sloppy Joe's together.  16 years ago we were all sitting around drinking Rumrunners and singing along with 'American Pie'.  The band is older now...More

headline: Back To The Future
content: Sloppy Joe's bar is incredible, a trip back in time, and an experience you will never forget. This is not 5 star dining, it's sloppy, the food is good, the drinks original, and it's an extremely busy place especially when the sun goes down but...More

headline: Compared to other spots on Duvall St., it's not too bad
content: There was a live musician performing who was not too bad.  The drinks are overpriced, but the food is comparable in price to other local restaurants.  The shrimp was AWEFUL.  We had it returned because it was that bad.  The grilled chicken sandwich, boneless chicken...More

headline: Great Experience
content: Busy place, service is pretty fast even when busy. Food was served hot and plenty to eat, almost too much for 1 sitting. The music wasn't bad either. Atmosphere  was pretty hectic but quieted somewhat when someone got up to sing.

headline: Good Food Good Music
content: Enjoyed the music.  The live band was really good.  So many times places like this have mediocre music but I was pleasantly surprised at how good it was.  The sloppy joe's were also good, a must eat on the menu.

headline: Fun!
content:
Stopped by because of the live music. Ended up staying for a few hours. Got dinner and it wasn't spectacular, but it's bar food! No complaints. Staff was excellent. 
For those who complain....
 It's a famous bar that serves food. They have live music. Soooo......More

headline: Always a fun stop when doing the Duval Crawl!
content: No trip to Key West would be complete without a stop in to Sloppy Joes!  We stopped by here for a beer and to watch the band play.   The band was good, the songs were ones everyone knew and the dance floor was full!  Everyone...More

headline: Great live music
content: Sloppys always has a great live band playing at various times of the day.  Now that smoking is no longer allowed inside the environment is even nicer.  Great dance floor and plenty of places to seat.

headline: Drunk party place with below par food
content:
This place is strictly for the heavy drinker crazed tourist type. Food was typical bar food.
Calamari was ok, fish tacos not so good.

headline: One necessary stop.
content: So, you're actually considering visiting Key West but NOT stopping at world famous Sloppy Joes for a cold drink and some loud rock & roll? Are you sure about that rash decision? Your friends back home will know that you missed the boat.

headline: Fun atmosphere
content: We dined in and there was a one man band that was pretty good, drinks were great!! I must say KeyWest establishments don't skimp on liquor!! I ordered the Shrimp Poboy and it was very good, fresh, perfectly cooked, my fianc√© ordered the Chicken Quesadillas...More

headline: Amazing place!!
content: We first went to sloppy Joe's for lunch with the family and it was amazing! Live music, large portions, delicious food. Lunch is a good time to go for families or people who don't like to drink (parents or grandparents ) Then we went later...More

headline: Good Food
content: Went for lunch and got their famous sloppy Joe sandwich and fish tacos.  Sandwich was very good, but a little expensive.  Three fish tacos were super good.  Music was good.

headline: The band was fabulous
content: We were able to listen to a awesome band that played well known music. The singer actually could sing. There was room to dance. Extremely packed. Must go at night after 10 pm that's when it picks up for dancing. No cover charge to get...More

headline: Lots of food!
content: We split the fish and chips and even halved, it was a lot of food for each.  It was hot, fresh and delivered quickly.  Prices were affordable so great value.

headline: A classic you can't miss
content: How can you go to Key West and skip Sloppy Joe's, not! This is a great american Classic. The beer is cold and the hamburgers are fantastic! Great people watching and music. this place is why people come to Key West, don't miss it.

headline: Must Go!
content: I agree this is a must go place in KW. Typical bar food, but good. The pulled pork was very tasty not your bottled barbecue sauce taste. Better.  Service was fast and courteous.  We ate at the bar since there were no tables available ....More

headline: Best Margarita ever!
content: My husband & I went in here after a local walking tour & visiting Hemmingway's house. It was very busy with live music & a great atmosphere. We each had a burger & the food was fine - typical 'pub grub' and the service was...More

headline: Fun bar with the best margaritas in town
content: Our favorite bar in Key West!  Fun bands play (not for kids), absolutely best margaritas and fish dip are here. The wait staff is friendly and super efficient. It's the best place to hang out before or after watching the sunset celebration from Mallory Square!

headline: Great Atmosphere
content: What can i say, their sloppy joes are amazing. Shocker, right? But even better than the food, was the entertainment. Great crowd of people listening to live music and all gettin' drunk! Obviously this is a very popular place - worth checking out!

headline: Must go
content: Went twice, as its a must in KW.  First time in the afternoon for drinks and music.  The second time it was so packed, we could not get in.  Did not try the sloppy Joes, but enjoyed people watching and the atmosphere.  Go early.

headline: Go for the experience enjoy a drink,  but not the food.
content:
Yes go there to say you have been. Enjoy the drinks  (in plastic cups ) beer's,  sloppy Ritas great. Its busy, its touristy,  not a restaurant,  if you're after fast food....
Busy take your camera. It will be a once only experience,  your in key...More

headline: So fun!
content:
Very neat place!  Lots of cool Hemingway history all over.  Excellent food!  Excellent food!  Pricey but worth it!

No kids menu!!!!

headline: Always fun
content: A trip to Key West isnt complete without a stop at Sloppy Joes this icon of the island never fails to leave you refreshed and ready for a night on the town. We were there during the songwriters festival and heard some great music. Try...More

headline: Awesome service
content: So busy, and our server, wish I knew your name!! you wore a kilt.  You are amazing, prompt, funny and FAST!!!!! this is the best old place for a drink and live entertainment, its always packed to the hilt, but it was nothing for our...More

headline: Enjoy the Music
content: Great place to enjoy the bands and atmosphere and drinks. Don't go there if you are looking for a great meal.  The food is mediocre.  Eat at another great restaurant on Duval St. before going there to enjoy good music and drinks.

headline: good pub food and great atmosphire
content: good not great food but a party place,had drinks and food a hemminway hangout and a good drinking party place to go

headline: Sloppy Joes
content: If you're looking for the true definition of a Key West bar, this is it. It's truly a unique place filled with Hemmingway history

headline: Great entertainment, overfilled crowds
content: The frozen drinks were very tasty, although expensive. The place was crowded, standing room only, don't hope to get a seat. Music and atmosphere is the attraction.

headline: Yum and Fun
content: Sloppy Joe's is a Key West staple for a reason.  The food, drinks, service and entertainment are all fantastic.

headline: Best service in town!
content: I cannot thank this business enough.  I lost my purse which had my id, credit card, phone and $100 cash.  The manager charged my phone and texted my husband to say he had my belongings.  All things, including the cash was intact.  What a blessing....More

headline: Fun live music and drinks
content: First...Sloppy Joe's is a bar on Duval in Key West--not a fine dining venue. It has a fun vibe, great service and good drinks. Lots of history.. Opens early and closes late....Great live music...Food is average bar food--but that isn't the draw here.

headline: Of course you stop by here!
content: I always pop in for a few when down here, always a good band playing and nice staff, a must do when on duval. Place is always rockin and people having fun. A great place to drink!

headline: A great night of entertainment
content: Spent a few hours here and had the best night out for a long time. Drink prices are reasonable, service is great from the staff and the entertainment first rate. If you don't mind it a little risqu√©. We got to listen to a very...More

headline: If you're here for a day
content: One must definitely drop by Sloppy Joe's to sit by the bar, get a drink, grab a bite and listen to some music after watching the sunset at the pier. The drinks were good and the service was great. I enjoyed the music and the...More

headline: Still Just O.K.
content: Doesn't much matter what I write here, Sloppy Joe's is a must visit just because.  Stopped for lunch while in town today (7 May) and had a blackened fish sandwich (I believe snapper) and wife had fried shrimp po boy.  I cut 2" off my...More

headline: Good Food but expensive for what you get
content: We had a lot of fun here.  The biggest issue is finding a table.  The place is crowded so you have to be strategic.  They were able to accommodate my  husband's gluten allergy so that was good.  I had a sloppy joe.  To be honest...More

headline: Had a Sloppy Joe at Sloppy Joes - Great food & music!
content: No visit to Key West is complete without a sloppy joe and beverage at Sloppy Joe's!   Our first time to Key West and we were told you have to go - and they were right!  Friendly fun atmosphere and the food was great!

headline: FUNNNNNNN
content: Spent my 40th Birthday at Sloppy Joe's, it was pouring rain outside, so it was a perfect place to stay dry.  Staff was awesome - Especially UNCLE LOU!!!

headline: Skip the food come for atmosphere
content: Seriously, drink and enjoy but the food is disappointing. Fun, loud atmosphere. Order a beverage or two but save the food for somewhere else!

headline: Average
content: Name name name and good live music but the food and the drinks: not worthy.  It seems to be a place that you should visit when you're in Key West, but they are soo many other authentic places to enjoy!

headline: From Locals to Tourist this place is a MOST.
content: I have been in this place so many times to count, and it is always good, some times amazing, the food is fresh and good not that bad on the prices, but after all it is still a tourist vacation spot. you could go at...More

headline: Great frozen drinks
content: Landed in Key West on a hot humid day. After sightseeing we stopped in here.Great choice!  Frozen Pina Colatas and conch fritters were excellent. Fast efficient service and a clean, cool place to people watch before returning to our ship. Relaxed atmosphere.

headline: A daily stop while in town
content: You just can't go to Key West without coming here. Live music, cold drinks, hot food. Sloppy Joes is one of the reasons I wish I could move to Key West. We ate here multiple times and the food was always good.

headline: Great Bar in Key West
content: I visited this bar while travelling with friends. It is a must visit while in Key West. The atmosphere is brilliant anc while we were there, there was live music which really kept the crowd lively!! The bar food was brilliant and we did not...More

headline: Over rated
content: They make a big deal about it being part of Ernst Hemingway's haunts but is really a remake of the original that is down the street.  Always busy and there are other places around that area that is just as good if not better.

headline: Absolute Must!
content: We had tried for a dinner here, but it was too crowed. We opted for a late lunch the next day...so glad we did!  The atmosphere was casual as expected, but the food was superb!  It was the best meal we had while here. I...More

headline: Historic bar. .
content: Duval Street is a commercial street in Key West like LA Rambla in Barcelona having the best of everything . Sloppy Joe's is on the north. Founded in 1933 when prohibition was withdrawn in America  and in the present spot from 1981 it's now part...More

headline: Fun vibe and chill out atmosphere
content: A must visit if it's your first time in Key West.  Exactly how I pictured it.  Nice entertainment with a cute little dog hiding in the guitar case who popped his head out.  Great way to encourage those tips!  Still, a fun place for a...More

headline: Great bar in Key West
content: We stopped in several times during our stay. Sloppy Joe sandwiches come in handy after a long day of adventure.Great snack for late night back at the hotel.

headline: Packed full of people
content: went mid after noon the place was packed sat over by the wall pictures of Hemingway with Castro and movie stars It was fun We had Cuban  natchoes they where good . A live band was setting up to play fun place very historic

headline: Party bar
content: We decided to try this bar to get out of the sweltering heat and sit and relax after walking around Duval St.  There is no air conditioning, just a lot of ceiling fans.  They always have some entertainment going on day or night.  We were...More

headline: Live music, cold drinks and a proper sloppy joe!
content: Awesome bar with brilliant live music, good staff and cold drinks.  We ordered the sloppy joe and fries as that's what this place is all about, superb flavour in a soft bun, reasonable prices and good service.  Busy, but if you can get a seat...More

headline: Sloppy Joes Thanksgiving 2014
content: Well the wife and I thought "We have to give Sloppy Joe's a try" We heard a lot about it. Food was OK but it is the atmosphere that is wonderful. All part of the Key West experience I suppose .We went at lunchtime and...More

headline: First timer
content: This was our first trip to Key West and our first stop was Sloppy Joe's. We were hungry and wanted something local and famous . We had the sloppy joe and it didn't disappoint us. I would recommend it. Our server was awesome directed us...More

headline: Highly Overrated
content: Sloppy Joe's is a very touristy bar and it's sweltering inside on a hot day. Atmosphere was decent and service was okay despite the crowds. We were there during the week when two guys on acoustic guitars were the entertainment - much of their routine...More

headline: A must see in Key West!
content: A classic Key West Bar and restaurant with wonderful music every night, great drinks and very friendly staff.Food was average, but atmosphere was great!

headline: nothing to talk about
content: this was probably one of the most overrated bar in key west, place was packed, had live music, but the food was mediocre, the service so so, and the atmosphere was just too loud Place was packed, probably a cruise ship in town.

headline: just drink and eat
content: you an only eat and drink so much at one time, but not here.  one has to rest before continuing your walk to the next food and drink around the corner.

headline: Great environment even for older folks.
content: Stopped in with a group on a Friday night around 10pm. The live band was terrific as was the DJ. We enjoyed several songs and the place was not too crowded at this point. We left to walk down the block, but came back when...More

headline: A must visit when in Key West
content: Great bar. We were in town for a wedding and we visited Sloppy Joe's after the wedding. Such a fun atmosphere with great music. While we were there they had band and a dj.

headline: A Key West Tradition
content: Our first time to Key West we had to stop by Sloppy Joe's. Fun and open atmosphere with good music, a nice breeze and good food! Had the fish tacos and they were more than happy to accommodate my request for blackened fish rather than...More

headline: Great place to grab a drink
content: My husband and I stopped in for a drink before heading back to our cruise ship.  The bartender was very friendly and entertaining.  We both enjoyed a couple relaxing drinks at the bar before heading out.

headline: great band stolen sun glasses a bummer
content: Having a great time listening to a fantastic young band. Service great could of been 5 star until my buddies $200 Maui Jims were lifted

headline: A Key West tradition
content: I have been going to Sloppy Joe's every time I visit Key West for the past 30 years and it never gets old. The food is a grade above typical bar food and the music, if you catch it at the right time, is outstanding....More

headline: The place to visit in Key West
content: This is a must to visit when you are in Key West. Typical bar food, a bit overpriced, but the atmosphere is what draws you in.

headline: A must visit to Key West
content: A necessary stop when visiting the island, as well as the sloppy Joe sandwiches ! However not the former hangout of Ernest Hemingway ! That is a mystery you must solve ..... enjoy and get a t-shirt

headline: Great Place & Great Food
content: This is a very cool old bar and restaurant. It's worth the stop. Be sure to try the famous Sloppy Joe sandwich. It's one of a kind and is worth the trip. They have good local talent singing also. I will be back.

headline: Food was very good & the live music was very nice
content: We went here for a relaxing business lunch with 10 associates. The food was fairly prices and very tasty. The live entertainment was very good and kept the crown into it.

headline: Good food
content: Stopped in for lunch. Fast service, food was out really fast. If you sit towards the back it is cooler, they keep the doors and windows open and on a really hot day it is real uncomfortable. The music was a louder than it needed...More

headline: Fun place to drink and eat
content: We arrived tired and in the middle of the afternoon on Easter Sunday. Had great service by our waitress. She brought water and margaritas quickly. She also advised us on our order. The food was delicious for bar food and the price was right and...More

headline: Fun, fun, fun!
content: Sloppy Joe's hasn't really changed much since we were there 25 years ago--still the same, fun, happening place only now they have several live webcams.  What a hoot it was to call friends back home and wave to them on the cameras.  We had lunch---sandwiches...More

headline: Try the Original Sloppy Joe Sandwich
content: We stopped here for a quick dinner; service was fast and friendly; I had the original sloppy joe sandwich, very tasty with just enough spices, and needed a fork as it was quite juicy; my husband had the roast beef sandwich, both sandwiches came with...More

headline: Give it a try you will be surprised
content: Went there for lunch with several others the place was packed but fortunately we noticed a waitress cleaning a table that someone spilled a drink and waited a few minutes and got a seat quickly.  Had a draft beer that was nice and cold.   Ordered...More

headline: Lots of fun!!
content: We happened to port in Key West on St Patrick's Day. This place was packed so we kind of had to hover over people like vultures to get a table but we were able to get a table in about 10 minutes. They had live...More

headline: Have a Sloppy Joe at Sloppy Joe's
content: We returned to Key West specifically to go to Sloppy Joe's and we were not disappointed.  Justin did a great job as a server. What to have to eat at Sloppy Joe's?  A SLOPPY JOE of course. It was the best sloppy Joe I have...More

headline: Music was better than the food.
content: Great atmosphere. You  pick your own seats.  Food is just ok. My daughter said the sloppy joe was good. No kids menu. A bit overpriced for what you get. Probably wouldn't go again or recommend.

headline: Fun Spot for a Margarita and a Snack
content: Sloppy Joe's made famous by Ernest Hemmingway - was his favorite bar.  Open air, great band and good service.

headline: Music, Great Food, and Delicious Drinks
content:
If you are visiting the Hemingway House to see how the beloved author lived, then if you know anything about his life, you must also visit where he drank!

Sloppy Joe's Bar is a Key West tradition since 1933.  Quite ironically, it opened its doors...More

headline: It's a party
content: They have wonderful entertainment a friendly and courteous staff the manager Becky Lawerance she is always smiling, and pleasant no matter the situation. Sloppy Joes makes you feel like it's your neighborhood bar just larger.  Great place

headline: Not a bad spot
content: Sloppy Joe's is a Key West must, but  I would limit it to drinks.  The food is average bar food.  The service is good.

headline: Great Afternoon
content: What a nice way to spend a few hours with friends. It's one of our "traditional" stops on our Key West vacation. Our server was very attentive to the 11 of us. The food was tasty and the drinks flowed freely.

headline: Fun atmosphere, great food!
content: We took our kids here after touring Key West and were not disappointed.  The food was great and the lively atmosphere contributed to the great experience.   We would definitely go back.  The buffalo chicken wrap was outstanding!

headline: Good Drinks Good Music Great Time
content: enjoyed the atmosphere, music and libations! Busy place but bar service was still good, drinks were not watered down. Would return and recommend.  Shop attached for some Sloppy Joes Souvies!

headline: One Mustn't Miss Sloppy Joe's While in Key West
content: We decided, as most tourists in Key West, to have lunch at Sloppy Joe's and we're glad that we did as it was a fun experience and worth the time.  I had the Sloppy Joe and my wife had the fish tacos.  All though neither...More

headline: Fun, casual night
content: Good priced drinks and some really good music. Their sloppy-ritas are legendary. This place is extremely casual. The bartenders were all so nice and welcoming. I came here 3 times while visiting Key West but I didn't give it 5 stars only because one of...More

headline: Fun place, wish the drinks were better
content: Lots of fun here, great music and people. Atmosphere, waiters and bartenders all good - the 'fancy' drinks are kind of over sweet and taste like a mix. Stick to beer.

headline: A Must Go In Key West
content: Sloppy Joe's is a tradition for my family. We always go there directly after we land for lunch. The food never disappoints and the service is pretty good. They always have an excellent band playing also. Sloppy Joe's is a must go if you are...More

headline: A slice of Key West!
content: Atmosphere is what Sloppy Joe's is all about. The food and drinks are all good but its the vibe of this place th to sets it apart from others. What's not to like about a place where Hemmigway hung out? I would go back again...More

headline: Overrated
content: Great history in the bar. The service was mediocre and the prices a little too high. I prefer some of the other bars... But a must visit once when visiting key west

headline: Cool place to have a drink
content: We were there in March 2015, we had drinks and appetizer's-. There was live music which was very good, the appetizer's-not so much! I would definitely recommend going to have drinks and soak up the atmosphere but I wouldn't recommend any appetizer's.

headline: Amazing place to eat!
content: Food is incredible!  The music was great & not too loud like other places where you have to yell across the table. Service was great as well.

headline: Great fun!
content: Iconic Key West bar. Great drinks. Cool t-shirts! We happened to be there on St. Patrick's day early afternoon. And the place was hopping.

headline: Friendly place with good food
content: We were looking for a place to eat late in the evening and decided to eat here. The staff was so friendly and the food was good. Lots of locals were eating here. We would go again.

headline: Fun
content: While staying in Key West,we went to Sloppy Joe's a couple of times, and really enjoyed it there. Great drinks and entertainment. A great place to start your Duval Street Crawl.

headline: Part of history....
content: Sloppy Joe's is an old Key West fixture and well worth a stop by.  Don't expect fancy...its a bar after all.  But it has an ambiance all its own!!  Great place to stop for a beer and pretzels while exploring Duval Street (or while the...More

headline: Amazing Band
content: We came here for a few drinks on Monday 30th March and ended up not wanting to leave the band you had were so much fun, with both modern and old music made the bar hard to leave.

headline: Hurry! Grab A Seat.
content: We went on spring break and it was very busy. What I didn't realize is that it's a seat yourself establishment. It became comical as my family and I kept an eye out on all four corners of the restaurant for the next available table....More

headline: Great experience the first evening.  Second not so much.
content: First off, I realized stopping here that this wasn't the most family with young children friendly. We sat on the patio of Joe's tap room side of Sloppy Joe's. My wife and I still wanted to experience the location.  The first day (Thursday, April 2nd)...More

headline: Great Bar Atmosphere
content: Great little bar in old town Key West.  Live music.  Good service.  Food was good but nothing special.  Good atmosphere

headline: Fun!
content: Nice live music, good authmosphere and good cocktails! We did not eat there. We were there for a few cocktails..

headline: A must stop in Key West!
content: Sloppy Joe's is one of the oldest bars on Key West....its a must stop on your next visit. We stopped in twice on a recent visit. The live entertainment was fantastic!  The Sloppy Joe Lemonade is very thirst quenching and the Sloppy Joes are quite...More

headline: You have to go here if you're in Key West
content: We didn't eat here, just stopped in for a couple drinks while the kids finished their Hagen Dazs. So much fun for the adults, kids grin and bared it. Almost always live entertainment and mostly pretty good. Service was pretty good also but it was...More

headline: Time to wait!
content: Every cruise we take to Key West we always stop here and have lunch. The only trouble with this place is that it is always packed! and you almost have to stand near a table and hope they get up soon. Other than that the...More

headline: Fun place
content: Being a frequent traveler to Put in Bay Ohio.  I had to to stop buy Sloppy Joes to see Mike "Mad Dog" Adams sing.  Unfortunately he wasn't there.  It is a cool bar with great atmosphere.  I strongly suggest you stop in for a cold...More

headline: Nice food, nice history, live music
content: Relatively slow service. Food was nice. Classic rock live music was a nice touch. Medium priced. Did not have to wait for table.

headline: FUN!
content: Loved this place.  Beverly at the main bar was the best!!  The live music was awesome every night.  Food is also good.  Even the other customers were SO nice to each other.  I think the total vibe is just positive in this place.  Go here!...More

headline: A fun environment
content: The environment was neat and the service was good but everything else was just average. A traditional must see in Key West but I wouldn't spend more than a hour or two there (unless they had a good band playing).

headline: Fun, fun, fun
content: sloppy joes were wonderful.  Entertainment was fun.   Lively group.  Very busy bar like atmosphere .   We sang, drank and had fun!

headline: Fun, Friends & Music!
content: We went to Sloppy Joe's to hear the entrainment that day "Jeff Clark".  We spent 4 hours listening to music, drinking and eating.  The day was great! The place was packed and everyone in the place was having a great time.  The atmosphere was so...More

headline: Awful drinks
content: We had to try the famous Sloppy Joes bar. Ordered a banana daiquiri and rum runner. Pre-mixed machine drinks that tasted like a 7/11 slushy. I'd of rather threw my $20 in the restaurant as I walked by and saved my time. Not sure if...More

headline: Fish tacos
content: Read about the place and had to pay it a visit during our Key West stay. It was awesome, in the middle of the day, it was like a party with good live music and fast service. I had the fish tacos which we're amazing...More

headline: Just Average
content: Stopped here for lunch during a cruise because it was highly recommended. It was ok. Staff was fairly friendly. Conch fritters were just ok, same for the crab cake sandwich. Server suggested a purple drink, kinda tasted like fun dip. But again, just ok. There...More

headline: They have a craft beer room here too....oh YES!
content: This place is huge and by all appearances, much loved by the tourists and locals alike. We settled in Joe's Tap room in the back and ordered a few local brews. The smaller bar was filled with friendly folks, and we enjoyed the company and...More

headline: Deserving of Fame
content: My husband and I were with a tour group that stayed in Key West for 5 days. One evening we were on our own, so decided to eat dinner at the famous Sloppy Joe‚Äôs. We had chips/salsa and a Sloppy Joe each. My husband had...More

headline: A trip to Key West is incomplete w/o a visit to sloppy Joe's
content:
You know going in it will be crowded, have average food, OK drinks and pretty good music.
We went during the day and it was still crowded and you had to work in teams to find a table. Service was friendly and efficient. The music...More

headline: Great Atmosphere... very loud
content:
Stopped by with friends for a drink and a rest from site-seeing. The place was packed.
A great musician was playing good pop tunes and Jimmy Buffet faves. One patron was really out of it... loud, spilling beer, bothering people around him. No one seemed...More

headline: Great
content: Open,welcoming feeling. Very pleasant staff...our food was great and the live entertainment was fun too.

headline: A great Experience for all
content: You just have to experience Sloopy Joe's at least once. Great Food, great entertainment, great Pina Coladas. Just a fun place with the Hemmingway influence as well. Great Fun!

headline: Went  for the experience and food and was not disappointed.
content: Was told that Sloppy Joe's was a must when visiting Key West. We went for lunch and had a great time. Seating is seat yourself which means you may have to circle the dining room once or twice watching for someone getting up to leave....More

headline: Not so sloppy
content: I didn't order anything to eat as we had already done that.  But I did order a few drinks.  Normally I don't order frozen drinks but the pina colada really looked good.  It even tasted better than it looked.  Music was good and they pour...More

headline: Over rated
content: This world famous is sub-par in my opinion. The staff was rude, place was packed and their drinks were nothing special. We went to check out BC its a classic but were actually kind of disappointed.  Probably wouldn't go back.

headline: A MUST SEE place when in Key West. It's an EXPERIENCE!
content: One of those "MUST SEE" places when in Key West. Order a drink and walk around looking at all of the memorabilia on the walls from Ernest Hemingway. He hung out regularly at this bar. Usually have very good musicians playing.  Great food, moderately priced...More

headline: You just need to experience it!
content:
The four stars reflect the place more than the cuisine...

Sloppy Joe's - Key West, Florida - 3/22/2015

What a fun place! You can almost feel Ernest Hemingway's presence. Friendly, attentive staff. They have a shop where you can purchase TeeShirts and memorabilia. Everyone is...More

headline: Fun with entertainment at lunch
content: Great food, friendly service, just a fun place to go. Wife had the sloppy jo and I the Philly,  both very tasty and filling. Would go again.

headline: To claim a world famous drink, have it be not horrible
content: This review is based on having only one drink at Sloppy's, their world famous, one and only "Sloppy Rita".  In a word: gross.  If you enjoy a good margarita, go elsewhere (although, I'm feeling like the entire island is difficient on this one; I tried...More

headline: Great Location and History
content: We have stopped at Key West 3 times on cruise adventures and have refreshed at Sloppy Joes each of those times.   I haven't been during the evening but it's kid friendly in the afternoon.  This time we ate Chilli Nachos and drank Mojitos.  The food...More

headline: A must go in Key West
content: After seeing picture after picture in all the promo literature about this place and hearing the story about it from the Old Town Trolley driver I knew it was a must go to on my Key West list of places to see.  We strolled in...More

headline: We had really good sloppy joe sandwiches and fries.  Nice cold pop with free refills and friendly waitress.
content: Both my husband and I really enjoyed the sloppy joe sandwiches and fries.  I couldn't eat all of mine, but my husband was willing too.  We also walked around and saw pictures of Key West and Earnest Hemmingway.  They claim that that was his favorite...More

headline: Hemingway's favorite bar
content:
is what i seem to remember seeing painted on the exterior of this edifice back in 1970.  Doesn't read that way now, but whatever.  

So now decades later, I can come inside and eat.  I don't know what it was then, or in hemingways time,...More

headline: I would rather light my money on fire than spend it tgere
content: Have been going to Key West for 7 yrs for New Years and have watched the conch drop every yr outside always a good time.  I'm in the Jets for 4 mo's every yr. But will never ever go in this place again and have...More

headline: Fun
content: This bar had great drinks and a fun band. Just a great all around nighttime atmosphere. We went a couple of nights!

headline: Fun Place for a Drink
content: Looking for a good drink and a place to relax for a bit, we headed into Sloppy Joe's. We sat at the bar and were greeted by a very energenic bar tender who got us drinks right away! There was live music to enjoy while...More

headline: More T-shirts than taste
content: Yes it's an institution but I think they've let their reputation as a seller of stellar cocktails slide - the frozen were weak. The crowd seem to be enjoying the music though & the gift shop was bunged! I preferred flying Monkeys at fogartys

headline: Sloppy Joes
content: Ok, you must visit Sloppy Joes at least once on your Key West trip. Great place, lots to look at, great friendly service. The music and t-shirts are a must! We did take out food this trip and it was plentiful and good eating!

headline: A must to visit
content: If you are visiting the Keys, you gotta visit Sloppy Joe's. That was what I was told. It was a nice pub with a great atmosphere even at 2 pm with live music and a good atmosphere.

headline: Weak Frozen Drinks
content: On a recent overnight, my husband and I decided to take part in the Duval Crawl and have some drinks at several establishments. Sloppy Joe's was one we should have by-passed. The music and atmosphere were lively, however their rum runners come from a frozen...More

headline: must see everytime
content: This is an institution. Great place to people watch.  Drinks are drinks. The food is snack food and priced for tourists. That means it's expensive.

headline: Great entertainment!
content: This year really enjoyed the Doerfel's. And a trip to Key West wouldn't be the same without Pete & Wayne!

headline: Anti-climatic
content: Look  in the door but don't waste your time going  in..  Suspect it might have been a small bar at one time but nothing special to see.

headline: Iconic must experience
content: This place is the mandatory bar to visit when down here; excellent musicians, a lively fun-filled crowd, and the story of Sloppy Joe's (although the original is a block away on a side street).

headline: A must visit
content: A KW staple and a must when visiting. Have always had a good time here. Good live music and friendly service.  Big dance floor area too. Will always return for a drink when in KW.

headline: This place is a place you have to go to
content: That said, I am closer to sixty then fifty and SJ is more for a younger crowd, especially after the sun goes down.  The music is rowdy and the drinks cold.  Everyone has always been friendly.  There is nothing bad about Sloppy Joe's unless you...More

headline: Ernest and Frank
content: Worth a stop. A great place for a beer, a burger, music and Hemingway memerobilia. Take an hour or two and chill, especially, on a hot humid day.

headline: Don't miss!
content: A staple of the Duval Street bar scene.  Food is good and the drinks are reasonably priced.  Be sure to take in the Pete and Wayne Show, but caution, it's not for kids!

headline: Yep Sloppy Joes!
content: Had to go and am happy we did.  We went for lunch and had drinks and of course "Sloppy Joe's".  Can't go to Key West without a visit.  The service is great.. food and drinks are excellent.  Good times!

headline: St Patrick's day was hopping
content: Visited on St Patty's day, had a couple of drinks and nachos, there was a guitar player singing, music playing and fun was had by all.

headline: Fun place in Key West
content: When in Key West,you have to go to Sloppy Joe. Good food, good music, fun atmosphere. The sloppy joes are ok, but the quesadillas are great. Good drink, too. Worth a visit!

headline: Fun place...great food
content: We stopped to buy a t-shirt and stayed for the food, drink, and entertainment.  Ordered a house salad and what I received was huge with exactly the items I wanted in it.  Drink refills kept coming even though we didn't ask for them ( I...More

headline: Sloppy Joe's
content: A trip to Key West is not complete without a trip to Sloppy Joe's.  Enjoyed a nice appetizer of wings and beverages.  The gift shop offers a great variety as well.

headline: Historic Place
content: I wanted to go for years and finally got there. Now I can honestly say, Been there, bought the Tee-shirt. Whoopee!!

headline: Fun place with great music and a big dance floor
content: Sloppy Joe's is an iconic Key West bar.  I've been on at least three different occasions/trips and it's always been fun.  Great music, live bands, and a large dance floor for those who like to move.  Another plus is that there are plenty of tables/chairs...More

headline: Overrated
content: When in Key West, you hear alot about Sloppy Joe's. Even at home, I often see people wearing Sloppy Joe's T-shirts. My expectations were high due to all of the hype, but I was rather disappointed. The service was just okay, and the drinks were...More

headline: It's Sloppy Joes!
content: If you're in Key West, you have to go to Sloppy Joe's just because! It's a Key West icon! It's crowded, it's loud and it's everything a Key West bar/restaurant should be. The food is descent, but go for the atmosphere. The gift shop is...More

headline: fun restaurant
content: After taking the trolley tour around Key West, we decided to eat here since it's one of the "famous" spots in Key West.  I had the sloppy Joe and it was very good.  My husband had a burger and said that was also good.  Even...More

headline: Great place for food and drink!
content:
My wife and I visited Sloppy Joe's for the first time recently and we had an absolutely great time! 
We went on a Tue and the place was packed, but we found a table. As soon as we sat down, the waitress was there to...More

headline: Fun place!
content: Great place to experience a real Key West party!  Great drinks.  Lots of friendly people and the staff was great.  Good variety of beers and special drinks.  Every time we stopped in people were really enjoying themselves.

headline: Must see!
content: Fun place.  No trip to Key West would be complete without stopping here. Menu is basically bar food with not a whole lot for vegetarians like me.

headline: cold beer decent music
content: Bottled beer serious Bouncers and decent music. Iconic and worth the stop in we drank two and crawled on.

headline: Okay but only just.......
content: Fast food in a fun setting. Hundreds of tables serving fried and ordinary food. I regret that I found this to be a notch better than fast food hamburger chain. It safe but not great by any means.

headline: Great food and drinks!!
content: So, I know this is a tourist trap. With that being said they do have great drinks and by far the best conch fritters I have had (and I've had them a lot of places). The service is always good and it is always crowded....More

headline: Good hillbilly atmosphere and friendly staff
content: What a great place to visit wide range of food and drinks lively atmosphere friendly helpful staff whilst we were visiting there was blue grass music playing and groups of customers from all over the world. We were made to feel extremely welcome especially with...More

headline: Never got a chance to order
content: Went in and place was crazy, to many tables crammed into this small place.  Band was ok but you couldn't talk as they were way to loud.  Waited for a while but never saw a waitress so we left and went some where else to...More

headline: Ok experience
content: Way over-priced. Too crowded and service was poor. Did that...never to return. Definitely a tourist trap.

headline: Ok, another tourist trap, but in a good way
content: Yeah, it is a tourist trap, but at least it is a lively one.  A good place to ask the next table "where y'all from".  The food is ok, the beer is cold and they had a pretty good pianist/singer. The crowd is mostly old...More

headline: Great Bar and Sloppy Joe's
content: It's our second time here for lunch and we will return again.  Sure, it's 85 degrees and the bar is open air, but there's something about hot sloppy joes and cold beers that makes a perfect day.  Yes, it's touristy and always crowded and the...More

headline: Sloppy Joe's
content: Sloppy Joe's is not much to look at, but it has that Hemingway history. I do enjoy a good piano player. But now days I am more of an early bird, so its very good when he does an early bird. I am not big...More

headline: Best Sloppy Joe
content: I will admit, their sloppy joe sandwich is good competition for mine.  Very crowded place and a must go to.  Have live entertainment and friendly wait staff.  they have college banners hanging around and I am happy to say our choice was among them.  If...More

headline: Fine like Papa Hemingway
content: If you are in Key West Sloppy Joes is an absolute must. Once the favorite haunt of Ernest Hemingway  it is a blow through bar with a great view of Duval.  They have a wonderful piano player/singer so sit back, have a cold beer, a...More

headline: Fun atmosphere, great for lunch
content: The sloppy joes are actually very good.  Good service, nice atmosphere.  Rum Runners are a little sweet, but it's a good tourist spot anyway.

headline: Visit to Mecca
content: Leading up to our Florida vacation, I relieved the tedium of our -25 to -32 degree weather by watching Sloppy Joe's Webcam. It was particularly entertaining late at night, as the drunken, overweight, middle-aged tourists undulated on the dance floor and sucked face as closing...More

headline: Great live music and a cold beer
content: Sloppy Joe's is a must-stop when in Key West.  We sat at the bar and had a beer and listened to some great live music.  Didn't have the sloppy joe this time (have had one before and it was great).  Always a fun and diverse...More

headline: Always a good time
content: Every year this is our first night stop . Pat Daliy  there again there this year always a great show and good times. After the show stck around for some great dance bands. This is a don't miss even if you just stop in for...More

headline: A great place for a beer and some entertainment
content: We didn't have dinner here but spent some afternoon time here listening to a band and having a few beers. Very entertaining, a vibrant atmosphere, and quick service. Even though it was plenty hot outside, they had plenty of AC to keep you comfortable.

headline: You have got to have the Sloppy Joe and a cold beer.
content: Great rock band was playing while we enjoyed a world famous sloppy joe and a Key West Ale.  What a great was to take a bight out of our hunger after a fun afternoon in the sun.  You have got to give this a try.

headline: Would have loved to hear some music!
content: On Sunday night we had decided to eat at Sloppy Joe‚Äôs.  We had learned about the historical connection to Ernest Hemingway while visiting his home, so we decided to give it a try.  There were some positives about Sloppy Joe‚Äôs‚Äîhistorical or traditional Key West location,...More

headline: Long black hair in my nachos
content: My friends and I were on our last day in KW and wanted to check out Sloppy Joe's for lunch to see what it was all about. We found a seat right away even though it was very crowded. We were planning on having a...More

headline: Depends upon what you're looking for...
content:
If you're looking for something good to eat, there are far better places to go. If you want to party in a party atmosphere, you've come to the right place.
Don't get me wrong about the food; IT'S A BAR! It's OK, it's fine...
The...More

headline: Great bar to hang out with friends.
content: It tends to get really crowded but that is par for the course. Never too hard to get a drink and the bands are usually really good.

headline: Hemingway's Bar
content: A typical looking bar with dollar bills, license plates from various states and hand written info on every surface.  The food was good and plentiful.  The value was equivalent to any bar.  The service was good.

headline: Stop for a drink.
content: We stopped for a drink here because everyone says you have to go to Sloppy Joe's.  It was crowded but we got a table.  Our waitress was friendly and service timely.  Do it, just to do it!

headline: When in key west
content: If you go to key west you must give sloppys' a try,drink,eat, laugh and be merry.Check out (live duval street cam) its 'right outside the bar......enjoy....see you next year sloppy........

headline: disappointed
content: Have been coming to key west for over 20years and sloppy joes was alway a must, went last night and was disappointed, the food  wasoverpriced for whay you got, the sloppy joe tasted like it was made from manwich and the chili was from a...More

headline: horrible bar tender
content: I went here for the first time ever, went in to sloppy joes for a drink and was blantely ignored by the bar tender. Watched someone order a drink by stepping up on a stand next to the bar, after she stepped down I figured...More

headline: Great bar
content: Live music, great service, good drinks. Nice sized dance floor and live web cams for your friends not with you to enjoy or envy.

headline: Fun place to go
content: Nice big place. Plenty of seating at multiple bars. Just a real laid back vibe. Good drinks and funny bartenders. As I was sitting there a police horse came walking half way through the door looking for his treat from the bartender. That's something you...More

headline: Sloppy Joes - Always Entertaining
content:
Always manage to be in Key West when the entertainers from Put In Bay are in town - LOVE IT.
Pat Daily is a must this weekend, but also caught part of Mike "Mad Dog" and WHAT A HOOT!  Was lucky and shared a table...More

headline: Wishful flashback
content: it is what it is.....one looks at the photos and can only wish they were there at that time but that is true about any place you visit with a romantic lifestyle history such as Key West....Duval Street has become a cross between Bourbon Street...More

headline: Hang with Hemmingway
content: Stopped in for an early lunch beverage. Got the Sloppy Rita which was great! The atmosphere was fun & light. The history of Hemmingway was really neat and made the stop all worth it. The service was also very friendly and welcoming!

headline: Touristy but Memories
content: We felt that we had to visit this establishment as part of the trip. It is not the original location, but the original Sloppy Joe's nonetheless. We also had to try the sloppy joe. It was terrific, just the way I remember one to taste....More

headline: Can't go wrong getting 'Sloppy'
content: Stopped in for lunch and drinks while doing a mini bar crawl of Duval street. Nice, big open air location in the middle of everything. Service was quick and friendly. My wife had a Sloppy Joe, which she raved about, I had a half pound...More

headline: An icon in Key West
content: Home of the original sloppy joe sandwich.  Restaurant and bar were lively with live piano music but finding a seat was difficult.  Sloppy Joe sandwiches were tasty but very light on the beef filling, mostly roll.

headline: Best Place on Duval Street
content: Great food and drinks, a fun atmosphere, and an overall great time! A little expensive, but must go if ever in Key West!

headline: Fun atmosphere great drinks hip music
content: We went here for drinks and live entertainment and we were not disappointed. The atmosphere was fun and the servers were very attentive. They made me a virgin mojito, great fun and my partner enjoyed their beers on tap.

headline: Last stop of the day
content: Well we head of this place, as a place to see! We did see and stayed for the music.. Oh my!  We were not ready for what was to come.. They were good as far as entertaining, not for young kids ears to hear.. Or...More

headline: Casual dining
content: The food was good and they had a live band that was good. This is a casual place. Very crowded, loud. It is what it is.

headline: well, they do actually serve food here
content: but, that's not the reason we usually drop in.....our annual trek to KW is not complete without hitting this place when pat dailey is performing....those who attend his performances shouldn't be classified as groupies, rather, they are appreciative of the musical talents of this long...More

headline: Good old days.
content: I have been going to Sloppy Joes since the 70's. Then it had a parachute on the ceiling and only the clanking of glass. Over the years it has kept up with the times. This is a new Sloppys, but it in time with today....More

headline: Exactly as expected
content: We stopped here for a quick lunch before heading back to our cruise ship. We had a quick sloppy joe, and a Greek salad. Both of which were done well. We ordered several cocktails too. Overall the service was excellent and quick. The restaurant had...More

headline: Loved it!
content: Huge spot but the service was great. The two guys on stage the afternoon we were there were excellent - great entertainers & hilarious.

headline: A must place to go!
content:
Great cocktails, fantastic music,
Had fun with cocktails and music.  Food was average bar food.
But when in Key West a must.

headline: We don't go for the food.
content: Food is your basic bar stuff (for us anyway). This place is always packed though! It is a fun, boisterous crowd and there is usually entertainment. We were there for Pete & Wayne. They are very entertaining but very crude.

headline: MUST DO!!!
content: Great place, super piano player on (even starting @ noon or so). The Sloppy Joe did not disappoint! Okay for kids too, during the day. GREAT DRINKS!

headline: Slick tourist trap
content: There are so many better options. Go around the corner to Capt. Tony's Saloon, on the spot of the original Sloppy Joe's It's much more exciting!

headline: Go for the entertainment, not the food
content: Came here based on friends recommendations and because this place is Key West. Sloppy joe sandwiches were average. Entertainment was very good. One of the guys is a Cleveland native and living an hour from Cleveland we laughed at everything he talked or sang about...More

headline: Trip to KW
content:
Go to KW without a stop at Sloppy Joe's?  Sure, the only thing you'd miss is the good music/entertainment.  A historic site due to past customers, but today it really is just another crowded, overpriced bar with rude, obnoxious customers.

The walk down Duvall is...More

headline: Must go!
content: Really good food, non-inflated prices with great service and atmosphere.  Fun was had by all that entered - young and old alike! Lunch for 3 was $26.00 and the service was superb.

headline: Crowded place with overpriced drinks
