Great fun, food, music and drinks that are worth it!
Our 4th visit to Key West & Keys wouldn't be complete without a visit to Sloppy Joe's.  Love this place, live music is great any time of the day!

headline: It's a bar...but the food is good!
content: This is the quintessential bar, dirty, smelly, not so great live entertainment.  But the Sloppy Joe and the pulled pork sandwich were surprisingly good.  And the onion rings were fab.

headline: Great Pulled Pork sandwiches
content:
Delicious sandwich at a reasonable price.  Service was fast and waiters were very pleasant.

There was a band setting up their equipment when we were about to leave.  We did not stick around long enough to hear them.

I would definitely return to this establishment...More

headline: its sloppy
content: It was our first place to eat and what do you get? A SLOOPY JOE!! This was the best Joe we ever had, the sloppy Joe on fries with cheese is a meal itself.

headline: This Place Was Hopping On A Sunday Night!  Fun Place To Eat.
content: Heard the live music and sign to "sit anywhere" & knew this was the place to go.  Neat selection of frozen drinks.....try the frozen pain in the a_ _it was great.  Ate an original sloppy joe sandwich and tortilla chips with black bean sauce...... it...More

headline: Sloppy Joe's Nachos
content: This was a great stop, live music and not sure what to order, so the bartender said we would not be sorry with the Sloppy Joe's nachos plate.  She was right and it was awesome and a lot of it for the two of us.

headline: Fun place.
content: Went for the Poker run, had lots of fun. Best  sloppy joes around and good music and drinks.  Lively crowd.  It's always fun to stop here.

headline: Showing friends good time
content: Our friends have never been to KW and wanted to go to Sloppy Joe's. We got right in as it was an off wknd, got seated and had the most upbeat friendly server. She told us about the area, joked, took pics for us and...More

headline: Fun Times!!
content: Great food!! Fun atmosphere!! Friendly staff. Definitely a place you must visit when in Key West!! Love it!!!

headline: Good fun, and busy!
content: A must do in Key West... We had a drink here and listened to the live music which was quite good... Its essentially just another American bar, but felt good being able to say we went there and bought the (expensive teeshirt!)

headline: Fun Place
content: A fun place you should go if visiting Key West. The staff is really nice and a fun place! The food was good nothing amazing but you really go for the atmosphere of the place. They have live cameras outside and inside so your family...More

headline: Staple stop for Key West trip
content:
I went, got the t-shirt, checked the box.

You can't go to Key West w/o going to Sloppy Joe's.  

It's a bar, just kind of a regular bar w/ the usual bar stuff.

Fun time, must-do activity.

headline: Fun!!!
content: Good food, good prices and live music! It is a very "happening" place and really gets going after the dinner hour. Friendly staff and fun atmosphere

headline: SLOPPY JOES IS FUN!!!
content: sloppy joes is fun and lots of nice people but kind of dirty and lots of loud music thats wasn't that nice but the drinks and people made it a fun time will go again!!!

headline: Just a so so restaurant
content: Just went there this past week. It's fine if you're into loud music and drinking. They make you move from your table at 9:30 if you are sitting up front near what must be their dance floor. No one came up to seat us so...More

headline: Super Awesome!!! A must see.......
content: The food here is average, but the drinks are delicious. Generous 20% pour. And the entertainment is fantastic!! We really loved the band called 12 Sharp. If they are playing, you gotta go.

headline: Atmosphere was terrific
content: Stopped in after seeing the Hemingway House and had to go back several times.  Live music in the afternoon, good drinks and an original sloppy joe sandwich - all great!

headline: You can't just walk on by...stop in!
content: Hit Key West as a stop off on our cruise.  You cannot walk past Sloppy Joe's without stopping in.  We were there around lunchtime.  They do make a good drink no matter what you get!  I was a bit hungry and had trouble deciding on...More

headline: Great bar atmosphere
content: Great place to learn about early Key West. Food fairly good and priced accordingly. Quick service and friendly staff. Singer was entertaining.

headline: Quite an experience!
content: We stopped on our last night in Key West and truly got the taste of the local flavor along with the tourists having a blast. Bartenders were attentive and made a very GOOD drink! Music and the cover band were alot of fun.

headline: A Key West Staple
content: A local and tourist favorite.  Not the best food in town, but you can't beat the great bands and strong drinks!

headline: food was not good
content: food was not good service was even worse when i go back i will be skippin by this place nice thing was guy playing oldies on piano

headline: Cool bar with Pittsburgh workers!
content: Great bar with good drinks and like always there seems to be people from Pittsburgh working. Great place and great service!

headline: Lots of liquor in them drinks
content: Love the live bands and the people there just dancing, drinking and generally not giving an eff who is watching.

headline: Best Bartenders in Key West
content: Had absolutely the best time in Key West thanks to Tropical Storm Isaac which forced us to hang out all day and all night in the bars!!   Rated #1 is Sloppy Joes!!  Bands were awesome, better than any other location in Key West, and the...More

headline: Great hang out
content: This place was great. They had fabulous live music the 3 night's we went-even on weeknights. By far it was the best live music in Key West. They also had the best buffalo wrap we've ever had and the same goes for the pina coladas...More

headline: Fun place!
content: The band playing (a family with a female lead vocal) was AMAZING! Fantastic service, and great drinks! We ordered wings, and fries and they were good! Fun place to hang out!

headline: Must go
content: If you go to key west, you have to go to Sloppy Joes.  The atmosphere is unrivaled. The Doerkel  family is one of the most entertaining and talented acts I have ever seen on the island.

headline: Our Lunchtime Experience was Good
content: What do you expect from such a bar? Yes it's  packed &noisy. We went at lunchtime and sat at the bar sevice was prompt for drinks and food. Both were perfectly acceptable, and got a good line of chat from the bar 'maid' who had...More

headline: Fun place to see a band!
content: We went for happy hour and there was a strange band playing - it was a family, so mostly kids.  It was a little bizarre (esp since immediately upon walking in I saw a server who was possible going to give birth at any minute,...More

headline: Food In A  Paper Lined Basket
content: My wife and I have always enjoyed Sloppy Joe's in Key West that is in the heart of the action there at the corner of Duval St and Greene St. Especially the live music bands that are always excellent. The service is good and the...More

headline: Our favorite bar in Key West
content: Great food, Great drinks, Great prices, Great entertainment and Great staff. What more could you ask for?

headline: Fun and good food
content:
I don't like sloppy joes because I tasted them in grade school(gross)
As a grown up I gave sloppy joe a second chance and I wasn't disappointed, nothing like grade schools sweet greasy taste. This sloppy joe was hot and delious ! The French fries...More

headline: Go early
content: Always go early so its not crowded and noisey. But don't miss a margarita and a full moon burger.  People are great there  everytime.

headline: Loud and Fun
content: Live music and my best mojito in Key West... however, when the cruise ships were in, it was waayyyyy crowded. Great for people watching. Pretty hot in early July.

headline: Great fun but not so authentic
content: Make no mistake, this is a fun bar.  Good drinks, surprisingly decent food and tons of live entertainment - you can spend a long time here.  One surprise on my last visit though...  This place became a destination based on it's legacy of being one...More

headline: Amazing place
content:
Stopped in for a daiquiri and we never came out that day , the place just buzzes with a vibe you can't explain
Servers are superb drinks serves quickly food portion just a little too big 
Live bands on stage excellent joint to cool off...More

headline: Excellent atmosphere a must for an evening of great entertainment
content: What can I say apart from a must for a night out in key west.  Great atmosphere, music, and staff always happy to help. The place to be on duval street......

headline: A classic
content: Good drinks, good live band, what else you need? This place os just fun.. Not pretentious at all, come as you are an prepare to have a good time

headline: Lived Here in the Evenings!
content: We spent every night at Sloppy Joe's enjoying the live entertainment (it was fantastic) and company.  The servers got to know us, and were a lot of fun to deal with!  I would go back over and over.

headline: This is where Key West is at.
content: Good food, entertainment and a mixture of boat people (cruise style) local and travelers.  It is what it is.

headline: Great Fish Tacos
content: We love Sloppy Joe's! My favorite fish tacos in Key West. Stop in to hear the Doerfells, they're amazing!

headline: A must stop..
content: This is exactly what I expected of Key West casual dinning.  The food and atmosphere were great.   Thanks!

headline: Old Key West Charm
content: Breezes floating through as one hears the occasional sound of glasses clinking and raucous laughter from the patrons.  The Sloppy Joe was fabulous as was the plate-sized "side salad".  One could just picture Hemingway sidled up to the bar alongside his cronies sharing shots of...More

headline: Must go
content: Sloppy Joe's was a blast. It was packed and fun. There is live entertainment and is a great place to people watch.

headline: Old school rock
content:
Come on,what can I say? This bar is a legend on Duval. I believe they have been in service for 75 years...
They serve good food and drinks and the best part,kick butt live music.
Don't miss Sloppy Joe's and get a shirt from their...More

headline: Don't miss this bar!
content: Travelled all the way down to Key West for one thing! To have a cold beer or two in Sloppy Joes. Have watched the on stage entertainment on the Internet for the past 12-15 years since webcams became more well known, and Sloppy Joes did...More

headline: Another dining icon.
content: Loud and crowded, but worth the trip. Close enough to Mallory Square. Wings were good, but boneless wings better. Plenty of history.

headline: A Must Stop in KW!
content: While bar hopping in Key West, we "hopped" into Sloppy Joe's! We were a little hungry, though not famished, so we split the Sloppy Joe Pizza and we each had a Sloppy Rita. It WAS the best margarita in KW (I had many : ))....More

headline: Great Food!!!
content: Oh my goodness! If you like Sloppy Joe's this is the place to go!!! Their Sloppy Joe's are super flavorful and of course they have great drinks and the entertainment was great too!

headline: Satisfaction Guaranteed!
content: We just ate lunch here today and had a very nice waitress that was very attentive and made sure my drink was never empty, which was good because we had some of the spicier items on the menu! the food was super delicious! I wish...More

headline: Great food, great music
content: I go just for the Sloppy Joe's!  Food is typical bar food, but it's really good.  Everyone just has a good time.  I've always had a good time watching the different bands that come to play.  Live music is always good.  Service is great!  Great...More

headline: Just for new tourist
content: Although we always stop here for one drink when in Key West, it is not our favorite.  Usually noisey and crowded and food and just okay.  This is just a very touristy location.

headline: Fun Time, Average Food
content: We stopped at Sloppu Joes for the obvious reason and it was packed inside.  We did find a table for two without wait though.  The drinks are a little pricey if you plan on staying for the entire performance of whatever band/act is playing.  The...More

headline: Went for a snack and a drink, stayed all evening!
content: We loved Sloppy Joe's!  First of all the atmosphere was fun. It was crowded but didn't seem too bad because of the laout. We were able to get two adjacent tables for our party of eleven..no small feat in that area. We ordered from the...More

headline: Lunch & enjoyed band.
content: Had sampler platter so we could try conch fritters.  Will leave those for the KW folks.  The wings, onion rings & cheese sticks were just normal, but we enjoyed the band that was a family of 10 or so.  Thought they did a great job...More

headline: Over Rated
content:
Before heading to Key West, I had at least 4 co-workers recommend this place.  The atmosphere was nice and so was the live music.  I could appreciate leaving a place like this and not smelling like smoke- which was a huge plus.  

Downside:  I ordered...More

headline: good fun
content: great food and music. They had a band which included brothers and sisters playing different instruments.

headline: webcam!
content: went for lunch as nighttime was too crazy with the kids.  had a good lunch and enjoyed the atmosphere.  singer on stage for lunch. . noticed webcam, called friends at home and went on stage so they could see the fun!

headline: Fun and to be expected.
content: Good fun crowd and music.  Its a typical drinking bar with live music, drinks and food.  Casual with families allowed during the day but 21 and over after dark when the real partying begins.

headline: Great fish n chips in a cool place
content:
While staying in Marathon we decided to take a day trip to Key West. After brousing some of the many t-shirt shops we decided to get some lunch and chose to go to Sloppy Joe's. 

We were delighted to find that even tough all the...More

headline: We thought it was over-rated....
content: We went just to say we went but the bartender he kinda had an attitude with us, and we just did not leave impressed.  The live music was great but the service could have been better and it is just way too overpriced for what...More

headline: Check it out.
content:
We were told this is for sure a place you have to go. And you should. We went around 2pm and it was packed. 
Its a cool place with live music. Then at night it gets pumpin, live band and the tables are pushed away....More

headline: Over priced
content: We went to sloppy joes after hearing of history at Hemingway house. What a disappointment. We basicaally had sandwiches and four drinks and it was over $100. Go for drinks and skip the food.

headline: pleasant
content: great atmosphere, good music, spcious, flexible (you seat yourself) yet great service as soon as you get a seat, awesome food and drinks, deserves a second visit.

headline: Fun fun fun
content: Had a great time at Sloppy Joe's. Drinks were good and our bartender Vikki was fantastic. Music is also great there and they do let you bring kids in there until 9:30. Perfect!!!

headline: A MUST DO!
content: I have never went to Key West and not visited Sloppy Joes!  It is the "cheers" of Key West!  Great food and even better drinks!  This trip it started to storm so we took cover in Joes until it passed... They made sure to get...More

headline: Decent Atmosphere
content: Daughter from the Navy picked this one based on some friend's reviews.  It was a decent atmosphere-it's a bar with decent live music.  Food was just average, I had the chicken fajita wrap which was fabulous, husband had the fish sandwich-very thin fillets-little disappointed, son...More

headline: Papa Hemingway Look-A-Like Contest
content: I was at Sloppy Joe's for a specific purpose... to witness the Papa Hemingway Look-A-Like contest.  The bar was packed with over 500 people, 150 of which looked like Hemingway.  It was a surreal experience unlike any other.  I can't tell you what the drinks...More

headline: Nice experience, good sloppy joes.
content: I thought we couldn't leave Key West without trying Sloppy Joe's.  It was quite an experience. The music was a little loud for conversation, but was pretty good for a place with no cover charge.  I had the sloppy joe and sloppy Rita, son had...More

headline: Must Visit Landmark
content: This place is just plain funny. It's fun, loud and definitely a pop in, cut a rug and give the security guard who stands poker faced watching everyone dance a shake, shake, shake, a salute and off you go. I didn't eat at Sloppys... Just...More

headline: Great bar!!
content: I loved the live band. I am usually not a fan of cover bands, but they were really good.  They played current music as well as the older hits.  Good times!!

headline: A classic
content: A place to grab a drink and a snack while "people watching"... noisy place with a lot of character... and fun

headline: Classic bar with great food
content: Setting aside the history - the food is great. The Sloppy Joes are the way to go!  Prices are high, but you are on Duval in Key West, so...what do you expect?

headline: You have to go once while you are in Key West....
content: OK...drinks are average, food was not an option with the crowd size, the live band was awesome, the crowd was huge, loud and fun.  Would I do it again?  Probably only with someone who had never been.  Am I glad I went?  Yep!  Had a...More

headline: It was OK
content: Stopped in on a rainy day.  It was crowded (expected as it's very touristy) The food was by just OK nothing to write home about. Nothing going on on stage but it was an early lunch. Would probably go back because, well it's Sloppy Joe's....More

headline: Fun environment, okay service
content: Live music was fun, the original sloppy joe was FANTASTIC, but the service was not the best. It was also kind of hard to find seating.

headline: Great live music at this famous bar
content: Hemingway reportedly spent many hours at this bar. Still is very popular.  Good location.  Great live musicians play here too.

headline: Sloppy Joe's restaurant
content:
Liked:  Live music, great food, good prices and portions, etc.
great service, fun atmosphere.
Disliked:  Limited seating, crowded, maybe too loud for some.

headline: Good music, bad food
content: The music and energy of the place was great. The live act had the place singing along and cheering at the end of each song.However the food was horrendous. My son and I both only took a few bites and threw a napkin over the...More

headline: Awesome
content: The drinks were great, service was great despite the place being packed. The sloppy joe was the best I ever had, I will never be able to eat a regular sloppy joe ever again. It was soooo good

headline: Drink and fun not for food
content: typical bar food way over priced. other than that it was great! entertainment was awesome! anything you want to drink was there!

headline: You only go here because you have to
content: Yep, I said it.  The ONLY reason to go here is because you HAVE to be able to say "Oh yeah, we hit Sloppy Joe's".  The drinks are expensive, and not special.  The food is "eh", it's way crowded, and god forbid you can't handle...More

headline: A hand-slappin', finger lickin' good time in the Keys!
content: So...no sloppy Joe that I have had (or ever will have) can compare to the deliciousness of a sandwich from Sloppy Joe's, Key West.  We stumbled upon this gem on Duval Street, and the whole family had a blast!  We coincidentally got a "front row"...More

headline: Tourist trap at its worst
content: I have no idea why anyone would go back to eat at Sloppy Joe's after eating some of the worst food I had on a recent trip to Key West. Even by bar food standards, what they serve at Sloppy Joe's is terrible. Yes, the...More

headline: Good Food
content: We ate lunch at Sloppy Joe's and my son had a chicken wrap that was huge and really good.  It is rather loud in the place, but if you sit near the door the volume of the music is tolerable.

headline: Good margarita, good service
content: Paula is great!!  Nice laid back vibe here, even when it gets loud it's still pretty chill.

headline: Best Sloppy Joe sandwich EVER!
content: Be aware that this place is crowded and you have to grab a table where ever you can!  It was busy but we went twice and were able to get a table pretty quickly.  I ordered the Sloppy Joe Sandwich the first time and hubby...More

headline: A "Must See' When You Are In Key West
content: Just got back form a week in Key West.  Sloppy Joe's is an excellent place for live music, food, and drink.  Make sure you get the nacho and chicken wings.

headline: Very key west.:-)
content:
Went in because I was hot and dying from the heat while the kids were shopping, got a souvenir cup of "Pain in the A**" which was premade in a collada machine.
So it wasn't very strong.
It was quite tasty and hit the spot...More

headline: Good food and drinks!
content: We tried the famous Sloppy Joe sandwich and the sloppy joe quesadilla which were both great! Good musicians playing throughout the day. Nice, casual spot for drinks/food/people watching!

headline: Awesome lunch with entertainment!
content: We began our day in Key West at Sloppy Joe's for lunch and found that the food was great, the service was great and we even got live entertainment! Loved the fish tacos, but others in our party really enjoyed the burger and of course...More

headline: Key West history
content: Just have to go to this place if not just for the history. The only problem is that this is one of the busiest bars

headline: It's a tradition
content: This place is always busy, and it is a bit of a tourist trap, but the music is usually good and the pulled pork sandwich is the best I've ever had.  I don't know why I like it so much, but I do.  Try the...More

headline: nice place but crowded
content: We went because it is a must visit place in KW.  We didn't stay because it was so busy.  Couldn't get a seat.  We stayed for awhile and listened to the live music.  Great band playing.  great atmosphere

headline: Great time and good food!
content: Had a great time watching a hilarious Pete and Wayne show.  It was gut busting laughter.  Went in the afternoon and had a few beers and figured the lunch would be average but it ended up being the best meal I ate the whole week,...More

headline: Sloppy Joe
content: Stop in every year to get a sloppy joe sandwich ! They never disappoint !

headline: Cruise Ship spot
content: Too many cruise ship patrons.  Too many people and music was impossible to hear.

headline: A Key West must!
content: Sloppy Joes is a fun place with good food, good service and live entertainment. It can get loud depending on the music style of the band.

headline: Its a must in key west!
content:
Always love a few beers in the afternoon here,busy busy busy and the atmosphere is great.
Quick service generally and the decor takes you back to the days of Ernest Hemingway.Food is good too.
Catch live music all day,love the place.

headline: Sloppy Joes is Key west
content:
The food is typical American from hamburgers to fish tacos the live music and people watching is great check out
there live cam on the Internet

headline: Great Sloppy Joe....
content:
A Key West tradition. Live music always seems to be playing here.
It was not super crowded when we went in the afternoon.
Great Sloppy Joe Sandwich, good place to stop for food and music.

headline: Wild night in Key West
content: Sloppy Joe's is for when you want to have a wild time and a hangover next morning. Fairly cheap drinks, food okay but who cares. Open till 4:00AM or later. Music is loud (live Bands). Cool old time atmosphere. Definatly going back next time but...More

headline: Fun Place and Good Food
content: My family and friends ended up in this restaurant, by chance, to step out of the torrential rain.  We got a table right in front of the stage and enjoyed a show by Pete and Wayne.  Those guys are fantastic.   Their songs are hilarious, but...More

headline: place to party
content: never had so much fun every night in the same bar..........this is a one thing you must do before you die party town............will be back in two years for my birthday for sure

headline: Sloppy Joe's - Don't miss it!
content: Key West classic... Try the sloppy joe, it's delicious.

headline: The best atmosphere
content: Great fish taco the best in town and hhhmmm the sloppy joe's sooooo good! The atmosphere is so much fun, a must go to.

headline: Sloppy Rita!
content: Margaritas were sooooooo good.  Fun place to hang out.  We could have stayed here all day.

headline: Go!
content: Food was delicious!  Reasonably priced and large portions!  Largest draft beer, 4 oz. larger, we found so far, for the same money else where!   We ordered a variety of meals, all were delicious,especially the sloppy joes!

headline: Exceeded Expectations
content: During our trip to Key West my wife kept saying that she wanted to go to Sloppy Joe's because "everyone says we have to go there"... I am not one for the "you have to go" type places. However, on our last day I conceded....More

headline: A must-stop for us
content: A Key West Landmark.  We had to give it a try.  The Sloppy Joe (what else would we have?) was actually pretty good.   It's convenient to the 'downtown' area.

headline: Fun
content: On our recent cruise stop in Key West, despite pouring rain, we braved a walking tour of flooded Duvall Street,  To escape the rain, we ducked into Sloppy Joe's and were so glad we did. The place was packed but we found a table near...More

headline: Great night out!
content:
this place gets crowded so get there early. the music was great
the food was great, the crowd of people so nice took our picture and we took there's. they had 2 differrent bands play the best was from Baton Rouge La. A fun place...More

headline: Sloppy Joe's
content: Good bar food.  Entertainment was superb.  Would definitely return there for the entertainment.

headline: Sloppy joe' s Sandiwich!
content: 1 of the best sandiwich in Key West. Super rico, good flavor, and yummy. The band is super cool & fun, so much talent in those kids. Sloppy Joe's = Key West.

headline: Worth it!
content: We went to Sloppy Joe's on our first night in town.  It was loud and crowded, but they had a good band playing.  We ended up going to a bar in a back room where it was quieter so we could catch up with friends...More

headline: Typical tourist restaurant
content: Food was average.  Drinks were too strong, but had live music and a festive atmosphere.

headline: Ya gotta get a shirt
content: Some places ya just have to go to...forget the food review, just grab a brew. Be a tourist, grab some friends and get the must-have t-shirt and can koozie...enjoy.

headline: Fun
content: Food was nothing special.  But, the live music was fun.  After a few drinks it's all about tr fun.  Check this out it is iconic!  Great live music I could not help but humm along.

headline: Classical Key West Experience
content: When in Key West you have to stop here for a Sloppy Rita (margarita), Sloppy Joe sandwich, listen to a little music and soak in the classical Key West experience.  This is best for adults and not so good for kids.  I love to sit...More

headline: Fun!
content: At first we thought to avoid the "Tourist Trap" but then decide to go in after all. We had a great time, a great bar tender and surprisingly good food (Taco Salad - HUGE). So go check it out!

headline: Awesome!
content: Live music. Laid back. Friendly service. Awesome awesome sloppy joe sandwiches!

headline: Fun place to eat
content: The food here was pretty good.  You are paying for the atmosphere of live singers and open walls to the street.  The service here isn't great, so if you need something, get it while you see your waiter/waitress because you may only see them once...More

headline: Should my family eat here?
content: Stopped here for lunch with my wife and three teenage children. It's seat yourself, so you just roam into the restaurant and find an empty table or hover over someone who looks like they are almost ready to leave. Service is quick enough that there...More

headline: Good food in a fun atmosphere....
content: This is iconic Key West. The food is good, not great. The service is friendly, the drinks are strong, the service is friendly, and the music makes the whole experience worth while. The decor is nice and it is a great way to spend the...More

headline: Fun times!
content: Came here to try the best sloppy Joes and got so much more in return. Great food, great drinks, great music, overall a cool place to hang out.

headline: What else do I have to say, it's Sloppy Joe's!
content: The name of the place says it all. Iconic of Key West, SJ's is a place you have to experience before you leave Key West. They make their drinks strong, wa-hoo!

headline: Good Lunch Spot
content: The history of this place speaks for itself.  Great lunch spot as long as there are not too many cruise ships in port.

headline: A place to go if you want to say you've been to Sloppy Joes!
content: Sloppy Joe's is fun, crowded, and has a great bar scene! There was live music which was fun as well. In our opinion, food was nothing to rave about- kind of like eating at Applebees or Chili's. Fun, but not outstanding! Our server did her...More

headline: Fun Place to Eat
content: We had great food and it was a fun atmosphere! The live band was good. It was just so crowded it was hard to catch the waitress when you needed her.

headline: A MUST STOP when in KW
content: Ya...its a tourist trap.  Yup....it's full of tourists from the cruise ships.  So the drinks are overpriced.  But it's SLOPPY JOE'S.  The institution of KW.  A trip to KW is not complete without a cold one at this place.  Skip the food; it's not what...More

headline: Excellent food, great music and atmosphere!
content: Not only was Sloppy Joe's delicious, but the service was AWESOME! The musician was great too! I would recommend tho sas a must see, for anyone visiting Key West! We went at lunch time, we had our daughter (12) with us, and it was great!...More

headline: You Have to Go!
content: A trip to Key West simply isn't complete without going to Sloppy Joe's.  You have to go.  It's a fun place to drop in for a drink or hang out all night.  There is usually good music, too!

headline: Waste of time!
content: I'm sorry we tried really hard to like the place but just couldn't! It was awful! The bad all were old enough for hair pieces and seemed to be pretty drunk themselves, the drinks were watered down, I got the fish tacos and the fish...More

headline: Ehhh
content: Drinks are over priced, service is slow (mostly because it is always packed!!) Band is always pretty good and a great location but i feel  the price is not worth it...at all

headline: Awesome bar!
content: Well, what can you say about this place... Yes, it's a bit of a tourist trap ( in a nice way though). The bar is open sided, cool, friendly, great for meeting folks and they have some great live bands too. Can't wait to come...More

headline: A landmark worth stopping in.
content: Good music, often jam packed but the drinks are good and so is the service.

headline: Papa's favorite hangout!
content: Very loud and touristy bar, but a must see when in Key West. Ernest Hemmingway is supposed to have written a couple of his famous books at a corner table in this bar. They have his pictures everywhere and tee shirts abound. Pricey but worth...More

headline: Good atmosphere, HORRIBLE SERVICE
content: Everytime my husband and I go to key west we have to go to Sloppy Joes, a tradition..and always is great ..this last time we went June 16, 2012 for some reason service was horrible ..the attitude, ..Sloppy Ritas ( a typical drink from them...More

headline: Great Beet Selection
content: If you're tired of the same old beers served at every bar, then go to Sloppy Joe's, which has a decent draft selection (ie. Dogfish 60 Min. IPA).  Plenty of places to sit, the place is huge, with high ceilings and nice artwork and photographs...More

headline: nice atmosphere
content: Always a good crowd, music is hit or miss. went there a couple times. The service was great just expected a little more from Sloppy Joes. its kinda the place you always hear about.

headline: Tourist trap of all tourist traps
content: The place is cool to look at but thats about it.They sell their selves with alot of name dropping(like all of key west) you know like Ernest HEMMINGWAY drank at that table and Harry Truman vommited in our bathroom one evening type stories.We stopped in...More

headline: An Icon
content: We liked the craft brews available in the back of the saloon, Loved the music..and thought the food was OK too.  Don't miss this cool experience.

headline: Sloppy Joe‚Äôs‚Ä¶infamous
content: Well, Sloppy Joe‚Äôs is a loud, profane and alcohol swilling place.  If you are looking for a quiet place with piano music and a glass of chardonnay and nothing to shock your sensibilities stay away!  If you are looking to let your hair down and...More

headline: Fun
content:
Had a quick lunch here. Conch Fritters were average and so were the Arepas. Good non-alcoholic strawberry daq.  
But: Great Live Music!

headline: A Staple of Key West
content: We dropped by for a beer and an appetizer - both were delicious! There was good live music, and the bartender was very friendly. We were there fairly early in the evening, so the crowd was pretty tame. Like most of the other bars on...More

headline: Neat environment, that's it
content: I ordered a mojito, and it was served with ROTTEN mint leaves. Floating brown mush was floating atop the beverage I didn't drink. The waitress brought me another, but that was first impression:-(

headline: Over rated
content: Definitely a happening place but the service was slow and the server was rude.

headline: Over-rated....
content: Having done a bit of research on bars in Key West before our first trip there we established that Sloppy Joe's was a must go! The bar is always jam packed so you are lucky to find a seat, theres also very little standing space......More

headline: Good bar food
content: Everyone told us we had to go here, but we weren't that impressed.  Food was okay and service was only okay.

headline: This a must do in Key West
content: We stopped in after walking Duvall st and what a cool place this is.   We had drinks and enjoyed the atmosphere.....wish we could have stayed longer.

headline: If you want a bar this is a good one.
content: If your looking for some bar food and drinks with some live music you have found the place! Food was good, drinks were good but if your looking for a relaxed dinner this is not the place. Everyone visiting key west should stop in at...More

headline: Great Time
content: During our week-long visit we spent at least part of every evening at Sloppy Joe's, which was by far the best bar we visited in Key West. Lots of history and a very friendly staff, especially Luisa, who took great care of us every time...More

headline: drinks only
content: had mojitos. they were ok. they give you double shots when you order a shot. which is nice if you want to get wasted fast lol

headline: Great atmosphere - location
content: Service great.  Animal friendly as we were allowed to bring in small dog.  Good food, great location, open to the street.

headline: great food and good band
content: We had a late lunch/early dinner at Sloppy Joe's. of course my husband got the sloppy joe and i got the chicken sandwich, both were great choices. "zac from pittsburgh" was the singer, he was pretty darn good and funny. highly recommend!

headline: food not so good
content: ok we went here because it just seemed like the thing to do after all this is a historical sight for key west good live entertainment, crowded, hot ,food not very good but they do have a live web cam out side so you can...More

headline: Best of Key West
content: You just can't go wrong at Sloppy Joe's!  The music is always good, the people watching is always entertaining, service is good, just plain fun!  I usually like to go where the locals go and not patron the "tourist traps" but this is truly a...More

headline: A Key West Must!
content: Famous for it's name and history in Key West.  Sloppy Joe's atmostphere is fun, relaxed and the food is good and drinks plentiful.     Music is always great!  Loved the large stage for the bands and open airy seating.    Not to be missed when you visit...More

headline: Decent, but nothing special.
content: We went to the back bar because they had better beer back there.  The food was OK but not that great.  Much better options elsewhere in town.

headline: My burger was a hockey puck!
content: Two of us dined here one evening and needless to say we were incredibly disappointed.  The service was very, very slow, the waitress seemed to be stone or just completely disinterested in her guests and the food arrived cold and over cooked. Don't be tricked...More

headline: We liked it
content: Food was great, service was fast. Not the friendliest staff though. Live entertainment was good.

headline: Ok food...tap room was worth it
content: Hard to find any beer but bud, corona, miller, etc. in KW...but the tap room here had some good pale ales.  We were happy.  Food typical bar food, nothing special.

headline: sloppy Joe's
content: is a key west mus!t- great athmosphere there, great service. recommended:0)

headline: A Key West MUST
content: Sloppy Joe's history and atmosphere are enough for any visitor to the area to head over. Service is very quick, even when packed in (which it always is). It is a very casual atmosphere where customers can seat themselves wherever they please. The food is...More

headline: Always something going on
content: There's live music from noon most days. And you have the the Sloppy Joe sandwich. The conch fritters are good too. Service is reliable. This place has been operating like a finely tuned machine since the days of Hemingway.

headline: Not Hemingway's Bar
content:
I refused to make a purchase after seeing this modernized tourist trap. Many believe Hemingway enjoyed Sloppy Joe's, and they really sell a load of T-shirts bearing his likeness.
He NEVER set foot in the place. His real hangout was Captain Tony's 1 block away...More

headline: Great Bar
content: No wonder Hemingway liked it! Good music and the drinks were great and lunch (crabcake sandwhich and taco salad) was really yummy. Dont miss it.

headline: A must when visiting Key West
content: Good food and drinks, good entertainment, fun atmosphere - what more could you want - You won't be disappointed!

headline: The Absolute Must Go TO Key West bar!
content: Been going here since 1969 and it still has the Real Key West Ambiance to it.  Great Hamburgers, Awesome Sloppy Joes, Great music and tourists and locals mix freely and happily.

headline: Key West must stop
content: One of the most famous places in Key West and definitely worth a visit. I had no idea what a Sloppy Joe was as I am from the UK. for those of you from outside the states it is basically bolognaise in a bun. However...More

headline: THIS PLACE ROCKS!!!
content:
What would a trip to Key West be without a stop at Sloppy Joes ??? Answer: a wasted trip to the Keys!!! Food was Great.. friendly staff, Constant Live entertainment, great drinks.. great atmosphere with character!!!  
We stopped in twice.. just couldnt get enough!!
And...More

headline: Bad service, unclean and horrible atmosphere
content: For the kids 25 and under. very noisy, bad waiting staff and had to leave when the waitress didn;t come back for our order after a half hour

headline: Love this place!
content: Good food, good drink and good music.  We always enjoy going here.  The last time - the guy singing did a few Dylan songs and it was better than Dylan.  Sorry Dylan fans.

headline: Nice atmosphere...
content: Good vibes, drinks OK and loved my T-shirt. Didn't eat but food surely looked apetizing on people's tables. Will try next time.

headline: Great atmosphere
content: Great Bank, fun place to people watch. Located right in the heart of all the action.  Must see stop.

headline: Best Ever
content: Sloppy Joe's is a must in Key West. The decor, ambiance and food are divine. The sloppy's are very large for a meal and the best ever. There is a live band there in the late afternoon and into the night and it is in...More

headline: Awesome. Awesome. Awesome
content: When we ate there the atmosphere was just awesome, the place was packed and the entertainment made it even more fun.  The "fish tacos" here were excellent, and while "Sloppy Joe Pizza" may seem weird, it works in a strange way.  Come here, eat, have...More

headline: Disappointing
content: I'd always heard people say how much they love Sloppy Joes, but we were very disappointed. It wasn't all that hard to get to the bar, but the service was terrible and the drinks were over priced and not very good. The band wasn't terrible,...More

headline: Sloppy Sloppy Joes
content: Delicious and sloppy Sloppy Joes and Sloppy Joes fries.  The band was very funny, not for younger kids; yet hilarious for adults!  Very popular spot so may have to wait for a table, just stand at the bar until you get a table or have...More

headline: Always fun
content: Loud! You definitely have to be in the mood to enjoy this place. Drinks were great but pricey. Bands were slammin!

headline: Fun place!  Great margaritas, quesadillas and music!  Service was always prompt and attentive.  A must when you visit Ke
content: It can get very loud so be prepared!  All part of the party atmosphere.

headline: Fun place for lunch
content: Had a burger and beer.  Band was fun and atmosphere was inviting.

headline: Try having just one Sloppy Joe... It's NOT possible!
content: I was in Key West in March 2006 and knew before getting there that I had to try Sloppy Joe's. The Sloppy Joe sandwich was SO good, I came back 2 additional times to eat it because I kept craving it! We also tried the...More

headline: Great live music!
content: They always have the best live music and it is always great people watching!

headline: Pete and Wayne and Great Food and Sloppy Ritas!
content: The biggest problem with Sloppy Ritas is they go down way too smooth!  We ate dinner there and it was good as always.  Plus we always try to catch Pete and Wayne's show, and they are hilarious!  Sloppy's is ALWAYS a Do-Over!

headline: Fun
content: Music was too loud (at 3 p.m.) but the drinks were good and the bartender was awesome and gave lots of good "locals" recommendations.

headline: Good old bar......
content: Stopped here for a snack as we were hungry after walking around. Great beer on draft, live music and good food.  Packed with people, lots of atmosphere and a great place to stop off for an hour or so.

headline: Fun place to eat
content:
Good food good band and a cute gift shop.
Try the onion rings.

headline: It is what it is
content: Loud cover band? Check. Multiple bars? Check. Crowds having a good time and not being bothered by much of anything? All of that check, check too. A standard in Key West from what our group was told. Fun band playing very current pop covers and...More

headline: Staff on safety patrol!
content: Super fun bar scene!  Our friends from DC happened to be playing there while we were staying...so cool.  My hubby got to shake his bum bum on stage and everything!  This is an anything-goes kind of place (evidenced by the fact that a woman heartily...More

headline: Filthy! Dirty!
content: This restaurant should be renamed Dirty & Sloppy Joe's! The sloppy fries were horrible. They had a sweet hamburg mixture over them that was just horrible!  The waitress was bothered to take our order and in a big hurry! The floors and the entire establishment...More

headline: Famous place to go once
content: This is a must see, just because of the history if anything. The live music is good, and the drinks were tasty...but expensive. The wait staff seemed to busy to really pay us much time, or conversation. It is worth maybe having a quick drink,...More

headline: "A Key West Tradition"
content: Cool bar. A must go if your ever in Key West. I had the sloppy joe sandwich and a side of conch fritters, a must if your ever there.

headline: Tourist trap but you go anyway.
content: This is a famous place in Key West and, as a tourist, you have to go to say that you went.  The Sloppy Joe sandwich is a must.  The rest of the food was really good, the atmosphere is true Key West, live music at...More

headline: Bar at it's best
content: Not to be missed!  You gotta stop in and have a mojito at Sloppy Joe's or you have not been to Key West!  Good live music and plenty of action!  We even saw some great salsa dancing!

headline: A Good Time Had By All
content: We stopped in at lunch and got one of the last available tables.  We ordered drinks and appetizers.  We had good service and good food.  They had a young man singing and playing guitar and he really knew his craft as well as knowing his...More

headline: The tastiest Sloppy Joe EVER!!! But expect loud music and smoke.
content: I love the food, but this is a bar and the music is always playing and it's quite loud. Unfortunately, there's no escaping it, or the cigarette smoke, no matter where you sit. Regardless, the food is incredibly tasty and worth at least one visit!

headline: Great time!!
content: We had dinner at Sloppy Joe's, there was live music and people dancing.  The food was good and atmosphere was awesome!!

headline: Surprisingly good food!
content: Black bean quesadillas with the BEST salsa! Great local band playing retro music like Ray Ragsdale (Stevens)!

headline: Entertainment better than food...
content: ...we had pizza, wings, wrap and original Sloppy Joe's sandwich, the food was OK, cold beer fine but the best part of the experience was the guy with guitar and his performance. Pleasant time altogether.

headline: Loud music and poor food
content: Not worth the visit and your money. It was impossible to have a conversation and the food was bad. I didnt eat half of waht i ordered.

headline: over-rated and crowded, always
content: Very loud, very crowded, especially if a band is playing.  Enjoy the atmosphere at Captain Tony's alot more.

headline: Fabulous restaurant
content: After the sunshine in Mallory square, I went for dinner to Sloppy Joe's. I really spent a nice moment. the food is good but you do not go there for the food but for the lively atmosphere and for listening the musician. You can understand...More

headline: Big Barn of a Bar
content: Piano player on a stage, pretty full, poor conch fritters. Beer's beer, tho a decent selection. Selection of Hemingway pix around, poorly maintained. His alpine skis are there too, oddly enough. Two mounts of big fish. Worth the stop after having visited the Hemingway house.

headline: A must in Key West
content: We had been told by friends who have been to Key West that Sloppy Joes is one if the best bars on Duvall St. There are many to pick from but this is history in Key West so I suggest you stop in even if...More

headline: Didn't visit the restaurant, but Joe's Tap Room left a lot to be desired...
content: The restaurant itself, I can't comment on, but since Sloppy Joe's Tap Room is connected to the restaurant, I can only comment on that. They advertise that they have a "variety of craft beers on tap" which was not the case. They had maybe 5...More

headline: Food and drinks are way overpriced
content: The atmosphere is great.  I love that there is a live band pretty much all the time.  But the food was so so and it was all extremely overpriced.

headline: Sloppy Joe's
content: A little expensive but we went for the drinks.  I had the Sloppy Rita which was very good and we shared a small pizza which was plenty for the two of us.  It was loud and crowded since two ships were in port that day...More

headline: The Place to Go in Key West
content: Sloppy Joe's is THE place to go in Key West for food & drinks.  We always stop here on our trips to Key West to check out the bands & get some drinks.  The Sloppy Rita is great.  It is typically crowded, but service is...More

headline: Just a great place to hang out!!!!!!
content: Fun crowd, great drinks and food!  There was a band from Tampa playing the evening we were there and they were just awesome! Didn't want to leave but all good things must come to an end :(

headline: The name says it all
content: Never carried for sloppy joes until I ate at Sloppy Joe's. It lives up to the name, and you have to try the sloppy joe's. Don't expect fine dining, but you will have a good time.

headline: It is what it is
content: Super loud and crowded!  The food was good, it came out fast and you should not expect anything more than what it is - a bar!

headline: Great bands
content:
fun place to have drinks and listen to music
they always have a great band

headline: Fun Bar
content: Really enjoyed the music and fun.  Food was good too.  Lots of friendly folks.

headline: Wow!
content: Friendly staff.  Great food.  Free entertainment.  Great and talented musicians.

headline: Love the atmosphere
content: While visiting Key West on a cruise, we stopped in Sloppy Joe's for one of their famous burgers. The place was packed but we found a table in the back. Our server was excellent.  The food was fast & very good. I would definitely go...More

headline: Great Atmosphere
content: Had the "Original" Sloppy Joe which was very good. Service was good and the pianist was excellent!

headline: Decent bar food
content: I don't think that the food is the prime reason people go to Sloppy Joes, but it's worth eating if you're there. It's not bad if you like dives and bar food.  I am a foodie, but I like going there and hanging out.  People...More

headline: Simple food - tastes good
content: Sloppy Joe's - on the main drag of Duval street.  Easy access and quite large so there is likely less of a wait.  The sloppy joe and the pulled pork are well worth the visit.

headline: Everything it's cracked up to be!
content: If it's your first time here like it was ours, don't even think about what to get. Get the Sloppy Joe. That's why I came, and I wasn't disappointed.  This isn't your school cafeteria fare. This is a work of art not unlike any master...More

headline: Great Time As Usual!
content:
The slogan "The Best Party In Town" still rings true. Especially for locals. Excellent music!

The last two nights my group had Jana and Lelani as servers. Service was friendly, quick and excellent as usual.

It has become the place for us to enjoy a...More

headline: Great time!!
content: Amazing live music, friendly staff, quick service... A must see stop for Key West....

headline: A Duval Street landmark
content: I only had beer at the bar, but if you're in Key West, Sloppy Joe's on Duval is part of the experience.  My boyfriend and I stopped in on Easter afternoon.  It was lively and busy, with very good live music. We would go back!

headline: Great KW Bar and Music
content: Sloppy Joe's is always a fun place.  Great drinks, bartenders and staff (particularly Andrea).  They have great music late night and Pete & Wayne in the early evening are the funniest song parody duo ever (R rated).  Food is not their thing, although the hot...More

headline: stopped in for a t shirt
content:
this is a very cool place, we had already eaten but did stop to buy a shirt
everything looked good

headline: Fun times!
content: Fun place with a lot of history.  A little pricey but they had great live music!

headline: Only average.... and could use updating.
content: We wanted to go to Sloppy Joe's because of all the hype of it being a "Key West tradition", but really, it was just average.  Way overcrowded, tables were small. Touristy feeling.  Could use updating.  The sloppy joe was good, as was the other food...More

headline: Bad service, dirty, but good music
content: We waited forever for a server to come to our table.  Once she took our order, the food was delivered before she ever came back with our drinks.  Another customer a few tables from us accidentally broke a bottle of beer under his table.  The...More

headline: Friendly staff
content: We took a day trip to Key West and stopped for lunch at Sloppy Joes.  We enjoyed the staff and the music at lunch.  We had to try conch fritters which we enjoyed as well as the sloppy ritas.  We also had the pulled pork...More

headline: Best Margaritas!!
content:
The margaritas here are outstanding. The best I've ever had!
We had the Sloppy Joe's for lunch. Very tasty and spicy!
Fun place to go and true Key West experience.

headline: History & the best pina colada ever
content: Having just left the Truman Whitehouse museum, we decided to pop into Sloppy Joe's. The staff behind the bar and on the floor were true professionals who knew their jobs well. The service was slower than a typical restaurant/bar but we didn't mind. The live...More

headline: avoid eating at sloppy joe's
content: just returned from a 3 day visit to Key West and had a great time and great meals such as Lattitudes and Salute;however was not happy with Sloppy Joe's-we ordered the nachos and conch fritters and neither were good. The chicken nachos was made with...More

headline: FUN!
content: We stopped in here to meet friends and have a few drinks. The band was FABULOUS, the place was rockin and the drinks were great...service was phenomenal. Don't miss it if you're in Key West.

headline: total tourist but so much fun!
content: live music; lots of good vibes and right on Duval- you need to visit Sloppy's when you go to the Key's!

headline: This place is pretty much a famous name- food is very average...
content: The sloppy joe quesadilla wasn't bad but every one else wasn't satisfied with their food- and none of them ordered anything with their famous sloppy joe mix in it...  It's just a tourist attraction really...  Service was decent though.

headline: Awesome!
content: What a great place!! Loved it! Such a great atmosphere. Also loved the wide variety in beer, very cool keep it up!

headline: Hemingway, it's still good and crazy - Excellent
content: I know all the reviews that this is a tourist trap bar, et al. Yes, it is because they all go there [the tourists] to see what's it‚Äôs like. In reality, it is good food, fast service, either good music with a singer, or bad...More

headline: Overhyped
content: This place was probably good in it's heyday but that time has long passed. Now it's a good place to stop just to say you've been there. The food is typical bar food and overpriced. At nights the bar is normally packed because they book...More

headline: Good eats
content: Enjoyed Sloppy Joe's so much I went back.  Love the atmosphere, staff, and food.  Plus they often have live entertainment in the evenings.

headline: Sloppy Joe's is well named.
content:
No utensils needed ever.
No plates needed ever.
Many napkins needed 
Smoking still allowed.
Food not bad but kinda greasy.
Live entertainment enjoyable.
Map needed to find washrooms.

headline: great place!!!!!
content: good food & price, live band & the staff is welcoming, service was great!!!!

headline: Great Bands and Entertainment
content:
This place is a lot of fun to have some drinks and listen to bands, which can also be very entertaining.  Not just a bunch of cover bands.  

Good mixed crowd of people just having fun.

headline: The Best bar on Duval St. in Key West!
content: Look , there's lots to do in Key West, but you and the Family have to stop by Sloppy Joe's for the best Sloopy Joe's you've ever tasted!!! The bell is always ringing. When I asked why, they told me it was because the servers...More

headline: It's just ok
content: I know this place has a lot of history in Key West but it really isn't that great.  $9 for a sandwich without a side order.  how crazy.  It took about 10 minutes before our waitress came to wait on us.

headline: The have-to-go spot!
content: Wonderful atmosphere and music!  Plus super cool tshirts.

headline: There is nothing Sloppy about this place!
content: What a great time, I would never go back to Key West with out going to Sloppy Joe's again.  Everyone was having fun dancing and loving the live music!  The food was excellent and the service could not be beat! Go you will enjoy it!

headline: Good food
content: Little pricy, busy and loud for the price. Ok if you are hungry.

headline: Everybody has to go to Sloppy Joe's
content: It's a Key West / Duval Street right of passage. Where the legendary Ernest Hemingway spent many hours while living in Key West. Continuous music throughout the day and evening.

headline: Fun!
content: Great place to stop for a beer.  Not sure if they have food.  We were on a bar crawl on Duval Street.  Busy place.

headline: Great bar, good music and drinks!
content: Stopped here for a drink....had some special rum runner with a floater....excellent.  I liked the music and fun atmosphere!

headline: Dinner Time
content: The drinks were awesome. The atmosphere was exciting! Everyone was very friendly!!

headline: History Is Alive at Slppy Joe's
content: Great entertainment, sandwiches and entertainment all day long. Can't miss it on Duval Street and check out the decor.

headline: Okay
content: This was on my partner's 'must do' list so we went for lunch. I had the Sloppy Rita and the Sloppy Joe. The margarita was good and I enjoyed it. The sloppy joe was good, but tasted exactly like the Manwich stuff you buy in...More

headline: Sloppy Joes!
content: Great  bar, great food!  Gotta have the Sloppy Joes!

headline: Fun place to stop in for lunch
content: We stopped in for lunch and it was a good atmosphere.  There was a local singer playing some Jimmy Buffet style music, which was nice. It was not packed and the service was excellent.  We had beers and salads. Yummy.

headline: Afternoon Bluegrass with a Rock'n'Roll Beat
content: We always enjoy the entertainment here, but when the Doerfels play we stay for hours.  This extremely talented family band will someday be famous.  We follow their website so we can catch them several times during our week in Key West.  Sloppy Joe's is a...More

headline: Crowded, but Worth the Wait
content: My husband and I just had a few hours to spend in Key West since we arrived on a Carnival Cruise ship.  We are so glad that we went to Sloppy Joe's.  It was definitely worth the wait to find a table.  There was live...More

headline: Fun bar
content: Good drinks and good food. Nice place to sit and have a beer.

headline: Have to do it once
content: The food was good, not too expensive, & the bar was fun! Great live music!!

headline: YUMMY!
content: The food was really good and the service was great.  We happen to go later in the afternoon on a Sunday so it was not at all crowded, like it usually appears.  We were REALLY hungry and the portions were large.

headline: Key west is great
content: Whilst your there you have to vist this venue! Great for entertainment

headline: way too crowded!
content: Wanted to have just a quick bite for lunch. Sign said "seat yourself", but couldnt find any empty seats. Looks like a popular stop for tourists off the cruise ships.

headline: Packed and Touristy
content: Packed and Touristy... ok, so is every other bar in KW.  But for some reason, I am just not as big of a fan of Sloppy Joe's.  When they have a good band, it obviously is a better place to hang.  It is one of...More

headline: interesting
content: It is an old bar with history. You have to visit at least once.

headline: i'm not as think as you drunk i am.....
content: where to begin.....actually, it should be where to end......if you're into having a good time, reasonably priced drinks, uninhibited fun, then this is the place for you..basically, beginning pretty much when the chickens start cackling, you can head for this bar...and if the chickens are...More

headline: Restaurant loud, tap room perfect!
content: We went in and a nice rum drink, it was very loud and the band was somewhat offensive but I guess that is what the place is about.  We were headed out when we saw the sign for Joe's tap room, we asked if they...More

headline: Best place for bands and good drinks
content: Key West has many, many bars with bands from which to choose. When I was last in Key West, I thought Sloppy Joe's would just be too commercial for me so I did not go. That was a mistake. We happily found a lot of...More

headline: This is one crazy bar/ restaurant!
content: They are located in the heart of Key West and in party central.  We had Sloppy Joes for lunch and they were really good.  The music was really good but LOUD!  The drinks were flowing non-stop.  Great place - sets the tone for Key West!

headline: Nice atmoshpere
content: Great Margarita's and met some really nice people vacationing there as well

headline: Nice Place to Eat and Drink
content: The service is GREAT! The food is average! We ate here to kind of "just say we did"... Its much better at night when the bands start!!

headline: Great Mojitos
content: Got to listen to live music as we sipped on some pretty tasty mojitos.  Very popular place - lucky to get a seat at the counter.

headline: Stopped for a drink
content: My husband is a Heminway fan so we had to stop at one of his favorite hang outs.  We only stopped for a drink to say we'd been there so it was fine.

headline: PARTY ATMOSPHERE-EVEN AT LUNCH TIME!
content: Everyone told us that we had to stop by Sloppy Joe's while in Key West.  If you are up for a party atmosphere, this is the place to go.  The place was crowded, even at lunch time, and everyone was really getting into the music....More

headline: Lively fun place. Excellent fish sandwich
content: Fun place to people watch and eat.  Live music pretty good. Sloppy Joe sandwich pretty good too.  Think it gets even more lively at night we did lunch.

headline: Tasty
content: One of 2 places that claims to be the originator of the sloppy joe sandwich (the 2 places are less than a block from each other). Live bands during the day, beer flows well and freely. The sloppy joe is sweet, went well with onion...More

headline: The famous Sloppy Joe's is a place you must stop by!
content: Always a party waiting to happen. Sloppy Joe's is one of the more famous bars in town. If you like a lively night life, you have to make this one of your stops. Start here if you want to try the Duval crawl! I only...More

headline: Music Anyone?
content: This bar had great live music and very loud. If you don't like loud music-stay away from this bar! Didn't eat, just had drinks.

headline: Great atmosphere
content: I loved this place, but it was for the atmosphere more than anything. It's full of character and characters. My husband had something to eat, I wasn't hungry and he enjoyed it but the entertainment and crowd were great fun - this was at lunchtime,...More

headline: Everyone must stop at Sloppy Joe's
content:
There are so many better places to eat in Key West - the food is really just average bar food - the entertainment was average Island cover music...
The drinks were better than average - 
and the service was extremely friendly, courteous and FAST...
the...More

headline: Smoking allowed! ; - (
content: You should be aware that smoking is allowed in the outside seating area.  Naturally we wanted to eat outside and watch the sunset but because of several people smoking, we were forced to go inside where smoking was not allowed.  Since we had our 10...More

headline: A Key West Must
content: We only went their once, but it was a lively, hopping location.  They had good performers, the drinks were very good.  The food as expected, mediocre.  Staff was different from other locations we visited, a nice change.

headline: Restaurant & Bar with party atmosphere
content: Had sloppy joe's since I was a kid.  Great to have an original finally.  Service was fast and friendly.  Adult at night - if you want to bring kids, suggest during day.

headline: Fun place to stop for a drink and get island flavor
content: Was crazy busy and a couple asked us if we wanted to share their table.  Just another fun thing that can happen in Key West.  Food was great and service top notch.

headline: Average
content: Nothing special. Typical bar food and over priced drinks. The service here though is some of the best I have¬†received¬†any where.

headline: Your typical bar with better food
content: We stopped at Sloppy Joe's for an early casual dinner. We both ordered the sloppy joe's because we had heard so much about them.  They were really nothing special or I guess it could be described as my husband put it, a glorified manwich.  This...More

headline: Better Than Expected. Full of Life and Entertainment
content: Enjoyed my light lunch and cold Draft with Super Waiters and Waitresses. Really an experience not to miss.

headline: Good Food, Decent Service...
content: a busy night in semi-high season...  took awhile to get served... waitress did a fine job, food came quickly...  fish tacos were really good...  wife had a sloppy joe sandwich.. entertainment for the night was strictly adult, and they told us that right up front......More

headline: fun
content: fun, entertaining and decent food and drink prices

headline: A must while in Key West
content: You can't visit Key West without stopping here for a bite to eat.  It is super casual and you find your own seat.  Sloppy Joe was okay, but the atmosphere was fun and they had entertainment as well.

headline: A trip to key west is never complete, without
content: slopped joe fries and conch fritters!!!  But, oh, I always eat so much I get ill!!  Live music is great - a must stop!

headline: Great Food, Great Scene - Absolutely Annoying/Offensive Music
content: As one does, I visited Sloppy Joe's on my first visit to Key West last weekend.  This famous venue is a classic.  The food is absolutely delicious, and served by very friendly wait staff.  The gift shop is great.  The actual layout of the bar...More

headline: Favorite hangout
content: We love Sloppy Joes! Pete and Wayne, The Benderz, The Juliano Bros Rock! We got to see Zac Brown on Feb. 8, when he sang a song with Wayne of Pete and Wayne. So cool!

headline: Always a party
content: This place seems to always be rocking in the evenings, good drinks and great bands. Get there early or you will be standing on the corner listening to the band. If you are in Key West its worth stopping by for a drink.

headline: Another Classic Key West Spot
content: Another place you must stop and at least have a drink on your bar hopping path through Key West. If you are going to go to the trouble of driving down to Key West, you must at least walk Duval street and have a drink...More

headline: we were told we had to visit....had a great time
content: we had a port of call on a cruise and we were told by a coworker we had to try it.  It was great.  Started with conch fritters (a key west tradition), I had the famous sloppy joe.  It was like a sloppy joe at...More

headline: good time and music after 1200am
content: great as part of a pub crawl had good time nice band fun staff great drinks where good

headline: Live entertainment, cold drinks and more....
content: Grab a drink and rest your feet, and continue exploring Duval Street....

headline: Good bar
content: Good music good drinks what more can you ask for? Good bartenders at that!

headline: A must seee if you go to Key West
content: If you are in Key West and you don't stop in at Sloppy Joe's you've really missed out.  One of the original bars there and a great location on Duval Street.  Lot of great live music every day!

headline: Pick your time
content: Depends what you are in for here.  Go early and it is more "classic" but still good.  Stay later and it shifts gears and get's its "party" on.  Like so much of KW it depends on the time of year, day and what else is...More

headline: All about the music
content: We stopped in 3 times during our visit to KW and always found great music acts performing !  This is the main reason to visit - the food, drinks and service are pretty average.

headline: The Hemingway swill
content:
Sloppy Joe's was Hemingway's Bar in Key West, or so the publicity says.
He'd hate the cruise ships coming in but the bar holds promise and the bar food is still good. A little pricey but that's tourism for you. And, btw, the floors aren't...More

headline: Great LUNCH!
content: We had a great lunch one Saturday in KW at Sloppy Joe's.  The guy on the guitar was great, my virgin daquiri (oh the joys of being pregnant in KW!) was yummy and made me feel like part of the crowd.  My husband enjoyed their...More

headline: Do NOT leave Key West without a night at Sloppy Joes!
content: My title says it all!  Not fancy, not frilly but a hell of a lot of fun!  The bands are aweome, the beer is cold, the place is always hopping!  The mood is fun & make you want to stay all night long!!!

headline: Slopp Joes
content: A rustic bar/saloon with great staff.  Good entertainment.  Fun to see the history.

headline: Touristy but still ok
content:
This place is full of history. It had good food (had cheese steak and mahi) and great live music which wasn't too loud. You're in the epicenter of tourist meets tourist. But that's ok. We would go back.
(100% wheelchair accessible)

headline: A Really Good Time! Close to all the action.
content: Pretty cool place with a lot of history. Wife & I stopped for drinks. This establishment was frequented by "Papa Hemmingway" back in the day, and they post pic's of all his look a likes on the end bar. We counted 7 "Papa's" while there....More

headline: Good food but slow service
content: Good food. The quesadilla was excellent and so was the sloppy Joe sandwich. The service was slow but there was live music.

headline: In one word, awful
content: My spouse and I got into Key West late evening after a ling day of travel and decided to at least get one drink on Duval before settling in for the night. Our unlucky stop was Sloppy Joes bar, an establishment that boasts ties to...More

headline: SO OVER RATED!
content: Talk about a place that gets by on it's name and history, this is it!  I've eaten here in the past and it's "OK" at best.  It's basically a drinking place with loud music, big crowds and expensive drinks.  This last trip we stopped in...More

headline: The yummiest sloppiest Joe ever!
content: Very fun venue for the whole family! Key West was a stop on our cruise. We look forward to returning to Key West on vacation in the near future.

headline: Favorite stop for pilots in town on training
content: My wife and I visited Sloppy Joe's with a group of Navy fighter pilots, down to Key West for training.  They all recommended the place to us highly, and we were not disappointed.  The bar has a good selection of beers, and mixed drinks are...More

headline: Good place to eat
content: We visited this bar/restaurant as a part of or walk though traditional Duval Street.  Enjoyed a lot the food and the athmosphere.  If you go to Key West, you should visit this place.

headline: A Key West institution - a sloppy joe at Sloppy Joe's is a "must" for any visit.
content: Decent bar food in a fun place with live entertainment.  Don't expect gourmet food, but it's nice to sit back and relax and have a very good sloppy joe or other more typical bar food.

headline: Key West legend !!
content: Had the "sloppy joe" sandwich and a bowl of chile ... oh yea ... a must in Key West !!

headline: Wow... I forgot how fun this place is
content: Live Music, great drinks, the best conch fritters in Key West.  This really includes it all. The staff takes extra care to make sure those from out of town feel welcome in this local's hangout.  Mid week, weekend, Sunday afternoon, you will have fun and...More

headline: Hemingways favorite
content: Had lunch after luckily finding a table. Piano player was fabulous, tacos and crab cakes were great, good service and a "happening place" that goes back to the old days of Key West.  Go to the Hemingway house and ask about his relationship with the...More

headline: Overrated
content:
Yes, it's one of the most popular spots along Duval Street, but it was extremely noisy and the food was only average.  We had sandwiches, which were tasty, but the portions were small.

That being said, it is a Key West landmark and I don't...More

headline: The Original Sloppy Joe's!
content: The food was excellent & very quickly received.  There was a LOT of food...may want to share!

headline: The original!
content: The food was excellent!  Very quickly received...and LOTS of it!

headline: Fun entertainment and Great Sloppy Joes!
content: Don't just walk by, actually stop in when there is a live band playing and entertaining. We heard a duo that was a "R" rated for sure, but we laughed so hard that our faces and sides ached! And of course, have a Sloppy Joe!

headline: Great place to eat in Key West!
content:
The food, staff and atmosphere are truly "Key West!"  We ordered the "Sloppy Joe" which was better than any other by the same name I have ever eaten and the place is just plane fun.  

We recommend it!  Charlene and Sheila, Durham, NC

headline: Good for Lunch
content: Lively atmosphere & very good lunch (did I mention, the drinks)

headline: Loud Fun crowd, loud fun music, Food's not bad
content: LOUD is the first word that comes to mind. Too loud for an older crowd, but ya gotta go there to have their "Sloppy Joe's" which, I was told this was the first place to make them. The entertainer's language was course, so if you're...More

headline: Thought this would be better
content:
this was just ok!!! a bity dirty fror my liking and please DONT use the toilets..
Just drank our drink and left, but a least we can say we have been.

headline: Exactly what we expected
content: This place can be found in any city but we still had to go there. Service was fine, food was fine, atmosphere was fun and lively with a band at lunch.  Its basically bar food but the French dip was a stand out.

headline: Typical bar
content: This is a typical bar without anything too exciting.  They have some pretty cool pictures up on the wall of the annual winner of the Ernest Hemmingway look-alike contest.  Seeing that was pretty cool.

headline: All you would expect!!
content:
Took our 2 kids (11 and 8) - got in as the doors opened on Sunday January 15, 2012.
It is what it is - lots of fun, historical and a great place!  The kids loved it and we took 40 pics in 90 minutes....More

headline: Great place to stop for a beer or two
content: I went to this place two nights in row. It had a great atmosphere and excellent service by both the bartenders and the waiters. Both nights had live entertainment as well which kept everyone entertained.

headline: Decent food and inexpensive
content: Typical, run-of-the mill bar. They have live entertainment at night. Wings, burgers, etc, etc. with beer on tap and in bottles. Mixed drinks available, too. It's a touristy place where the younger crowd likes to hang.

headline: great atmosphere
content: loved this place,,,great food, drinks and atmospher...had live music ..alittle noisy but we didnt mind cuz the atmosphere was buzzing...

headline: Great place to visit
content: Went to Sloppy Joes last week for drinks and dinner great wings! saw Emily's Toy Box band great night.

headline: Awesome food and music
content: The BEST Sloppy Joe I've ever had! The fries are great, too. They have great music, can be a little loud, but it's worth it since the food and music is so good.

headline: Hate to say it.... a little overrated.
content: Sloppy Joe's is a Key West landmark.... So we kinda felt like we "had" to go. The live music was awesome... but the food was just OK, and pretty pricey for what you get.

headline: Great place to visit, part of the Key West "to-do" list
content: It was a great place to go. It had a nice environment, wait was not too long. The food was good, nothing too awesome. We did order the Sloppy joe because we felt like this was the thing to order. Very good and there was...More

headline: Great Time & Great Food
content: Had an excellent time at Sloppy Joe's and yes the sloppy joe's are out of this world. Had a great time listenting to the man playing music in his bare feet!! A good time was had by all!

headline: Great place for lunch
content: We are really glad we stopped at Sloppy Joes when we were in Key West in early January.  It has a great location right on Duval Street (although we found out it wasn't the original location of the bar that Hemingway frequented).  The guy playing...More

headline: Not my wife's favorite
content: Rowdy, loud not much atmosphere for a couple, but would be fun with a goup of friends. Food average!

headline: nostalgic
content: Greak drinks, good pub grub, usually entertainment, and ...after all, its where Papa used to hang out.

headline: Food Terrible!
content: This is a Tourist Trap. Stop by and see where Hemmingway was supposed to hang out but don't buy more than a drink. the food is gross. How can they get it so wrong! Do not waste your money. We had the chilli which was...More

headline: Entertainment Good Food Okay
content: Great entertainment - food was okay - kind of busy to have really good service - food was okay - we will be back in April!

headline: Good place but a bit overrated
content: This place certainly has all the trappings of a tourist trap and there are many there.  Had a personal pizza which was great but the service was a little slow even when the place was not that busy and the guy playing piano just seemed...More

headline: The band was pitiful
content: Sloppy Joe's is a place you feel like you should go to in Key West. So we went. An hour later the band hadnt played a complete song. The 2 of them sucked to begin with and a cant imagine what would be on the...More

headline: Awesome bar!
content: You should definately visit this place. Great athmosphere, live music, $4 beers and $3.75 for a busket of french fries. Try their famous Slappy Rita. Must visit.

headline: Tourist must
content: It seems that every tourist must stop in to Sloppy Joe's.  It is ok the "door guy" was little testy but the beer is cold.

headline: A Great Place to Grab a Drink
content: We stopped in to grab a drink around 5 pm.  It was busy so we left. However, we went back at 9:30 and it was a new crowd. They moved the table and chairs at 10 to make room for the dancing. They had a...More

headline: Great Band & Fun Atmosphere
content: Ok, so a bit touristy, but still fun and lively! We just popped in to have a drink and listen to the excellent band on Sunday, 1/16/12. I have to say, it was fun people watching too. Nice crowd and all ages.

headline: Great entertainment!
content: Had a great time dancing! Just a fun place to hang out sing and dance when you want to cut loose. Loud environment

headline: Loved the Sloppy Rita's!
content: We loved Sloppy Joes!  The food was good and the drinks where strong.  They have live entertainment every night so you can't really tell if it is a Sat night or a Tues.

headline: Sloppy Joe and a Rum runner, cool and delicious!
